story:
This exquisite compact electric screwdriver is easy to operate and extremely practical - ideal for home use. The screwdriver has a comfortable, ergonomic handle; the rechargeable lithium battery design increases convenience; with its own LED lighting, you can use the screwdriver anywhere. This tool is perfect for those who enjoy DIY, or do a lot of disassembly.

The cap accommodates up to 12 replacement screwdriver bits, so you can store your selected bits inside it. In this way, the entire screwdriver and replacement heads can be perfectly combined. This clever design structure means that the screwdriver no longer requires a messy toolbox to hold all its parts, but can be placed on a table top, neatly in a drawer or easily carried around.

With this sleek and innovative one-piece design, you won't see any screws on the surface, and the all-aluminum casing gives it an exquisite appearance. Using German quality technology and an Apple-grade anodizing process, the grip is super-comfortable as well as resistant to staining and corrosion. The internal gears are tightly attached and durable. Top quality is guaranteed and the product comes with a full one-year warranty.

This screwdriver uses an all-metal gearbox that's both compact and powerful. The torsion is up to 0.9N.M for electric and 3N.M for manual use.

Note that the electric torque cannot always be applied: for example, a high level of torque is required in the initial state and in the final tightening of a screw. In this case, do not release the switch, but continue to hold down the switch while swinging the screwdriver to left and right. The host will then immediately start the self-locking function, and increase the electric torque.

The handle is only 31mm in diameter, which means the screwdriver is suitable for most people to hold comfortably. It can be used for a wide variety of household tasks, such as disassembly and assembly of small furniture, tables and chairs, door handles, various types of lamp, switches, etc.

The screwdriver has an Automatic-Manual design, which means it can easily be switched between electric and manual usages. If you enjoy the fun of taking things apart, then it can be a traditional manual screwdriver. If you're after speed, the automatic function can help you to install or remove screws in seconds.

Ordinary gun-type screwdrivers tend to require a manual direction change, but this unique screwdriver has only a single button on its entire body. You can start it with one click and control the direction of rotation without switching buttons. And it's battery-powered, so that screws can be easily turned with just a light touch – no major effort required!

Three shadow-less LED lights are also installed where the cutter head is connected. The lights can be automatically activated when you turn on the screwdriver, providing maximum illumination of your workspace and allowing you to operate in dimly-lit environments.

The screwdriver uses magnetic suction mounting between the bits and the body, so that no additional tools are required for installation. Just place the replacement tool head close to the body of the screwdriver to complete the installation. Continuing suction ensures that bits don't loosen during use, making the screwdriver very safe and convenient.

This is a fully complete and practical screwdriver set for home use: assembling beds and cabinets, repairing electrical appliances, etc. It has varying sizes of screwdriver bits that will easily meet your every need, with bit hardness of up to 60hrc. It is also equipped with 36 different screwdriver heads to handle varying types and sizes of screws.

 

 

The 67mm operating shaft allows you to rotate the screw easily, even if it's in a deep groove. In this way, this handy electric screwdriver can be seen as a robotic assistant that professionally disassembles anything screwed, allowing you to complete a job without any effort.

The screwdriver is powered by a lithium battery and can be recharged via Type-C. Charging takes only 2 hours. The unit displays a red light during charging status and a green light when fully charged. With its large capacity 1300mAh battery, the screwdriver is both cordless and portable. It has great endurance, lasting for more than 180 days of standby on a single charge, and it can be used for 10 to 30 days (non-continuous usage).

Ever been unable to manipulate a screwdriver due to sweaty hands? The electric screwdriver's accessories also include a soft anti-slip mat that ups friction, greatly increasing your productivity.

Thanks for the comments from backers all over the world. We are very glad that our previous Wowstick has made your lives more convenient and helped with such a variety of tasks!

STANDMAC, Inc. is a group of designers, engineers, and innovators seeking new ways to make everyday life more convenient. We create tools and products that empower people to take charge with the simple turn of a wrench or twist of a screwdriver. We want to move tools forward, and bring about the next generation of useful instruments.

CONTACT US - wowstickplay@standmac.com

story:
Covered by these fine folks (and others!):

The Temperfect Mug

Is your coffee too hot...and then too cold? This is the mug for you! The Temperfect mug extracts the excess heat from your coffee as you pour it in, stores that heat, and then uses it to keep your coffee just right for hours. It does this all without batteries, cords, electronics or apps, and it's infinitely reusable.

 

You get to drink your coffee right away—without burning your mouth.
You don't have to rush to finish it before it gets cold!

 

To work this magic, we added a second layer of insulation to a vacuum-insulated travel mug. This layer of Temperfect insulation is designed to quickly absorb excess heat from your drink, and then release it again, slowly, to keep your coffee from getting cold:

From Kickstarter to Indiegogo InDemand

After a successful crowdfunding run on Kickstarter, we're putting the Temperfect mug here on Indiegogo InDemand for those who missed the Kickstarter campaign and want to get themselves one of these magic mugs. You can order one (or more) of our mugs for immediate delivery by clicking the appropriate button at the right of this page. There are detailed descriptions of the various options below. If you need other quantities, or if you'd like to pay with PayPal or Amazon Pay, the shopping cart on our website, joeveo.com can accommodate you.

Delivery

Our mugs are assembled at our own factory here in North Carolina before shipment to our backers. We're currently shipping within a day or two of receiving your orders (non-US orders may take longer because they are done in weekly batches).

Decisions, Decisions

We are offering the Temperfect mug in different colors and with different surface treatments. The options are detailed in the paragraphs below. Just pick the mug that suits your taste, and click on the corresponding "Perks" button at the top right of this page to reserve one. If you'd like quantities that are not available in our perks, you can go to our website, joeveo.com, to order whatever combination of mugs you'd like.

All of these mugs have the Temperfect magic and hold a generous 16 oz of your favorite hot beverage.

The Temperfect mug in Joeveo orange

This is our flagship mug, with a brushed stainless steel exterior (and polished stainless steel on the interior surfaces), a glossy white food-grade polypropylene cover, and a grippy Joeveo orange ("orange juice with a shot of coffee") silicone sleeve. We use high-grade 304 series stainless steel for all metal parts of the mug.

Optional Sleeve Colors

We have two new colors; allow us to introduce Aqua and Charcoal, two classy new Temperfect colors available now. Just click the appropriate button at the right of this page to order.

Titania Coating

Titanium dioxide, or Titania, is a coating used in industry for insulation from extreme heat (in gas turbines, for example) or for parts that need an extremely wear-resistant coating. It is a ceramic, and it is applied with a plasma-spray process in which it is heated above its 3,400°F melting point and sprayed onto the mug surface, building up a layer of material from 0.003-0.007” thick. There's a video of the process on our Facebook page here (caution: loud plasma!) The Titania finish has a fine roughness, like that of bisque-fired ceramic, or slate, and even when wet it is not slippery. Because of the roughness, it builds up an interesting patina of scuffs with use (not scratches, it's too hard for that), so it is not a coating for someone who wants perfect uniformity. This is a "chameleon" coating that appears to change color depending on the light, surroundings and observer. It can appear to be black, dark blue, gray and all colors in between.
 

Frequently Asked Questions

Can I put it in the dishwasher?

The tumbler body is not dishwasher safe. The reason is the high temperatures in a dishwasher, particularly during the heated dry part of the cycle when the mug is near the heating element at the bottom of the dishwasher. The high temperatures reached in a dishwasher might degrade the vacuum insulation with time.

The cover and sleeve are dishwasher-safe though, and are designed to be easily disassembled for cleaning by hand or in the dishwasher.

Does the lid provide a leak-tight seal?

The lid on these mugs is not designed to be leak tight; it is intended to keep your drink hot and to keep it from sloshing out when you are walking with the mug, or when the mug is in your car (offroading, or on the typical Chicago city street, for instance). If the mug is inverted with coffee in it, it will leak, though slowly.

What do the temperature-time measurements look like?

Glad you asked! We measured the temperature of a mug-full of coffee poured into the Temperfect mug, a standard ceramic coffee mug and a normal vacuum-insulated travel mug. Here are the results:

The coffee temperature was the same for all three mugs initially, 78°C (172°F). This is the average coffee serving temperature we've measured for coffee machines and coffee shops (60°C is 140°F).

Any other questions about ordering or about the Temperfect mug?

We take any and all mug-related questions at contact@joeveo.com !

About Us

The coffee temperature was the same for all three mugs initially, 78°C (172°F). This is the average coffee serving temperature we've measured for coffee machines and coffee shops (60°C is 140°F).
Any other questions about ordering or about the Temperfect mug?
We take any and all mug-related questions at contact@joeveo.com !
About Us



the J. (Joeveo) Crew in April, 2017 at our favorite local coffee shop Joeveo it a little, but high-performing, startup in North Carolina, USA. We started with a Kickstarter campaign in 2013, the goal of which was to provide a solution to one of the world's most pressing hot beverage problems: our coffee was first too hot, and then suddenly too cold. The solution is the Temperfect mug, and the money we raised on Kickstarter helped us put it into production.
After years of post-crowdfunding manufacturing ramp-up, we now have a supply of the parts we need to make these mugs, and a factory, right here in North Carolina, where put them together and ship them to our customers. We are now shipping daily as orders come in. Get yours here on Indiegogo, or through our website, joeveo.com (for more ordering freedom).
Always feel free to get in touch at contact@joeveo.com!

story:
Marine Gardens Video: Can we save Vancouver's affordable rental housing gem, pride of Habitat 76?

Marine Gardens is a beautifully-designed complex with 70 affordable, family-oriented rental units in Vancouver, Canada. But this verdant housing complex is threatened by destruction for 584 new units in two towers (27 and 21 storeys) and a 6.5 storey midrise. The public hearing on this rezoning is on February 24, 2015 with a City Council decision soon thereafter. To influence the public discussion, a compelling video will help tell the story!

To tell this story, hyper-local documentary maker David Vaisboard, with renowned urbanist Ned Jacobs (son of writer Jane Jacobs) will prepare a 5-minute video featuring interviews with resident leader Jillian Skeet. Our $500 goal will cover recording and editing of video and audio. 

http://cityhallwatch.wordpress.com/2015/02/19/public-hearing-feb-24-rezonings/

Our $500 goal will cover recording and editing of video and audio. An extra $250 would be a bonus to help with printed materials to publicize the situation, and an extra $250 above that could go as a fund to support the efforts of Marine Gardens residents to represent and defend themselves. The video will be shown at the public hearing, be made available online for the whole world to see, and be available for any events to promote discussion about affordable housing and urban development.

Our goal is to document the beauty of this urban gem while it still exists, provide input for discussions at City Hall and the subsequent development processes at this site, and influence the discussion about housing issues in cities of the world. We hope the video might even inspire efforts to preserve the Marine Gardens community and legacy in some way.

Marine Gardens was designed by architect Michael Katz and landscape architect Cornelia Oberlander. It was completed in 1974 as a demonstration project for the “Habitat 76” conference, showing an innovative and livable, affordable and sustainable residential development. It is a highly successful example of compact townhouses achieving a density of 45 units/acre. The buildings were even designed to be dismantled and relocated.

Although City Hall and the developer plan to destroy and replace the 70 affordable rental units (albeit, replaced at market rates) and relocate tenants (giving them right of first refusal following redevelopment), the plan will in fact uproot and scatter a fine and unique multicultural community that includes low-income residents. The deplorable plans will enable the destruction of one of Vancouver’s hidden gems. This story needs to be documented and told. And we believe the telling of the story might change the outcome. 

We also consider the very process of making this video to be a collective learning experience. There are a myriad of housing and development challenges facing Vancouver and most cities of the world today. We will learn from this process and develop a model for planning/funding/creating/distributing a short documentary video for use in other cases like these. 

FURTHER REFERENCES

http://cityhallwatch.wordpress.com/2015/02/19/public-hearing-feb-24-rezonings/

Previous coverage on CityHallWatch (click the URL above for all the links below)

Marine Gardens (445 SW Marine) rezoning going to Public Hearing? Resident asks City Council to stop now, citing City misrepresentation, conflict of interest, irregularities, etc. (January 31, 2015)

Marine Gardens residents challenge Vision Vancouver’s claims of affordable housing, greenest city: Briefing Nov 6

(November 5, 2014)

Letter: Where Is The Missing Land Title For Marine Gardens? (And All That is Wrong with City Planning) (September 16, 2014)

Marine Gardens: who would notice a gem in a five and dime store? (Photos and commentary by urbanist Ned Jacobs, April 13, 2013)

Open House April 25th – Concord’s Marine Gardens proposal for 584 units at 445 SW Marine Drive

(April 12, 2013)

Ned Jacobs reflects on Geoff Olson opinion piece: Jane Jacobs’ vision lost among Vancouver’s high towers (October 24, 2014)

Proponent: Concord Pacific (See our prior article about this corporate citizen: Concord Pacific: Corporate social responsibility, integrity and governance)

story:
Short Summary

The Frank Lloyd Wright Gordon House is a House Museum located at the Oregon Garden in Historic Silverton, Oregon. It is the only Frank Lloyd Wright designed building open to the public in the Pacific Northwest. It is open for guided tours and can be rented for private events. Our leaky roof was recently replaced with single-ply Durolast roofing which will protect the house for generations to come. The West Balcony awaits critical repairs to reconstruct and restore the sagging double cantilever structure. Your help with these and other important projects is needed to protect, preserve  and restore the house. Check out the Gordon House at: http://www.thegordonhouse.org/

What We Need & What You Get

We need your donations, large and small to help pay for the amazing new roof and fund the West Balcony restoration.
Roof Restoration:
The full roof replacement was partially funded by a generous grant from the MJ Murdock Foundation, material donations from Durolast Roofing, and labor and material donations from Competitive Commercial Roofing and Pacific Crest Construction. Upon removal of the existing built-up roof, a considerable amount of dry rot and decay was found, complicating membrane installation and adding significant unforeseen costs to the project. It is all sealed up and complete now to protect the house from the persistent Oregon rains.
West Balcony:
The West Balcony restoration project has been designed by Tim Richard, GBD Architects and KPFF Structural Engineers, and is ready to permit as soon as funding has been secured. You can help make this happen.
Perks:
Your generous donations will be rewarded with gifts and private access to the Gordon House. See listed perks. Please give a donation to these projects and share this request for support with your friends and other FL Wright followers.

The Impact

Your donations will help us continue to preserve and restore this architectural gem. It is truly a little jewel box. To date, the Gordon House Conservancy has deconstructed, moved, reassembled and restored the Gordon's Usonian style farm house. It is open for public tours and hosts business retreats, weddings, art exhibits, poetry readings and other special events. Educational programs offer a unique opportunity for students to learn about Frank Lloyd Wright and his contribution to design and architecture. We need your new and continued support in these important efforts.

Risks & Challenges

Maintaining a Frank Lloyd Wright House can be challenging. Flat roofs with minimal slope in Oregon, multiple cantilevers, cedar siding's appeal to wood peckers among other unique details such as the fretwork windows and signature red concrete floors require special ongoing preservation and care. Providing public access to a house designed for a single family also creates additional needs for care and protection. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you live in or near Oregon's central Willamette Valley, you can volunteer as a tour guide, gardener, librarian or event support staff. Corporate sponsorship are also welcome. We can always use material donations for projects or goods and services for our silent auctions and outreach events. We are open to other ideas, just let us know what you can give to support this Oregon Treasure. Visit the Gordon House, take a guided tour, buy one-of-a-kind gifts and memerobilia.

jewel box. To date, the Gordon House Conservancy has deconstructed, moved,
reassembled and restored the Gordon's Usonian style farm house. It is open for public
tours and hosts business retreats, weddings, art exhibits, poetry readings and other special
events. Educational programs offer a unique opportunity for students to learn
about Frank Lloyd Wright and his contribution to design and architecture. We
need your new and continued support in these important efforts.
Risks & Challenges
 Maintaining a Frank Lloyd
Wright House can be challenging. Flat roofs with minimal slope in Oregon,
multiple cantilevers, cedar siding's appeal to wood peckers among other unique
details such as the fretwork windows and signature red concrete floors require
special ongoing preservation and care. Providing public access to a house
designed for a single family also creates additional needs for care and
protection. 
Other Ways You Can Help
 If you live in or near
Oregon's central Willamette Valley, you can volunteer as a tour guide, gardener, librarian or event
support staff. Corporate sponsorship are also welcome. We can always use
material donations for projects or goods and services for our silent auctions
and outreach events. We are open to other ideas, just let us know what you can
give to support this Oregon Treasure. Visit the Gordon House, take a guided tour, buy one-of-a-kind gifts and memerobilia.

story:
We are LumNkey. We want to create a new generation of smart-technology that is affordable for everyone in the form of our futuristic key design.Our innovative design could help to improve your way of life on a daily basis. Our inspiration is born out of a simple frustration: not being able to find your keys. We now want to take our solution to the next level, and provide an easy-to-use device that is available to everyone. This is the smart key of the future.

Since May 2016 our team of developers, enthusiastic individuals with passion in their field, have been working on our concept and perfecting our initial design. All that is required is for the LumNkey device to be paired with your smart phone. After both devices are paired, just download our LumNkey App on your mobile store and connect the profile to the your chosen WiFi and you are ready to go! . The key illuminates automatically when you enter the proximity of your WiFi, making LumNkey easier to locate in a bag or pocket incredibly straightforward. Returning home has never been a more pleasant experience with the confidence that this product brings you. LumNkey is tried, tested and ready to make its way to the public market and speak for itself. 

The quality of the LumNkey gadget is excellent and reliable. It’s simplistic and completely user-friendly design makes light work of finding your keys. You get incredible value for money and a simple-to use product. The L.E.D provides a stress-free, convenient way to come home in the dark. It uses state of the art Bluetooth technology and with multi-operational modes in the RGB L.E.D, it’s also easy to choose the illumination of your preference. It is small enough to fit into your pocket too. With LumNkey and all it provides, you are buying safety, security and peace of mind for returning home in the dark.

Key covers and key tags are out-of-date, wear-and-tear material proven not durable, little to no visibility with glow-in-dark making it impractical and difficult to see. LumNkey outperforms in quality and high visibility with its featured technology.

 

It is our intention to provide an elite product for everyone to be able to afford. It is our goal to mass-produce these devices so that everyone can own their own assurance that LumNkey will light the way; allowing everybody to experience the extraordinary.We have experienced manufacturers on-board who are enthusiastic and ready to make our innovative idea a reality. In the future of LumNkey we would like to see the clever technology on more than just people’s homes. We hope to be able to reach out to provide for all of people’s lock-illuminating needs; be that bikes, deadbolts, boats or garage doors. The possibilities are endless. Easy to use and easy to order, the incredibly affordable price also includes shipping costs. In case you think this is too good to be true it’s important to explain how it works. We can bring this amazing product to your door, and your pocket, by cutting out the middle man. By using a direct-to-consumer model, it enables us to cut handling costs such as distributors and retail stores. We provide the light at the end of your commute, dinner date, or evening out for just $10.

If your LumNkey doesn’t do what it says in the description, just send it back to us. We will replace it, free of charge, with a brand new unit. Back the revolution! Be a part of incredible technological advancements! Be one of the first in your community to have affordable automation technology. It’s a ground-breaking way to provide safety and security in the dark when entering your home and we need you to support the revolution! Please become involved in our mission to provide safety, security and practical illumination solutions for everyone. Let’s be a success story! New to Indigogo, we’re pledging for the support of those who want to revolutionize the technology market for their community. We want to provide an affordable, stress-free, user-friendly safety solution for entering your home in darkness. The integrated design of LumNkey provides ease of manufacture and customer use. Along with affordability and the benefits of an entirely effective product in its market, we really believe we can exact change.

 

 

Risks and challenges

We realize that any crowd-funding campaign comes with its own risks and challenges related to product development and marketing. Our professional team of experts has painstakingly created and tested LumNkey over an extended span to ensure complete contentment for customers. We have lined up manufacturers and are raring to deliver an exceptionally smart self-illumination device. Placing quality and realism at the top-most part of the ladder of priority, we guarantee a transparent process throughout. In case of unforeseen issues, you will be the first to know of it. You are welcome to get in touch with us regarding any queries you have on LumNkey. We value and cherish your support!

story:
Lock-Pod at a Glance:

Full Control All in One App:

 

 

Take complete control of your Lock-Pod via our proprietary, patent-pending mobile app on your Wi-Fi connected smartphone, tablet or computer.  Here are some of the functions that the app allows you to do:

  • Engage or disengage either lock separately, or both locks together, from virtually anywhere.
  • View your active Lock-Pod integrated camera or view your other network-synced cameras.
  • Adjust the temperature inside Lock-Pod's Thermoelectric condition-controlled compartment.
  • Allow access to one or both compartments, specifically designed for Rx, CE and standard package deliveries.  Lock-Pod accommodates all standard size FedEx, UPS and USPS boxes.
  • Receive email or app notifications for status including: Unlocked, Locked, Opened, Closed, Delivery Completed and more via Preferences.  The integrated Motion Activated Camera automatically turns on the camera and records whenever movement is detected.
  • Schedule when the compartments are unlocked during the day for friends or family to drop off items, or give them a digital code to manually lock/unlock whenever they arrive.
  • Sync with all major carriers for pre-delivery notices, tracking number cross-referencing, complete process scanning and automated delivery completed notifications.  Set preferences for "e-signatures" to never get a re-delivery notice again!

Lock-Pod Compatibility:

 

Our patent-pending app is specifically designed to utilize the most current API technology.  This allows us to ensure integration and compatibility with all major platforms from both carriers and manufacturers of home automation products. Implementing API technology that is flexible and adaptable gives our Lock-Pod users full, reliable integration with a universe of smart devices.

 

    Why Lock-Pod?

     

    With explosive, year-over-year increases in online sales leading to more and more deliveries everyday, package theft has become one of the fastest growing crimes in the world.  "Porch Pirates" are exploiting this situation and with carriers delivering over 7 billion packages a year, they are finding plenty of opportunities.  Today, everything from food to personal items to prescription drugs are delivered to homes and offices daily.  Theft of these parcels leads to increased costs, massive inconvenience and potentially dangerous situations.  With this in mind, we challenged ourselves to create a modern solution to solve these problems and in the process contribute positively to individual happiness, general productivity and the global economy as a whole, all at once.

    The Lock-Pod team is dedicated to providing a smart, elegant, easy-to-use solution to help online and local shoppers safeguard deliveries of their purchased goods.  It was important to us that it was portable, removable and could be adapted to work in just about any environment or situation.  Our goal is to bring this product to all households, businesses and organizations at an affordable price to help deter theft, reduce crime, create safer delivery situations and ease the minds of consumers (and drivers) everywhere.

    • A secure and reliable solution to prevent criminals from stealing your deliveries
    • A smart and intuitive system that works with existing technology and all major platforms
    • A solution that is easy to use and easily controlled from your computer or mobile device
    • An "outside the home" solution for receiving deliveries without having to allow strangers to enter your home when you're not available
    • A personal mailbox and storage system for friends and family dropping off or picking up items for you.  Great for renters or Airbnb, no more leaving your keys under the door mat...

    What the experts have to say:

     

    “People who are relying on a camera to protect their packages are probably kidding themselves”

    -Captain Gary Berg – Campbell, CA Police Department

     

    “You never know who’s going to recognize the person. 

    Then, if we get that person’s ID, we put out a warrant for their address.”

    -Detective Linda Longo – Philadelphia, PA Police Department

     

    “Thieves are going from house to house to house.  They just follow a UPS truck,

    then jump out and see if there was a delivery, and grab it”

    -Spokeswoman Jodi Silva– Houston, TX Police Department

    Once We Reach our Funding Goal:

     

    • When the campaign on Indiegogo ends, the funds will go directly towards creating the working Prototype, Hardware, Software and Systems Integration, and Tooling
    • Lock-Pod has completed the 3D modeling process and identified the 3D printing company to work on the prototyping www.forecast3d.com
    • Lock-Pod has completed proof of concept on the app and has identified the API development company to integrate the hardware and software www.loftllc.com
    • All the components have been sourced and Lock-Pod has identified and audited all factories
    • We will finalize all molds, materials and finishes
    • We will be able to immediately begin creating the finalized prototype and begin the onset production cycle to deliver Lock-Pod on schedule!

    Risk Mitigation

     

    Launching a new CE product is inherently risky.  It takes the right combination of art and science to not just build a product that works, but also one that is useful and helpful to consumers as well. Many CE projects, even those that have been well funded, have been lost in the concept stage due to creating "a solution in search of a problem".  Others have been great concepts, but have fallen down in the execution stages due to lack of planning, foresight or experience.  Here are some reasons why the Lock-Pod team is confident that we can build the bridge between a great idea and a successful product launch.

    • There is no question that package theft is a major issue and that currently available products do not offer a complete solution.  Conceptually, Lock-Pod is the most comprehensive solution available for a problem that is only getting worse.  We know we are the best mousetrap...
    • The Lock-Pod team has over 50 years of combined experience in the ideation, integration, production, manufacturing, and distribution of many successful consumer electronics products and general consumer goods.  
    • We have decades of go-to-market experience in a variety of consumer products and channels including: Mobile, Direct to Consumer, B2B, Licensed Goods, Computers and Accessories, Networking Products, Power Products, Outdoor Products and related Distribution.
    • The Lock-Pod team has been involved in multiple startups in a variety of disciplines including Sales, Marketing, PR, Operations, Sourcing, Forecasting, Industrial Design, IT, Packaging and Hardware/Software Integration.  This has given us a unique "360" perspective on what works really well, what works pretty well, and what doesn't work at all...
    • We have also worked in association with a number Fortune 500 companies in both employee and consulting capacities.  This has provided us with the opportunity to overcome a different subset of business challenges and given us more broad-based global experience as well.
    • We currently have a planning and execution strategy in place to solve most foreseeable problems quickly and effectively based upon our collective experience. 
    • Additionally, we have put together a "flow" process with mitigation contingencies, which we have identified in partnership with our extended network, to help our development team meet all projected timelines.  We have in fact hit all current milestones as a direct result.
    • These clear goals and timelines are entered into our automated production roadmap, which allows us to easily share information and communicate supply chain status with all production partners instantly, in order to have transparency both upstream and downstream.

    Lock-Pod Signature Cut Proof/Water Proof Net:

    FAQS

     

    How do I contact the Lock-Pod team?

    Please e-mail us at info@lock-pod.com.

    What size package fits in Lock-Pod?

    Lock-Pod's inner dimensions are 18 3/4 x 13 1/2 x 6 1/2 and will accommodate all FedEx, UPS, USPS, and DHL equivalent Standard Large Boxes and below with enough room to retrieve them.

    Where does Lock-Pod ship?

    Lock-Pod ships worldwide!

    How does Lock-Pod communicate with other devices?

    Lock-Pod works over Wi-Fi and can easily be adapted to your home network.

    What kinds of batteries does Lock-Pod product take?

    Lock-Pod has a built-in battery that is rechargeable via the USB port.  Lock-Pod can also be connected directly to A/C power.

    Do I need any additional equipment to use Lock-Pod?

    Any smartphone, tablet or computer with a Wi-Fi connection will allow you to access and control all of the features of Lock-Pod when you use with our proprietary app.

    What is IFTTT?

    IFTTT stands for If This Then That, and is a flexible platform that Lock-Pod is compatible with.  This is one way to allow our device to connect to all of your existing technologies: Samsung Smartthings, Nest, Ring, Blink, Amazon Alexa, Google, and much more.

    Why order now?

    Lock-Pod is offering introductory level discounts to all of our early contributors and will never again be offered at these extremely low rates.

    How do I check the status of my pre-order?

    The Lock-Pod team will provide continual updates to all of our contributors to ensure all information is up-to-date and completely transparent.  You can also inquire via our info@lock-pod.com email address.

    Which Thermoelectric Modules does Lock-Pod use?

    The Ceramic Plate (CP) Series of Thermoelectric Modules (TEMs) is considered the standard in the thermoelectric industry.  Assembled with Bismuth Telluride semiconductor material and thermally conductive Aluminum Oxide ceramics, the CP Series is designed for higher current and large heat-pumping applications.  Lock-Pod uses only CP TEMs.

    What can I control on Lock-Pod with my smartphone?

    You can view the Lock-Pod integrated camera, open/close the compartments, lock/unlock the locking hooks, control the temperature, schedule deliveries, receive notifications and much more through the patent-pending Lock-Pod app.

    What is the purpose of Lock-Pod?

    Lock-Pod is the all-in-one secure smart home device to help deter theft, reduce crime, and ease the minds of consumers (and drivers) everywhere.

    What is the warranty?

    Lock-Pod has a one-year warranty.

story:
Our Story

We are Tupuca and this is a story and a journey shared by four aspiring African entrepreneurs looking to make a difference in society.

Tupuca means to indulge, a word derived from a local Angolan dialect. This word was the setting for what we envisioned multiple people doing, indulging in food, family, friendships and moments. This spurred us to think of how to efficiently bring this vision to the masses, while using existing infrastructure and human capital. Thus, Tupuca was born, a food delivery application that acts as a platform to connect the daily customer to their restaurant of choice, a simple yet effective idea. Furthermore, we seek to tackle an even bigger issue, which revolves around child hunger, this app will seek to take comprehensive steps to reducing the current staggering statistics that we are facing, this application will have a built in option that will allow the user to donate a chosen amount to a charity of choice.


Tupuca will create jobs in the logistic and administrative fields as well as offering expansion for our partnered restaurants and ultimately boosting the economy.

Our contributors would not only help bring convenience to an untapped Angolan market, but would also help provide an avenue for people to give back when they order using our application and create job opportunities as well.

What We Need & What You Get

Our app has come to live thanks to bootstrapping and many hours of work, all showed in our demo video we uploaded. As we are approaching the finish line we are unfortunately running out of fuel. A $20 000 injection would see us get across the line and successfully launch our app.


We have come up with exciting perks for our potential investors: these perks aim to make the donor/investor feel part of our journey. Tupuca will guarantee that your donation will find its way to the intended hands that need it the most.

The Impact

Through our interactive application, we create a comprehensive platform that aims to connect the users with multiple restaurants, ensuring them timely delivery of quality foods or pick up. Tupuca will look to solve daily inconvenient situations where staff has high food demands with very little time between breaks and traffic constricts movement, Tupuca will deliver nutritious meals to people in the workplace that might otherwise pass up lunch due to constraints and ultimately be less productive.

Job opportunities for young biker boys will be created through the demand for an adequate logistic network, getting them off the streets performing informal taxi work into being paid staff and professionals.

Addressing the bigger issue has never been easier, Tupuca’s built function for optional donation, we can make sure that you and I start taking steps towards solving pressing matters when it comes to child starvation. 

Risks & Challenges

With any innovation comes great risk especially in a developing country. Tupuca is taking into account the internal risk such as low technology adoption by the employees, miss-communication, and miss handling of funds. Our goal is to mitigate these risks by training our employees using the best practices from well-established industries.Convenience, innovation, efficiency, transparency, and honesty is embedded to our core believe and mission.

Externally, the major risks that we have to take into account are malfunction and high data usage of the application and website, failure of method of payment, low market acceptance, non-compliance by the restaurants, copyrights violations, and lawsuits. Malfunction and high data usage risks will be tackled from the design and creation stage during the prototype-testing phase. By providing different payment options such as cash, credit cards, mobile banking, and rechargeable membership cards will be able to serve a greater target market. Restaurants compliance will be improved by providing them a ready to use software in a tablet where they see and respond to the orders and reservation with minimum effort. Lawsuits and copyright infringement will be mitigated by hiring a lawyer which will help to create detailed copyrights, terms and agreements conditions that will protect our business.


Other Ways You Can Help

We appreciate your support towards making our dream come true and to brighten the day of so many other people that make part of the Tupuca circle.

Please spread the word and have it at the back of your mind that through your effort, someone will have a chance to donate to the less fortunate when they use TUPUCA. You are a big difference maker.

Thank you
story_txt:
Our Story 
We are Tupuca and this is a story and a journey shared by
four aspiring African entrepreneurs looking to make a difference in society.
Tupuca means to indulge, a word derived from a local Angolan
dialect. This word was the setting for what we envisioned multiple people
doing, indulging in food, family, friendships and moments. This spurred us to
think of how to efficiently bring this vision to the masses, while using
existing infrastructure and human capital. Thus, Tupuca was born, a food
delivery application that acts as a platform to connect the daily customer to
their restaurant of choice, a simple yet effective idea. Furthermore, we seek
to tackle an even bigger issue, which revolves around child hunger, this app
will seek to take comprehensive steps to reducing the current staggering
statistics that we are facing, this application will have a built in option
that will allow the user to donate a chosen amount to a charity of choice.

Tupuca will create jobs in the logistic and administrative
fields as well as offering expansion for our partnered restaurants and
ultimately boosting the economy.
Our contributors would not only help bring convenience to an
untapped Angolan market, but would also help provide an avenue for people to
give back when they order using our application and create job opportunities as
well.
   What We Need & What You Get
 

Our app has come to live thanks to bootstrapping and many
hours of work, all showed in our demo video we uploaded. As we are approaching
the finish line we are unfortunately running out of fuel. A $20 000 injection
would see us get across the line and successfully launch our app.
We have come up with exciting perks for our potential
investors: these perks aim to make the donor/investor feel part of our journey.
Tupuca will guarantee that your donation will find its way to the intended
hands that need it the most. 

The Impact 


Through our interactive application, we create a
comprehensive platform that aims to connect the users with multiple
restaurants, ensuring them timely delivery of quality foods or pick up. Tupuca
will look to solve daily inconvenient situations where staff has high food
demands with very little time between breaks and traffic constricts movement,
Tupuca will deliver nutritious meals to people in the workplace that might
otherwise pass up lunch due to constraints and ultimately be less productive.
Job opportunities for young biker boys will be created
through the demand for an adequate logistic network, getting them off the
streets performing informal taxi work into being paid staff and professionals.
Addressing the bigger issue has never been easier, Tupuca’s
built function for optional donation, we can make sure that you and I start
taking steps towards solving pressing matters when it comes to child
starvation.    Risks & Challenges  



With any innovation comes great risk especially in a
developing country. Tupuca is taking into account the internal risk such as low
technology adoption by the employees, miss-communication, and miss handling of
funds. Our goal is to mitigate these risks by training our employees using the
best practices from well-established industries.Convenience,
innovation, efficiency, transparency, and honesty is embedded to our core believe and
mission.
Externally,
the major risks that we have to take into account are malfunction and high data usage of the
application and website, failure of method of payment, low market acceptance,
non-compliance by the restaurants, copyrights violations, and lawsuits. Malfunction
and high data usage risks will be tackled from the design and creation stage
during the prototype-testing phase. By providing different payment options such
as cash, credit cards, mobile banking, and rechargeable membership cards will
be able to serve a greater target market. Restaurants compliance will be
improved by providing them a ready to use software in a tablet where they see
and respond to the orders and reservation with minimum effort. Lawsuits and
copyright infringement will be mitigated by hiring a lawyer which will help to
create detailed copyrights, terms and agreements conditions that will protect
our business.

  

Other Ways You Can Help 

We appreciate your support towards making our dream come
true and to brighten the day of so many other people that make part of the
Tupuca circle. 
Please spread the word and have it at the back of your mind
that through your effort, someone will have a chance to donate to the less fortunate
when they use TUPUCA. You are a big difference maker. 
Thank you

story:
They talk about us


They support us


Fighting energy poverty



In collaboration with the organisation AI4D (Africa Investment For development), our aim is to bring light into these people’s lives thanks to a simple and eco-friendly solution which promotes local economic development.


How do we make a difference ? 

We have created lighting systems which illuminate streets, households, shops, schools, medical centers at all time of day and night. This solution is:

  • Fighting energy poverty the simplest way, with a plastic bottle

Our lighting systems are made of a simple circuit, a battery, an LED, a plastic bottle and a small solar panel.The simplicity of this solution allows anybody to build it from scratch. 

  • An eco-friendly solution
Besides reducing and reusing plastic waste, our lighting systems use renewable energy for better environmental value and social impact.

  • A south-south innovation, created by the poorest for the poorest

We share our open-source technology with local communities. Once they own the know-how they can take care of all the maintenance and install new lighting systems. Hence, they become totally independent from us and can create their own micro enterprises.


Our impacts


Where the money goes ?

With 27.000$, we can ensure the project in Ivory Coast!

The money will be used to:

  • buy the required materials to build the lighting systems;
  • finance human and material logistic;
  • install the lighting systems both in people's homes and in the streets (2.000 villagers involved);
  • train the local community in order to guarantee the economic sustainability of their actions;
  • measure the impact of our installation and our trainings with the help and support of our local partners.

With 50.000$, we can ensure the replicability of our actions!

The money will be used to:

  • support the micro entrepreneur with the organisation of the maintenance as well as the new installation of the new lighting systems;
  • support the microentrepreneur in reinforcing connections with local suppliers;
  • organize new projets in the region with the support of Mr. Ehouman Oi Ehouman, Tiémélékro's mayor.


Testimonies 

"Thank you so much for the light! I would never dare coming at night before because I was scared of the dark!" - Leila, Syrian woman in the refugee camp of Calais.

"When I discovered Liter of Light, I thought it would be a great solution for my community back in Ivory Coast. This is how we started working together with the team of Liter of Light on this beautiful project." - Odile Ano, coordinator at AI4D (Africa Investment For Development)

"I have always cared about humanitarian causes. With Liter of Light, I found a young team of people who really wants to make a difference. Since 2015, I have been involved in many interesting projects all over the world. Moreover I had the chance to see the smiles on people's face when they get the light." - Thomas, 23 years old volunteer.

Partners


A competent and passionate team

story:
The test version of the customizer site available here



OUR STORY

Peter is a Hungarian designer with over 17 years of experience in sports management. The story began with the production of a folding bike. He wanted to keep his office wear clean, so decided to build a chainless commuter bicycle equipped with carbon belt drive system. The idea to upcycle the spare parts not used for the bike was the first step...

The bike desk lamp was originally created by Peter as a solution when his daughter started school in 2013 and did not like sitting at the desk. Some friends asked him to create a lamp for their kids so he started to make them in different colours. In 2015 Peter founded Industrial Kid to improve the original design and launch the bike desk lamp internationally.

Featured on

„We really want one of these on our desk at work.” Total Women’s Cycling

„You can't get enough bike-related stuff in your life.” SPOKE magazine

„Going to have to add it to our list of best office gadgets.” Interesting Engineering



FEATURES AND BENEFITS

Industrial Kid’s bicycle-inspired, contemporary design lamps offer the customers the freedom of choice by participating in the creative process. Each piece is unique because individual owners customize the lamp by playing with the colour of the spare parts.

The economic LED bulb can be switched on and off with a gentle pull of the brake levers. The LED bulb included. To enjoy Industrial Kid experience just follow these 3 steps:
  1. Pick your colour scheme by using the customizer
  2. Click Submit button
  3. Receive the package, open and use.


TECNICAL SPECIFICATIONS


Dimensions: 50 x 47 x 20 cm (height x width x depth)
Weight: 1.6 kg
Materials
Base: Ø 20 cm x 2 cm – beech, solid, varnished or dyed
Arm: Ø 2.5 cm – beech, solid, varnished or dyed
Stem: steel, powder coated
Brake levers: aluminum, powder coated
Electrical components
Light source: GU10 LED bulb, 270 Lumen, 4W
Colour temperature: warm white (2,700 K)
Input: 230V, ~50Hz 0.3A with EU plug
Power cord: 2 m transparent cable
Usage: Indoor use only



SPARE PARTS AND MATERIALS


BRAKE LEVERS AND STEM

Brake levers and stem available in 10 different colours to make the desk lamp compliment any interior. The brake levers are made of aluminum, the stem is made of steel. We have a variety of different colour concepts and will continue to develop imaginative and innovative designs and finishes, offering you complete freedom of expression.


BOWDEN CABLE HOUSING AND GIPS

The grips made of soft rubber. Bowden cable housing and grips also available in 10 different colours.

WOODEN PARTS

The base and the arm of the lamps are made of birch. Due to the hardness of the material, we shape it with power tools. As its colour range is fairly wide with a light grain that may be straight, wavy, or curly, the number of variations are unlimited. The wooden parts treated and finished with natural preservatives (linseed oil) only.



BETA TESTING

Bike desk lamp underwent a long design process. A lot has changed since the first lamp was produced.

The current version of the lamp is the result of multiple iterations. Challenges were multifold: finding the right shape for the base and arm, ensuring good balance without creating a heavy product. We pay attention to the selected materials to provide a child-friendly product and user experience. In order to present you unique and exquisite artwork throughout the production we have very rigorous quality control. We insist that every single detail of our product is perfect.

We also pay special attention to the tecnical standards and regulations. The base product (regular desk lamp switching method) bears the EC declaration of conformity. The production is in compliance with the relevant safety requirements of certain electrical equipment.



REWARDS


PLEASE DON'T FORGET TO ADD THE SHIPPING PRICE!



ALL WE NEED IS YOU

We have entered the final phase of our development and need one last final push for mass production. We need the help of the Indiegogo community to bring Industrial Kid desk lamp to you and to start production in 2016 and for this we need 20,000 USD. Here’s a graph describing how we’d like to utilise your help:


We believe that the custom made creative process will be popular on the design market. With your support we can finish the certificaion process and start mass-production this spring. Have a look at our timeline:


As an Industrial Kid supporter you will be kept up to date with progress at regular intervals and share the journey with us.

We really believe in the power of community and hope that you will soon be able to enjoy your personalised Industrial Kid desk lamp!

THANK YOU ALL!



MEET THE TEAM

We have the right mix of dreamers, doers and worriers in our team. 

Peter is the designer of Industrial Kid and is in charge of all the design and production aspects of the lamps. He looks after the logistics of the production, and works day in and day out to ensure that you get the best quality stuff. He is based in Cegled, Hungary and now is focusing fully on Industrial Kid sales.

Zsani is our business development specialist, based in Eger, Hungary. She oversees all the strategic issues and makes sure that everything is going in the right direction and we are working in the most efficient way.

Marti covers the communication tasks, planning and how to engage with people through a variety of channels. She studies economy and lives in Budapest, Hungary.

Imre controls the financials of Industrial Kid. He is a real entrepreneur, with a strong business driven philosophy. He based in Budapest, Hungary.



Risks and challenges

Industrial Kid materials are sourced from domestic and international suppliers. We are mitigating supply risk (supply disruptions, lead time, quality issues, etc.) by working with well-established businesses, by not relying on any one supplier, and by sourcing most of our materials directly from Hungary. We take the responsibility for delivering on our targets and promise to always be transparent in informing you of any potential delays along the way.

PRODUCT TESTING
We have built multiple working prototypes that may be altered by design refinements to enhance the assembly of the final product. The tone of the colours may also differ from photos depending on the choice of the final paint material and coating process.

MANUFACTURING
We have established relationships with experienced local manufacturers to mitigate the risk of delays and ensure that quality control is implemented to the highest level. We have built test prototypes and will continue fine-tuning the process to provide you with the best possible product at the best possible price.

SHIPPING DATE
We have built in extra time for the testing and manufacturing process and are confident we will ship by the projected dates. We will keep you informed of any unforeseen delays.

FAQ

  • How do I choose the colour for my order?
  • We will send you a survey once the fundraising campaign is completed to confirm your colour choice.

  • When will I receive my order?
  • The first and second product shipments were expected in June and July 2016, as indicated in the campaign.
  • (We handcraft each and every Industrial Kid desk lamp, and make sure all of them are perfect. Since so many people have ordered, it takes some time for production.)

  • What should I do if I’ve bought one Industrial Kid desk lamp and want to buy one more?
  • Please simply contribute to one more perk. :-)

  • Do I get a discount on the price/shipping fee if I buy more than one Industrial Kid desk lamp?
  • On the prices: The current prices of Industrial Kid desk lamp are already discounted.
  • On the shipping fee: Two Industrial Kid desk lamp doubles the volumetric weight, so the shipping companies would charge twice. (I.e. no discount will be provided by them)

  • What type of plug and voltage is it for Industrial Kid desk lamp?
  • It is two-prong plug and 230V. Since the plug and voltage condition vary in different countries, please prepare your own plug adapter and converter if needed. We intended to ship Industrial Kid desk lamps with different plugs and voltage types in short term.

  • Can we change the light bulb in Industrial Kid desk lamps?
  • Yes. You can remove the lid and change the light bulb. But please, note: you can use Industrial Kid desk lamps with LED bulb only.

  • Is there a warranty on Industrial Kid desk lamps?
  • Yes, we provide a one-year warranty. Under normal usage, if malfunction or damage occurs, you can send Industrial Kid desk lamp back to us to get it repaired. The warranty covers the electric components and the brake levers operating the switch.

Bringázz velem haza! – asztali lámpák a kerékpározás jegyében

Bringázás = szabadság + játék + friss levegő. Mintha újra gyerekek lennénk. Az Industrial Kid lámpái ezt a könnyed, vidám hangulatot viszik be a szobába, ha már a bringát kint kell hagyni. És még világítanak is. Kezdeményezésünk támogatásával a már kifejlesztett termék sorozatgyártásának beindítását segítheted, hogy a bringás lámpát eljuttathassuk mindenkihez.

A koncepció

Lámpát többnyire úgy vásárol az ember, hogy bemegy a lámpaboltba, rábök az egyikre, amelyik tetszik neki, és hazaviszi. Ezzel szemben egy Industrial Kid lámpa kiválasztása maga az alkotófolyamat, a játék. Azt persze senkitől sem várják el, hogy össze is szerelje a lámpáját, viszont mindenki megtervezheti a saját színösszeállítását, ami passzol a lakásához, a stílusához, vagy egyszerűen csak a kedvence. A vásárlók szabadon játszhatnak az alkatrészek színeivel, így minden egyes lámpa a tulajdonosa egyéniségét tükrözi.

Az Industrial Kid lámpái kerékpáralkatrészekből állnak, a tulajdonos a markolat, fékkar, kormánynyak és bowden-ház színét állíthatja össze magának tíz különböző árnyalatból.  Lehet mentafagyi, eperturmix, vagy csokis fánk hangulatú is. Ha jól sikerült a választás (és miért ne sikerülne?), a végeredmény éppen passzolni fog a lakásba. Exra-bónusz játékosság: az energiatakarékos LED fényforrás a fékkar meghúzásával kapcsolható be és ki.

A történet

A kerékpáros asztali lámpa prototípusát Péter 2013-ban tervezte iskolakezdő kislányának, aki – egészen addig – nem nagyon szeretett az íróasztalnál ülni. Az első megrendelések később a baráti körből érkeztek, az ő kívánságukra kezdett különböző színű modelleket készíteni. Az Industrial Kid-et 2015-ben két üzlettárssal alapította, azzal a céllal, hogy továbbfejlesszék az eredeti ötletet és nemzetközi piacon értékesítsék a terméket.

A kampány

„Rövid távú célunk, hogy létrehozzuk a különböző stílusú (országúti, vintage, stb.) bringalámpák nagy választékát. A tervezőoldal fejlesztésével mindenki megtervezheti online a saját stílusához illő lámpát a kedvenc színösszeállításában. A hosszú távú célunk pedig a termékskála bővítése, fali és mennyezeti világítást is tervezünk. Ha a design-koncepciónk találkozik megrendelőink alkotás iránti vágyával, sikerül valami egészen újat létrehozni, és közben mindannyian jól szórakozunk. Ez a mi termékfejlesztési stratégiánk.” (Belső Péter, tervező)

lamps?


Yes, we
provide a one-year warranty. Under normal usage, if malfunction or damage occurs,
you can send Industrial Kid desk lamp back to us to get it repaired. The
warranty covers the electric components and the brake levers operating the
switch.





Bringázz velem haza! – asztali lámpák a
kerékpározás jegyében


Bringázás = szabadság + játék + friss levegő. Mintha újra
gyerekek lennénk. Az Industrial
Kid lámpái ezt a könnyed, vidám hangulatot viszik be a szobába, ha már a
bringát kint kell hagyni. És még világítanak is. Kezdeményezésünk támogatásával
a már kifejlesztett termék sorozatgyártásának beindítását segítheted, hogy a
bringás lámpát eljuttathassuk mindenkihez.
A koncepció
Lámpát többnyire úgy vásárol az ember, hogy bemegy a
lámpaboltba, rábök az egyikre, amelyik tetszik neki, és hazaviszi. Ezzel
szemben egy Industrial Kid lámpa kiválasztása maga az alkotófolyamat, a játék.
Azt persze senkitől sem várják el, hogy össze is szerelje a lámpáját, viszont
mindenki megtervezheti a saját színösszeállítását, ami passzol a lakásához, a
stílusához, vagy egyszerűen csak a kedvence. A vásárlók szabadon játszhatnak az alkatrészek színeivel,
így minden egyes lámpa a tulajdonosa egyéniségét
tükrözi.
Az Industrial Kid lámpái kerékpáralkatrészekből állnak, a tulajdonos a markolat, fékkar, kormánynyak és bowden-ház színét állíthatja
össze magának tíz különböző árnyalatból.  Lehet mentafagyi, eperturmix, vagy csokis fánk
hangulatú is. Ha jól sikerült a választás (és miért ne sikerülne?), a
végeredmény éppen passzolni fog a lakásba. Exra-bónusz játékosság: az energiatakarékos LED fényforrás a fékkar meghúzásával kapcsolható be és
ki.
A történet
A kerékpáros asztali lámpa prototípusát Péter 2013-ban
tervezte iskolakezdő kislányának, aki – egészen addig – nem nagyon szeretett az
íróasztalnál ülni. Az első megrendelések később a baráti körből érkeztek, az ő
kívánságukra kezdett különböző színű modelleket készíteni. Az Industrial Kid-et
2015-ben két üzlettárssal alapította, azzal a céllal, hogy továbbfejlesszék az
eredeti ötletet és nemzetközi piacon értékesítsék a terméket.
A kampány
„Rövid távú célunk, hogy létrehozzuk a különböző stílusú
(országúti, vintage, stb.) bringalámpák nagy választékát. A tervezőoldal
fejlesztésével mindenki megtervezheti online a saját stílusához illő lámpát a
kedvenc színösszeállításában. A hosszú távú célunk pedig a termékskála
bővítése, fali és mennyezeti világítást is tervezünk. Ha a design-koncepciónk
találkozik megrendelőink alkotás iránti vágyával, sikerül valami egészen újat
létrehozni, és közben mindannyian jól szórakozunk. Ez a mi termékfejlesztési
stratégiánk.” (Belső Péter, tervező)

story:
Help Revive the Ancient Craft of Lost Wax Casting

My name is James Howard, owner of Pemberton & Sons, a company whose roots can be traced back to the forge smoke of 17th century Birmingham, England. Since William Pemberton founded us, our name has been synonymous with exquisitely wrought, fine architectural hardware and bespoke fixtures, fittings and furnishings. Today, our bronze, brass and silverwork can still be seen in the world's finest interiors, showcasing our mastery of the ancient process of Lost Wax Casting.

Why should you care?

Because we are passionate about keeping rare artisan tradition alive.

Lost Wax Casting is a meticulous and highly skilled technique. First a model is crafted from wax, which is then enveloped in a heatproof substance. The wax is then melted away, leaving a perfectly shaped mould into which to pour the molten metal. This process takes time and care, but the results are startlingly intricate.

With your help our artisans will be able to practice under one roof, acting as the custodians of a tradition that dates back thousands of years of experience. Building on our heritage of exemplary craftsmanship, we aim to continue Pemberton & Son’s tradition of creating beautiful objects – exclusive, authentic and made to last.

A heritage of makers and a little of my story

I had been working in this industry for a prominent US company for several years when I decided to fulfil my family’s heritage, taking up the mantle of Lost Wax Casting. I have now re-established the old family company of Brass Founders, of which my late Grandmother, Ann Pemberton, was so very proud. Our family company has a rich and lengthy history. We were even invited to the Great Exhibition of 1851 in Hyde Park, where figures such as Queen Victoria and Charles Darwin may have enjoyed our pieces. 

The Great Exhibition, Hyde Park, London, 1851

Our family business today

Since then, our business has continued to thrive. Pemberton & Sons are now proud to undertake bespoke projects for high-end interior designers such as Ralph Lauren alumni, as well as commissions for private palaces, governments and royalty.

Our dream

To bring our magnificent heritage full circle, and re-establish a traditional foundry in the heart of Birmingham, England – just like the one our family used to have all those centuries ago.

We want to ensure that the artisanal craftsmanship that we heavily rely on is never lost, and that we can endeavor to bring all the various skillsets under one roof.

Our gift to you

We have a series of fantastic Perks on offer, from posters and paperweights, to statues and bespoke fittings. All our Perks are resonant with the sought-after American Deco style, in homage to the US design and the Pemberton’s US connections through the Pemberton Pedigrees of Boston and Philadelphia.

The Perks center around the classic American Deco look beloved in the US and Europe alike. Every piece is handcrafted in England: a unique offering that you will treasure for years to come. Some of our Perks even give you the chance to become enshrined as a part of Pemberton & Son’s ongoing heritage.

                                   

Please see below to find out what your valued support can bring. We thank you in advance and for your vital role in sustaining traditional artisanship.

Take advantage Sir Max’s swanky Bronze, Silver, Gold Ticket Perks and receive 5%, 10% & 20% discounts on the Pemberton & Sons Archive Collection

Pemberton & Sons Archive Collection

 

Alternatively, you can choose one of the following offers instead from Sir Max's Perks:

Bronze: An invitation to a tour of the foundry followed by lunch

Silver: An invitation to a tour of the foundry, followed by lunch, dinner at the inauguration plus your name on a brick at the foundry

Gold: An invitation to a tour of the foundry, followed by lunch, dinner at the inauguration plus your name on a bronze plaque at the foundry

Best possible chance

To give ourselves the best possible chance to re-establish the foundry and a zero risk campaign, we have opted for a simple, elegant, and desirable design with the American Deco style Perk offerings. All our pieces are made by manufacturers with 100s of years experience in the industry. This classic style has been designed and used by our clients previously so we know they are well loved. It’s simple, there is no risk. 

A partial raise. What then?

If we get a partial raise, we will still invest all profits in the foundry and take a stake or make up the full price with a bank loan.

Please send all enquiries to info@pembertonandsons.co.uk

 

T&Cs

  1. By ordering Perks it is accepted and agreed that; The contract for sale exists and is governed by UK law only.
  2. It is agreed by the purchaser that given the reduced price and manufacturing lead times, the order can't subsequently be cancelled.
  3. Delivery and tax are prepaid to US and Canada only. Any subsequent variations of any type are at an additional cost to the purchaser. Please enquire regarding Worldwide orders.

story:
Short Summary

We’re BobaBoxes, the bubble tea loving company. Just to give you a quick run-down on who we are and what we do. We’re a brand new subscription box company put together by two bubble tea lovers myself and Dan. We’re currently working on building up a buzz around our name in advance of our official launch in October.

Me and Dan have spent the last couple of months ordering flavouring, tapioca and bursting balls from all around the world to make sure we got the closest we could to making a commercial quality tea from home. We plan on offering these ingredients in two different size BobaBoxes, the first is our standard 4 flavour 8 cup box. The second a 2 flavour 4 cup box. Box boxes will of course come with jelly, straws, bursting bubbles, our own recipes and recommendations and anything else you’ll need for that month (bring your own milk and water).

 

What We Need & What You Get

We're currently working our socks off to get the first box out to you guys. So far we've been taking preorders for the box and we're getting a slow and steady turn around but we think it's high time you got some boba! The money raised here will mainly go towards the cost of our box packaging and a couple of things for us to add inside.

The Impact

With your help we can really speed along the process of getting the first months box out. After that it's all smooth sailing.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share, share, share and share. Help us get out name out there. If you have any suggestions for our marketing, website or box in general that would be great too.

story:
What is Hiddenbed USA

Everyone has heard of a Murphy Bed, our goal is to bring the same awareness to Hiddenbed.  Hiddenbed is an innovative space saving bed and desk that allows you to leave everything on the large desktop as you transform from desk to bed! Brilliant!!
Hiddenbed was born of necessity. The patented mechanism was first developed because the inventors son moved in with him after finishing school and there was simply not enough room in the small house they lived in. A small section of the main living area was sectioned off and the 5'x 8' area needed to house a bed and some room for his son to work. After much trial and error the Hiddenbed was born. 

What We Need & What You Get

Although we currently provide mechanisms to manufacturers of finished furniture, it has been a long road to bring the Hiddenbed to the masses both in quality and price. The problem is that retailers make the price of this excellent piece of furniture out of reach for most people.
We decided to make the drawings and mechanisms available to the masses and need to re-tool our manufacturing facility in order to make this happen. We need to increase our manufacturing capabilities in order to make the complete furniture available at direct to consumer prices.  We've designed Hiddenbeds that are reasonably simple for the DIY'er to make themselves with easily obtained raw materials.

The Impact of Hiddenbeds

 Whether it's in a small or "Tiny" house, or a spare bedroom or a student housing, everyone has found themselves in need of more space. Many of us are downsizing our homes and even moving into Tiny Homes or have to share with friends or family. The Hiddenbed provides a very innovative solution for any space problem you have.  

Risks & Challenges

Starting a manufacturing facility for making RTA furniture is very expensive and has many risks because of the large competitors that are manufacturing inferior quality furniture at very high prices.

We know that we can lower the costs of manufacturing by a great deal and save our customers an enormous amount of money by selling simple RTA Hiddenbeds in all different sizes by allowing folks to buy direct. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone has the ability to build their own Hiddenbed for a number of reasons. If you are in that situation, you can hire a handyman or a local carpenter to cut all the wood panels and then simply assemble the Desk/Bed yourself.  

If that's not your cup of tea, you can just give it as a gift to someone who has the facilities to build one or please just share this campaign with your friends and family because we feel that just about everyone can use a Hiddenbed, whether it's for a spare bedroom/office, a small room that doesn't have the space for a Bed and a Desk, a Dorm room, Hunting trailer, etc, etc, etc...

story:
Annual Explosion is designed for EVERYONE!... Children, Teens, Adults, and Seniors. 

Create amazing gardens of all kinds and let creativity reign.  Whether you're teaching little ones to grow snow peas, harvesting thyme from your Italian Herb Garden, or increasing your curb appeal with trailing petunias or sophisticated succulents,  everyone can find a way to add a little gardening into their life with Annual Explosion.

We've developed a hanging garden system that offers great use for all life stages of seedling, plugs, juvenile, and mature plants, and can be used with a variety of growing medias, including soils, substrate materials (peat, coco etc), perilight, and many other custom mediums. 

A Few Features... Annual Explosion  is Made in America and is outstanding in it's durability. It's UV resistant flexible material and threading, along with corrosion resistant grommets make it easy to be hung on many outdoor surfaces and arbor structures. 

Show your support today ny pre-ordering your Annual Explosion Hanging Garden through Indiegogo and ket your creativity come to life!

This product can help grow the world!

Vertical and non-horizontal gardening techniques have demonstrated benefits and are considered highly desirable, especially in urban environments which tend to have limited access and or high value physical space. Despite the challenges with urban cultivation, there is a growing awareness of most major metropolitan and urban areas as being proverbial “food deserts,” whereby agricultural inputs are required to be transported into the urban area, from outside resources. Users can also use this product as an option for a decorative resource for infertile environments, in order to improve visual aesthetics. Most users and target audiences have found that the Annual Explosion Quad Panel is comparably cost effective to similar products and resources.

Nestled in North Central FL, Natalia Pegg and Russ Anderson met first as educators within a school for challenged youth. Working day in and day out together, they bonded over plants, business, and innovation. With Natalia's background in business and education and Russ' experience as a Master Gardener and Edible Landscaper, ideas started turning into reality. Two years of testing and 4 designs later, they've put together a pretty cool product!

Russ had been seeking affordable vertical growing options for his client base and wasn't impressed with the options available. Natalia shared her vision for what was affectionately dubbed a "tree skirt." and with some collaborative analysis of textiles and systems available, they slowly figured out an affordable vertical gardening system that is easy to set up for almost any space, level or experience, or range of mobility. 

Please, Help Us Reach Our Goal!

We are seeking $30,000 for additional startup costs and to sustain our contracts with our U.S. based manufacturers. Some of these costs include both online and traditional marketing strategies, additional legal fees, new product development and design, as well as, supporting the current manufacturing of our first shipment due Mid to Late May.  We've teamed up with a great (U.S.) based textile manufacturer and have built a solid relationship with many  industry resources over the past two and a half years. We have spent a significant amount of time and money on this project and look forward to the next phase of building this company with your support. 

A Bit About Our Perks!

We are fully invested in our company and products and are prepared to  meet our goals during this campaign. Our financial outlook has been structured to continue manufacturing for all our current and future customers through direct pre-sales resulting from continued marketing efforts. We have strategic relationships being built which poise our company for growth through various financial avenues, including private investors, retail investors, and direct sales through Independent Contractor networks. 

The Impact

Affordability: This product makes it affordable for every household or commercial property to take part in vertical gardening. There are other options on the market that have been around that just are not affordable for everyone. This poses a barrier that the Annual Explosion Outdoor Vertical Garden System breaks down by keeping a fair price for its Quad Panel System. 

Versatility:

  • Mobility: Set up is incredible easy and transfer between locations is even easier. 
  • Great for a range of ages, experience, and styles.

Risks & Challenges

A major challenge we have faced is our dedication to remaining a 'Made in America' company. In our attempt to create and deliver high quality and durable products while maintaining affordability for the consumer, we have chosen to overcome this challenge by offering value added service and social media content to our line of products to offset any perceived lack of value.  A strong rapport with our major consumer bases should prove to be effective in building a brand that commands a respectable price for its product. We feel it is important to support our domestic economy, but we need our potential customers to support our cause and our commitment. 

Another challenge is building a social media following quickly enough to gain momentum during our Indiegogo campaign to ensure success.

  • Our networks and communities are really important to us and social media provides a great avenue to showcase our innovation. A strong support base and commitment to sustainable and strategic marketing will hopefully help us to overcome these hurdles.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are just as excited about our Campaign as we are and would like to help us further, please share our campaign with others and help to get the word out. Check out our website at www.annualexplosion.com
