story:
Overview

Pico-UTM 100 is simple but powerful!

Pico-UTM 100 is a truly plug & protect security gateway developed by Lionic with its own patented Deep Packet Inspection technology and designed to protect home & SOHO and small business, Lionic has collected virus, ransomware and other intrusion instances actively and built the large signature database. Pico-UTM 100 includes 1 year subscription of signature service so as to purify and protect your network constantly. All known virus, ransomware and intrusions will be caught and blocked without any missing ones.

 

Pico-UTM 100 caters your need

Wish no tough luck to get hacked or virus? Or you shall keep hope on the launch of Pico-UTM? 

From the beginning of Year 2020 , Covid-19 pandemic changes life patterns,  remote work, work from home, and schooling from home have become a trend.  Meanwhile, the awareness of cyber-security is rising up related to ransomware, phishing and social engineering attacks, 93% of companies worldwide under the survey are more concerned on network security now than before Covid-19, 58% of special attention on employees’ home network security. As a result, Lionic aims to launch a security device: Pico-UTM 100 to fix concerns for home, SOHO, and SB. We believe being able to connect is basic, to be connected securely is the requirement nowadays.

If you ever found out your important photos/files/data were stolen or leaked and you were unable to rescue them back, did you regret not to take actions before or get a solution for the future ?

With Pico-UTM, cyber-criminals will no longer intrude to your personal data.

Now, here has a powerful, intelligent and plug& play security appliance - Pico-UTM 100, with its easy installation without changing your original network topology, keep high performance with all functions on and equipped with security features, Anti-Virus, Anti-WebThreat and Anti-Intrusion to be a safeguard for your whole family and business.

Why you need Pico-UTM 100?

Year 2020 is a disaster year filled with Covid-19 pandemic and threats of Cyber-security!

Taiwan  not only can help to prevent against the virus from Covid-19 but also the virus of cyber-security. Everybody knows Taiwan is a primary strategist to keep citizens' healthy during the Covid-19 this time. We have the tier one sanitation committee to lead people during this crisis. Besides, we also kindly share the resources and offer the helps to other countries even those countries have ever known Taiwan. 

As a result, Taiwan is worthy for a trust. We are not only able to help people  on Covid-19 issue but also rescue you from threats of cyber-security according to our high-tech. Lionic is one of best security solution providers who has focused on developing the Deep Packet Inspection technology for many years and extends the applications to multiple security modules and according signature databases.

 

Why cross-packet technology makes us a difference?

With patents of deep packet inspection technology, Pico-UTM 100 is able to precisely catch and block cross-packet virus and malware through constant scanning.

 

Pico-UTM 100 has full quadrant protection

Pico-UTM 100 is developed by Lionic's patented Deep Packet Inspection technology, and utilizes its large virus signature database to extend 4 powerful and necessary applications nowadays.  

  • Anti-Virus: one-to-multiple pattern matching catches all known viruses.
  • Anti-WebThreat: daily update on URLs to block phishing and malicious websites entirely.
  • Anti-Intrusion: Block botnet attacks, DDoS attacks, ransomware, weak password and another 4 common cyber-attacks. (please go to FAQ to see complete attacks)
  • Firewall: fundamental firewall setting to reinforce the protection.

Pico-UTM 100 has user-friendly interface

Pico-UTM 100 provides  user- friendly interfaces which can be determined  the policy by users and  through the dashboard  the users can monitor the status in time and update the policy at any time.

 

Our Story - Lionic

When internet has not yet been fully connected by everyone, we’ve started looking into cyber-security and developing network security mechanism with Deep Packet Inspection technology .During the time our SW had been licensed, qualified and certified by lots of high visibility providers of network equipment worldwide including NEC, Cisco, and series of telecoms. We always believe being able to connect is basic, to be connected securely is the requirement. And now it happens!  

We, Lionic, constantly offers network security solutions to providers of network equipment, and now we decide to launch our own product: Pico-UTM 100 by using our robust technology and signature databases, we expect to offer to end user directly! 

We wish no more expensive and complicate product, our simple idea and sincere hope are to keep your home networking purified and safe.

 

Why Lionic need your help?

Lionic is a very technical-oriented company, we don’t know how to do marketing perfectly; we are composed of very down-to-earth engineers. What we have is a good product, please endorse and back us to launch Pico-UTM series.

story:
Official Website Link: 

https://www.yeeuu.com/collections/hote-product-4/products/yeevv-s1-smart-fingerprint-lock-standard-version

 

Born with a sleek design, S1 comes in 3 different configurations that fit any door and home. It features 8 smart access methods for convenience and versatility. Combined with the optional Wi-Fi bridge, you can remotely manage permissions and users or check the access logs in-app from anywhere. Approved by multiple international standards and regulations, S1 provides industry-leading safety performance with a tamperproof all-in-one structure and bank-level encryption built-in, to protect your home and properties 24/7.

 

 

 

 

Powered by the most cutting-edge techs, S1 has a fast (less than 0.5s) and accurate fingerprint reader with the ability to store up to 50 different fingerprints. In addition, there are multiple password modes to suit any situation.

  • Permanent Password – Works as an admin password or for immediate family members.
  • Dynamic Password – Is valid for 5 minutes and useful for visitors to a store or property.
  • Virtual Password – Combine any digit with the right password for added security, to prevent any possible peep.
  • Temporary Password – Highly versatile method to set entry time periods by minutes, hours, and dates. Such as: valid from 10:05 am - 11:30 for a specific date or each Monday in a set period. It is an excellent method for employees, service people, or Airbnb guests.

 

 

As an internet-enabled smart lock, the S1 makes remote access easier than ever with the smart Wi-Fi bridge. Entry can be controlled from anywhere in two ways. Remotely unlock the door with your phone for family or visitors, and ensuring that you will never be locked out. Additionally, the app has robust permission management that can instantly grant or revoke permissions remotely so that other users can unlock the door with their own phone.

For each access, you will receive the notification on your phone and the app will record the log, making it a convenient yet safe access method for services people or rental guests!

 

 

S1 Smart Lock uses convenient yet secure physical entry methods as well. It is NFC compatible with smart devices including phones and smartwatches that can act as an electronic key for entry. The S1 package also includes 3 NFC badges for durable, portable, and reliable entry. People with unshaped or blurred fingerprints can use the NFC badge to easily unlock for faster entry.

 

S1 Smart Lock is fully compatible with Google and Amazon Alexa voice assistants that can open the door using voice commands and it neatly integrates into a smart home system for the ultimate in modern convenience and security.

However, in some instances, a mechanical key may be helpful as a redundant backup system. The S1 uses a hidden key cylinder design that accepts a mechanical key as access.  Simply remove the shell and insert your key to get access instantly.

 

 

 

The included YEEUU app is a powerful way to fully manage access for any door. It maintains a complete log of entries that can be reviewed anytime, anywhere. If any change in protocol is needed the app permission manager provides total control of each visitor’s entry permissions. Change passwords, set limits, adjust time periods and grant or revoke permissions instantly using the in-app features.

 

 

 

For any door, security is the primary goal. The S1 Smart Lock is designed for rock-solid security and durability. It is constructed with a B-class cylinder and aluminum alloy shell that is tamper-proof. Its all-in-one cylinder design has a separated motor structure that makes it electromagnetic hack-proof and impossible to manipulate. It meets the approval rating of all essential international safety standards including FCC, CE, & ROHS.

Data stays safe with AES 128-bit bank-level encryption. AES, is a symmetric encryption algorithm and one of the most secure used by financial institutions and governments. For further data security, all the data is stored locally using methods approved by European GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation) and CCPA (California Consumer Privacy Act) regulation.

 

Automatically Locks

 

Unlike a typical doorknob, S1 always stays locked until the access is authenticated, which will unlock the door for 5 seconds before lock again. There is no worry of leaving a home or property unlocked by accident when leaving the location. When you leave the home, the S1 automatically locks without the need to turn the knob, to prevent any unwanted visitors slipping into your home.

By placing the authenticated fingerprinter on the identifier for 8 seconds, the lock will be switched between always-lock and always-unlock to meet your requirements in different situations.

 

Auto-deactivation & Alarm System

 

For added security, S1 Smart Lock has systems to prevent manipulation or password hacks. The system Auto-deactivates after too many failed entry attempts. After 15 unsuccessful fingerprint attempts or 6 unsuccessful password attempts, the system will deactivate for 15 minutes and send an instant in-app alert to the administrator.

 

Enable or Disable the Ability of Locking from the Inside

 

One of a kind, S1 brings the most customizable experience for the door entry control. By simply install or remove the rotary knob, you can enable or disable the capability of locking from the inside, to meet different requirements of your different rooms.

 

 

The S1 Smart Lock is designed for low-maintenance convenience and simple battery changes. It uses 3 triple-A alkaline batteries for 12 months of working time, much longer than the common products on the market. Battery percentage remaining is shown in-app along with a low battery indicator in the device & in-app reminder. Even in the case of battery outage, you can still use the mechanical key for entry.

 

S1 is durable and made for exposure to the elements. The metal surface has an anti-corrosion treatment with mat finish for durability and delivers the most deluxe feeling for door entry. The device is IP55 rated for water and dust resistance that withstand various environments.

 

 

 

The S1 Smart Lock is designed to fit any door. S1 can be directly used in the standard single-cylinder deadbolt lock and split-cylinder deadbolt lock. Combined with our optional front panel and 5572 lock body(see below), S1 can be also used in the integrated-cylinder lock.

Note: Add-on option is available after you choose your perk. 

 

 

Step 1. Check the picture below to see if your lock type is included.

Note: For type 1-4 (the cyan part), S1 smart lock can be used directly without any optional add-on.

For type 5-6 (the gray part), the optional add-on is needed. A 5572 lock body is needed for type 5. A 5572 lock body and a front panel are needed for type 6.

If you are not sure about the compatibility or your lock type, you can also contact us at yeeuu.ujia@gmail.com for help.

 

Step 2. Measure and check if the clearance meet the requirements below(For single bolt lock, only the center-to-edge clearance (>50mm) is required.):

If your lock meets all the requirements above, you can use S1 on your door. For perk choosing, please check the picture in step 1. 

 

 

 

 

 

Note: The only difference between Basic and Deluxe is the Fingerprint access function. The Basic Version doesn't support fingerprint access.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Single-Cylinder Deadbolt Lock Installation Demo

 

 

 

 

 

YEEUU is a brand focusing on the smart home. Starting from “connect you with home”, we created a smart door lock that is unique from outside to inside. Based on dozens of changes to the existing smart door locks, our design is simple and practical, just for everyone who loves life can enjoy each detail.

Thank you for joining us on our journey to make homes smarter, safer, and more convenient.

 

 

We are experienced product designers with years of experience in the smart home manufacturing industry and work with reliable partners for manufacturing and logistics. We also have a record of crowdfunding success. Because of this, we know what to expect in the process and are confident that we can avoid any potential problems. If some issues do unexpectedly arise, we promise to keep our backers updated about the situation and provide quick solutions.

story:
Simply peel and stick to your door using durable but removable adhesive. For permanent installs, use the screws and screwdriver provided with your Gimdow order. 
No modification required of the current door lock.  We promise!

Reusable and installs in 10 minutes

 

 

Swappable inserts make it compatible with just about any lock,
including fission and conjoined locks

 

*Applies only to sticky adhesive install.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Let your dog walker in for their scheduled walk, or give your guests virtual keys that expire after their stay.

 

 

Peek in the app to see when your kid got home from school, when your dog walker started and finished their walk, and if your package was delivered.

 

 

 

Never worry about hacking and breaches with Gimdow’s 128-bit encryption. Your code will always stay private and secure.

 

 

4 AA batteries last over 300 days with 10 uses per day.

 

 



 

Click on the image to earn cash rewards of 10% of pledges from your own referral link!

 

 

 

 

 
 

Gimdow has been tested and proven. We have been working on perfecting the technology so you can bring it home.

 

Gimdow has shipped out all the perks to backers.

 

 

HIGHEST QUALITY CONTROL AND CERTIFICATION

Successfully stress-tested for 100,000 use cycles

 

 

Eric Yi, CEO of Gimdow, was  Co-founder of Sherlock Smart lock.  He is an Industrial Designer and a University Lecturer.  Eric graduated from Politecnico di Milano, and has over 10 years of industrial design experience with Sherlock and Xiaomi Global Technology Company. Established in 2018, Gimdow is dedicated to innovative and simple design for the best in home security. 

Gimdow saw a need for a smart lock that could easily be installed and removed without taking apart an existing lock and causing permanent damage to any door.  It’s just as secure as August or Nest and Yale, but you can install it in minutes and remove it without anyone ever knowing it was there. Apartments, dorms, offices, even. AirBnbs - Gimdow wants to make smart locks accessible to everyone, regardless of their living situation. 

Gimdow commits to start shipping in December 2019 and backers should be confident that orders will be shipped on time. 

 

 

 

 

We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included. Please see perks for details on the shipping cost that applies to you.

 

We plan to ship starting in December 2019. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.

 

By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

Warranty

Gimdow is covered for a period of 1 year on manufacturer defects only. We DO NOT cover wear and tear or USAGE.  Returns and exchanges only - no refunds. 

Mechanical components are covered by a 1-year warranty against manufacturing defects.

For all PRODUCTS, this warranty expires 1 year from the date the PRODUCTS were delivered to the BUYER unless excluded from warranty or otherwise voided from coverage under warranty.

NO REFUNDS WILL BE MADE for  Christmas delivery orders once we ship.  For orders shipping in 2020, no refunds will be issued after the campaign ends. 

 

 

 

 

Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory's experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for eCommerce start-ups.

story:
Hello!


THANKS for participating in our PARTYBOXGREETINGS/INDIEGOGO EVENT... Events that bring good people together for good causes!

Everybody Loves
Receiving A Gift Box...
That Great Feeling
A Gift Box Brings Has
Gotten Better!

(This is true no matter who, how old, or where you are. Celebrities too!)

Unlike ANY other product on the market today...
PartyBoxGreetings & Balloon Buddies is an Innovative Way to ELEVATE SENDING GIFT CARDS!™ Available at some of your favorite websites, PartyBoxGreetings (PBG) sends friends, family and business associates their favorite GIFT CARD, along with a Balloon Buddies Character that is attached to a Helium-filled MYLAR BALLOON; all neatly tucked away in a PBG Gift Box and then delivered to doors everywhere – ready to open and get a very UPLIFTING GREETING! Now, on all of those SPECIAL OCCASIONS when sending gift cards arise, you can choose PartyBoxGreetings & Balloon Buddies. Making Someone's Day Is Just 1-Click Away!

Inspired by purpose, our mission:
LIFTING SPIRITS + DELIVERING JOY!
That GREAT Feeling a Gift Box Brings HAS GOTTEN EVEN BETTER!™

We are committed to bringing a product that delivers joy to friends and loved ones, no matter where they live. In our video posted above, you can see our PartyBoxGreetings box, that's custom-designed to deliver a helium-filled Mylar Balloon along with a Gift Card, intact, with our Balloon Buddies product tethered to the balloon. The Balloon Buddies Base is Filled  with small treats, i.e., mini-m&m's, mini chocolate bars, gumballs, jelly beans, etc. The moment kids or adults open their party box, their eyes light up with surprise and Pure Joy... such a great feeling to know you helped deliver.


PartyBoxGreetings makes sending a GIFT CARD count more than ever before!

Easy as 1-2-3...

2. Improving the delivery experience -- Choose PBG with BB + filler
3. Get a very happy recipient opening their very special delivery.

• Exponential growth opportunities in license, product line proliferation, brand expansion, ad hoc and specialty advertising opportunities

Industry Facts & Figures

Annually:

• $110 billion dollars in value are loaded on gift cards in the US alone
• Over 90% of US Consumers purchase or receive a gift card
• Average of $213/year on gift cards (consumer spend)
• 83% of corporations use gift & prepaid cards
• Only 7% Non-Gift Card Users in 2014, down from 27% in only 2 years

Source: Accenture, 2014.


Milestones & Goals

Following our crowdfunding campaign, we will meet all obligations to contributors and complete our solid business platform, including licensing agreements & partnerships with the most popular websites offering gift cards.

Tremendous product proliferation inherently resides in the exponential licensing opportunities, and vast Balloon Buddies character scenario development — including all event-based and thematic celebrations. Agreements with endless partner websites further company growth.


Traditional Challenge:

Using the boring "same ol', same ol'" approach when sending gift cards to family, friends, and important business associates. :( 


Solution:

The "check-out" cart at your favorite website just changed for the better!

This is Our Very Cool Way To Enter The $100+ Billion Gift Card Industry
+ While Adding The Fun Balloon Buddies Product!

Stand head & shoulders above ordinary, using our Unique "pop-out-of-the-box" approach when sending gift cards.

On Board? : )

The Power of Social Media! :)

The three PartyBoxGreetings videos presented on this page + the link to our website highlight more details about our products & services. Consider the exponential licensing with gift card selling sites + our Balloon Buddies.

 




Endless Licensing Opportunities

Add-On To Popular Gift Card Portals

Target: Availability @ iTunes and other major gift card selling websites.

Target: Available @ Toys R US and other major gift card selling websites.

Target: Available @ Starbucks and other major gift card selling websites.

Target: Availability @ Amazon and other major gift card selling websites.


Targeted Opportunities Are Nearly Endless

• Point-of-Sale e-Commerce sites
Amazon | Disney | Toys R Us | Starbucks | Nordstroms | 1800FLOWERS

• Point-of-Sale Theme Parks
Disneyland | Walt Disney World | Universal Studios Hollywood/Florida

• Point-of-Sale Party, Gift & Flower Shops
Hallmark | Party City | Teleflora

• Ad hoc Sales Ops
Victoria's Secret (Retail) Valentine's Day Promo

PartyBoxGreetings
Proudly Exhibiting @ Innovate!SoCal 2015

We are excited to participate and present PartyBoxGreetings at InnovateSoCal 2015 as an exhibitor. InnovateSoCal 2015 is a platform to showcase and connect today's most inspiring entrepreneurs & innovators in the USA. Innovators who are dedicating themselves and their ventures to transform their industry, community and/or business practice. In fact, we'd love you to come and visit us at our booth, March 26, 2015.

The innovate!SoCal 2014 Conference was the first symposium that brought together disruptive thinkers in economic development to work together to find solutions to building the entrepreneur ecosystem in Southern California and beyond. The day features panels and renowned speakers sharing their perspectives on tools and models that help establish a powerful, self-sustaining, nurturing environment for high growth start-ups.

This prestigious event is sponsored by The Ewing Marion Kauffman Foundation. The EMKF is dedicated to entrepreneurship and innovation. In fact, Kauffman's entrepreneurship work is national in scale and global in reach. Their entrepreneurship strategy supports entrepreneurs in the U.S. by expanding signature education programs, notably Founders School, FastTrac, and 1 Million Cups, and investing in proven education models. They also seek to foster start-up communities and develop challenges to spur entrepreneurial activity in select metropolitan areas.

"By casting a wider net to ensure the broadest possible participation in innovative entrepreneurship, as well as better understanding how entrepreneurs learn and grow their startups, SoCal is going to be a model for entrepreneurial ecosystems everywhere, and a breeding ground for many of our country's next great ventures." – Thom Ruhe, Vice President of Entrepreneurship, The Kauffman Foundation

With that said, our INDIEGOGO EVENT is aimed at a modest monetary target leading to the larger goal of PROOF OF CONCEPT (POC). POC may lead to, and is intended for a substantially higher investment offering.

Challenges...
Create Strength In Character & Reward

Some of the risks and challenges are obvious, some not. "To me, failure is not an option; in this case, I have immense staying power. Some call it strength, some say intestinal fortitude; in either case, it's a lot like this scene from ROCKY BALBOA." Vincent Medina, Managing Director, PartyBoxGreetings. Google Search Domination & Visibility Expert




PartyBoxGreetings Has Heart

"I have been and will continue to be a strong advocate for humane causes. Most recently, donating time and money to OceanConservancy and their quest to help the great sea manatees of Florida. I love children, dogs, sea life and elephants too. I believe it's important to count our blessings and always try to reach out to others less fortunate than ourselves. My daily walks to the end of the jetty include the sights and sounds of ocean life. Lately, too many sea lion pups have been turning up sick... or, worst. :( 
I keep the whales, sea lions, dolphin and sea birds hotline on speed dial."
Vincent Medina, Managing Director, PartyBoxGreetings

Abraham Lincoln said it well: "I am in favor of animal rights as well as human rights. That is the way of a whole human being."

ABCs of Persuasion

(strength in perseverance & purpose)


"...just be a little bit more human." - Dan Pink



Itemizing the $15,000

The Targeted Sum will be applied to:

 • Balloon Buddies Product
 • PartyBoxGreetings Gift Boxes
 • Website "go-live" Completion

Additionally,
 • Mylar Balloons
 • Helium
 • Cords
 • Ribbon
 • Shipping Costs
 • Taxes
 • Fees paid to Indiegogo, PayPal
 • Rewards to All Contributors, etc.


Last, But Not Least

AGAIN, OUR SINCERE THANK YOU FOR:
CONTRIBUTING + SHARING + LIKING + COMMENTING + TAGGING :)

The Power of Social Media! :)


Risks & Challenges

"I have been in business for many years and have provided solutions for big businesses as well as mom & pop shops. Corporations like Chevron, Avery Dennison and Amgen.

"Consistently, challenges are taken analytically with confidence, while applying ingenuity and vast resource & consensus, leading to well-founded conclusions. I also apply Six Sigma and hybrid Strategic Sourcing methodologies throughout creative, production and logistic processes.

"In addition, SEO and Google 1st Page Search Domination and Visibility Expertise and Real-Time Results fascinated me. So much so, I analyzed this as a project and process, then mastered it. You can test me... simply search: 'Who is the Google Search Domination Expert?' One of many search terms that will merit equal results. Why add this info here? Take a wild guess. ;)"

~ Vincent Medina, Managing Director, PartyBoxGreetings, Google Search Domination & Visibility Expert

story:
Phoebe: an auto-sense handbag induction light with power bank function. It lights up the inside of your handbag and gives sufficient charge to your phone. 

The best Christmas gift for her!

How many times did you have to literally empty your handbag to find your keys? How many times have you missed a phone call because you couldn’t find it on time in your bag? A research showed that the average woman spends an astounding 76 days of her lifetime digging in her handbag. You don’t want to be that woman.

Solution 1: Using a cell phone for lighting?
Solution 2: Using a cigarette lighter for lighting?
Solution 3: Using a key ring torch for lighting? 
But, by the time for finding and manually turning on these tools,  you should have already found the stuff you are looking for. 
- Got to have a better way!

Phoebe is all you need,  she helps you out in ONE second!

Phoebe is a handy accessory that will automatically light up the inside of your handbag, making everything clear and helping you waste no time. A motion sensor will detect your hand’s movement and turn on a bright light that will illuminate the area you need clearly. No need to push buttons to turn it on or off. It will automatically shut off after 14 seconds, enough for you to find anything you need! No sense wasting even more time looking for flashlights or lighters in your handbag.

         

                                          Touch Free 

        

                                          Search Free

When you are home, it can be used as a gentle, bedside night light. Keep Phoebe by your nightstand, for easy and comfortable illumination when necessary. Phoebe is an induction lamp which means higher efficiency and longer life. It’s a smart, multi-­use accessory that can make life better for any woman!


Phoebe is charged via a USB port which means you can charge it almost anywhere.   It only takes a single charge so that you can open a well-­lit handbag for 3800 times!

No matter what type of exercise you like during the night time, it’s always a good choice to have Phoebe with you because it eliminates your fear and prevents accidents by giving a warning sign.

Phoebe is a must have accessory for concerts, parties, bar. Just imagine that everyone hands up, swing and cheers together with Phoebe. What a beautiful view！

One item you must have for outdoor fitness is Phoebe. No matter you go hiking or camping，you always need an emergency light and Phoebe can charge your device as well.  Get one Phoebe now and enjoy all of its features.

                                Why Indiegogo

Our lifestyles today resemble our lifestyle less and less the farther back we go, ten, twenty, thirty years. Get back far enough, and you may hardly be able to recognize us by the items we carry around and the everyday tools that we use. One thing, however, has remained the same for a long time: handbags.

People have been carrying handbags for a very long time, and that trend shows no sign of changing any time soon. On the other hand, the items that we put in those handbags have changed, and there is one present mainstay that is something of a newcomer. It’s our smart phones.Taking into consideration both of these long-term trends, handbags and smart phones, our team is proud to present Phoebe, an auto-sending handbag induction light that comes with a built-in power bank, perfect for charging your phone while you are on the go. You will never lose anything inside your handbag again with this easy-to-use, ultra-convenient light. Phoebe is the future of handbag accessories, brought to you today.

We have come to you, Indiegogo, for help raising $5000. This start-up capital will cover the costs of manufacturing, marketing, and distributing Phoebe, bringing power and visibility to handbags everywhere. Your contributions are appreciated. Help us make it a widespread reality by supporting our campaign. Get a Phoebe yourself, enjoy her benefits and save yourself those 76 days. They can be used for so much more! Thank you for your time.


FAQ

- How does it work?

A capacitive sensor is used for the circuit design, it will be activated by the capacitance from the human hands and generated an electronic signal to turn the light on.

- How long time the battery will last for continuous lighting?

With the fully charged 2000mAh battery, it will light up for 15 hours, each time the light will keep lighting for 14 seconds, that is to say, the light will light up 3800 times (14 seconds each time) with a fully charged battery.

-Can I shut off the light when I am using Phoebe as power bank?

Yes, by keep pressing the power button for 3 seconds, the auto-sensing function can be shut off, and another 3 seconds pressing to turn it on.

- Does it detect human hands only?

The main purpose of using a capacitive sensor for the circuit design is to detect the human hands.  There are several other capacitive objects, which will be detected to make the lights up, however, the light is designed to be automatically turn off after 14 seconds to make sure it won't draw the power all the way out. Also, the auto sensing function can be manually shut off by pressing the power button.

A capacitive sensor is used for the circuit design, it will be activated by the capacitance from the human hands and generated an electronic signal to turn the light on.

With the fully charged 2000mAh battery, it will light up for 15 hours, each time the light will keep lighting for 14 seconds, that is to say, the light will light up 3800 times (14 seconds each time) with a fully charged battery.
-Can I shut off the light when I am using Phoebe as power bank?
Yes, by keep pressing the power button for 3 seconds, the auto-sensing function can be shut off, and another 3 seconds pressing to turn it on.
- Does it detect human hands only?
The main purpose of using a capacitive sensor for the circuit design is to detect the human hands.  There are several other capacitive objects, which will be detected to make the lights up, however, the light is designed to be automatically turn off after 14 seconds to make sure it won't draw the power all the way out. Also, the auto sensing function can be manually shut off by pressing the power button.

story:
Kitchen Farms 

Our goal is to achieve food sustainability through technology, advocacy & commerce.  One way we aim to do this is by enabling anyone to produce their own food, no matter how much knowledge they have. 

What we have developed is an environment monitoring device that can tell if specific plant species are outside their ideal growing conditions.  This eliminates guesswork for new growers and also maximizes production. 

Your help will allow us to continue this project and make it better.  We have mapped threshold values for dozens of herbs and vegetables that can be grown in your own home.

The funding is to help us continue our research and bring our products to people.  If you have ever had a failed attempt at gardening where the plant did not successfully produce what you expected, you will understand how valuable this device is. 

Our next step is integrating AI for quick diagnosis for ailments that might occur to your plants.  This has already started to be built into the app and will hopefully soon just be an update for anyone who already has the app downloaded.

How it works

It is not a device that gives you measurements, it is a device that measures the environmental conditions like moisture, light, humidity and temperature and compares these with the information we have collected on whether the conditions are within the range of values for the plant you are growing. 

The mobile app allows the grower to be alerted for any thresholds that have been met and estimates the time to harvest. This saves the grower time and helps ensure the produce is healthy.

The Team

Natasha MacLeod from Rocky Point, Prince Edward Island is the lead engineering technician responsible for the programming and design of the Kitchen Farms devices.  Natasha has a farming background and studies Sustainable Design Engineering at the University of Prince Edward Island.  She is a member of the UPEI Engineering Society, was the Logistics and Communications Director for the 2021 Atlantic Engineering Competition, a board member of the Autonomous Robotic Applications Club and is the Atlantic Regional Director for EngiQueers Canada.

Kashyap Raval is a Python/ AI engineer at Let'sNurture and Co-organizer of  PyData-Ahmedabad, Tech speaker and tech enthusiast. He has a Bachelor of engineering in Computer Science from Gujarat Technological University, and his primary focus and inspiration for his studies is in AI and web development. 

Iain MacInnes is the project manager and coordinates the marketing and sales initiatives.  Iain has almost a 20 year career in information technology and marketing.

Ketan Raval is the owner and CEO of Nurturing Technologies Ltd. operating in PEI, the funding partner and founder of Kitchen Farms. Ketan has many years of experience in business and information technology.  Ketan currently resides in Moncton, New Brunswick.

story:
Meet Mos Eco

Hi, we're Lauren & Emilie, an Irish 31year old and a Dutch 29year old on a mission to create less trash. We are launching a range of eco-swaps to make it easy to live a lower waste lifestyle, swapping out every day plastic items for sustainable and compostable alternatives that are not only less trashy, they are high quality, durable and good looking too. 

What We Need & What You Get

Everyone works hard for their money. That's why we're not just asking you to invest but we propose a win-win solution: If you help us fund our first production round, we give you a discount on the products. It's essentially a pre-order discount in exchange for a slightly longer shipping time. 

This is what we'll need and what will happen with the funds;

  • We're looking to get €4500 for our first production round, which will cover the production of the products, the shipping & the import costs. We've already covered the design, pre-production and sampling part ourselves. 
  • If this funding round is successful, we'll be able to produce our first round of razors, dish brushes, replacement heads, pot brushes and silicone lids. 
  • If we don't get to the full amount, we will take out a loan instead, to cover the additional costs. So either way you will receive your products if you've placed a pre-order during this funding round. 

The Impact

As we've said in our video, two billion razors are estimated to be thrown away each year in the US alone. That's a huge amount of plastic that isn't recycled and ends up in landfills. Add the amount of cling film, sponges and dish brushes that we throw away each year to the equation and you'll realise it's time for some swaps. Because they're everyday items, the swaps are easily made.

The Razors

Instead of using and throwing out razors, we've created a range of stainless steel razors that will last for years, feel luxurious and heavy in your hand and that have double edged blades for an incredibly clean cut. When it does reach the end of its life it’s fully recyclable, so it creates no waste.

We also just quickly want to touch on your wallet for a second here, because the initial investment of a zero waste razor is going to pay off so quickly. The replacement blades come in packs of ten and are only €3, so imagine how much you can save in a lifetime with this single swap. 

The Dish Brush & Pot Brush

Those normal, bright coloured plastic dish brushes and scourers are a thing of the past. They can't be recycled by recycling plants and they are also pretty ugly. So we sat down to create our own wooden dish brush with replaceable head so you can keep using your handle, lowering your waste & footprint even further. The dish brush is made entirely out of wood, metal, a bit of cotton for the string and plant bristles. The pot bruhs is made entirely out of wood and coconut bristles, making it fully biodegradable.

Biodegradable Sponges

Our biodegradable sponges are made with hemp for the soft side and coconut fibres for the scouring pad. It’s the first fully biodegradable kitchen sponge that has both a soft side and a scouring pad. And where normal kitchen sponges are made with plastic, shed microplastics into the environment and are not recyclable, our Mos Eco sponges are made with plant fibres only and are fully biodegradable.

Silicone Lids 

Cling film is a huge polluter. It’s used a lot, it is single use by nature, recycling plants don’t recycle it and it sheds microplastics into the environment. SIlicone on the other hand reverts back into its harmless ingredients when burned: amorphous silica, carbon dioxide, and water vapor (unlike plastic which releases toxins when burned). Whilst still being able to endure extreme fluctuations in temperatures from very cold to very hot, but without melting, cracking or otherwise degrading and shedding. It's the perfect swap for cling film. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We fully understand that not everyone is in a position (right now) to help fund our production round. That's absolutely fine! Here are some other ways you could help us in the right direction: 

  • Get the word out on social and make some noise about our campaign
  • Tell your friends and family about our campaign if you think they're interested; there's nothing like some good old word-of-mouth! 
  • Use the Indiegogo sharing tools to share our crowdfunding page

 

YOU GUYS ARE THE BEST!! Thank you so much for your help with our mission to create less trash, we couldn't do it without you! 

X Lauren & Emilie

Get the word out on social and make some noise about our campaign
Tell your friends and family about our campaign if you think they're interested; there's nothing like some good old word-of-mouth!

X Lauren & Emilie

story:
Story

We are two friends from Vienna , and our kids play together regularly,  when our families meet. Board games where a huge part of our childhood, we loved spending hours and hours playing them. So it was only natural that we couldn't wait for our children to be old enough to experience this. However nowadays kids are used to faster, and easier access to games, and fun activities.

That is why we came up with a solution to make board games more interesting for everyone.

 

OmegaOne Details

  • Android Based System
  • Full HD Touchscreen Panel - Scratch and Water Resistant
  • Eye-Protect-Sensor - Keeps Your Eyes Safe by Adjusting Display Brightness
  • Built-in Battery - Up to 6 Hours of Gameplay
  • Built-in Stereo Speakers
  • 32 GB Storage Space - Enough for Hundreds of Boardgames
  • WiFi, Bluetooth (Facebook Connectivity + Google Play for Downloading Games)

 

 

Why OmegaOne?

There are so many reasons to choose our device. Compared to the classic board games you can set up a game in just under 30 seconds. Gameplay is a lot faster and smoother, however gaming sessions might take considerable amount of time to finish.

With our technology, you are able to save your game progress, and continue at any time you like. 

 

Advantages

  • 100% Safe for Children
  • Saves a lot of Space
  • Virtually Unlimited Number of Games
  • Quick Save & Load
  • Scratch & Water Resistant

OmegaOne ​does not contain small parts that children could swallow, so it's suitable for kids over 2+ years of age. We planned this product with a built-in eye protect sensor to keep you, and your family members eyes safe during games. We also wanted to ensure that OmegaOne works the same after many years of use, just the day when you received it. The added extra protection layer, and the spill resistant frame will keep the device safe.

Share Your Great Family Moments with the World via Facebook

Family time: Sitting down with family with no interruptions may feel like an impossible thing in your home, as everyone has different schedules which pushes them to opposite directions. But playing games with your kids, or with your friends, is a perfect way to spend time together and build learning skills at the same time. Playing a board game after a family dinner is an excellent way to get closer to your family, while strengthening your family bond.

 

 

Dimensions

 

Risk & Challenges

There are always ups and downs in any venture and while delays can happen, we will update you with the progress. With your support, we will able to work with the right people because our aim in the end is to deliver the highest quality and functionality possible.

 

Thank You!

We greatly appreciate, if you help us to raise awareness by sharing, liking or tweeting this campaign to your friends.

story:
WHOLEROLL is the World's First Envirofriendly Bathroom tissue Subscription Box with the global mission to help end deforestation and combat climate change. Our #1 goal is to save you money, save you time while also saving the environment. 

Each roll is made with 100% high quality fiber 90% post and 10% pre-consumer paper and whitened with non-bleach materials. Each WHOLEROLL box will include a unique reusable bag to help offset the use of plastic bags, and a tree will be planted for each box purchased.

  • Box counts are in #8, #12, #16, #20, #24, #36 & #48
  • #500 sheet count, 2 ply and septic tank safe
  • Individually wrapped or #4 #8 #12 count packages in our “classic” world map green
  • 100% high quality recycled fiber-90% post consumer paper, 10% pre consumer paper and we will also have a 100% bamboo paper or bamboo blend 
  • All packaging( including boxes, reusable bags, tissue wrap and the bathroom tissue) will be made from recycled content that is completely sustainable. 

 

 

 

 

Sample-This is a sample of the texture of a 90% post consumer 10% pre consumer tissue but not with our custom embossing. We will be able to run our custom embossing with our first production run. Eco-friendly bathroom tissue was once a luxury, but now it is a necessity.

Surprise 1-We love surprises and we hope you do to.  Each monthly box will come with a different and unique reusable bag.  Who said bathroom tissue had to be boring.

     

 

Surprise 2-No bathroom  is complete without the aroma of a candle. We have an extra surprise for Early bird backers and those that give $100 or more. We will include our favorite A Napa Uncorked "Cabernet" Candle. Fill your home and bathroom with the scent of Napa Valley. It has the sweet aroma of wild grapes enhanced with hints of strawberries and sweet sugary notes with a light alcoholic background. It's  wonderful aroma of red sweet cabernet wine. The candles are made with soy wax and come in a 10oz. repurposed wine bottle. Soy wax candles release fragrances naturally and burn longer. The fragrance of the carefully blended wine aromas will transport you to Napa Valley. This candle comes in a recycled gift box and are 41/2" Tall with 50-60 Burn time. It will make your WHOLEROLL Box an aromatic delight. 

 

WHOLEROLL is beautiful to display.  No need to hide this tissue under the counter from your guests.  We want you to be proud to display this tissue in your home, your Airbnb rental or guest house. It shows how much you value preserving the earth, and it just might encourage others to do the same. WHOLEROLL is beautiful for spas, hotels, vacation getaways or anywhere you want to have the perfect ecofriendly amenities for your guests.  

 

HOW ARE WE DIFFERENT FROM OTHER ECOFRIENDLY BRANDS

  1. We will publicly provide stats and measured progress on the number of trees planted, trees saved from using our tissue and the impact it is having on the environment.
  2. We are the first company to incorporate a global initiative and mission with our bathroom tissue (Recycle10) to try and transition 10% of the global population from using virgin pulp tissue to our ecofriendly brand.
  3. We plant a tree for every subscription box of WHOLEROLL.
  4. We align as a business hub project with the UN Sustainable Development Goals to help end deforestation and combat climate change.
  5. Direct to consumer convenience
  6. Beautiful enough to display

 

OUR BATHROOM TISSUE COMPARED TO THE AVERAGE STORE BOUGHT SIZE.  OUR SHEET COUNT IS #500 SHEETS PER ROLL. THE AVERAGE STORE BOUGHT IS #198 SHEETS PER ROLL WHICH MEANS OUR ROLLS ARE NEARLY 2 1/2 time the size of the store bought.  MORE TISSUE AND TAKES UP LESS ROOM.

 

 

 

"One Box One Tree" Commitment -We are working with The Arbor Day Foundation to help fulfill our "One Box One Tree" Commitment to plant a tree for every box purchased. We will make public our measured progress so that you can see the impact you are making around the globe. As a project of the United Nations Business Hub, we believe if every person and every nation unites to combat the climate crisis, we can successfully fulfill the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals.

SNEAK PEAK @ The Future of WHOLEROLL in many different colors. We are "Earth Conscious and People Committed" preserving nature and the future of the next generation.

            

 

THE VISION OF WHOLEROLL. WHY IS USING ENVIROFRIENDLY TISSUE SO IMPORTANT?

RECYCLE10 is our vision to mobilize a global community.  Our goal is to educate the population on the benefits of using WHOLEROLL and to transition 10% of the global population from using virgin pulp and to begin using WHOLEROLL 100% recycled Eco-bath tissue. When we reach our goal we will have saved and planted hundreds of millions of trees. Why is using ecofriendly toilet paper, saving trees and keeping the oceans clean so important? It is important because deforestation is a contributor to global warming and climate change. Our planets oceans and forests are key to a sustainable future for all life on Earth. Trees are valuable resources for the planet because they absorb carbon emissions out of the air.  When we take care of Mother Earth, this leads to a future that includes breathable air, dependable weather patterns, drinkable water and the survival of ecosystems.

 

Saving the Environment-Our mission is to help end deforestation and combat climate change using WHOLEROLL. We will plant a tree for every subscription box purchased. The next generation is the future and we intend to be apart of preserving their future.

                        

Saving you time and money- Grocery shopping can be a task and we definitely realize that.  WHOLEROLL will be delivered to your front door saving you money, saving you time while we are also saving the environment and We think that's pretty cool.  

Our product is not about bears, kittens and flying babies. Our product is about people, the moms and dads and their children, this planet and our mission to preserve it for future generations. WHOLEROLL is an ecofriendly 2 ply 500 count septic safe bathroom tissue that is affordable, soft, beautifully embossed and Made in America. Each roll is individually wrapped in an emerald green world map paper representing our global mission to reach the world with our tissues.

WHOLEROLL means to "completely move forward" and that is what our team at WHOLEROLL has done. We surveyed people all over the globe to find out what is most important to them in a bathroom tissue. We gathered data and information that was important to us and in line with the sustainable mission of the company. Our product is made from high quality fibers sourced from pre and post consumer materials.

Tested and approved. We're leaving no stone unturned  in order to bring you the best on the market and best for the planet.

Sustainability is the cornerstone of the culture of WHOLEROLL and sustainability is not something we do. It's who we are. We were very selective in developing a partnership with a manufacturer. We decided to only partner with a manufacturer that held the same values, commitment and practices that we hold on sustainability. A manufacturer that is LEED certified and whose tissues are Green Seal approved. We aim to be one of the responsible consumer goods companies that will ensure that the products we are selling are not contributing to deforestation or to any type of environmental damage.

 

                 

Thank you for joining us and embracing the vision.  When you receive your reward, remember its not just about tissue. Every movement needs pioneers and that is who you are. You are a pioneer in the country in which you live making early waves by choosing a sustainable solution that benefits the planet, your country and the future of the next generation. 

Limited Edition "Camouflage Collection" (only for backers never to be made again) - We are creating a one of a kind limited edition World Map Combat Collection for all of our backers.  The combat collection represents the fight we are in to help end deforestation and combat climate change. It represents you as a pioneer believing in the global vision to preserve the earth.       

 

 

OUR BHAG-Big Hairy Audacious Goal-Yes "WE GO APE TO SAVE THE PLANET"-We have established a project called Recycle10. Our goal is to transition 10% of the global population from using virgin pulp tissue( 98% of the tissues on retail market shelves) which is made from full grown mature trees that manufacturers chop down and to begin using WHOLEROLL; Our sustainable brand that will be delivered to your front door saving you money, saving you time while saving the environment.  

 

Check out the growth of our tree below.  See how the idea for our product has grown. How did it begin? It began with a mom who had a house full of boys who never put the roll on the spool. She knew there had to be a better way and that's when she had an "Aha" moment. She thought what if there was a quick way to insert the roll. Convenience is what they needed. So she looked at the spindle and the tissue roll and said what if they were made together as one piece.  So she decided to call the new product "WHOLEROLL." Needless to say WHOLEROLL is now patent pending. 

But, while in product development, she learned that 98% of the bathroom tissue on retail shelves was made from the virgin pulp of mature full grown trees that were being chopped down, and she also learned that the average family of four chops down three trees a year for bathroom tissue usage. Shocked by that percentage, she decided to give up her own favorite brand and create a brand that would be more beneficial to the earth and the next generation.

 

 

FROM THE TEAM

We are so excited to share our project with you that we have been working on for 2 years now. And yes we learned a lot on this journey. There is no project ever worth attempting that will not go unchallenged, and yes we were challenged. We were ignored by investors, laughed out of meeting rooms and even challenged by some manufacturers who thought we were biting off more than we could chew. But we didn't quit. We gave it our all and our last.  We maxed out credit cards and shook our heads many days trying to figure out how we were ever going to make the monthly payments, but we kept pressing forward because we believed otherwise. We are here today against the odds committed to making a difference and regardless of the bumps in the road, as you can see we still had fun making and bringing our project to you.

 We are creating a very unique bathroom tissue made with the perfect blend of high quality post consumer fibers. It is a one of a kind bathroom tissue that is uniquely soft, beautifully embossed with the WHOLEROLL logo and some will be in a world map print that speaks "Good for me and Good for the planet."  If we are successfully funded, the funds will go towards our very first production run of WHOLEROLL. With your support, this will be possible and we say "Thank you for believing in us and for investing in the planet and the future of the next generation."  

Also a special thanks to

  •  family and friends who gave us much encouragement and feedback, 
  •  to the people we surveyed all over the globe who told us what they wanted in a bathroom tissue-softness, sustainability and affordable 
  •  a special thanks to the UN Business Hub(our project connector on the Hub)for their commitment to the SDG's 
  • and to "The Arbor Day Foundation" who we look forward to working with in our "One Box One Tree" Commitment to help fulfill the Sustainable Development Goals and tackle the crisis of climate change.

                                         THE WHOLEROLL TEAM

 

 PLEASE SHARE!   HELP US TAKE WHOLEROLL AROUND THE GLOBE                     

 

 

Visit us @

www.wholeroll.com

www.wholerollaroundtheglobe.com

Box counts are in #8, #12, #16, #20, #24, #36 & #48
#500 sheet count, 2 ply and septic tank safe
Individually wrapped or #4 #8 #12 count packages in our “classic” world map green
100% high quality recycled fiber-90% post consumer paper, 10% pre consumer paper and we will also have a 100% bamboo paper or bamboo blend 
All packaging( including boxes, reusable bags, tissue wrap and the bathroom tissue) will be made from recycled content that is completely sustainable. 
    Sample-This is a sample of the texture of a 90% post consumer 10% pre consumer tissue but not with our custom embossing. We will be able to run our custom embossing with our first production run. Eco-friendly bathroom tissue was once a luxury, but now it is a necessity.Surprise 1-We love surprises and we hope you do to.  Each monthly box will come with a different and unique reusable bag.  Who said bathroom tissue had to be boring.      Surprise 2-No bathroom  is complete without the aroma of a candle. We have an extra surprise for Early bird backers and those that give $100 or more. We will include our favorite A Napa Uncorked "Cabernet" Candle. Fill your home and bathroom with the scent of Napa Valley. It has the sweet aroma of wild grapes enhanced with hints of strawberries and sweet sugary notes with a light alcoholic background. It's  wonderful aroma of red sweet cabernet wine. The candles are made with soy wax and come in a 10oz. repurposed wine bottle. Soy wax candles release fragrances naturally and burn longer. The fragrance of the carefully blended wine aromas will transport you to Napa Valley. This candle comes in a recycled gift box and are 41/2" Tall with 50-60 Burn time. It will make your WHOLEROLL Box an aromatic delight.  WHOLEROLL is beautiful to display.  No need to hide this tissue under the counter from your guests.  We want you to be proud to display this tissue in your home, your Airbnb rental or guest house. It shows how much you value preserving the earth, and it just might encourage others to do the same. WHOLEROLL is beautiful for spas, hotels, vacation getaways or anywhere you want to have the perfect ecofriendly amenities for your guests.   HOW ARE WE DIFFERENT FROM OTHER ECOFRIENDLY BRANDS
We will publicly provide stats and measured progress on the number of trees planted, trees saved from using our tissue and the impact it is having on the environment.
We are the first company to incorporate a global initiative and mission with our bathroom tissue (Recycle10) to try and transition 10% of the global population from using virgin pulp tissue to our ecofriendly brand.
We plant a tree for every subscription box of WHOLEROLL.
We align as a business hub project with the UN Sustainable Development Goals to help end deforestation and combat climate change.

Direct to consumer convenience


Beautiful enough to display
 OUR BATHROOM TISSUE COMPARED TO THE AVERAGE STORE BOUGHT SIZE.  OUR SHEET COUNT IS #500 SHEETS PER ROLL. THE AVERAGE STORE BOUGHT IS #198 SHEETS PER ROLL WHICH MEANS OUR ROLLS ARE NEARLY 2 1/2 time the size of the store bought.  MORE TISSUE AND TAKES UP LESS ROOM.   "One Box One Tree" Commitment -We are working with The Arbor Day Foundation to help fulfill our "One Box One Tree" Commitment to plant a tree for every box purchased. We will make public our measured progress so that you can see the impact you are making around the globe. As a project of the United Nations Business Hub, we believe if every person and every nation unites to combat the climate crisis, we can successfully fulfill the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals.SNEAK PEAK @ The Future of WHOLEROLL in many different colors. We are "Earth Conscious and People Committed" preserving nature and the future of the next generation.             THE VISION OF WHOLEROLL. WHY IS USING ENVIROFRIENDLY TISSUE SO IMPORTANT?RECYCLE10 is our vision to mobilize a global community.  Our goal is to educate the population on the benefits of using WHOLEROLL and to transition 10% of the global population from using virgin pulp and to begin using WHOLEROLL 100% recycled Eco-bath tissue. When we reach our goal we will have saved and planted hundreds of millions of trees. Why is using ecofriendly toilet paper, saving trees and keeping the oceans clean so important? It is important because deforestation is a contributor to global warming and climate change. Our planets oceans and forests are key to a sustainable future for all life on Earth. Trees are valuable resources for the planet because they absorb carbon emissions out of the air.  When we take care of Mother Earth, this leads to a future that includes breathable air, dependable weather patterns, drinkable water and the survival of ecosystems. Saving the Environment-Our mission is to help end deforestation and combat climate change using WHOLEROLL. We will plant a tree for every subscription box purchased. The next generation is the future and we intend to be apart of preserving their future.                        Saving you time and money- Grocery shopping can be a task and we definitely realize that.  WHOLEROLL will be delivered to your front door saving you money, saving you time while we are also saving the environment and We think that's pretty cool.  Our product is not about bears, kittens and flying babies. Our product is about people, the moms and dads and their children, this planet and our mission to preserve it for future generations. WHOLEROLL is an ecofriendly 2 ply 500 count septic safe bathroom tissue that is affordable, soft, beautifully embossed and Made in America. Each roll is individually wrapped in an emerald green world map paper representing our global mission to reach the world with our tissues.WHOLEROLL means to "completely move forward" and that is what our team at WHOLEROLL has done. We surveyed people all over the globe to find out what is most important to them in a bathroom tissue. We gathered data and information that was important to us and in line with the sustainable mission of the company. Our product is made from high quality fibers sourced from pre and post consumer materials.Tested and approved. We're leaving no stone unturned  in order to bring you the best on the market and best for the planet.Sustainability is the cornerstone of the culture of WHOLEROLL and sustainability is not something we do. It's who we are. We were very selective in developing a partnership with a manufacturer. We decided to only partner with a manufacturer that held the same values, commitment and practices that we hold on sustainability. A manufacturer that is LEED certified and whose tissues are Green Seal approved. We aim to be one of the responsible consumer goods companies that will ensure that the products we are selling are not contributing to deforestation or to any type of environmental damage.                  Thank you for joining us and embracing the vision.  When you receive your reward, remember its not just about tissue. Every movement needs pioneers and that is who you are. You are a pioneer in the country in which you live making early waves by choosing a sustainable solution that benefits the planet, your country and the future of the next generation. Limited Edition "Camouflage Collection" (only for backers never to be made again) - We are creating a one of a kind limited edition World Map Combat Collection for all of our backers.  The combat collection represents the fight we are in to help end deforestation and combat climate change. It represents you as a pioneer believing in the global vision to preserve the earth.          OUR BHAG-Big Hairy Audacious Goal-Yes "WE GO APE TO SAVE THE PLANET"-We have established a project called Recycle10. Our goal is to transition 10% of the global population from using virgin pulp tissue( 98% of the tissues on retail market shelves) which is made from full grown mature trees that manufacturers chop down and to begin using WHOLEROLL; Our sustainable brand that will be delivered to your front door saving you money, saving you time while saving the environment.   Check out the growth of our tree below.  See how the idea for our product has grown. How did it begin? It began with a mom who had a house full of boys who never put the roll on the spool. She knew there had to be a better way and that's when she had an "Aha" moment. She thought what if there was a quick way to insert the roll. Convenience is what they needed. So she looked at the spindle and the tissue roll and said what if they were made together as one piece.  So she decided to call the new product "WHOLEROLL." Needless to say WHOLEROLL is now patent pending. But, while in product development, she learned that 98% of the bathroom tissue on retail shelves was made from the virgin pulp of mature full grown trees that were being chopped down, and she also learned that the average family of four chops down three trees a year for bathroom tissue usage. Shocked by that percentage, she decided to give up her own favorite brand and create a brand that would be more beneficial to the earth and the next generation.  FROM THE TEAMWe are so excited to share our project with you that we have been working on for 2 years now. And yes we learned a lot on this journey. There is no project ever worth attempting that will not go unchallenged, and yes we were challenged. We were ignored by investors, laughed out of meeting rooms and even challenged by some manufacturers who thought we were biting off more than we could chew. But we didn't quit. We gave it our all and our last.  We maxed out credit cards and shook our heads many days trying to figure out how we were ever going to make the monthly payments, but we kept pressing forward because we believed otherwise. We are here today against the odds committed to making a difference and regardless of the bumps in the road, as you can see we still had fun making and bringing our project to you. We are creating a very unique bathroom tissue made with the perfect blend of high quality post consumer fibers. It is a one of a kind bathroom tissue that is uniquely soft, beautifully embossed with the WHOLEROLL logo and some will be in a world map print that speaks "Good for me and Good for the planet."  If we are successfully funded, the funds will go towards our very first production run of WHOLEROLL. With your support, this will be possible and we say "Thank you for believing in us and for investing in the planet and the future of the next generation."  Also a special thanks to
 family and friends who gave us much encouragement and feedback, 
 to the people we surveyed all over the globe who told us what they wanted in a bathroom tissue-softness, sustainability and affordable 
 a special thanks to the UN Business Hub(our project connector on the Hub)for their commitment to the SDG's 
and to "The Arbor Day Foundation" who we look forward to working with in our "One Box One Tree" Commitment to help fulfill the Sustainable Development Goals and tackle the crisis of climate change.
                                         THE WHOLEROLL TEAM  PLEASE SHARE!   HELP US TAKE WHOLEROLL AROUND THE GLOBE                       Visit us @www.wholeroll.comwww.wholerollaroundtheglobe.com

story:
Summary

After my son suffered a fall from his crib, I was desperate to find a way to keep him safe, if he ever tried to climb again. He was too young to transition to a bed, and I couldn't bear the idea of doing nothing. I scoured the internet for a way to cushion any future fall, and to my dismay, there was nothing available.  

We were obviously very concerned about our son after he fell, and even the doctors at the hospital were unable to recommend anything to help us.

I created the DreamCatcher to give parents an option to keep their child safer, without using unsafe crib tents or makeshift tools.

What We Need & What You Get

We have finalized the design and prototyping, we just need a little more cash to make this a reality!

Our molds and design are complete, the funds will be used for production.

  • We have been quoted $20,000 for the production, and will need another $2,000 to ship the container from the factory to our distribution center
  • We have been able to keep our costs low, by partnering with pNeo, who have launched multiple new baby products to market

The Impact

We know that parentscannot be with their child every moment of the day, and the crib should be a relatively safe place. But our experience has shown that no matter how hard you try, sometimes accidents happen.

The DreamCatcher will:

  • Provide a softer place to land in the event that your little adventurer climbs out of their crib
  • Reduce the likelihood of severe injury for children who climb

Most importantly, DreamCatcher does not restrict your child to their crib. We don't believe that this is a practical, or a healthy way to keep your child safe.

Risks & Challenges

We have done all we can to reduce the risks for us, and for you! Developing the DreamCatcher has been a process, and we have consulted with numerous experts to ensure that we have a safe, effective product for you. We are currently undergoing compliance testing to ensure that it meets all the relevant international standards

Safety is our #1 priority, so we have:

  • Engaged manufacturing & design experts for their guidance to ensure that DreamCatcher meets the highest quality & safety standards
  • Spent our initial funds where it counts - designing a safe, effective product

Our highly professional partners are ready to start production, according to our strict requirements. We have inspected their facilities, and are satisfied that they are well-equipped to meet our needs.

All videos and photos are of prototypes and small details might be adjusted in actual production.

We will ship to your location, anywhere in the world. Please be aware that certain destinations might involve customs fees and duties that are backer’s responsibility and might influence delivery time. We unfortunately cannot control what different governments will choose to impose, as this varies widely and regularly changes.

While we plan to start shipping all rewards at the same time, some of you will receive them faster, while some later depending on your physical address. 

As our project involves human factor, manufacturing and shipping overseas, sometimes unforeseen events may happen. We will always keep all our backers updated at each stage and if any changes happen.

Other Ways You Can Help

You may not need a DreamCatcher , but we'd appreciate your help to let parents know that we have a solution to a big challenge they face! So what can you do?

  • For the cost of one coffee, you get us a step closer to our goal
  • Buy a DreamCatcher for a friend - we can even gift-wrap for you!
  • Share this campaign to your Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Snapchat, any Social Feed you have, or simply use the Indiegogo share tools to get the word out!

story:
We need clean indoor air

That's why we, Terry and Megan developed Ventcenters. Together we have 30 years of construction experience in both new and remodel. We are a mother and daughter team and family is our priority. A major issue facing our health is air quality, especially in our homes . Frustrated by the current filtration that we have available for our homes we came up with a no brainer way to fix it. Our product is a simple replacement part for the current vent register you currently have in your house. But wait, this vent cover has a basket that contains a medical grade filter and a re-designed top vent that actually pushes air into the room where you need it.

No Apps, Batteries, or Computers....It's Important to Be the Smartest Thing In Your House.

We need your help! Buy making a contribution or pre purchasing a vent you will help us fund additional sizes of vents and filter baskets. The molds needed to produce our product are very expensive and limit the sizes we can offer. We will also be able to advertise and let everyone know that such an easy, affordable and beneficial product exists. 

You can be part of an amazing revolution in healthy indoor air. Air purifiers only clean the air that finds its way to the purifier. Let's not even talk about how expensive they are, the additional electricity, or maintenance. By installing our vents, 99.9% of air passing though our antimicrobial filter is purifying  pollutants as small as 0.6 Microns every time your HVAC system is running!

Why is this filter better?

Our proprietary filter contains an antimicrobial that will prevent  mold, spores or mildew from growing inside you vents and stop them dead in their tracks.The loftiness of the filter design also allows air to pass through effortlessly while providing  99.9% filtration at a medical level. Our filter will catch pollutants as small as .06 Microns, The standard furnace filter only traps pollutants at 8 microns, that's if you can keep your furnace filter in place. Current furnace filters flop around and do a poor job of filtration. Since filtration is only as good as it's containment, we developed our Ventcenters basket to hold the filter in place for premium filtration.The top of the filter has a slightly tacky substance that will hold all the debris and pollutants that fall in your vents and prevent them from recirculating when the air is introduced. The sides of the filter will not be encased providing even more filtration. By changing the Ventcenters filter every 3-4 months you will be providing your family with the purist air available.

The Ventcenters Basket System

Unlike current vent covers today that push air to the side and down, our newly angled top directs air at a 45 degree angle up and out into the room to be conditioned. Our new Ventcenters design is also easy to open and close when needed.

Our patent pending design for the 'Lesich Vent' was created to hold our filter in place with minimal interference. This system has performed so well in testing we are just leaving the prototypes in our homes until we can make more! The Lesich Vent will be constructed out of a FLAX Poly resin. After the flax seeds are harvested and the flax oil is made, there is enormous waste of this fiber in America. We will be using this fiber because of its renewability, eco friendliness, and natural antimicrobial properties. Flax fiber is also incredibly strong which we need for the vent top. The top of the Lesich Vent will be a strong as the metal ones currently in homes. The benefit our material is we will be able to offer a selection of colors, eliminate the rust and flaking paint associated with the old metal vents, and be able to open and close the vents with ease.

 

It's a great idea, just make it!

We are asking for this funding to move forward with the manufacturing of the molds for all of the different sizes of vents in your home. By supporting us you will learn more about the air system in your home, be one of the first to own one of these life changing Ventcenters, and begin the movement for better and healthier indoor air quality at an affordable price! The chart below shows how we intend to use your generosity and trust.

 

We have secured the filters and molding materials. We have also engineered the design for the molds. The warehouse is waiting for us to fill it with this amazing product that will do so much for so many.

Our Impact with your help

The fact is we are spending more time indoors. Allergy, asthma rates and weird killer viruses are at an all time high. The average house size has increased by an average of 1000 sq. ft. since 1972 but nothing has been done to address the HVAC system. The building code was also changed that year making our houses harder to ventilate. It's like hitting the recirculation button in your car. Gross! We have launched a campaign to educate everyday people on how their homes work and the issue of poor indoor air quality but, we need your help to make sure that all people can afford to have purified air in their homes. 1 in 11 children and 1 in 12 adults suffer with breathing issues. These issues are treated with purchasing expensive medications and in way to many cases, hospitalization. When you're sick or recovering where do you want to be? In your home! Where does your newborn start life? In your home! Where does your family gather for holidays, birthdays, life? In your home!

Who will need this product?

If you live in a building and breathe through your lungs, you need Ventcenters.

 

Risks and Challenges Q&A

 

As with any campaign there will be risks. At this point we intend to fulfill the need for the 4x10 Ventcenter. However, that is only one size and without further help we are unable to produce and develop the other 7 sizes that exist in homes across North America. Other challenges you ask?

Q:Women developing construction products, that's a mans world.

A:We have a combined  experience level of 30years in construction and we are respected and considered experts in our fields.

Q:If it's that simple, why hasn't anyone invented this yet?

A:Innovations in construction have been stagnant for many years, you may say "it's a rusty bolt to turn". Innovations usually come from perfecting the way it's been done versus the way it should be done. Everyone that has been involved or heard of our product has been helpful and enthusiastic. From Lawyers to Engineers we are supported. Now we need you!

Q:Why Terry and Megan?

A:Above all our professional training, we are mothers, pet owners and we clean our own homes. Kids out sick from school, doctors appointments, MEDICATIONS (so expensive!), We are driven and passionate about this new way to help us all breathe easier and better. We don't take NO for an answer and we will work day and night,(or until we fall asleep at the table and hit the floor, that actually happened) to bring this to market! 

Q: Where are you going to make these fantastic vents?

A:AMERICA,that's right! All material from the Flax sourced from Wisconsin to the filters made in Indiana to the Vent basket fabricator here in Colorado. As a Veteran this is extremely important to us.

Other Ways You Can Help

We know this is a big deal! There are so many millions of people that this will help. Now you're all excited but not able to contribute at this time. You can be the difference! Help us by following us and sharing our story, which is so common, and we will be here. Just by spreading the word that this product exists. With you on our side, we cant fail.
