story:
Ein paar Hinweise zur Nutzung und zu den Preisen

  • Der Mitnehmer wird in 3 Preisstufen angeboten:
  • Die 10 Zweierpacks für 98 € (2 à 49 €) sind ausverkauft.
    Ich biete an 2 x einzelne Mitnehmer zu bestellen und die zusätzlichen Versandkosten nach Lieferung zurückzugeben.
  • Die ersten 100 Mitnehmer -aufgeteilt in 60 Einzelne, 10 Zweierpacks (ausverkauft !)
    und 5 Viererpacks- kosten 49 € pro Stück. Sie heißen: Mitnehmer I
  • 200 Mitnehmer -aufgeteilt in 160 Einzelne, 10 Zweierpacks und 5 Viererpacks-
    werden für 64 € pro Stück angeboten. Sie heißen: Mitnehmer II
  • Danach ist der Preis 78 € pro Stück. Sie heißen: Mitnehmer III    
     

Der MITNEHMER

Der MITNEHMER ist der ideale Stuhl für alle die unterwegs sind und sich zwischendurch gerne mal hinsetzen würden. Im mitgelieferten "Turnbeutel" (Baumwoll-Rucksack) ist er immer dabei.

Der Aufbau ist ganz einfach. Nur zusammenstecken und Sekunden später ist er zur "Besitzung" bereit. Ohne Metallteile und ohne Werkzeug.

 

Die Details:

  • Der MITNEHMER wird komplett in Deutschland gefertigt.
    Er ist aus strapazierfähigem und hoch belastbarem Birke-Multiplex gefräst.

  • Die Oberfläche ist unbehandelt.
    So können sie den MITNEHMER ganz individuell bearbeiten: ölen, wachsen, farblos oder bunt lackieren – Ihrer Fantasie sind keine Grenzen gesetzt.

  • Der MITNEHMER wiegt nur 2,5 kg und trägt 100 kg !
    Er ist 32 cm breit und insgesamt 77 cm hoch. Die Sitzhöhe entspricht exakt einem Esstischstuhl: 45 cm.

  • Die nur 5 Einzelteile passen in viele Rucksäcke. Geliefert wird der Mitnahme-Stuhl in einem einfachen Baumwoll-"Turnbeutel". So kann der MITNEHMER sofort überall mit hin genommen werden.

  • Ab August lieferbar !
story_txt:
Ein paar Hinweise zur Nutzung und zu den Preisen
Der Mitnehmer wird in 3 Preisstufen angeboten:

Die 10 Zweierpacks für 98 € (2 à 49 €) sind ausverkauft.Ich biete an 2 x einzelne Mitnehmer zu bestellen und die zusätzlichen Versandkosten nach Lieferung zurückzugeben.
Die ersten 100 Mitnehmer -aufgeteilt in 60 Einzelne, 10 Zweierpacks (ausverkauft !)und 5 Viererpacks- kosten 49 € pro Stück. Sie heißen: Mitnehmer I

200 Mitnehmer -aufgeteilt in 160 Einzelne, 10 Zweierpacks und 5 Viererpacks-werden für 64 € pro Stück angeboten. Sie heißen: Mitnehmer II

Danach ist der Preis 78 € pro Stück. Sie heißen: Mitnehmer III     
Der MITNEHMERDer MITNEHMER ist der ideale Stuhl für alle die unterwegs sind und sich zwischendurch gerne mal hinsetzen würden. Im mitgelieferten "Turnbeutel" (Baumwoll-Rucksack) ist er immer dabei.Der Aufbau ist ganz einfach. Nur zusammenstecken und Sekunden später ist er zur "Besitzung" bereit. Ohne Metallteile und ohne Werkzeug. Die Details:
Der MITNEHMER wird komplett in Deutschland gefertigt.Er ist aus strapazierfähigem und hoch belastbarem Birke-Multiplex gefräst.
Die Oberfläche ist unbehandelt.So können sie den MITNEHMER ganz individuell bearbeiten: ölen, wachsen, farblos oder bunt lackieren – Ihrer Fantasie sind keine Grenzen gesetzt.
Der MITNEHMER wiegt nur 2,5 kg und trägt 100 kg !Er ist 32 cm breit und insgesamt 77 cm hoch. Die Sitzhöhe entspricht exakt einem Esstischstuhl: 45 cm.
Die nur 5 Einzelteile passen in viele Rucksäcke. Geliefert wird der Mitnahme-Stuhl in einem einfachen Baumwoll-"Turnbeutel". So kann der MITNEHMER sofort überall mit hin genommen werden.
Ab August lieferbar !

story:
Introducing the Teri Battery Camera

We know this day in age that security is a top priority.  But it is hard to find a solution that is both affordable and easy to install.  Momentum has spent years trying to develop a solution that is both cost effective and feature rich.  With the support of our current user base and our development team we are finally introducing our first wire free battery camera, Teri.

About Momentum

In 2015 Momentum launched its first Wi-Fi camera. Since then we have expanded our assortment to include several smart home skus…which include indoor cameras, outdoor floodlight, and garage controller.  Momentum continues to engage in innovative ways for users to monitor their home, when they’re away.  Today Momentum has several retail partners like Walmart, Home Shopping Network, Home Depot, Lowes, and Amazon.

 

Why Buy a Security Camera?

In a survey by Safety.com in 2019, they found that 38% of Americans own a home security product with 49.6% stating they just wanted to add security to their home.  Everyone want to make sure the ones they love the most are safe.  Whether it's to keep an eye on your house, watch your pet, or check in with a loved one a home security system can do just that.  This is the foundation Teri was built on and the idea for you to stay connected with your home even when you are away.

 

Features

Human Detection

One of the main challenges for outdoor cameras these days is the amount of false notifications.  A leave falling or a dog running across the screen will trigger any motion detection.  Therefore in order to reduce notifications we have implemented our AI algorithm to detect humans, which are the more important scenarios. Best of all is this feature is free for and can be turned on within the app!

 

Micro SD Card Storage

Many companies will charge you a monthly storage fee in order to save footage.  Others may not even give you an option to save your recordings.  Momentum believes that quality and service should be the main priority for customers.  So we have provided the option for users to save their recordings on their own micro SD card if they choose to do so without having to pay a dime more.

 

Built-in LED Light

As an outdoor camera it is important you can see whether it is during the day or night.  A built-in LED light helps illuminate the area in the dark so you can see in full color.  It also acts as a deterrent light that will turn on when motion is detected to scare off any unwanted visitors.

 

Alarm Siren

Teri is your first line of defense in keeping intruders out of your home.  For emergency cases the Teri camera has an alarm siren that can be triggered when you are away.  

 

Rain or Shine 

The Teri Battery camera is meant to be your first line of defense.  Whether it is sunny or raining this camera will continue to operate, stream, and record.

 

What Our Customers Are Saying...

 

 

How Our Camera Compares to Others

 

 

The Momentum Secure App

The Momentum Secure app is easy to use and install.  Get it available on the Google Play Store or the Apple  

Google Play Store:  https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=c...

Apple App Store:  https://apps.apple.com/us/app/momentum-secure/i...

 

 

Production Update

We are committed to creating a product that we know everyone will want and love.  So our team has been working around the clock to make this happen.  Thank you to everyone who have supported us on this campaign with the Early Bird Specials.  We have finished testing and are in production mode!  First orders is scheduled to be sent out at the end of this month.  We will continue to have more updates in the coming weeks on production and shipping.

 

​We Are Shipping!

We have finally received the products and currently in the process being shipped out to everyone!  We really appreciate the backers for being patient with us and we hope you really enjoy what we have been working hard on the past year for you!

story:
The Need

As we sit in the air-conditioned comfort of our homes and vehicles, across the globe our brave and often heroic American men and women serving in the US Armed Forces are sacrificing their lives and comforts to protect and defend us and this nation day and night.  They never consider themselves heroes they do it out of love for this country, and for each other.  In today’s combat environment the conditions are always extreme.  From 115 plus degrees in the desert on one side of the world, to hot and humid environments that would melt you and me on the other side, not to mention the hard and harsh conditions of training.  It is just unbelievable what they go through beyond being fired at. They never ask for anything in return.  

Heat is something that our troops struggle with.  Safety and effectiveness in extreme heat is a constant topic of discussion. Our troops are at risk all the time due to heat exhaustion.  In the combat environment they have to push themselves to the limit for us all.


As stated in the video above.  While at Fort Bragg NC, home of the 82nd Airborne Division and Special Forces, this spring we got to meet many of our military heroes.  We were invited there by the 82nd Airborne Division Association.  After a few hours of military training out at Sicily Drop Zone our team got to meet these troops and had the opportunity to pass out Frosty Towels®.  After an initial macho reticence, the reception of this simple gift was outstanding and unbelievable,  If you could have seen their eyes like we did.  If you could have seen the excitement on their faces and heard it in their voices, you would have done anything to help them.  You would stop reading right now and make a donation.

Here are some of the things they said over and over: "Wow these are amazing!",  "How do we get them?",  “Where do we get them?", "When can we get more?"

I left there with an emotional determination and one thought:  “If these men and women can sacrifice their lives for me and my family, if they can put themselves through these kinds of conditions, then we can figure out a way to get these towels into the hands of the troops”.  To make this happen, We need you! They need you!

Letter from the Desert

Here is a letter from a 1st Lieutenant after coming back from a mission in the desert:

I hope you can see that this is a very special campaign.  You can put a smile on the face of an active duty military hero and make their day a little more comfortable.  I believe it is the least we can do for them...

We need YOU!



We need you. Our troops need you.  We cannot do this without you.  You are vital to getting these Frosty Towels into the hands of our troops.

Please support our troops.  Please help them get a Frosty Towel®.

Here is how:

  1. Make a donation - (you can donate any amount you feel led to or choose one of the donation perks to the right)

  2. Email all of your family, friends, and associates to share how they can support our troops

  3. Post on your FACEBOOK page several times over the next few weeks

  4. Encourage others you know to donate

  5. Share this campaign using the Indiegogo sharing tools

  6. Use the hashtag #coolourtroops on Instagram and Twitter

  7. Over the next two weeks re-email all of your family, friends, and associates several times

For all that our heroes do for you and all of us please take the time to share this campaign with as many people as you can….it will only take you a few minutes...it is the least we can all do. 


How this will Benefit You

When you make a donation today you will know in your heart that you have done something very special to bless one or more of our brave men and women who are willing to lay down their lives for us.  

When they are somewhere on this planet in the worst of conditions; hot, sweaty, and exhausted, thanks to you, they will get a Frosty Towel®.  Once they open it up, it will get super cold.  At that point they will wipe down and put it on their neck or head.  As soon as they do, they will get a huge smile on their face and they will know that you appreciate them.  I promise you, they will be grateful.  

So please donate today.

How Frosty Towel® Gets to the Troops

82nd Airborne Division Association and their chapters around the USA.

82nd Airborne Division Association, Inc. is chartered by congress to be the preeminent Airborne Association for all serving and veteran troopers, their families, and friends of the Airborne Brotherhood. 

The Goals

To build a team with all of you to help get Frosty Towels into our hero's hands and make their lives a little better by helping to bring a level of cooling comfort to our troops, and reduce the stress of heat. 
We want to raise enough funds over all to donote over 100,00 Frosty Towels to our US Military Heroes over the next 10 months (with the ability to ship some as soon as September).  If we can get to 50,000 towels plus, we will also be donating to the Warrior Alliance in Atlanta, GA. that works with wounded verterans, to the 82nd Airborne Division Association (See below to learn more).

It is important to us that we give back.  The initial funds raised will go to the production of Frosty Towels for our troops.  As people donate more the cost of production will go down and we will be able to donate even more towels. Remaining excess funds will be donated to the Warrior Alliance of Atlanta, GA. and to the 82nd Airborne Division Association.  (for more information about these organizations please go to the bottom)


Who We Are

We are a family business.  We love this great country and we still believe in the American Dream. We are very grateful to have a product that can actually make a difference in people's lives.  We started this journey nine years ago and it has been a blast mixed with ups and downs.  Our heart is, we want to give back.  We want to give to those who have sacrificed the most for us.  This project is just bigger than us.  We cannot do this without you.  We need you to become a part of the Frosty Towel® team for our heroes.


About Frosty Towel

I am sure you are all asking what is a Frosty Towel® and why is it so special?

Frosty Towel® is the only patented natural instant cooling towel in the market place. It uses special technology to cool you down in moments and help with your core body temperature as well.  We use natural plant oils and extracts infused into a cotton towel that lowers the temperature of the towels to 64 degrees on average to begin with.  It comes in a re-sealable package and is reusable. To learn more we have provided two short videos below.


Frosty Towels® are sold in places like Disney World Resorts and Parks, Six Flags, Wild Adventures, Carowinds, Kings Dominion, Herschey Parks, Mast General Stores, KSO Kinnucans, Tylers SportIng Goods, Select Ace Hardwares, and at hundreds of locations around the USA and throughout the Caribbean.  They are also used in safety programs, by medical professionals, first responders, and by athletes the world over. 


Back to our Heroes


Our brave heroic troops have been in extreme conditions in harms way for many years now.  The heat of the desert is unbearable not to mention the heat in boot camp and at many of the military installations around the world and in the USA.  We honestly do not know how they do it.  We do know this; Frosty Towels do make a difference.  They do work.  


Final Thoughts

You are critical to making this dream a reality.  We cannot not do this without you.  You are essential to the success of this campaign and getting these Frosty Towels into the hands of our troops.

Please stand up for our troops.  Please help them get a Frosty Towel®.

For those of you that have not made up your mind to donate yet, please let me remind you, if you had been at that drop zone and could have seen the eyes of the troops and seen the smile on their faces you would donate a few dollars immediately and sacrifice some time emailing your friends and posting this on social media without any hesitation.  You just would.  

I cannot express it enough.  Our brave men and women in the US Armed Forces are giving up all for us.  They do it because they want to.  They are even willing to sacrifice their lives for us.  As I stated above, if you donate today you will know in your heart you have done something special.  Because of you the day will come soon when one of these troops is handed a Frosty Towel®.  You will put a smile on their face.  I promise you, they will be grateful for what you did here today.

Donate today and tell all of your friends to help keep our Troops cool one Frosty Towel at a Time. 

Thank you. God bless you and May God bless and protect our troops and the USA.
The image below was taken while members of our team where at Fort Bragg for All American Week. This is not to be construed as an endorsement from the 82nd Airborne or of the US Army.  This is a personal image. 

Below is a short list of some of things these fine organizations do to support our troops (the more towels you donate the more funds we can donate to these groups).
82nd Airborne Division Association: 
  • Provide scholarships to families and wounded heroes
  • They support families where their loved one was killed in action and provide scholarships to them also
  • They work with the wounded warrior battalion to help make sure wounded veterans get paid and are helped.  They provide funds and support to them as well
  • Provide funds for the food banks on the forts for the families.
  • They bring families down to Orlando for vacations

The Warrior Alliance: 

  • They provide full re-integration services for our Wounded Veterans
  • They provide support to families with Wounded Soldiers through Retreats, Training, and Courses to bring them closer together, build them up and help them grow as a family
  • They provide additional education as well as job and vocational training
  • They provide employment support
  • They provide health and wellness training

story:
Summary

Introducing the patented Simple Stir, the world’s first microwave food cover that uses the motive power of your microwave turntable to stir your meal! The Simple Stir is designed to sit on the floor of your microwave outside the turntable. A detachable stirring paddle is held motionless by the rectangular cover and the turntable does all the work for you. Your food is now just as hot in the middle as on the sides.

For dishes that don’t require stirring, simply use the Simple Stir like a regular microwave food cover. Since the Simple Stir doesn’t sit on top of your plates and bowls like a typical cover, you won’t have to clean it as often.

The Simple Stir works great for:

- Sauces
- Soups
- Cheese and Bean dips
- Pasta
- Frozen Corn and Peas
- Pizza
- Anything you microwave!

We are raising funds to start our business. This money will allow us to produce the first round of Simple Stirs, properly test the market, and set us up to approach the large retail distributors. We intend to have the first round of production complete within three months of our successful Indiegogo campaign.

This company currently consists of one person. I am an accountant by day and inventor by night, an active member of Mensa, a Rotarian, and an Eagle Scout. I have worked on this design for the last few years, spending whatever time and money I could scrape together to make this happen. I believe that our newest design will make a useful and stylish addition to your kitchen.

Thank you for helping me bring my idea to life!

Risks & Challenges

I have spent several years designing the Simple Stir to be an elegant, sturdy, and convenient kitchen tool. I received a utility patent on the design in 2015. I have secured several quotes from manufacturers to prevent delays in production. That said, this is my first experience in the world of commercial manufacturing. I understand that obstacles will arise that I could not have possibly expected.

Other Ways You Can Help

You might not be able to contribute financially, but if you happen to have a social media account, I sure would appreciate you sharing this campaign with your friends and family.
story_txt:
Summary
Introducing the patented Simple Stir, the world’s first microwave food cover that uses the motive power of your microwave turntable to stir your meal! The Simple Stir is designed to sit on the floor of your microwave outside the turntable. A detachable stirring paddle is held motionless by the rectangular cover and the turntable does all the work for you. Your food is now just as hot in the middle as on the sides.
For dishes that don’t require stirring, simply use the Simple Stir like a regular microwave food cover. Since the Simple Stir doesn’t sit on top of your plates and bowls like a typical cover, you won’t have to clean it as often.
The Simple Stir works great for:
- Sauces- Soups- Cheese and Bean dips- Pasta- Frozen Corn and Peas- Pizza- Anything you microwave!
We are raising funds to start our business. This money will allow us to produce the first round of Simple Stirs, properly test the market, and set us up to approach the large retail distributors. We intend to have the first round of production complete within three months of our successful Indiegogo campaign.
This company currently consists of one person. I am an accountant by day and inventor by night, an active member of Mensa, a Rotarian, and an Eagle Scout. I have worked on this design for the last few years, spending whatever time and money I could scrape together to make this happen. I believe that our newest design will make a useful and stylish addition to your kitchen.
Thank you for helping me bring my idea to life!

Risks & Challenges
I have spent several years designing the Simple Stir to be an elegant, sturdy, and convenient kitchen tool. I received a utility patent on the design in 2015. I have secured several quotes from manufacturers to prevent delays in production. That said, this is my first experience in the world of commercial manufacturing. I understand that obstacles will arise that I could not have possibly expected.

Other Ways You Can Help
You might not be able to contribute financially, but if you happen to have a social media account, I sure would appreciate you sharing this campaign with your friends and family.

story:
Thanks to all those that contributed to the success of the Living Shelter campaign PART 1 (https://igg.me/at/living-shelter).

We are honoured to announce that, with the great support of our backers, the first 1:1 Living Shelter prototype is now exhibited at the Architecture Venice Biennale 2016.

Until November 2016, more than 200,000 visitors will be able to experiment the capsule at Palazzo Mora, terrace level 1 within the exhibition Time – Space – Existence hosted by the Non-Profit Organization Global Art Affairs Foundation.

Along the prototype construction process and the opening of the Architecture Venice Biennale, our team received fantastic feedbacks. Institutions, NGO, communities, designers, engineers and the public trust Living Shelter to be a smart solution for disaster relief.

Our team is even more determined to bring its innovative solution in the disaster relief market and start to help the communities in need.


WHAT IS LIVING SHELTER?

Check-out the Living Shelter PART 1 campaign to learn more about the genesis and features of the Living Shelter: https://igg.me/at/living-shelter.

The prototype process and installation at the Venice Biennale is also documented on the Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/Living-Shelter-855235037955574/


IMPROVE THE FIRST VERSION OF THE PROTOTYPE

Prototyping process helped us to identify where systems can be improved: better concealed hinges and track system, optimization of primary structure, adjustment of the overall height for more efficiency while deploying the shelter. Our team of designers and engineers is already working on an upgraded and lighter version.


USE INNOVATIVE TECHNOLOGY FOR FURNITURE

We are convinced that the Living Shelter should provide what is currently the best in term of innovation and design. With this mind, we have already started exploring further the portable furniture system currently part of the flat-pack. New technology such as 3D-printed and light-weight composite materials will increase stability without adding extra weight. Design and systems will focus on ergonomic to meet the end-users usages.

Our team is currently revising the design of the portable set of furniture including:

  • 2 chairs
  • 1 foldable bed
  • 1 table for 6 pax,
  • 1 kitchen counter
  • 1 ladder to access to the rows of hammocks above the double bed
Those elements will be patented in Singapore alongside the overall Living Shelter©.


SHARE THE KNOWLEDGE WITH THE COMMUNITY

It’s crucial to enable people to work together towards a common goal. During the transitional phase, our team envisions to transfer the 3D printing knowledge to the community.

Computer, software, 3D printer and materials could be sponsored with partners. Through workshops, the community could learn how to create three-dimensional objects of everyday life and furniture. Templates of design could be provided as well as basics skills to create their own design. This initiative could be part of a NGO program post disaster relief as a case study.


OUR GOAL

We’re asking US $5,000 for:

  • Portable furniture:
  1. 3D print samples of innovative systems
  2. Prototyping to confirm the ergonomic design
  3. Produce 1 copy of each furniture
  • Sharing session with the community
  1. Communication and research to find partners and NGO to develop the workshop
Design and engineering works are self-founded by our companies.

WHAT DO YOU GET IN RETURN FOR HELPING US LAUNCH

Through contributing Living Shelter campaign PART 2, you can take pride in knowing that you’ve directly served the communities in need with innovative adapted solutions.

Help us out with any amount and get online recognition.

Go one step beyond, you will receive a 3D printed miniature of 1 portable furniture.

With further contribution, you will be able to provide a testimonial to communicate with the end users. This will be a part of the instruction manual, included in the Living Shelter pack.

Uniquely designed goodies are available:

  • “Thank you!” origami cut-out letter of the Living Shelter to assemble yourself
  • Special postcards featuring the project
  • A tote bag to show your sponsorship as contributor of the project

Get a chance for an individual invitation to a special lecture given in Venice by the creators of the project in autumn 2016 hosted by the Global Art Affairs Foundation. Tickets flights and accommodation will be at your own accord.

Perks can be redeemed right after the end of the campaign.


SHARE TO HELP

Simply by clicking the share button, you can make a big difference!

Just follow us and spread the word about this awesome project to your friends. Meanwhile, we’ll continue to update you on our latest progress via the Facebook page.

Lastly, THANK YOU for all your support and generosity to change the future of communities in need through supporting Living Shelter.

story:
The Suaoki P7 laser measure has all the features you’d expect from a laser meter, plus even more. If you need a quick measure for construction, furniture arrangement or home decorating, P7 is exactly the tool you need.

P7 is also a combination of a high precision laser distance meter and an ultra sensitive angle sensor which enables it to measure distances in various modes.

With the integrated Bluetooth technology, P7 can directly transfer data to your smartphone or tablet. It comes with an APP that allows you to draw a floor plan sketch (CAD) or mark distances on a photo reference, so you can quickly and easily prepare for your next move.

 

 
 
 
If you need to know the distance of a pair of arbitrary points, you can simply use 2 arbitrary points distance function with the incredibly simple operation - “click, click and done”. Based on the angle change and the 2 distances you just measured, P7 automatically computes the distance right away. You no longer need any complicated calculation, P7 eliminates all of these hassles.
 
 
 

When you press a button, it’s natural for the hand to shake a little. However, this phenomenon will become unignorable if you are trying to measure the distance to places such as a ceiling corner. You’ll have to focus on one particular point, which can be a little hard.

 

Fortunately, P7 features a continuous measurement function, it can rapidly get a series of distances and pick out the maximum and minimum measurements. In this case, because the ceiling corner is inward, making it the farthest point, so you’ll need the max value. However, if it’s an outward corner, you’ll need the min value.

P7 features a series of built-in equations for area/volume calculation and auto level, auto height.

 

When you need to acquire the area or volume of a place, all you need to do is measure the side lengths one by one, and P7 will display the result immediately.

 

What is auto level? Say you need to know the distance from you to the wall, but there are obstacles in the way and the laser can’t reach there directly. This is where auto level comes into play - simply point to the upper part of the wall, bypassing all the obstacles. P7 will show you the horizontal distance to the wall with a simple application of trigonometric function.

 

Likewise, auto height brings you the vertical distance between the 2 points you measured. Just measure the lengths of both upper and lower ends of the target vertical line, and you’ll get its height.

There are 3 different Pythagorean modes for you to choose. They all use Pythagorean function to calculate distances indirectly, using the same math we learned in high school. However, when you apply it to various scenarios, it can be a little tricky to choose the most suitable mode. Maximizing its utility depends on your creative mind.

Besides measurement, it is also very important to keep a record of your measured data. You can connect P7 to your smart device with Bluetooth, and control P7 by the APP which features 3 basic functions:

One, P7 stores 30 sets of data by itself, but when working with your phone, there would be no limit. You can even export the data to an Excel spreadsheet.

Two, you can draw a brief sketch of floor plan reminding yourself where to put the sofa or how big a carpet you need.

Three, it also lets you annotate dimensions in your images. Simply take a photo and mark it with the dimensions on your phone or pad so you won’t forget the meaning of those measurements.

Suaoki P7 also provides you with tons of useful and thoughtful features for an enhanced experience.

 

- Touchscreen: A traditional keypad laser measuring tool would be too time-consuming to operate. A touchscreen, however, can be really handy when you have too many features to choose.

 

- Automatic Screen Rotation: Whenever you measure, it’s almost inevitable you’re going to rotate the laser measurer, if the screen rotates accordingly, it’ll be better for your neck.

 

- High Precision Angle Sensor: Detect the angle for all sorts of calculations.

 

- IP54 Dust and Splashproof: P7 is tough enough for the most rugged outdoor real job site use.

 

- Tripod Mount Hole: If you are seeking for a more steady measurement, you’ll need a tripod to stabilize P7 (Tripod not included though).

 

- 3D Digital Spirit Level: Immediately indicates whether P7 is on a level surface.

 

- Anti-drop: Wrapped in rugged yet elastic rubber, P7 withstands minor drops.

 

1. Does this product ship worldwide?

Yes, both Suaoki P7 and Suaoki S7 ship worldwide.

 

2. How accurate is Suaoki P7?

For normal distance measurement, Suaoki P7 has an accuracy of ±2 mm in length and ±0.3° in angle. Only in the 2 arbitrary points distance mode, the accuracy is slightly lower, which is ±1 cm.

3. What shipping information do I need to submit?

Fill in the required information as below:

1) Full name;

2) Postal code;

3) Street address, City and Province ;

4) Phone number;

5) Country.

Please make sure you fill in all 5 fields, especially your phone number. The delivery is very likely to fail otherwise.

4. Is the laser safe for the eye?

This is a class 2 laser product (human accessible power output: <1mW), for protecting your eyes, please do not stare into the beam or view directly with optical instruments.

5. What does the warranty cover?

We provide you with a one-year warranty for refund or replacement.

6. I have other questions not answered here. What should I do?

We’re happy to respond to any further questions you might have. Visit our official website: www.suaoki.com or email us at support@suaoki.com

story:
On Sunday after the holiday breakfast Laiga and Juris along with five-year-old daughter and seven-year old son departed from the greens to enjoy the fresh holiday. When they came back, everything was in order. Around seven in the evening Laigai noticed smoke in the laundry shed hand, and immediately called her husband, who was not at home at the time. When Juris arrived, flames already increased in force. At home at the time he was also Juris parents and brother. Everyone did what they could - carried off from home furnishings and apparel, however, despite the efforts of fire, the house of 170 square meters suffered so thoroughly that what is left is demolished. I managed to extinguish the fire only at night. Juris currently with his wife and children live in the neighborhood, but the parents to another son. «What more insurance! With our salaries ... »exclaims Juris. exampleexampleexample. Juris father began to raise their hands for more than 20 years. The son of the house was completed and improved by thinking about it for a large family as comfortable and spacious accommodation. By profession Juris builder. «As far as we could, so we did - noble for yourself," says the family breadwinner

We are asking you to please open your hearts in aiding the family with any amount of donation you can provide at this time. Our love and prayers are with our Family; anything you can give will help.

story:
Make your glass smart in just few minutes

Smart Film instantly transforms transparent glass into a frosted blind with a simple on – off switch. Our electronic smart film applies to any glass window or partition to provide privacy and security.

Smart Film gives you a richer and more vibrant view of your environment, eliminating the need for traditional window coverings that collect dust and germs and clutter up your space.

Smart Section Blinds use Smart Film technology to create unique, customizable blinds. Unlike Smart Blinds that cover your entire window all at once, Smart Section Blinds divide your glass surface into stripes that can be controlled independently. You can create horizontal stripes, vertical strips, or any variation to provide the perfect setting for any occasion.

  • Converts your existing glass into Smart Glass
  • Delivers instant privacy control automatically or with the touch of a button
  • Helps make the most of your space
  • Improves your view and enhances natural light
  • Reduces the need for heating and cooling by up to 40%
  • Matches your setting to your mood to suit any occasion
  • Boosts the value of your home and improves the status of your business

Smart Section Blinds take Smart Film to a whole new level by adding an impressive degree of control. While Smart Film blocks an entire window at once, Smart Section Blinds virtually divide glass into stripes and blocks. Each section can be controlled separately, including their degree of opacity, so you have complete control over your smart glass.



You can control Smart Blinds with a simple switch, WiFi, timer, temperature, or a motion sensor. It also works with your existing home automation system.


This technology can also transform any glass into a high-definition television. In its opaque state it works as a rear projection screen to display video or images. 

This radical concept re-imagines how you can realize the potential of your space. Convert your entire window into an HDTV to showcase your products and tell stories about your company, your vision, and your community.


1) We have completed our final Smart Section Blinds prototype, and we’re ready to move into mass production. 

2) We are in the final stage of developing the control system that you’ll be able to operate by smart phone, timer, physical gestures, and a motion sensor.

3) We’ve created a low-voltage prototype, reducing voltage from 110 to 30 volts, dramatically increasing the product’s energy efficiency and ensuring optimal safety in all applications.

Crowdfunding dollars will help us develop a wireless power supply that works over Wi-Fi, eliminating the need for traditional wiring that clutters up your space.

Wireless transmission technology transmits power via electromagnetic fields, which is perfect for a minimalist installation that looks great on windows, sliding doors, and glass doors.

For the past months we have been hard at work developing smart film, with the goal to bring natural light, privacy and security  to everyone.  

We launched a crowdfunding campaign to raise funds so that we can develop wireless power transfer technology, produce smart film in higher volumes, and bring the price down.  

Not in the position to make a financial contribution? Spread the word and share this idea with your friends and family. You can like us on Facebook, share the campaign on social media, or let others know about us by word of mouth. You can also become a distributor. This is a great option for existing window tinting companies who want to add to their product arsenal. 




We took the risk up front and delayed the launch of our campaign until we believed it was ready because we wanted to lessen the risk to our backers. We have a great team in place so we aren’t anticipating a lot of obstacles. When it comes to new technologies, nothing is certain, but we will face every challenge with the same tenacity and perseverance we’ve had from the start.

How does the technology work?

When the electrical supply is switched on, the liquid crystal molecules align themselves and the glass becomes instantly clear. When the power is off, the liquid crystal molecules scatter the light for a frosted effect.

Do Smart Section Blinds completely block the light?

Smart Section Blinds are translucent white or “frosted” when turned off. Switchable glass is never actually opaque. During the off state, Smart Section Blinds let in over 50% of visible light, but still block the view. It’s an ideal choice for small spaces like offices, bedrooms and bathrooms because it provides privacy on demand while allowing natural light to filter in.

What is the difference between Smart Section Blinds and Smart Blinds (Smart Film)?

The only difference is the degree of control. Smart Section Blinds virtually divide glass into stripes and blocks, and each section can be controlled separately, including their degree of opacity. Smart Blinds (Smart Film) block or adjust the opacity of an entire window. 

Why be an early adopter? What’s in it for me? 

Early adopters are the key initial supporters that help us make this project possible, and we’re ready to say thanks any way we can.

  • You get to purchase Smart Section Blinds at the lowest possible price
  • We’ll provide a guaranteed warranty to compensate for any possible faults
  • You will receive your product before we sell it anywhere else
  • You’ll become a preferred customer and receive lifetime preferences, including discounts of up to 40% on all future orders

What if I want to be a distributor or reseller? 

We’d love for you to get in touch. You can purchase our distributor pack for initial samples by emailing us at social@smartglasscountry.com. Please note that there will be a limited number of resellers for each territory, so act fast!

How many controllers do I need?

One controller can control up to 50 square ft.  

What is the average price per window?

Most windows range from 32-36” in width and between 54-62” in height, which is approximately 9-14 square ft. per window. The average window would need 2-3 perks.

How many square metres is 5 square feet?

5 square feet=0.46 square metres. One square metres=10.74 square feet. 

How do I measure my required quantity?

Measure the height and length of the glass, allowing for a 1/8” (3.175 mm) installation tolerance.

Can Smart Section Blinds technology be applied to my existing windows?

Smart Section Blinds are manufactured with a self-adhesive cling layer on one side, so you can easily apply it to your window just like the screen protector on your phone. We prepare the Smart Film for your specific glass size, you just need to peel and stick.

Can the level of opacity in Smart Section Blinds be adjusted?

Yes, you can adjust opacity by using a dimmer or our controller.

Can I get Smart Section Blinds in different colors?

A variety of colors and tints may be incorporated into Smart Section Blinds to achieve a decorative effect. We have white and dark grey as our base colors.

How do you clean Smart Section Blinds?

Smart Section Blinds should be cleaned with a soft cloth and gentle cleanser. Avoid harsh chemicals and sharp instruments. Be sure to remove liquids from any edges that may have collected during the cleaning process.

Can you cut holes in Smart Section Blinds?

Yes, you can cut holes, cut-outs, and create custom shapes.

How do I convert my glass into a high-definition TV?

Two technologies are available: rear projection (using a projector and Smart Section Blinds as a screen), and transparent LED display. Please contact us for more information.

How does this technology save energy and the earth?

Smart Section Blinds save energy in a few different ways:

  1. Provides privacy without blocking natural light
  2. Reduces heat gain due to sunlight, lowering air conditioning costs to save on electricity
  3. Easy to clean with no chemicals required

How do I set it up?

Similar to any electronic device, you plug Smart Section Blinds into a power outlet and it’s ready to go. You can also connect to the controller or download our app from the Apple Store or Google Play to control it from your smartphone.

How can you make this technology so affordable?

We can keep our costs low based on volume. Because we’re selling directly to consumers, we don’t need to build in retail margins that substantially add to the product cost.

How do I integrate this technology into my existing home automation?

We have documented our API and it should be ready for release sometime later in 2016 for existing home automation developers to develop on our system. 

What platform does Smart Section Blinds support?

Smart Section Blinds support iOS, Android, and iWatch. These platforms will be ready before delivery. 

Where can Smart Section Blinds be shipped?

Smart Section Blinds will be shipped worldwide as long as United States Postal Service (USPS) or Canada Post supports delivery to that location.

What is the warranty for Smart Section Blinds?

Smart Section Blinds will include a one-year limited warranty. We will do a one-for-one exchange for any faulty product within a one-year period.
story_txt:
Make your glass smart in just few minutes



Smart Film instantly transforms transparent glass into a frosted blind with a simple on – off switch. Our electronic smart film applies to any glass window or partition to provide privacy and security.
Smart Film gives you a richer and more vibrant view of your environment, eliminating the need for traditional window coverings that collect dust and germs and clutter up your space.Smart Section Blinds use Smart Film technology to create unique, customizable blinds. Unlike Smart Blinds that cover your entire window all at once, Smart Section Blinds divide your glass surface into stripes that can be controlled independently. You can create horizontal stripes, vertical strips, or any variation to provide the perfect setting for any occasion.










Converts
your existing glass into Smart Glass


Delivers
instant privacy control automatically or with the touch of a button


Helps
make the most of your space


Improves
your view and enhances natural light


Reduces
the need for heating and cooling by up to 40%


Matches
your setting to your mood to suit any occasion


Boosts
the value of your home and improves the status of your business





Smart Section Blinds take Smart Film to a whole new level by adding an impressive degree of control. While Smart Film blocks an entire window at once, Smart Section Blinds virtually divide glass into stripes and blocks. Each section can be controlled separately, including their degree of opacity, so you have complete control over your smart glass.












You can control Smart Blinds with a simple switch, WiFi, timer, temperature, or a motion sensor. It also works with your existing home automation system.









This technology can also transform any glass into a high-definition television. In its opaque state it works as a rear projection screen to display video or images. 




This radical concept re-imagines how you can realize the potential of your space. Convert your entire window into an HDTV to showcase your products and tell stories about your company, your vision, and your community.


1) We have completed our final Smart Section Blinds prototype, and we’re ready to move into mass production. 
2) We are in the final stage of developing the control system that you’ll be able to operate by smart phone, timer, physical gestures, and a motion sensor.
3) We’ve created a low-voltage prototype, reducing voltage from 110 to 30 volts, dramatically increasing the product’s energy efficiency and ensuring optimal safety in all applications.Crowdfunding dollars will help us develop a wireless power supply that works over Wi-Fi, eliminating the need for traditional wiring that clutters up your space.

Wireless transmission technology transmits power via electromagnetic fields, which is perfect for a minimalist installation that looks great on windows, sliding doors, and glass doors.






For the past months we have been hard at work developing smart film, with the goal to bring natural light, privacy and security  to everyone.  
We launched a crowdfunding campaign to raise funds so that we can develop wireless power transfer technology, produce smart film in higher volumes, and bring the price down.  
Not in the position to make a financial contribution? Spread the word and share this idea with your friends and family. You can like us on Facebook, share the campaign on social media, or let others know about us by word of mouth. You can also become a distributor. This is a great option for existing window tinting companies who want to add to their product arsenal. 















We took the risk up front and delayed the launch of our campaign until we believed it was ready because we wanted to lessen the risk to our backers. We have a great team in place so we aren’t anticipating a lot of obstacles. When it comes to new technologies, nothing is certain, but we will face every challenge with the same tenacity and perseverance we’ve had from the start.







How does the technology work?
When the electrical supply is switched on, the liquid crystal molecules align themselves and the glass becomes instantly clear. When the power is off, the liquid crystal molecules scatter the light for a frosted effect.


Do Smart Section Blinds completely block the light?
Smart Section Blinds are translucent white or “frosted” when turned off. Switchable glass is never actually opaque. During the off state, Smart Section Blinds let in over 50% of visible light, but still block the view. It’s an ideal choice for small spaces like offices, bedrooms and bathrooms because it provides privacy on demand while allowing natural light to filter in.


What is the difference between Smart Section Blinds and Smart Blinds (Smart Film)?
The only difference is the degree of control. Smart Section Blinds virtually divide glass into stripes and blocks, and each section can be controlled separately, including their degree of opacity. Smart Blinds (Smart Film) block or adjust the opacity of an entire window. 


Why be an early adopter? What’s in it for me? 
Early adopters are the key initial supporters that help us make this project possible, and we’re ready to say thanks any way we can.





You get to purchase Smart Section Blinds at the lowest possible price


We’ll provide a guaranteed warranty to compensate for any possible faults


You will receive your product before we sell it anywhere else


You’ll become a preferred customer and receive lifetime preferences, including discounts of up to 40% on all future orders




What if I want to be a distributor or reseller? 
We’d love for you to get in touch. You can purchase our distributor pack for initial samples by emailing us at social@smartglasscountry.com. Please note that there will be a limited number of resellers for each territory, so act fast!


How many controllers do I need?
One controller can control up to 50 square ft.  
What is the
average price per window?




Most windows range from 32-36” in width and between 54-62” in height, which is approximately 9-14 square ft. per window. The average window would need 2-3 perks.

How many square metres is 5 square feet?
5 square feet=0.46 square metres. One square metres=10.74 square feet. 

How do I measure my required quantity?
Measure the height and length of the glass, allowing for a 1/8” (3.175 mm) installation tolerance.


Can Smart Section Blinds technology be applied to my existing windows?
Smart Section Blinds are manufactured with a self-adhesive cling layer on one side, so you can easily apply it to your window just like the screen protector on your phone. We prepare the Smart Film for your specific glass size, you just need to peel and stick.


Can the level of opacity in Smart Section Blinds be adjusted?
Yes, you can adjust opacity by using a dimmer or our controller.


Can I get Smart Section Blinds in different colors?
A variety of colors and tints may be incorporated into Smart Section Blinds to achieve a decorative effect. We have white and dark grey as our base colors.


How do you clean Smart Section Blinds?
Smart Section Blinds should be cleaned with a soft cloth and gentle cleanser. Avoid harsh chemicals and sharp instruments. Be sure to remove liquids from any edges that may have collected during the cleaning process.


Can you cut holes in Smart Section Blinds?
Yes, you can cut holes, cut-outs, and create custom shapes.


How do I convert my glass into a high-definition TV?
Two technologies are available: rear projection (using a projector and Smart Section Blinds as a screen), and transparent LED display. Please contact us for more information.


How does this technology save energy and the earth?
Smart Section Blinds save energy in a few different ways:





Provides privacy without blocking natural light


Reduces heat gain due to sunlight, lowering air conditioning costs to save on electricity


Easy to clean with no chemicals required




How do I set it up?
Similar to any electronic device, you plug Smart Section Blinds into a power outlet and it’s ready to go. You can also connect to the controller or download our app from the Apple Store or Google Play to control it from your smartphone.


How can you make this technology so affordable?
We can keep our costs low based on volume. Because we’re selling directly to consumers, we don’t need to build in retail margins that substantially add to the product cost.


How do I integrate this technology into my existing home automation?
We have documented our API and it should be ready for release sometime later in 2016 for existing home automation developers to develop on our system. 


What platform does Smart Section Blinds support?
Smart Section Blinds support iOS, Android, and iWatch. These platforms will be ready before delivery. 


Where can Smart Section Blinds be shipped?
Smart Section Blinds will be shipped worldwide as long as United States Postal Service (USPS) or Canada Post supports delivery to that location.


What is the warranty for Smart Section Blinds?
Smart Section Blinds will include a one-year limited warranty. We will do a one-for-one exchange for any faulty product within a one-year period.

story:
A world of Squiggles

The Squiggle lamp collection is the latest work of furniture designer Jørn Broen Christensen.

Working with chaotic shapes and coincidence Jørn Broen is able to replicate the same appealing aesthetic we find in nature and unwittingly make in slots of time on a piece of paper. 

 

 

To make these chaotic yet deliberate shapes Squiggle is made with a unique 3D manufacturing technique bending metal tubes in organic shapes. To visit our site and read more click the image above.

 

Organic Design Shapes - A Leading Trend

Award winning Italian interior design researcher and trendsetter The Italian Bark call the organic Squiggle design by Broen a leading trend for 2020 / 21. See link to read more.

 

 

Elisabetta Rizatto is listed in the Top Global 25 interior blogs by The Huffington Post, besides being named in many paper and online publications, including Vogue Australia

 

 

To read the full interview click the link.

 

 

Get your Squiggle lamp

 

 

Sizes 

Squiggle come in three different sizes. So no matter the sizes of your workspace Squiggle will provide you with sufficient quality light.
 

SMAL: Height 42 cm / 16.5 inches - Width: 60 cm / 24 inches. 320 lumen. 

 

MEDIUM: Height: 50 cm / 20 inches - Width 75 cm / 30 inches. 380 lumen.

 

LARGE: Hight 72 cm / 28 inches - Width 100 cm / 40 inches. 505 Lumen.

 

Three size options in comparison

 

 

Pick your favorite colour

Explore the beautiful nine Squiggle colours and chose the one for you.  

 

Notice. Dont place the Passionate Red, Dutch Orange and Deep Purple in direct sunligt. 

 

 

 

Technical specs 

 Squiggle come with a powerful LED source of 950 lumen pr meter. This make it well suited as a work light.

The LED´s have a pleasant warm white colour of 2700 Kelvin – as know from halogen lights. 

The lamp have a very good colour reproduction of 97 CRI. The colours of the objects Squiggle illuminates will be correct.
 

 

 

To illustrate the illuminating power of the Squiggle lamp we have picked a picture below that demonstrates this. It is taken on a clouded day.

The lamp is placed high above but is still able to illuminate the girls legs and the whole piano. The lamp in use is the Squiggle Medium / 380 lumen.

 

 

Squiggle comes with all 4 global power supply standards. In the post-campaign survey we will let you specify which type you need.

 

 

Designer and founder

Jørn Broen is the designer of the Squiggle lamp and the founder of Broen Interior Design.  

Jørn has 15 years experience with product design and product development. 

Furthermore Jørn has 2 years experience  from working on the floor in a metal workshop. 
 

 

 

Production and delivery

Our first batch of Squiggle lamps are in production now  and we will be able to deliver the first 300 lamps in first half of June 2020. 

To give an impression of the production process we have made a short handheld video from the factory floor.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

While this is our first Kickstarter campaign, it is not our first experience manufacturing a quality design product. Please see our website for previous products. The Squiggle lamp is a unique design with advanced 3D tube bending and a high quality light source but the product is not a challenge to produce as such. Most parts are standard or simple to manufacture. We work closely with skilled manufactures and will do final assembly and quality control in house.

story:
The wait is over. No more screen time conflicts!

 

Are you, like us, parents who experience conflicts about your child’s screen time and looking for solutions? In today’s increasingly connected and digital world, the answer is most likely ‘yes’. Search no more, the SCRIIN WiFi router is coming to town to solve these conflicts and help every family member be aware of their screen time and achieve a healthy balance. 

The SCRIIN WiFi removes the conflict - When the agreed screen time budget is up, the Internet at home shuts down for that individual. It’s time to take a break and do something else, like being physically active.

 

 

We ❤️ the internet and smartphones.

 

Technology is amazing, and the technology of the modern age has made our lives overwhelmingly richer. The development of smartphones combined the Internet is a revolution that the SCRIIN team have been part of developing throughout our careers.

 

 

 

But there is a dark side.

 

The technology revolution and the personalized screens we engage with the Internet make us lazy, sitting still too long. Making a generation unhealthy. Previous generations literally moved a marathon or more every week while today us and our children sit still in front of our screens during far too many of our waking hours. It is becoming a serious health problem both for children and adults. We need to develop a better balance between screen time and physical activity in our lives.

 

 

 

Balance screen time with physical activity.

 

SCRIIN WiFi is built to help you and your children balance screen time with physical activity. This is how it works:

1. Give your child (and yourself) a daily budget of screen time.

Create accounts for all your family members and give each family member a daily screen time budget. Depending on age, the amount of screen time can differ.

 

 

2. Enable the device in the SCRIIN App

When your child wants to use a device at home, like the PS4, Xbox, or using the iPad or any device connected to SCRIIN WiFi, they can only enable the device or multiple devices through the SCRIIN App.

 

 

3. Get notifications before screen time is up

The SCRIIN App will notify your child when their screen time is coming to an end and finally shut down access to the Internet. The first notification comes 15 minutes before time is up, followed by warnings 5 minutes and then 1 minute before screen time is up. We think it is important to prepare for shutdown so children have time to say goodbye to their online friends.

 

 

4. Track your physical activity

With the SCRIIN App or the optional Activity Tracker, you can track you or your child’s physical activity. Use it to achieve balance between screen time and physical activity, and even unlock your Internet connection when you have reached a better balance.

 

Progress circles show you how much time you have been physically active, and how much time you have spent with all your screens during a day.

 

 

For all family members.

 

SCRIIN WiFi is built for all family members who have a smartphone. There are no complex settings. We make it simple for you and your children to manage your screen time in your own home.

 

 

Plug it in. Download the SCRIIN App. Go.

 

We aim to make everything as easy as possible for you. Installation of the SCRIIN WiFi router is built for everyday people, not technicians. When you receive the SCRIIN WiFi router, plug it in and connect it easily with the SCRIIN App. The App will take you through some simple steps to get your whole family connected.

 

 

It is stable and secure. Built to the highest technical standards. Made for high-speed connectivity.

 

 

 

Screen addiction - it really is a ‘thing’!

 

Recent studies show a common thread - Screen time among children after school is dangerously high. Here in Sweden, 40% of adolescents use a screen 3 or more hours every day after school. We still do not know the full effects of increased screen time, but it makes us sit still too many hours per day and these leads to health problems through inactivity.

 

Recent studies also show a correlation between the overuse of social media and anxiety and depression. Social media and video games are designed to make us addicted. They give us instant gratification and our brains love it, while we all understand rationally that delayed gratification is what is good for us. Exercise gives us delayed gratification while eating sweets gives us an instant kick. Which one is really better for us and our children?

 

 

Children are the future. Let's make them smarter.

 

Our children are the future. Yeah, it’s a cliché, but it doesn’t make it any less true. Every generation seems to be a bit smarter than the previous one. The brain needs to be physically active to function well in order to learn and to think in several steps. Physical activity also helps us generate insights and connect physically with other people, which gives us better Emotional Intelligence.

Disrupting sedentary behavior in our children and enabling a healthy balance between screen time and physical activity, the next generation might yet be the smartest generation ever. We want them to outsmart us so they can improve this planet and make life flourish.

 

 

Shutdown and move!

 

With technology, we can do amazing things, but we also need to move our bodies. Our vision is that all children are physically active for at least 60 minutes every day. If your children are moving 60 minutes every day, the chances of a long and healthy life are increasing significantly.

 

The SCRIIN WiFi router helps to shut down when sedentary screen time becomes too much. The SCRIIN App, with or without our small activity tracker, will help you understand if you have reached your goal of 60 minutes of physical activity daily.

 

 

We have set our goal. Let's reach it together.

 

We want to deliver our SCRIIN WiFi solution to all of you in many countries around the world. Join us. We need you to help us reach our goal!

 

 

We are the founders of SCRIIN.

 

 

 

You are much more than a customer.

 

We want you to be awesome! But we also need ambassadors to realize our dreams and visions. If you join this campaign you will not only get a product to support your family’s screen time conflicts, you will also help us make sure we can get this product to as many families as possible, ensuring more people break sedentary screen time for a healthier lifestyle. 

We will forever love you and continue to innovate on your behalf.

Our goal is to raise €15,000 in order to meet manufacturing requirements and volume so that we can mass produce SCRIIN WiFi and make it affordable for everyone right now. 

With your help, we can make SCRIIN WiFi a reality. Let’s do this!

 

 

 

Spread the love ❤️, Let’s make SCRIIN WiFi happen!

story:
So easy to use!

1. Place Your Tower Commander in the Tower Garden and connect it to your WIFI. 

 

2. Download the Tower Monitor app from Google Play or Apple App Store.

3. Launch the Tower Monitor App and setup your Tower Commander!

 

 

 

 

4. Connect with the Tower Garden community!

 

 

In 2017 my wife and I took the leap from the corporate world, built a greenhouse, bought a seedling business, added some commercial Tower Gardens, and became farmers! We didn’t know exactly what we were getting into, but we knew we needed something more fulfilling and engaging in our work life. Little did we know the blessings that farming would bring us.

Having come from a technology background, one of the first things we wanted was to be able to control the farm from a phone. We wanted to set the temperature, control the fans and shutters, track tasks, and generally collect growing data. We setup a very robust solution using low cost technology that has functioned with amazing precision and outstanding uptime. At the same time, we were packing and shipping seedlings to home Tower Gardeners and growing a strong community. We realized that home gardeners did not have the same ability to track and monitor their growing as we were able to do in the greenhouse.

Right about that point, we were able to bring a team together and developed an idea for a device that a home gardener could use to monitor their Tower Garden. Tower Commander was born.

We spent two years developing the prototype. We designed and 3D printed a device that easily integrated into the Tower Garden.  Then we stuffed it full of sensors, connected it to the cloud, and developed an app to show the growing conditions. We are now launching our Indiegogo campaign to fund the development and release of the production device.

As we grow, we are adding more products that enhance the home and commercial Tower Garden experience.

We are innovators, entrepreneurs, and gardeners who are committed to bringing quality, affordable, easy to use solutions to make your growing experience even more enjoyable.

Happy gardening! Clint and Team

 

Patents Pending
2020 Tower Commander ™ All Rights Reserved 

Tower Garden® Is wholly owned by Juice Plus+ and not affiliated with Seedgistics, LLC.

We setup a very robust solution using low cost technology that has functioned with amazing precision and outstanding uptime. At the same time, we were packing and shipping seedlings to home Tower Gardeners and growing a strong community. We realized that home gardeners did not have the same ability to track and monitor their growing as we were able to do in the greenhouse.Right about that point, we were able to bring a team together and developed an idea for a device that a home gardener could use to monitor their Tower Garden. Tower Commander was born.We spent two years developing the prototype. We designed and 3D printed a device that easily integrated into the Tower Garden.  Then we stuffed it full of sensors, connected it to the cloud, and developed an app to show the growing conditions. We are now launching our Indiegogo campaign to fund the development and release of the production device.As we grow, we are adding more products that enhance the home and commercial Tower Garden experience.We are innovators, entrepreneurs, and gardeners who are committed to bringing quality, affordable, easy to use solutions to make your growing experience even more enjoyable.Happy gardening! Clint and Team Patents Pending2020 Tower Commander ™ All Rights Reserved Tower Garden® Is wholly owned by Juice Plus+ and not affiliated with Seedgistics, LLC.

story:
Welcome to AnZa! 

The AnZa espresso machine is the lovechild of two not-so-strange bedfellows: a professional design studio and an espresso repair shop, both sharing the same space in Berkeley, California.

Born out of passion for good coffee and boredom with the default espresso machine vernacular, the AnZa brings new life and love to your countertop. 

The AnZa is not your typical appliance, collecting dust on your countertop. Concrete. corian. Wood. Steel. Brass. Glass. These largely ordinary materials are not often found on espresso machines. But their application shows you don’t need to look far to find design elements that create a dramatically new experience—emotional, practical, or otherwise. The result is a spectacular espresso machine, and an unparalleled conversation piece.

AnZa in Concrete

AnZa in Concrete offers Brutalist overtures at once softened by contrasting white ceramic accents.

 

 

 

AnZa in corian

In corian, AnZa playfully extends the ubiquitous kitchen counter material to a countertop appliance itself.

 

 

Whatever you choose, both models offer the same streamlined user-experience, resulting in a beautifully pulled espresso shot.

There has been surprisingly little innovation in the world of espresso machines, despite our obsession with interior architecture and kitchen design. Anza’s added value comes from its material choices and accessible functionality. AnZa delivers a cafe-quality experience in a fashion unlike any other appliance—truly earning its bit of valuable real estate on your kitchen countertop. The AnZa might not be technically unique, but the design and material choices of the AnZa make it something completely new, a conversation piece that aims to refashion the industry of home espresso machines.

Globally Featured Publications: 

 

 

Our History

A few years ago, designers at Montaag set out on a creative experiment. What could it look like to treat an appliance like a work of art—without sacrificing quality? Based on the design team’s love of coffee, and our shared office space with an espresso repair shop, the AnZa design process kicked off. 

 

 

Our team sought inspiration from the many workshops and salvage yards surrounding us in the San Francisco Bay Area. We played endlessly with material, color, and tactility. Ultimately, we landed on product design principles that emphasize honest materials and intuitive functionality.

Design process

 

After many rounds of prototypes (and a display of our working model at Selfridges department store in London), we have fine-tuned the technical specs, and secured a full-scale manufacturer overseas.

 

How easy is it to use AnZa? 

Concerned about the specs? Not to worry. In partnership with the espresso repair shop that shares our office, the AnZa team has benchmarked technical quality against other high-end espresso machines. The AnZa works as beautifully as it looks. 

The AnZa offers an intuitive interface to deliver delicious espresso shots every time. If you’ve never pulled a shot of espresso before and want to learn, here is a short tutorial that will show you the gist from one of our working AnZa prototypes.

AnZa Specifications

The AnZa is not your typical espresso machine. It comes with high-value features that help ensure you have a delicious shot of espresso and seamless experience every time.

One huge value-add: AnZa comes equipped with an electronic PID controller that provides consistent water temperature to ensure you get the quality you expect every time. 

  • Brewing temperature is set and maintained using a (PID) controller
  • Machine weight: 15 kg  
  • Volume of water tank: 1.5 L  
  • Stainless steel boiler has a volume of 300 ml and a 1350 W heating element  
  • Boiler is placed above the group head to minimize temperature loss
  • 15 bar ULKA pump with pressure gauge and 9 bar pressure limiter
  • Portafilter: 58 mm  
  • Single boiler system with steam at 15 bar  
  • The steam wand has a detachable tip with 3 openings

Where will AnZa be produced? 

The final production version of AnZa will be produced overseas at our manufacturing facility.  

 

That is where you, the amazing coffee community comes in. With your support, we can cover our manufacturer payment and bring the AnZa espresso machine to kitchens all over the world. Yes, yours too.

We are ready to hit “go!” and are now at the final step: securing funds to cover the manufacturing costs.

 

 About the AnZa team

 

 

The AnZa team is comprised of designers from Montaag, a multidisciplinary design consultancy with offices in Berkeley, California and Oslo and Stavanger, Norway. Collectively, we have brought dozens of products to market for both Fortune 500 clients and early stage start-ups. Our consultancy shares space with Kanen Coffee: a full-service espresso repair shop that lent their technical expertise and guidance for the AnZa coffee machine collaboration. 

Thank you!

With AnZa, we encourage you to be a little bolder. With a bit of imagination, you can deliver a delicious home espresso shot through a stunning machine. Why can’t the joy of making a good coffee extend throughout the entire experience? Join us in elevating the at-home coffee experience.
story_txt:

story:
Meet the Ninety° 

The Pour over coffee maker that combines effortless brewing and visual elegance.

Tired of seeing unchanged designs of coffee makers for years?

We know how you feel because we feel the same, too. 

What we have come up with is a product that fulfils your everyday visual and functional satisfactions, a coffee set that you can proudly display at your home. Evaluate your everyday coffee ritual. Your pursuits for aesthetics deserve to be completed with something sleek as the Ninety°.

More than just a coffee maker, it’s going to be an integral part of your new lifestyle. 

 The beauty of hand brewing coffee is all in the experience - The preparation, the pour, the smell, the sound, - The ritual is essential. Inspired by Chemex, Hario and other impressive products on the market, the Ninety° is driven by clean and functional design while also making no compromises to the brewing experience. Ninety is also:

  • Easy to set up.
  • Easy to operate.
  • Easy to clean.
  • Dishwasher safe.
  • Perfect sized for the whole family.

 More in the Ninety°

A pour over set designed to be on display. 

Ninety° is truly a stylish lifestyle product, its modern and unique design stands out and grabs everyone's attention at first sight. It's equally functional as it is beautiful, fun to play with.

The most important part of your day deserves to be perfected.

When we created Ninety°, our vision was to craft a set of brewers that was stylish, fun, interactive and amazingly simple to use. Most of all, we wanted to bring that perfect cup of coffee from across the world right into your home.

For coffee drinkers, coffee lovers, coffee professionals, and even those yet to be initiated. Ninety° delivers a completely new experience, opening the door to a new level of caffeinated pleasure. 

After a year of developing and many design iterations, we finally have a product we are truly proud of. Ninety is going to be the only coffee set you will need to brew great coffee. Discover different coffee technique and enjoy the art of coffee making.

Let the Ninety° light up your day.

Great coffee awaits.

  *All prices listed in US dollar subject to currency change.

The Team

story:
Carefully engineered with an All-American design, Thero saves your tongue and time from scalding hot drinks, letting you enjoy your favorite coffee at instant coffee speeds. Drinking coffee is a way to get more out of your day and Thero lets you get the most out of your coffee. No more jumping through hoops just to get started.

 

Temperature adjusting mugs have been around for a while, but Thero is the fastest! We use only the highest grade materials, turning drinks from scalding hot to the perfect temperature in just 2 minutes and keeping them there for 5-6 hours.

 In a day and age where we can send people to the moon and colonizing Mars no longer feels like some far off dream, why do we still have to struggle with overly hot coffee? At Thero, we think that life on Earth should be a little simpler and that is what we set out to do with the Thero Magic Mug. 

Most coffee is poured at 180-200 degrees Fahrenheit, which is way too hot to drink. At this temperature, coffee will scald your mouth and kill off cells, making it not only unpleasant, but harmful as well. A classic paper cup will take 15-20 minutes to cool down coffee to a drinkable temperature and will become too cold just a few minutes after that. Meanwhile, classic insulated travel mugs will keep your coffee undrinkably hot for hours, unless you take the lid off in which case it will still take half an hour. Thero gets your coffee ready in just 1-2 minutes so you can start drinking the moment you step out the door.  

We know that some people like their drinks a little hotter and some a little cooler, so when we say 140 degrees is the perfect temperature we expect some skepticism. The good news is that our perfect temperature is not just an arbitrary number! Deeming 140 degrees the perfect temperature is the result of not only testing what the most popular drinking temperature is, but also working with coffee roasters and taste testers to find the range where premium coffee exhibits its full body of flavor!

Also, we hate cutting corners, so we didn’t! Thero Magic Mugs are designed to work with even boiling hot water so you never have to worry about your drink being too hot to handle. We worked diligently with coffee experts throughout the product design process to create the best product for coffee, but at the same time we wanted to make sure we built something that worked well for our tea loving friends too!

The Thero Magic Mug uses some of the same technology that keeps rocket ships from overheating on launch and reentry to control the temperature of your coffee. Our special space-grade material is designed to absorb excess heat while your drink is above 140 degrees Fahrenheit, quickly bringing it down to that perfect drinking temperature. Then, when your hot drink falls below that perfect temperature, it will release that stored up heat back into your drink. This way you get to savor and enjoy your drink instead of gulping it down.

 

The coolest thing about this aerospace material is that it does this all on its own. No sensors or electricity required! Just rinse with cool water in between uses to reset the material and let it get rid of any heat it might still be holding on to. 

Risks and Challenges

Bringing any product to market can present challenges and unfortunately, delays can occur due to unforeseen circumstances. One possible reason for the potential delay is the holiday rush. We have already identified several manufacturers and wish to complete our order before the holiday season in the OEM's country. Our current timeline has 1-2 months of wiggle room for potential delays and we are trying our best to bring Thero to you ASAP.

story:
CONTROL IT WITHOUT TOUCH 

IT AUTOMATICALLY ON/OF BY TILTING YOUR HEAD



I like outdoor activities, especially fishing. In fishing at night, I use cap light and often need to touch it with wet and dirty hands when I catch a fish or replace baits. 

But I can't keep it turned on because it may chase away fish and sometimes there are people around fishing together and it will disturb them. TILTERN provides 'Tilt on&off' mode and it will turn on only when you look down and off automatically when you raise your head again.

When I use cap light, I want to change its LED color - with warm white which feels more natural in a night with full moon and with cool white feels brighter in a dark night. And I see people feel tired of using one color. So LED replacement concept applied in TILTERN. We call this detachable LED head part CUBLIT and we provide both WARM WHITE and COOL WHITE. CUBLIT can be attached other derivative devices such as MINI TORCH (stretch goal)





  • TILTERN BLACK + EXTRA CUBLIT : $44

  • TILTERN WHITE + EXTRA CUBLIT : $44

  • TILTERN ORANGE + EXTRA CUBLIT : $44


  • 2 x TILTERN (any color) + EXTRA CUBLIT : $78 (-$10 saving)

  • 4 x TILTERN (any color) + EXTRA CUBLIT : $150 (-$26 saving) & Free Shipping




Please add $15 for shipping (outside of Korea)



When it reaches over $100,000 - new CAMO color will be available in the color selection


When it reaches over $150,000 - derivative device MINI TORCH will be available

MINI TORCH circuit and structure design has been done already. CUBLIT is compatible with MINI TORCH.

Epilogue

We got an idea and started from what we like and think as a part of life, which is fishing, camping and outdoor activities. We hope you also have a chance to experience TILTERN. Upon a success of TILTERN, we are planning various lighting applications for outdoor activities. We'll put more functions such as wireless control in various lighting applications.

We really appreciate your donation for TILTERN and hopefully, we'd like it to be born in the world upon your support.


You can contact to us through :
