story:
Quick Navigation

Use Soap Daily - Exclusive IndieGoGo Perks - Products that work with Soap - Soap Demos - Technical Specs - Timeline - About Us - FAQ - Contact

Clean your home network with Soap

What is Soap?


First thing that you need to ask yourself is how many networked devices do you currently have in your home? How do you manage all these devices?

Soap is the first ever all inclusive home networking app. Soap has all your home networking needs covered whether its conventinal networking managment suchs as network security, adding and removing of devices, or setting up time limits for your kids. On top of conventional networking managment Soap offer offers device agnostic solution to your home automation design. Soap's goal is to work with as many different home automation products as possible. So you are no longer tied to the specific app for your specific hub or light bulbs. At Soap we want to unite all your connected devices under one simple and easy to use app.

Make sure to check out the perks that will only ever be offered with this campaign

Soap Router

Only avaliable here on IndieGoGo.

  • AC Router
  • 1.7GBs Marvell Wireless Card, Changeable via mPCIe
  • 2GB of Ram, that is expandable up to 8GB
  • Expandable Storage
  • Open WRT
  • SATA II

Click Here for more info.

 

 

Use Soap Daily

Home Automation

Networking

Parental Controls

 

Soap Home Automation

Universal Home Automation

Soap makes home automation easy. No longer do you need fifteen different apps to control fifteen different devices. Soap unites all your home automation devices into one single app, with a familiar easy to use user interface.

 

Hub Control

Soap is hub agnostic, the Soap app will communicate with the hub you already own. No need to buy any proprietary hardware.

 

Always the perfect temp

Soap will allow you to control your connected thermostat from your smartphone from anywhere in the world.

 

Light on, Light off

With Soap you can turn off lights with a simple touch. No more having to get out of bed to shut off your lights. Think of this as your 21st century clapper.

 

Soap Works With

 

 

Soap Networking

Easy Network Set-up

In steps as simple as setting up your new phone you can now set-up your home network!

 

 

 

Soap Makes it Easy to Add & Remove Devices From Your Network

Adding devices is easy with Soap...no need to search for passwords or find buttons on the device...just tell Soap what to add on your phone or tablet, and Soap does the rest.

Manage all your devices

See all your networked device on a single screen.

 

Keep your network secure

Alerts

Get alerts directly to your smartphone for everyhthing that occurs on your network.

Passwords

Easy change your network passwords and apply it to all the connected devices on your network

 

 

All network tasks are simple with Soap
The Soap app gives all users the ability to perform network tasks that once only the tech savvy were able to accomplish.

  • Easy Network Set-up
  • Individual user management
  • Network push notifications
  • Individual device tagging
  • Security notifications
  • Advanced network features
  • Time Limits
  • Data Limit Controls
  • Device specific filters
  • Add devices from your phone
  • VPN
  • QoS
  • Port Forwading
  • Home Automation

 

 

Soap works with these router brands

 

Soap Parental Controls

Soap gives you back control of your network once and for all. Easily manager what each and every device does and has access to on your network.

Data Control
Some cable or content providers don't offer all-inclusive or unlimited plans...so use the Data Limits feature to protect your wallet

Time Limits
Some cable or content providers don't offer all-inclusive or unlimited plans...so use the Data Limits feature to protect your wallet
Filters
Create device specific filters that limit access to websites that you don't want your kids visiting.

 

Soap isnt just for cleaning

These are just some of the great things you can do with Soap, and as your connected home grows Soap will continue to grow with it.

Exclusive IndieGoGo Perks

Products that work with Soap

Wink Homeboy Ecobee
Nest Honeywell Insteon
LIFX Lightwave SmartThings
Phillips Hue Dropcam Wemo
           

 

Linksys Belkin Netgear
Buffalo D-Link TRENDnet
Asus Routers TP-Link    
           

 

Soap Demos

Nest Demo
Qucik simple video to show the Soap app working with the Nest thermostat.
LIFX Light Bulb Demo
Short video to show the LIFX light bulb control with the Soap app.
Soap Open WRT Router Demo
This is an early version of the router control.

 

Technical Specs

Soap Router

This is a great top of the line router that has already been built and tested and is ready to ship.

  • Intel® Atom™ N2600 1.6 GHz
  • Intel® NM10
  • 1.7 gbps Marvell Wireless Card
  • 1 x DIMM DDR3-800/1066 up to 4 GB (unbuffered)
  • AMI
  • 4 x 10/100/1000Mbps (Intel® i210AT)
  • 1 pair (optional)
  • 1 x Compact Flash™ type-II, 1x CFast™ (optional)
  • 1 x PCI Express Mini Card
  • 1 x console RJ-type connector, 2 x USB 2.0, 1 x VGA
  • 12V/5A
  • 0° ~ +40°C (32°F ~ 104°F)
  • 30 x 152 x 110 mm (1.18” x 5.98” x 4.33”)
  • Linux Kernel
  • FCC class B, CE class B

Linksys EA4500 Media Stream N900 Smart Wi-Fi Wireless Router Specs

Operates simultaneously at both 2.4GHz and 5GHz bands, supporting wireless speeds of up to 900 Mbps total on the 2 bands (450 Mbps + 450 Mbps). Lets you connect computers, Internet-ready TVs, game consoles, media players and more to your wireless network and the Internet. Quality of Service (QoS) feature delivers smoother performance for high-priority traffic such as music, voice and video.

  • Dual-band support is great for your home theater - HD video streaming and more
  • MIMO antenna array offers extended wireless range
  • The 6 antennas also help minimize dead spots. Wireless-N connectivity is compatible with 802.11a/g/n devices
  • 4 Gigabit Ethernet ports to connect your wired devices
  • Each high-speed port supports transfer rates of up to 1 Gbps (1000 Mbps)
  • A separate port lets you connect to the Internet, providing access to all devices on your network
  • Built-in USB port lets you share a device with others on your network
  • You can attach a USB printer or external USB hard drive that anyone on your network can access
  • SPI firewall helps keep your network safe from Internet threats
  • Advanced WPA2 encryption helps secure your wireless network
  • Customizable parental controls help keep kids safe when online
  • Quick, easy setup in 3 steps
  • Supports the latest Internet standards
  • IPv6 certified

SmartThings Hub Specs

  • Communication protocol: ZigBee, Z-Wave, IP, and other wireless protocols
  • Dimensions: 4.3 x 5.6 x 1.3”
  • Weight: 5.6 ounces
  • Power source: micro-USB (6” cable and power adapter included)
  • Range: 100-150 feet (depending on your home’s construction)

Timeline

About us

Why the name Soap

The name Soap came from the early days of the product, when we originally were designing a product that helped parents keep their home networks clean. We soon came to the realization that this was a much too narrow concept as the market continued to tell us that the time for a universal network management app had arrived. But everyone loved the name Soap so much that we decided to keep it.

Directional Change

As many of you know we originally were going to build a router running Android with a touch screen display. We ended up having to make a difficult business decision due to cost and the length of time it was going to take to develop the product. We of course are taking care of our original backers, but we strongly believe that the path we are taking now is the right path to meeting the market demands for a universal network management application. We have humbly conceded our orignal router manufacturing plans to those who do it best and have decided to partner with them instead of compete with them.This change is a win for everyone.

Where were located

Our Soap office is located in Monument, CO just north of Colorado Springs and south of Denver.

The Team

The Board: Dave Tilton, Chris Lundwall

The Team: Alex Jones, Fred Martinez, Brandon Jones, Borys German, James Bently

 

Soap at CES 2015

 

 

FAQ

Q: What is Soap?
A: Soap is an application for your tablet or smartphone that gives you total access and control over your home network. It allows you to not only control all your home automation, but also monitor and manage all your conventional netwoked devices like computers, and tablets.
Q: Will you have an app for iOS and Android?
A:Yes we plan to have an app on both platforms.
Q: Will you have a windows app?
A: Currently we do not have a time table on this, but at some point we will.
Q: When will the Soap app be officially avliable?
A: We plan to launch the app in March of 2015.
Q: Does Soap work with Open WRT?
A: Yes.
Q: Will you continue to add new devices to the Soap App?
A: Yes we will continue to update the app with new devices as they are released by the manufacturers.
Q: What wiill premium features be in the future?
A: Some of these are still on the drawing board, but they will be things like custom filters, some scene management features, and specific app inhancements.
Q: Will Soap work with my current router?
A: If you can load Open WRT on your router, the answer is yes. We are currently working some other solutions as well that we will announce when we can.

 

Contact us

Have any questions please feel free to email us at questions@soapapp.us. If you have a product that you want us to incorporate into the app please email us at workwithsoap@soapapp.us.

Soap is the first ever all inclusive home networking app. Soap has all your home networking needs covered whether its conventinal networking managment suchs as network security, adding and removing of devices, or setting up time limits for your kids. On top of conventional networking managment Soap offer offers device agnostic solution to your home automation design. Soap's goal is to work with as many different home automation products as possible. So you are no longer tied  to the specific app for your specific hub or light bulbs. Soap isnt just for cleaning

These are just some of the great things you can do with Soap, and as your connected home grows Soap will continue to grow with it.

story:
About the Designer/Innovator

Jacob Chen is an independant product designer based in Taipei, Taiwan. Since Jacob was a little boy, he had a deep fascination with how things worked, and have taken apart and studied every toy and anything interesting that he could get his hands on to. With the encouragment from his Dad who was an art teacher, Jacob took a path which combined artistic creativity and technological innovation, and became a unique product designer/inventor (or in my opinion, an Innovation Artist).

Product Features

  • The tea flows through the tea leaves, then through the bottom filter, and finally in to your cup, capturing all the available flavors.
  • There is no pouring action, thus making it a lot safer to use for the elderly or those with unsteady or shaky hands.
  • Designed for tea leaves, also great for tea bags and instant coffee. Can be used for ground coffee (Coarse and Extra Coarse Grind only)
  • Maximum capacity: 550ml (approximately 4 standard cups).


The Campaign  

My name is Meiyi Chen and I'm based in Scotland. I'm currently working together with Jacob raising funds to begin production of the Thumbs Up Brewer. The minimum production quantity for the first batch of the Thumbs Up Brewer is 1000 units. The prototypes have been made, tested and refined. All is left is to raising enough money to fund the production!

Inspiration

The core concept of the Thumbs Up Brewer was inspired when Jacob was visiting Stock Bridge during a trip to Edinburgh. He fell in love with second hand charity shops dotted through out the street and went back there over and over again through out his visit. Although I can never get my head around on how second hand shops can lead to inspiration, but then again, I'm not an inventor or an artist...

Dis-assembly and Cleaning

The Thumb Up Brewer can easily be taken apart piece by piece, cleaned by rinsing under running water, or simply just put all the disassembled piece in to the dishwasher. 

And after cleaning, just put everything back together. 



What is Tritan? 

The Thumbs Up Brewer is made from the material Tritan. But what exactly is Tritan? 

  • Tritan is a new material developed by the US company Eastman, its full name is called Tritan™ Copolyester, it does Not contain A(BPA). Tritan have also obtained approval from the US FDA (Food Contact Notification (FCN) No. 729).
  • Tritan is 100% safe to use between the temperature range of 110°C to minus 40°C (inclusive).

The Design and Patent

The Thumbs Up Brewer was developed using TRIZ design principles. It is currently fully patented is Taiwan (Patent Number: M 493940). Patents are also pending in multiple different countries and regions.



Production and Fulfillment

The Thumbs Up Brewer will be 100% manufactured in Taiwan. All products will first be shipped out of Taiwan to 2 different Fulfillment Centers for distribution to backers.

Europe & Australasia Distribution Center: Responsible for shipping out all rewards to backers living in the UK and Europe. (Royal Mail 2nd Class parcels and Standard International Parcels Services will be used)

Asia & Americas Distribution Center: Responsible for shipping out all rewards to backers living in Asia and Americas. (Tracked International Courier Service)


Thumbs-up Slim (Alternative Design)

  • 500ml version of the Thumbs Up Brewer
  • Identical design concept and mechanism as the Thumbs Up Brewer.
  • Perfect for Tea Leaf, Tea Bags and Instant Coffee.
  • Made from Tritan.
  • Can be taken apart and easily cleaned. Dishwasher safe.
  • Comes in 4 colors: White, Black, Green, Pink. (The Perks that you receive will be a RANDOM color. However, if there is a specific color that you very much dislike, please send me a message, and we will make sure that you won't receive that specific color.)

Product Quality Guarentee

A two year product quality guarantee is offered on all Thumbs up Brewers. (Under normal usage, each Thumbs Up Brewers can be used for 5 years or more.)


Durability Test



The Perks

The Referral Program

Refer friends and get AWESOME REWARDS!


Shipping Cost Table


Risks and challenges

I have had numerous discussions with Jacob regarding the risks and challenges with the production of the Thumbs Up Brewer. Jacob is very confident as the manufacture process and production line have already been fully tested and refined in the initial limited trial production of Thumbs-up Mini Brewers. But there is still the concern with large scale production of the larger Thumbs-up Brewer, it will be more prone to risks and process failures, which could delay production.
Thus in our case, the biggest risk and challenge will be meeting the promised deadlines.
We believe that we have given ourselves plenty of time with our promised delivery dates. But if we do run in to any problems which will result in possible delays, what we can promise is that it will be CLEARLY COMMUNICATED to all the backers, and no one will be left in the dark wondering when will they ever get their rewards :)


Any questions or thought? Please leave a comment or send me a message :)

story:
We are raising funds to help get a production line going for our Next Generation Solar Window Candles. This will help us build enough inventory for HSN (Home Shoppers Network). We will be hiring about 5-10 people and storing the candles in a storage unit nearby. Funds will also help us obtain the rental of a building for 1 month, parts, tools, tables, and chairs required for the assembly line. This is a project that everyone can feel good about. Places that have no electricity can now have a little light shine into their lives.

Investing in Next Generation Solar Window Candles helps people by helping the planet. Are we helping or hurting this planet and the next generation? Lessening the burden on the environment by eliminating thousands of batteries being thrown away every week lessens environmental impact.The Next Generation Solar Window Candle is more than just a solar window candle.It is a windownized solar system with home decor in mind,that provides power to 5 optional modules. Every family member can make use of these candles. From the tiny tot, who uses it as a night light, to the teenager,who uses it to charge the smart phone,to mom,who uses it to time those cakes and pies to perfection,to dad,who uses it to make sure he is never late for work.New modules just introduced are the security module using motion sensing,for a tool less security system that leaves no holes in walls,just perfect for apartment or dorm.Use the motion module for home automation to turn lights on and off,saving energy and money,making it easy to be green.Can also be used as guest notification at restaurants with remote light or alarm function.Message module can be used as centerpiece and notify guest of daily specials.Radio module, with magnetic antenna attachment that detaches on impact,to sleep by or keep up with the latest news and sports.Light module to read by or eat by when the lights go out.This is possible by the polarized magnet connectors that transfer power from the power storage base to the modules via top and side connectors. A very good thing for us and the planet.No window sill, No problem!!! The new peelNstick window sill for Next Generation Solar Window Candles is made from clear polycarbonate that blends in with any window and requires no tools to install.With a 5 year warranty, you know we do not design for the dump.How much money could you save in batteries over 5 years over 5 devices???View the modules available at YouTube Playlist Visit our website at http://www.ledlightingautomation.com  and use the contact form there for more information. Available on Amazon at http://www.amazon.com/Window-Candle-Magnetic-Solar-Charging/dp/B00GB39J2K. The candles that CAN DO more for you and the planet.Thanks for your time.

story:
Summary

hello dears,my name is ziggy and my son name is poyraz.we are living in Turkey-Aydin.i am 34 years old and poyraz is 10 now.my life start awesome with my family years ago.we had wonderful life and i went to university in istanbul 1999.big earthquick happend in istanbul,soo many people died.i was lucky then but i left istanbul after that so went back to aydin again.my father never wanted me to study in istanbul so he was happy i came back.when i came back from istanbul i get married with my son's father.i met him in istanbul and we came back to aydin together.one year later i got married with him.the story of ziggys life starts here..... ten days after i got married my mum died,she hanged her self in my room.she was the last person to do that.maybe you are asking your self big WHY?? yeah i am still asking why but no answers arround.i get very sick and get panic attacks.still have it but its better,taking medicines.my life starts that day when she died i though but never stopped there.i had my son 3 years later and i get divorse because he was never helping me to get better.he try to put me in evidence hospital.he did yes ! but i have two brothers that helped me out of hospital.later on when i get divorse i found a good job.i rent my house with my son and every thing was getting better.no no never happened.then my father died......that was too much for me.and my brothers left me alone with my son.i remember we stayed in central park 3 nights.you are asking your self what happened your friends?where are they?no where absolutly no where.no body helped me arround these days.after i found a job but who is going to look after my son?on an on goes like this really.what am i doing right now is working in supermarket but i cant look after my son good.his father is not helping for anything even a penny.i want to feed my son with fruits also.he loves banana.just a little banana.if you can help me just buy him a banana.we dont want clothes or new things.we just need to rent a house becuse we are staying friends house at the moment and keep moving to other and other friend house.my son asks me all the time why we are keep moving.well i told him the truth.because we dont have it baby...even for a one mounth if we can stay somewhere our own that nobodys talking after us like;when are they going? just need to rent a house or room.i will send photos if we can rent a house.dears,i cant pay back if you help me right now but in a year i will try to pay back.will give my tel number or email if need to contact with me.i am borrowing this computer from friend to connect with you. thank you so much for your time and help.i am hoping for a normal human life with my son.please all look after your self well and pray for me...

Other Ways You Can Help

please share this maybe some people may want to help.thank you a million to all..have a perfect life you deserve......ziggy

story:
MACHINE-WASHABLE, DRYER-SAFE ON LOW, & WRINKLE-RESISTANT 

CASHMERE-BLEND CAPSULE WITHOUT THE LUXURY MARKUPS

 

At SOFIE & NATE, we LOVE cashmere!  After raising more than US$19,000+ in a 20-day Kickstarter campaign in Sept. 2016, we are now bringing the campaign to IndieGogo supporters! Pre-Order your capsule cashmere-blend pieces for incredible deals.  Deliveries begin in Dec. 2016 and Jan. 2017 depending on which sets you order.  Try our super soft and luxe cashmere-blend pieces that keep on getting softer and softer after your wear and wash!

Cashmere is incredibly soft, lightweight and luxuriously warm. But right now on the market, high-quality cashmere and cashmere-blend clothing are just too expensive, both to buy and to care for on a daily basis. We spoke with more than 50+ cashmere wearers who all told us that they would love to buy more cashmere pieces IF the prices were lowered and IF they didn’t have to pay for expensive dry-cleaning bills…  

Introducing SOFIE & NATE’s Easy-Care, Cashmere-Blend capsule... High-quality, AFFORDABLE, cashmere-blend pieces that you can wear daily without breaking the bank. Super soft and versatile pieces against your skin for a cashmere-warm and luxe feel.  And they’re simple to care for too…just toss the piece into the machine to wash, the dryer on low to dry and it’s wrinkle-resistant. It’s everything we have ever dreamed of for easy-wear, easy-care, everyday cashmere!

For this campaign, we would like to offer our Supporters the following Easy-Care, Cashmere-Blend 3-piece capsule:

Modern Knits Flare Dress (Frontal View) - Black

Modern Knits Flare Dress (Details of Textured Knit) - Black

Classic Cardigan (Front) - Light Heather Grey

Unisex Long Scarf - 74-in - Light Heather Grey

Unisex Long Scarf - 74-in - Light Heather Grey

Unisex Long Scarf - 74-in - Light Heather Grey

1) MODERN KNITS FLARE DRESS 

  • Indented horizontal (top) and vertical (bottom) stripes pattern for a figure-flattering wear
  • Sleeveless
  • 4-way stretch knit for greater comfort and movement
  • Smooth luxurious hand feel

2) CLASSIC CARDIGAN

  • Straight cut
  • Faux shell buttons 
  • Ribbed finishing at hem 
  • Smooth luxurious handfeel  

3) CLASSIC UNISEX LONG SCARF

  • ONE Size - Long length (74 inches) for several wrap-around
  • Clean finishing 
  • Smooth luxurious hand feel

A capsule of three (3) basic luxe staples that can be worn together, or as separates with your other clothing items, tailored to your own unique styles. With versatile fabrics combined with luxurious cashmere in neutral and jewel tones, the capsule pieces can be worn year-round and can transition easily from the office or the home, to a day out on the town.  

Color Options Chart

Raspberry: Pantone 18-1761 TPX (Dress & Scarf Options)

Navy : Pantone 19-3839 TPX (Cardigan Option)

SOFIE & NATE has designed our cashmere pieces for the modern women in mind:

A working executive who loves luxe basics to mix and match with her office wardrobe, that can go from day to night. 

A stay-at-home mom who needs to dress in casual luxe to stay comfortable chasing around her kids and performing household chores while on alert to step out at any given moment in time. 

A part-timer that works from anywhere who requires luxe basics to work and be presentable on video conference calls. 

And sometimes, just a woman who loves to wear cashmere-blend apparel for its softness and warmth every day without having to think much about dry-cleaning fuss and expenses.

 

PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS     

Our Easy-Care capsule collection is NOT 100% cashmere. Our cashmere blend includes cashmere mix with three versatile fabrics - Rayon, Nylon, and Acrylic - which allow this specific cashmere-blend to have stretch (for ease of comfort and movement), smoothness, and enable easy-care properties (machine-washable, dryer-safe on low, wrinkle resistant). 

For this blend, we use 12gg (gauge) premium cashmere to make our clothing yarn finer, smoother, and more tense for durability. As a comparison, most mass-market brands use 7gg - 9gg cashmere to reduce cost. At SOFIE & NATE, we use 12gg to 16gg designer-grade cashmere in our products. Hence, our proprietary cashmere-blend fabric will feel wonderfully soft and luxe for hand feel.

Our cashmere-blend fabric has been registered with the Application of Design Registry on 9 August 2016.  This process takes 60-90 days for the certification.  Until we get the certification, we cannot share the material composition percentage due to fear of copies.  Thank you for your kind understanding with regards to intellectual properties matters.

If you need sizing help, please feel free to email us directly at customercare@sofieandnate.com We will be glad to help!

 

HOW DO WE KEEP OUR PRICES LOW?

At SOFIE & NATE, we work directly with a cashmere farm family in Inner Mongolia, and avoid any middleman.  Therefore, we deliver our high-quality cashmere-based products to you at a fraction of the traditional luxury price.  No middleman takes a cut.  All the savings go directly to you. 

Our cashmere farm family partner is located in Inner Mongolia, China. They have been around for 70+ years and it's a family business passed down several generations. The farmers comb the hair (no shearing), hand-sort, and clean the hair at their own farm. They also spin the yarn there too. From there, it goes to our manufacturer in China who knows and has worked with the cashmere farm family for a long time. Our manufacturer is a WRAP-certified (Worldwide Responsible Accredited Production) factory in China. WRAP is an independent, objective, non-profit team of global social compliance experts dedicated to promoting safe, lawful, humane and ethical manufacturing around the world through certification and education.

Please kindly rest assure that despite being a small start-up, Sofie & Nate takes great care and pride in working with people who care.

 

OUR STORY  

Based in sunny Los Angeles, California, SOFIE & NATE offers luxurious cashmere-based products at friendly prices. By combining our modern design aesthetics with HLS Cashmere™ fabric innovation in our products, SOFIE & NATE strives to create a new standard in cashmere clothing and accessories for cashmere-lovers worldwide.  

Cashmere is our fabric of choice due to its softness and warmth properties, coupled with being light-weight and having a luxe hand feel. But… We really hate the way cashmere is traditionally designed and distributed. Our mission is to re-design cashmere-based products for our generation. We design with the modern women in mind. Afterall, at SOFIE & NATE, we are those women as well.  

From eco-conscious, 100% dye-free natural cashmere to exceptionally easy-care cashmere-blends, we aim to make SOFIE & NATE’s luxurious cashmere products a staple for our everyday life.

 

PRODUCTION & DELIVERY SCHEDULE   

 

IMPORTANT:  

WORLDWIDE SHIPPING – We ship worldwide through a 3rd-party courier. Shipping charges is selected based on your home country when you are making your pledge.  

LOCAL CUSTOMS/DUTY/VAT CHARGES – If you live outside of the US, you will be responsible for any applicable local customs clearance charges, duty and/or VAT charges imposed by your local country.

CUSTOMS CLEARANCE OUTSIDE OF USA - Local customs clearance at your designated countries may take some time. Should you have any questions regarding your package, please contact your local courier who will be able to update you on the local custom clearance status. Thank you!

 

CONNECT WITH US!

Website: www.sofieandnate.com  SIGN-UP on our website to receive exclusive news, updates, and upcoming campaign announcements!

Facebook: Sofie & Nate LIKE us on our Facebook page for daily updates!

Instagram: @sofieandnate  ADD us on IG for daily updates!

Email: customercare@sofieandnate.com   EMAIL us!

Wholesale & Corporate Accounts:  customercare@sofieandnate.com  EMAIL us!

We would love to hear from you! Any questions, comments, feedback and suggestions are welcomed!

 

WHY ARE WE DOING CROWDFUNDING?

Our Easy-Care, Cashmere-Blend development has been going on for over one year. And now that we have perfected our fabric blend and passed InterTek international fabric testing, we want to share our products with cashmere-lovers worldwide! This is our first launch of this innovative fabric and we want to involve our customers in our product development process.

We are super excited about our Easy-Care range - this range is everything we have dreamed of in our company’s mission: “Cashmere for the Everyday Life.”

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES:

There is NO risks involved for production as we have started production already for all three items: Dress, Cardigan, & Scarves.

Our biggest challenge will be sizing. While we have provided a sizing chart, should any customer require some consultation on sizing during the campaign, we will be very happy to help out. Please email us at customercare@sofieandnate.com and we’ll get back to you as soon as we can.

Once you receive the goods and you are not happy with the size, please let us know. We will try our best to remedy the situation. If you are a resident of the United States, we will do a free exchange. You can send the product back to us via your own courier and expense. The returned goods must be in original condition and packaging and have not been worn. Once we receive the goods, we will send you the new exchanged piece. Only one exchange is allowed per customer. If you are an international customer, then we will have to charge extra for international shipping.

We want to make sure all our customers are happy with our SOFIE & NATE's products! Any questions or concerns that you may have, please feel free to email us at customercare@sofieandnate.com

Thank you kindly for purchasing our products and supporting our mission:

Cashmere for the Everyday Life!

story:
What?

The ring&dink smart wireless doorbell add-on  is a doorbell accessory that notifies the user of any doorbell activity through ones smart devices: phones, tablets and computers.

 

Why?

The device is meant for people who often miss their doorbell ring over loud or distracting activities.  

Our device will make sure you will not miss someone at your door while you are:

  • Listening to loud music
  • Gaming or talking with your headphones on
  • Vacuuming
  • Mowing your backyard

Our device would also help people with impaired hearing by vibrating their phone.

 

How?

  • Easy no-nonsense installation, no permanent modifications to the existing doorbell are required

All it takes is to stick the device to your existing doorbell ringer via the added double-sided adhesive tape. 

  • Simple, user-friendly configuration

Connect the device to your PC via USB and configure using our configuration GUI.

 

  • Power efficiency

High-capacity rechargeable batteries and low power consumption guarantee low maintenance. The device will notify you if the batteries are running low.

  • Optimization for all smart devices

Get notifications to your laptop, PC, smartphone, etc.

  • Relative low price

 

Really?

We believe in technology and the value of our project, and we wish to offer our idea as a finished product for other people to use. We are sure that there are many more individuals with the same problem that we have, however, being students with limited income, we are in need of your support to be able to complete our project.

story:
First  15 persnnel

Super early bird  $ 149( $109+ Shipping Fee)  REX Super Brian  1set

Amazing perks of having a REX Super Brain 

at the unbelievable price of $ 149 (Originally $400) 


Campaign of product of other company which is similar to product of our company $995~ $4500  

 https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/632221988/braintellect-2…


No more old-age brain wave device using light and sound!

REX Super brain Unlike previous brain wave learning devices that indirectly induce the brain wave using sound and light, it turns the magnetic field as minute as the terrestrial magnetism into a wave of certain frequency and directly stimulates the brain wave into alpha, theta, or delta wave. 



REX Super brain Unlike previous brain wave learning devices that indirectly induce the brain wave using sound and light, it turns the magnetic field as minute as the terrestrial magnetism into a wave of certain frequency and directly stimulates the brain wave into alpha, theta, or delta wave. 

On the other hand, the method of turning the magnetic field into a wave of certain frequency has been proved to be effective. 

There are many huge and expensive medical appliances using the high gauss magnetic wave, and those appliances are not available to many people because of their expensive cost. 

However, the Super brain is not a medical appliance but a portable brain wave learning device using single 1.5 voltage battery. It is very economic because the battery consumption is slow and at the same time, it is an outstanding device for brain wave stimulation.

Sound and light brain wave learning devices were popular in 1990s and there were countless products released all over the world.

But now, after their lack of performance was found out, those devices are being kicked out from the market. Instead of sound and light, use the Super brain that directly and effectively stimulates the brain wave by using the magnetic wave.



Deep sleep

Are you suffering from insomnia?    

Try out the delta wave.  


Meditation

Are you anxious because of uncertain future, overwhelming work, or mental stress?

Get some help from the alpha wave.  


 

 Rest

Learning

Studying, concentration, creativity...and do you want to use your brain to its maximum potential capacity? 

Try out the high-alpha wave.


Before using the super brain (almost no alpha wave)

five minutes after using the super brain (rapidly increased alpha wave status)



REX Super brain is crafted based on Dr. Robert O. Becker’s theory that both human beings and animals significantly react to the magnetic field.


 Super brain stimulates the brain wave by producing a specific harmless magnetic field from the main device to head band and creating high alpha wave, low alpha wave theta wave, and wave of delta wave

Even Albert Einstein, known as the biggest genius of all time, could not use his brain to the full potential.    

Then how can a human being use his/her brain to the maximum capability? 

The answer is in transforming the brain wave to alpha wave with the power of science. 

 Once the brain wave is changed into alpha wave with science.. it is easier to extract the unlimited potential that a brain has.. The brain of a human being, when the brain wave turns into alpha wave.. extracting the limitless hidden capability that was given by god is possible.

 When a brain wave becomes an alpha wave, not only concentration, creativity, studying capability, and memory power significantly develops but also mental stress goes away and peace in mind is created.

 A status that the brain is extremely active and studying capability, intuition, and creativity is increased to the maximum, is the alpha wave status.  

When the brain wave is in alpha wave status, the brain can demonstrate the maximum potential capability and when the brain wave changes into theta wave, brain goes into a sleeping mode.  

In a normal situation, human being’s brain wave is in beta wave status. If the brain wave is in beta wave, tension, agitation, anxiety and worries accumulate, and with such mental stress, they often damage your body and mind.  

However, once the brain wave turns into alpha wave, anti-stress hormone called beta-endorphin increases two to three times.

 As a result, it is scientifically known that the mental stress quickly goes away.    

And the brain wave turns into slow alpha wave and the brain enters the meditation status. 

The alpha status of brain is the best status for an ideal life of a human being. 

Therefore, no matter Western or Asian, the purpose of all meditation practices is about changing the brain wave to alpha wave. 

However, it is extremely difficult to freely control and get to such active status of the brain. 

Therefore, the research on how to reach the alpha status whenever we want to in a short amount of period has been practiced from long time ago. 

After different endeavors, several products were invented. Some of them, even though it is weak, actually succeeded in activating the brain.  Nevertheless, all of them use the method of stimulating either the user’s hearing or sight.   

Super brain has an outstanding efficiency because it stimulates the brain wave by creating a specific frequency wave in safe and harmless.  

 Super brain has an outstanding efficiency because it stimulates the brain wave by creating a specific frequency wave in safe and harmless. 

Super brain has an outstanding efficiency because it stimulates the brain wave by creating a specific frequency wave in safe and harmless. 

 

Super brain is an outstanding portable brain wave learning device.

Unlike a humongous medical machine that uses strong magnetic field.. it is NOT a medical purpose machine..small in size and uses a magnetic field as minute as the terristrial magnestim.. and it is an outstanding brain wave learning device for deep sleep, studying, concentration, and meditation.

Super brain is an outstanding portable brain wave learning device.

Super brain is an outstanding portable brain wave learning device. Because it directly stimulates the brain wave by covering the magnetic field with frequency and releasing certain frequency, it has an exceptional performance compare to other previous brain wave learning devices that use sound and light.    

Recently, as a depressive disorder therapy using frequency-carrying magnetic field came up, it is being used for many patients who suffer from depression.

 However, even though they want the magnetic field wave therapy, due to the expensive cost, the patients are hesitant about it.  


Depression therapy appliance uses a strong magnetic field to cure. However, our product, since it is NOT a medical appliance, uses single 1.5 voltage battery and has a magnetic field as minute as the terrestrial magnetism. 

Since our product is not a medical appliance, it cannot create a strong magnetic field like the therapy machine. 

However, it has an incomparable performance as a brain wave learning device. 

 With Super brain, instant alpha wave stimulation is possible with single button press. Once the brain wave goes into the alpha wave state, studying, concentration, learning capability, and creativity increase and develop. 


Since our product is not a medical appliance, it cannot create a strong magnetic field like the therapy machine. However, it has an incomparable performance as a brain wave learning device.



With Super brain, instant alpha wave stimulation is possible with single button press. Once the brain wave goes into the alpha wave state, studying, concentration, learning capability, and creativity increase and develop. 

If you choose the sleeping mode of Super brain, your brain wave will change into delta wave and you will fall into a deep comfortable sleep. And if you choose the meditation mode, you will be relieved from any mental stresses and experience relaxation. 

If the brain wave maintains the alpha wave state, it is good for healthy mentality, and you will be free from all mental stresses.  

Risks and challenges

We started to develop Super brain in early 2000 and we came up with a first prototype in 2001. However, we thought that the product cannot be sold to the customers and stopped the development because the product was too big, inefficient battery life, and the coil that goes into the head band was way too thick.

Even thought the development of Super brain was paused for several years, we continuously tried and thought about how to come up with a product that can be used by the customers without any discomfort. In October 2012, we resumed the development of product and in August 2015, we came up with a new product that has fixed all the problems of the old product.

In new product, it was difficult to craft the coil of headband because it needs exact and detailed craftsmanship. Nevertheless, we eventually created an extremely detailed coil inside of the headband to get rid of discomfort. With battery life, it is be used for a long time with single 1.5 volt AA battery, which is extremely portable.

1st production wave produces 1150. First 1150 will be delivered by  January 31th, 2015 Once order goes over 1150.. From order number 1151, it will be delivered by August 30th, 2016.

REX Super Brain which is designed to use magnetic waves which is safe enough for human bodies to induce deep sleep, stress release, study and concentration improvement has closed the campaign on the  kickstarter on  November 6th, 2015.

originally the campaign goal on the  kickstarter was raising 50,000 CAD, 

 but it was marked at 5,000 CAD mistakenly.

Raising 10,000 CAD on the Kickstarter and receiving additional financing from the bank, but still the $15,000 was short and we are starting whole new campaign on the Indiegogo for the reason.

story:
Hi Everyone, My name is Abel, Father of two, I'm an overseas contract worker in Singapore, I'm working here for more than 5 years now. My career background is in areas of Electrical Panel manufacturing, 

I'm working as a wiring technician in a regular basis. During weekends I spent my time reading books about technology and related topics about green and renewable energy.

Like many of us, I'm just an ordinary man who lives my everyday life just like anybody else.

Dreaming of big things sometimes, like managing my own Company someday (I'm looking forward to have it fulfilled before I turn 50 years old hopefully). 

What inspires me to take a stand and make this campaign is the thought of making a difference especially when it will benefit the many.Everyone of us can influence change in our own little ways.

Thinking about the natural disasters that always hit the Philippines every year, mark by the recorded strongest typhoon HAIYAN and flooding to most part of the globe. I became increasingly concern about the continuously evolving climate change caused by global warming.

I felt like I want to do something but  I'm just a very small dot and what can I do to change things?...but eventually I felt that taking action one step at a time voluntarily on our own, we can influence change.

Bringing out our concern about Global warming and make people aware and understand whats happening in the environment presently.

I believe we're not too late, if we collect our efforts we can make a bigger change...that's what encourage me to do this campaign.

The Campaign is to promote a product that will help lessen the effect of global warming and look for beneficiaries who will use this product.

In my campaign I'm are looking forward to build a Portable solar generator to light a two to three classroom village for O.L.S.O.T.S, a volunteer missionary founded school in Cambodia.

The high spirit of the Founder who is trying to make a difference on his own gives me even a stronger motivation that I can make a difference as well, if I chose to...and this is my very first charity project...to build and donate a clean and green energy to a village classroom for Cambodia school children.

the main OBJECTIVE behind the campaign is to make use of already unearthed solution to the progressing effect of climate change, and that is for us to use the solar energy and any other form clean energy as a source or alternative energy source.

it had been calculated that a degree of increase in earths temperature will eliminate fresh water from one third of the world land surface by 2100 that is only eighty five years from now. time fly so fast... the time is now to take our action...we must not waste every single second of our opportunity to bring back mother nature's health.

I am appealing to every individual around the globe who is reading my campaign please support this cause for mother nature while we still have the chance.

please follow my tweet as well for more updated details, my i.d, @alcantara1971.


HOW CAN DONORS/CONTRIBUTORS HELP THE PROJECT? 

Donors plays the most important role in this campaign because like any other project we need donors to make our campaign bring forth to reality.

I am appealing to every viewers of this campaign to become a donor for this project, myself alone can't do much to fund the project, I can only give what is within my capacity and to physically attend to the progress of the campaign.

WHAT BENEFIT DONORS CAN GET FROM THEIR DONATION?

In return the campaign is offering some PERKS that you can choose from.

Apart from that ...like anybody else I am a donor myself, I cant offer any physical gain but rest assured you will gain intangible returns like healthier environment, cleaner planet to live in...

just imagine... if the effect of climate change will continue and nobody care to take a stand... would it be fine for our family's to live in a planet of TYPHOON, HURRICANE, FLOOD , EARTHQUAKE, TSUNAMIS?

definitely NO!

What I can assure is ...you will gain the feeling of fulfillment and joy because you care as much as I do, you will gain happiness in your heart because you share your love to charity cause, this is what you and me will gain if you donate for this campaign. 

JOIN AND DONATE FOR CHARITY AND TOGETHER LETS MAKE A STAND TO FIGHT CLIMATE CHANGE, ALONE WE CAN MAKE A DIFFERENCE

TOGETHER WE CAN MAKE WONDERS!


THE BENEFICIARY

I choose to work with O.L.S.O.T.S (Ongoing Learning Studies Outstanding and Talented School). A school founded by Mr.Cyril Pushpanathen. I have known him for more than two years now and he is also my landlord.

 Cyril spend most of his life in helping the community specially the youth.He used to be a guidance counsellor to Singapore's Prison ministry during his younger days. By the time he retired from service he continued his community service by doing a voluntary mission in Cambodia.

He funds most of his charity work from his own pocket together with the help of friends. This man's magnanimous spirit gives me the motivation to make a stand and do something that will make a difference in the community and accomplish something good that will benefit others.

and that's why I created this campaign.If a single person can make a good cause to his community, two or more people can accomplish excellent change toward the benefit of many, I can say it is a very simple idea but putting it to life is the hard part.

with you my dear viewers out there, I believe that we can achieved our goal with you supporting my campaign. I aim to start small now... lets observed the outcome then we will look forward to a bigger accomplishment in the future.

please DONATE FROM THE HEART and join me in my campaign.

WHAT IS OUR ACCOMPLISHMENT IF WE SUCCESSFULLY ACCOMPLISH OUR CAMPAIGN

Most of us may not be aware that most of the natural disaster and calamities that is happening around the globe is a product of climate change due to Global warming.

Global warming cause by extensive use of burning fossil like the crude oil that mostly fueled our car and generators. Fossil fuels run our factories everyday, an energy source that is most use in all parts of the globe.

burning this fuels creates an extensive amount of carbon dioxide that blankets the atmosphere and traps the heat that needs to be return to the atmosphere.Heat that wasn't emitted back creates a green house effect bouncing it back to the earth causing imbalance to nature, like melting the glaciers in the arctic, causing oceans to rise, as a result of extensive flooding , typhoon and hurricane to most part of the Globe.

THE IMPACT OF OUR CAMPAIGN

By using green energy like the used of solar panels we are minimizing the burning of this fossil fuels and though we can not eliminate right away the global warming effect, we can slow down its progress until such time nature heals herself.That is the main idea of the campaign... saving the globe from climate change.

On the other hand we will help our chosen beneficiary charity to have a better and brighter environment by letting them use our green energy,in our case by giving solar generator, in such case we have accomplish two areas of our objective by doing just one campaign.

First, we are helping to save the planet from global warming by minimizing the emission of carbon dioxide in the atmosphere, Second we have help children of charity. I believe that is a great accomplishment for every kind of campaign.

THE PROJECT - PORTABLE SOLAR GENERATOR FOR O.L.S.O.T.S 

The project is to built a customized wheeled portable solar generator made from available resources from a D.I.Y shop.

The concept is to make it handy that it be can easily push or pulled, making it mobile and flexible to be brought to any areas of the school campus. 

APPROXIMATE PROJECT COST - $1500.00

MATERIALS: 

Solar Panel with connector

DC TO AC INVERTER

Charge controller

500 watts 8Ah Battery

Fuse

Wooden board

wheels

Screws and Nuts

light bulbs with extension wires

MISCELLANEOUS:

Transportation

Shipment cost

Labor cost

Others

RISK AND CHALLENGES

Generating the fund is the most difficult challenge of all.Getting donors to support the cause is not easy at all, and I know I will be facing all this during the campaign.

But my faith  in all the people and viewers who are reading my story is bigger than any challenges that the campaign may be facing.

I believe that all of us yearns to save our environment from being destroyed and this is the biggest hope that I had.

I will make every possible way using videos to keep donors updated with the campaign.

With this being said, Im looking forward to the funders support.

Thank you very much.

story:
Introducing Absolute Sani

Absolute Sani, World's first Handheld LED UVC Sanitizing Wand

Our first of its kind portable wireless sanitizer uses 24K gilded gold and sapphire crystal glass LED UVC light bulbs kills 99.9% of germs: bacteria, viruses, fungi, and protozoa with no mercury component, no chemical residue, odor or toxic emission.

Mercury Free, Ozone Free, Odor Free, Chemical Free

You Can Use It Anywhere!

Absolute Sani kills:

Immediately kills 99.99% of fungi (like the ones that cause athlete's foot).

Wipe out 99.99% of bacteria from anywhere including hard to reach places.

Eliminate 99.99% of viruses from any surface or texture.

Sanitize 99.99% of all germs within seconds of exposure anywhere!

Our Story

Always have to clean up after messy kids?

Find yourself in a dirty bathroom?

Not sure if your hotel/AirBnb changed your bedsheets?

After experiencing these less than desirable situations ourselves, we started looking for a portable, effortless solution. However, after shopping around we discovered that most wands on the market used dangerous mercury encased in glass and emitted ozone.

So we decided to look for a different technology, the non-toxic, portable and wireless solution ourselves - the Absolute Sani wand.

We’ve partnered with a leading LED manufacturer and modern designers to develop the technology; allowing us to integrate hospital-grade LED sanitization technologies into a sleek, portable wand that everyone could use.

99.9% of germs(including bacteria, viruses, and fungi) are eliminated in just seconds with the Absolute Sani.

 

 

 

 

How Does it Work:

While some germs are resilient to high temperature (i.e. Mad Cow Disease), low temperature (i.e. Bird Flu), and antibiotics (i.e. Super Bug), no germs can withstand UVC light. 

Absolute Sani emits UVC light between 260-280 nm, the most efficient range for sanitization. During our research and development, direct exposure longer than 5 seconds will eliminate 99% of germs like bacteria, viruses, fungi, protozoa by breaking their DNA bonds, resulting in cell function to stop and the microorganism to die.

 

Our wands use light bulbs made from UVC LED chip encased with sapphire crystal glass and gilded with gold.

Why gold and sapphire glass?

The use of gold and the sapphire crystal glass dramatically increase the lifespan of the product. The light bulbs last for more than 120,000 minutes of sanitizing.

24K Gold

We use gold for its ability to provide antioxidants, anti-friction and clean electrical conduction. Gold also has a higher corrosion resistance and a lower chance of oxidation, making it perfect to use in our on-the-go wand.

Sapphire Crystal Glass

By encasing the gilded LED chip in sapphire glass, Absolute Sani's UVC bulbs are stronger, more scratch-resistant, least prone to shatter, and clearer than normal glass light bulbs.

The use of gold and sapphire crystal also allows us to omit the use of any mercury in our production. Our wand is the safest on the market.

Safety Features:

Absolute Sani comes with a child lock function to prevent misuse from children or accidental turn-ons. 

It also comes with a carefully designed eye-protection system that it will shut off if turned upside down to protect the user's eyes to prevent accidental damage.

 

LED Vs Mercury:

Traditionally, UVC wands are made from Mercury light bulbs encased in glass. Those are easy to break, and they cause long-term damage to its users due to its mercury component and its ability to release O3. Before the end of 2020, countries all over the world will significantly reduce the usage of mercury.

The biggest downside to Mercury Lamps is that they are made from the heavy metal and usually the light bulbs are encased in simple glass bulbs, making them easy to break and dangerous. Absolute Sani has LED light bulbs gilded with gold and encased in sapphire crystal glass; increasing durability and functionality.

Mercury lamp sanitizers also heat up dramatically during operation and could damage the goods under the light.

The most dangerous part about mercury lamps is that it produces Ozone (O3). Ozone at the ground level is a harmful air pollutant, it is the main ingredient in “smog."

Breathing ozone can reduce lung function and harm lung tissue. It can cause chest pain, coughing, throat irritation, and airway inflammation. Ozone can worsen bronchitis, emphysema, and asthma, leading to increased medical care. 

Absolute Sani contains no mercury and emits no ozone. We value your health and want to help you create a healthier environment around you.

 

How to Use:

 

Product Information:

 

Product Timeline:

2017 September - Project Initiated

2017 December - Finished Project Design

2018 Feb - 1st Prototype

2018 June - 2nd Prototype Light bulb and Stability Test

2018 August - 3rd Prototype Created, Stability Test Passed

2018 November - Launch on Indiegogo 

2019 January - Production

2019 February/March - Expected Delivery

 

Who We Are:

We are a group of young entrepreneurs from Los Angeles, California. Our company was founded because we want to introduce premium innovation into everyday life.

We've launched Absolute Sani as our first crowdfunding project and hope to be able to deliver more exciting projects focusing on everyday improvements for you in the future.

Your contribution will help us grow our team and continue our branding and marketing effort in hopes of launching Absolute Sani into retail and other online stores. If you have any additional questions, please feel free to ask here, or email us at absolutesani@gmail.com

story:
A-4RM is a product development & prototyping company based in The Bay Area. We are committed to creating and producing quality well crafted products using SUSTAINABLE, RECLAIMED, RECYCLABLE, and LOCAL materials in the US. We have over 20 years of experience.

We also help startups,  entrepreneurs, and established companies with CAD modeling, Industrial Design, Renderings, Structural Packaging Engineering, High Fidelity Prototyping, Graphic Illustrations, and UX/UI. 

The Design:The A-4RM (#001) Clock is made of 100% local San Francisco Bay Area redwood cutoffs purchased at a local mill that would otherwise go to waste in a landfill. Other wood species are available (via email for special orders) and they all have a unique pattern which makes each one-of-a-kind. The geometric hexagonal symmetrical facets are sculpted in 3D CAD, CNC machined, and processed by hand. 

Size: The dimensions are 7.25" x 7." x 1.5" and delivered with a silent clock mechanism. The clock mechanism is included with a ⅞ shaft for the hands.

NEW PERK!

Get a Free A-4RM solid redwood business card/Pen/cellphone holder to match your clock when you are among the first 15 buyers.

Wood species: Custom requests can be made with Elm, Redwood, Cypress, Maple, Sycamore, Poplar, and Walnut. Lead time depends on availability. Please send inquiries to: a4rmstudio@gmail.com to receive a quote. 

Environmentally friendly: When you use reclaimed lumber, you decrease the demand for newly sourced lumber, which helps curb deforestation. If harvested responsibly, reclaimed wood is a renewable resource that reduces landfill waste as well as the use of environmental hazards to manufacture new products.

All funds will be used to grow the business facility, purchase machines for more local production and stock reclaimed wood. 

Help us continue to make useful well crafted sustainable products using local materials made in-house as a way to decrease transportation emissions and cost. We promote good design and US production!

Please spread the word about our company! 

Best,

A-4RM

A Timeless Design!

 

CHOOSE EITHER DESIGN!

#1

#2

 

Specify the material:

  • Redwood

  • Elm

  • Walnut

  • Sycamore

 

The geometric diamond-like symmetrical facets are sculpted in 3D CAD, CNC machined, and processed by hand. 

We are committed to creating and producing quality products using SUSTAINABLE, RECLAIMED, RECYCLABLE, and LOCAL materials in the US.

The A-4RM Clock is made of 100% local San Francisco Bay Area redwood.

We purchase several species of wood at a local mill that would otherwise go to waste in a landfill.

We turn local reclaimed wood into Good Design for your home, office, and gift ideas!

Delivery Guaranteed as early as June/July/August!

We ship all clocks natural with NO mineral oil. Feel free to finish your purchased clock. The results will look like the above on the left image. 

Back view with attached clock mechanism. AA Battery not included.

Thank You!

story:
Short Summary

Hi! Jeff & Skyler here and we are the Cabinet Saver!

  • Jeff - 48 and I wear many hats...Sometimes I'm the man in charge and other times I'm at the bottom of the totem pole!
  • Skyler - 30 OIF/OEF veteran, and unlike Jeff I'm never the man in charge and very familiar with the bottom of the totem pole! I'm not even in charge of this project!
We're trying to raise a bit of start-up capital so that we can get our first production run marketed, sold, and delivered.... Cabinet Saver is very important to us.....
Jeff nearly went under during the real estate crash of 2008 and was stuck with many units that needed to be rehabbed. In 100% of units, the cabinets were damaged. Personally, every place that I have ever lived had leaks in the kitchen sink base cabinet. A small leak can be a huge expense.

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking to raise $10,000 USD....FOR:

  • Label Cost
  • Box Cost
  • Sensor Cost
  • Raw Material Cost
  • Tooling Cost
  • Manufacturing Cost
You get to be apart of something like nothing else on the market. We'll keep you in the loop week by week of developments. You get to help two patriots keep business here in the greatest country in the world USA! Cabinet Saver is MADE IN AMERICA!

The Impact

The Cabinet Saver was born out of necessity. When the real estate market crashed in October 2008, my company was left holding hundreds of condominiums with a large number still needing to be rehabilitated. We were struggling as a company to handle the carrying costs, so to save the money I decided to start installing all of our kitchens. Over the course of 2 years I installed nearly 100. Every kitchen we went to demo had water damage under the kitchen sink and by ‘every’ I mean 100%. When the new cabinets were put in I thought I would buy cabinet liners to protect against future water damage. I didn’t just want a flat tray; I wanted something to force the water forward so it could be easily identified. After calls to Ferguson, Lowes, Home Depot, etc. I was greeted with the same response…”that is a great idea!” At that point I set out to design a product that would protecting the investment I just made in all of these kitchens.

HERE'S WHAT WE HAVE DONE SO FAR

    • CAD design completed
    • Prototype Mold completed 
    • Patent and Trademarks have been filed 
    • Various prototypes made to determine correct blend of materials 
    • Packaging supplier has been selected and waiting on Purchase Order
    • Tooling is completed
    • Manufacturer vetted and selected
    • Warehousing has been secured 
    • Commerce web site has been developed and awaiting launch 
    • Facebook site has been created
    • First production order placed for 1300 Cabinet Savers!

Risks & Challenges

Manufacturing a product, specially designed to accomplish many goals, is challenging, that's why we have been involved with the design process from concept-paper-tooling-prototyping-production (hopefully soon with your help).

Our estimates for delivery are conservative, and our partnerships are reliable and solid, but delays may arise from the following: 

- Raw Material Availability 
- Production Scheduling

We will keep you posted on a weekly basis, and in the event of unexpected issues, we will work incessantly to minimize impact on delivery.

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
