story:
ESNQ Knit

Welcome to ESNQ Knit (Esenique group) on Indiegogo. We create handmade items of extra fine 100% Australian merino wool premium 18 microns*.  This wool is soft and silky without being itchy or irritating your skin. And more pleasant to touch than 23-26 micron fiber or cheap acrylic one.

In this campaign we present pet bed, sweater, cardigan, exclusive mermaid tail and, of course, chunky knit blankets.  Everyone feels the same, seeing our knit blankets for the first time: amused, excited, passionate to treat their home with such wonder.

Chunky knit blanket creates special atmosphere of comfort, well-being and protection. You will necessarily want to roll in it, make a cup of your best tea and read that long-forgotten book at last. You can just dip into your thoughts as well. The blanket is a key element for cozy atmosphere.

Thank you for your attention to our campaign.

* A micron is the measurement used to express the diameter of wool fiber. Fine wool fibers have low micron value.

 

 

 

Show your pet the love you feel by providing optimal comfort and the perfect place to rest and relax with ESNQ knit pet bed. 

 
Chunky knit bed offers optimal comfort for your pet, allowing him sleep like never before.
 
 
Hand knitted pet bed will allow your pet to discover the true meaning of relaxation.
 

 

This is the perfect place for your cat or dog to rest after a long day playing and walking.

 

Sizes for pet's bed

  • Soft and warm, very comfortable, designed to give your pet a sweet sleep.
  • Fashion and lovely appearance.
  • Pet loves that he can curl up however he wants because the bed stretches and changes shape with him. 
  • You can mix any 2 colors. 
  • Select size and any one color in this perk. We can add just 5 colors. Take a look for a full color palette in this page and mail us, which 2 colors are preferred. What is the main color (walls) and what is the secondary. 

It is so comfy. Meow~

@venusbees

 


With the super chunky knit sweater you won’t need a jacket as it gets colder.


This sweater model looks well-balanced on any figure. It fits well with many clothes like jeans, leggins, skirts of different length. Chunky knit sweater combined with form-fitting trousers make you look stylish, not massive.


This is a big knit sweater for keeping on. You wear it and feel completely happy.

 

This sweater has some certain peculiarities:

  • It hides figure flaws and makes you forget that your waist is not so small, your breast is not that big and your shoulders are too broad. All this does not matters now, since we learn how to accent right places and accent them right. It’s a model of your chunky knitwear that draws attention. And you are the one taking complements. 
  • Chunky knit sweater is the warmest thing you’ve ever worn. Merino wool sweater is a real frost rescuer at times of bitter cold. 

  • Chunky knit sweater and cardigan doesn’t need to be washed. You can easily remove dirt with the tips of your fingers. If you wear a T-shirt underneath, you can dry clean it once a season at most.

  • You can choose any of 10 colors. Select size and any color in this perk. We can add just 5 colors. Take a look for a full color palette in this page and mail us, which color is preferred.

This  big, lovely sweater that feels like a hug in clothing form. 

 

Are you open to changes? Are you easy to alter your usual ways of bright dressing? Then you definitely MUST have such chunky knit cardigan in your wardrobe.

Bulky cardigan will accentuate your fragility. It won’t make you look larger, on a contrary, it will contrast your thin wrists and broad sleeves.

  • You can choose any of 10 colors. Select size and any color in this perk. We can add just 5 colors. Take a look for a full color palette in this page and mail us, which color is preferred.

 

Sizes for merino wool sweater and cardigan

 

Every little girl at some point in her life wishes she could be a mermaid. What if you could be a mermaid in your adult life?

With ESNQ chunky knit mermaid tail blanket for kids and adults, lounging and dreaming of the sea is more enjoyable.  

Extra fine merino wool  makes the mermaid tail blanket really soft and snuggly. We believe, we are first, who tried to knit such blanket of merino wool. 

ESNQ chunky knit blanket really cozy and keeps the warmth in around your legs. This blanket is perfect for cozying up on couch and read your favorite book. Slip inside, feel like a real beautiful mermaid!

  • You can choose any of 10 colors. Select any color in this perk. We can add just 5 colors. Take a look for a full color palette in this page and mail us, which color is preferred.

Mermaid tail blanket sizes

Mermaid tail blanket is the perfect gift for your child, wife or friend, who loves mermaids and the sea.

 

Life without a sweet warm blanket is not life at all. What else can make your day in any kind of weather? What is warm, pleasant and gloriously soft? It’s not kittens what we have in mind now. It’s more universal and hypoallergenic knit blanket.

None of other blankets in the world can compete with this blanket. It looks as if it came from a fairytale. 100% merino wool is immensely tender and soft. It draws you in touching it again and again, and your skin enjoys felicity sensing this natural and hypoallergenic fabric.

Chunky knit creates special atmosphere of comfort, well-being and protection. You will necessarily want to roll in it, make a cup of your best tea and read that long-forgotten book at last. You can just dip into your thoughts as well. The blanket is a key element for cozy atmosphere.

The knit blankets have stunning sizes. Stitches are about 5-7 centimeters each! It’s almost as long as your finger! Due to such stitches the blanket is airy-fairy and light even when knit tightly.

​

Chunky knit blanket is your sensible love at a glance. You won’t let it off your hands, we promise! If winter never was your favorite season, now you’ll wait for it to come! 

Chunky knit blanket is a unique item which not only warms you but cheers you up by its amazing appearance. This is eye-catching accent of your interior. You can use it as a blanket, bedspread and even as a carpet! 

Chunky knit blankets are handmade, so you won’t meet them neither in any shopping center nor on any of your acquaintances, unless you present them with one of that kind. We can knit the blanket in any color which you like most or which best fits your interior. We offer 10 basic colors harmonizing with all the others.

  • You can choose any of 10 colors. Select any color in perk. We can add just 5 colors. Take a look for a full color palette in this page and mail us, which color is preferred.

@melina_casella

 

 

                                                                    Blanket well stretches to each side.

 

ESNQ Small Blanket

Throw size blanket 110*130 cm (43*51 in).  Our smallest blanket. You don’t need to share it with anyone. You can relax and feel comfort of its warmth. Be careful though. If you roll yourself in this knit blanket before you go to work, you can change your mind and take a day off!

 

ESNQ Medium Blanket

Twin size blanket 150*150 cm (59*59 in).  Knit blanket to cover up at night and imagine it’s summer already. Roll in this cozy chunky knit blanket after the day of hard work and tune yourself on pleasant evening or weekends.

 

ESNQ Large Blanket

Queen size blanket 200*200 cm (79*79 in). Knit blanket for you and your beloved. What was the last time you two sat with your arms round each other, dreaming and sharing your day?

 

ESNQ Extra Large Blanket

California King size blanket 250*250 cm (99*99 in). Magnificent cloud of warmth and tenderness. This dreamboat becomes great eye-catching accent of your interior at once. 

 

ESNQ Cable knit Medium Blanket

Twin size blanket 150*150 cm (59*59 in). Accent any room with the luxurious style of this cable knit blanket. 

 

ESNQ Cable knit Large Blanket

Queen size blanket 200*200 cm (79*79 in). Treat yourself to the unparalleled softness of this chunky cable knit blanket. 

 

 

You can choose any of this 10 colors. We can add in perks just 5 colors, so if you don't see desired color in the perk, just choose any and write us what exactly color you want.

100% merino wool knit blanket 18 microns has superpowers. It warms those who constantly feel cold and comfort ones who are always hot.

 ​Knitting this wool reminds playing with a kitten, for 18 microns merino wool is soft and tender in a similar way.

 

Keeping your knit blanket soft and safe is incredibly easy. Knit blankets are hard to stain, and all defects are easy to remove by the tips of your fingers. It does not absorb odors and always smells of natural wool. This fabric is unsuitable for small insects and bacteria. You can wear this knit blanket on a balcony, terrace or summerhouse.

Follow these rules, and your knit blanket will serve you for years to come:

  • Once a year take it to professional dry-cleaner.
  • Do not wash it – water makes it loose it's best condition, softness and cloud-like look.
  • Tenderly remove pillings by the tips of your fingers. 
  • Keep it away from gobelin and straw surfaces.

               

 

 

We updated shipping time. First 10 orders we will ship in December 2017.

Hello, my name is Julia. I belong to the creative type of people and the most favorite thing that I like to do is creating something with my own hands. 

But most of all I like to knit. Should I have a new yarn in my hands, I immediately start to knit without a break, until I finish the model.

I met with the super chunky yarn 3 years ago and ordered to sample my first 5 balls. I cannot express my delight when I first touched them. It was something fabulous, even heavenly.

I knitted only from 100% yarn of 22-23 microns and believed that this was the best that I had seen in my life. Until I met an extra fine wool of 18 microns. And then my world had turned upside down.

The difference of this wool from any other is that it is incredibly silky, like a kitten’s fur. There are more than 80 delicious shades in the palette, and I'm so far working with the most popular 10 colors.

WHY ESNQ KNIT?

You might have already seen that many people knit such blankets and knitwear, but why should you choose ESNQ knit?

  • We are one of the few who offer blankets in a premium fiber of 18 microns.
  • Each item you see here is hand knitted exclusively by me.
  • With us, you will really feel what a high-quality service is. You will receive personalized attention and quality items.  
  •  I'm ready for the experiments. I would be happy to knit something new for you, something that no one had ever tried.

Thank you for purchase a handmade product and for helping me to develop my love for knitting. Julia.

                                       Julia                                                                                          Alex

                               Founder, CEO                                                                    Co-Founder, COO

Alex is my husband and helps to embody my ideas, supporting me in every possible way. Without him there would not be ESNQ Knit. I also taught him how to knit, what to say he loves it :)

This wool inspires to be creative. We wish to turn the legion of ideas into reality and need your help.

  • We are going to buy new shades of this wool and create new decor and patterns of chunky knitwear.
  • We’d like to try new interior design items like ottomans, carpets, lamp shades,  woven wall hanging etc. And of course something for our pets – pet houses and bed. 
  • We’ll have to spend many time and materials on experiments to create brand-new items and we need your help. 
  • If you can't be our backer, you can still help us. Share this page in Instagram or Facebook. 

We expect to fulfill orders by February-March of 2018.

Shipping worldwide by priority airmail from EU (Prague, CZ). Shipping usually takes 8-10 days to Europe, 10-14 days to USA and Canada, and 10-20 days to others countries. 

RISKS

We have stores "ESNQ knit" on Etsy and eBay since October 2015. You can see all our positive reviews there. In case of successful funding on Indiegogo there is no risk at all.

 

RETURN POLICY

We want you to be happy with your order. If you are not, for any reason, just return the item within 5 days of receiving and we will issue a 100% refund as soon as we will receive parcel. Buyer pay back postage. The parcel must have the registered tracking number. 

 

Thank you for buying handmade!
story_txt:
ESNQ KnitWelcome to ESNQ Knit (Esenique group) on Indiegogo. We create handmade items of extra fine 100% Australian merino wool premium 18 microns*.  This wool is soft and silky without being itchy or irritating your skin. And more pleasant to touch than 23-26 micron fiber or cheap acrylic one.In this campaign we present pet bed, sweater, cardigan, exclusive mermaid tail and, of course, chunky knit blankets.  Everyone feels the same, seeing our knit blankets for the first time: amused, excited, passionate to treat their home with such wonder.Chunky knit blanket creates special atmosphere of comfort, well-being and protection. You will necessarily want to roll in it, make a cup of your best tea and read that long-forgotten book at last. You can just dip into your thoughts as well. The blanket is a key element for cozy atmosphere.Thank you for your attention to our campaign.* A micron is the measurement used to express the diameter of wool fiber. Fine wool fibers have low micron value.   Show your pet the love you feel by providing optimal comfort and the perfect place to rest and relax with ESNQ knit pet bed.  Chunky knit bed offers optimal comfort for your pet, allowing him sleep like never before.  Hand knitted pet bed will allow your pet to discover the true meaning of relaxation.  This is the perfect place for your cat or dog to rest after a long day playing and walking. Sizes for pet's bed
Soft and warm, very comfortable, designed to give your pet a sweet sleep.
Fashion and lovely appearance.
Pet loves that he can curl up however he wants because the bed stretches and changes shape with him. 
You can mix any 2 colors. 
Select size and any one color in this perk. We can add just 5 colors. Take a look for a full color palette in this page and mail us, which 2 colors are preferred. What is the main color (walls) and what is the secondary. 
It is so comfy. Meow~@venusbees With the super chunky knit sweater you won’t need a jacket as it gets colder.This sweater model looks well-balanced on any figure. It fits well with many clothes like jeans, leggins, skirts of different length. Chunky knit sweater combined with form-fitting trousers make you look stylish, not massive.This is a big knit sweater for keeping on. You wear it and feel completely happy. This sweater has some certain peculiarities:
It hides figure flaws and makes you forget that your waist is not so small, your breast is not that big and your shoulders are too broad. All this does not matters now, since we learn how to accent right places and accent them right. It’s a model of your chunky knitwear that draws attention. And you are the one taking complements. 
Chunky knit sweater is the warmest thing you’ve ever worn. Merino wool sweater is a real frost rescuer at times of bitter cold. 
Chunky knit sweater and cardigan doesn’t need to be washed. You can easily remove dirt with the tips of your fingers. If you wear a T-shirt underneath, you can dry clean it once a season at most.
You can choose any of 10 colors. Select size and any color in this perk. We can add just 5 colors. Take a look for a full color palette in this page and mail us, which color is preferred.

This  big, lovely sweater that feels like a hug in clothing form.  Are you open to changes? Are you easy to alter your usual ways of bright dressing? Then you definitely MUST have such chunky knit cardigan in your wardrobe.Bulky cardigan will accentuate your fragility. It won’t make you look larger, on a contrary, it will contrast your thin wrists and broad sleeves.You can choose any of 10 colors. Select size and any color in this perk. We can add just 5 colors. Take a look for a full color palette in this page and mail us, which color is preferred. Sizes for merino wool sweater and cardigan Every little girl at some point in her life wishes she could be a mermaid. What if you could be a mermaid in your adult life?With ESNQ chunky knit mermaid tail blanket for kids and adults, lounging and dreaming of the sea is more enjoyable.  Extra fine merino wool  makes the mermaid tail blanket really soft and snuggly. We believe, we are first, who tried to knit such blanket of merino wool. ESNQ chunky knit blanket really cozy and keeps the warmth in around your legs. This blanket is perfect for cozying up on couch and read your favorite book. Slip inside, feel like a real beautiful mermaid!You can choose any of 10 colors. Select any color in this perk. We can add just 5 colors. Take a look for a full color palette in this page and mail us, which color is preferred.Mermaid tail blanket sizesMermaid tail blanket is the perfect gift for your child, wife or friend, who loves mermaids and the sea. Life without a sweet warm blanket is not life at all. What else can make your day in any kind of weather? What is warm, pleasant and gloriously soft? It’s not kittens what we have in mind now. It’s more universal and hypoallergenic knit blanket.None of other blankets in the world can compete with this blanket. It looks as if it came from a fairytale. 100% merino wool is immensely tender and soft. It draws you in touching it again and again, and your skin enjoys felicity sensing this natural and hypoallergenic fabric.Chunky knit creates special atmosphere of comfort, well-being and protection. You will necessarily want to roll in it, make a cup of your best tea and read that long-forgotten book at last. You can just dip into your thoughts as well. The blanket is a key element for cozy atmosphere.The knit blankets have stunning sizes. Stitches are about 5-7 centimeters each! It’s almost as long as your finger! Due to such stitches the blanket is airy-fairy and light even when knit tightly.​Chunky knit blanket is your sensible love at a glance. You won’t let it off your hands, we promise! If winter never was your favorite season, now you’ll wait for it to come! Chunky knit blanket is a unique item which not only warms you but cheers you up by its amazing appearance. This is eye-catching accent of your interior. You can use it as a blanket, bedspread and even as a carpet! Chunky knit blankets are handmade, so you won’t meet them neither in any shopping center nor on any of your acquaintances, unless you present them with one of that kind. We can knit the blanket in any color which you like most or which best fits your interior. We offer 10 basic colors harmonizing with all the others.You can choose any of 10 colors. Select any color in perk. We can add just 5 colors. Take a look for a full color palette in this page and mail us, which color is preferred.@melina_casella                                                                      Blanket well stretches to each side. ESNQ Small BlanketThrow size blanket 110*130 cm (43*51 in).  Our smallest blanket. You don’t need to share it with anyone. You can relax and feel comfort of its warmth. Be careful though. If you roll yourself in this knit blanket before you go to work, you can change your mind and take a day off! ESNQ Medium BlanketTwin size blanket 150*150 cm (59*59 in).  Knit blanket to cover up at night and imagine it’s summer already. Roll in this cozy chunky knit blanket after the day of hard work and tune yourself on pleasant evening or weekends. ESNQ Large BlanketQueen size blanket 200*200 cm (79*79 in). Knit blanket for you and your beloved. What was the last time you two sat with your arms round each other, dreaming and sharing your day? ESNQ Extra Large BlanketCalifornia King size blanket 250*250 cm (99*99 in). Magnificent cloud of warmth and tenderness. This dreamboat becomes great eye-catching accent of your interior at once.  ESNQ Cable knit Medium BlanketTwin size blanket 150*150 cm (59*59 in). Accent any room with the luxurious style of this cable knit blanket.  ESNQ Cable knit Large BlanketQueen size blanket 200*200 cm (79*79 in). Treat yourself to the unparalleled softness of this chunky cable knit blanket. 
  You can choose any of this 10 colors. We can add in perks just 5 colors, so if you don't see desired color in the perk, just choose any and write us what exactly color you want.100% merino wool knit blanket 18 microns has superpowers. It warms those who constantly feel cold and comfort ones who are always hot. ​Knitting this wool reminds playing with a kitten, for 18 microns merino wool is soft and tender in a similar way. Keeping your knit blanket soft and safe is incredibly easy. Knit blankets are hard to stain, and all defects are easy to remove by the tips of your fingers. It does not absorb odors and always smells of natural wool. This fabric is unsuitable for small insects and bacteria. You can wear this knit blanket on a balcony, terrace or summerhouse.Follow these rules, and your knit blanket will serve you for years to come:
Once a year take it to professional dry-cleaner.
Do not wash it – water makes it loose it's best condition, softness and cloud-like look.
Tenderly remove pillings by the tips of your fingers. 
Keep it away from gobelin and straw surfaces.
                 We updated shipping time. First 10 orders we will ship in December 2017.Hello, my name is Julia. I belong to the creative type of people and the most favorite thing that I like to do is creating something with my own hands. But most of all I like to knit. Should I have a new yarn in my hands, I immediately start to knit without a break, until I finish the model.I met with the super chunky yarn 3 years ago and ordered to sample my first 5 balls. I cannot express my delight when I first touched them. It was something fabulous, even heavenly.I knitted only from 100% yarn of 22-23 microns and believed that this was the best that I had seen in my life. Until I met an extra fine wool of 18 microns. And then my world had turned upside down.The difference of this wool from any other is that it is incredibly silky, like a kitten’s fur. Each item you see here is hand knitted exclusively by me.

story:
A powerful, affordable, easy to use water filter that is perfect for every home. 

Aquatella is a 4-stage countertop water filter that eliminates over 99% of all harmful pathogens, heavy metals, pesticides, and chemicals from your drinking water.

Tap water is treated with a large number of chemicals to kill bacteria and other microorganisms. Plus, even if the source of the water is pure, that water must travel through pipes (sometimes very old pipes) to finally reach your home.

 

These chemicals are routinely added to our water:

 

Aquatella will filter out all those things and purify your water! Keep your water clean and your body healthy!

Who’s ready for delicious, clean water? Aquatella comes equipped with the latest nanofiltration filters. It works even with low water pressure and boasts the highest removal rate in its class.

Using a micro high-quality sediment filter, this stage removes small particles including dust, dirt, rust, grit, and particles that are 15 times smaller than a grain of sand. 

Removes Pesticides, Formaldehyde, Chlorine, Heavy Metals, and Odors.

The nano-membrane filter is a unique system possessing removal capabilities well beyond the scope of conventional filtration technologies. This stage is capable of removing a wide range of waterborne contaminants including bacteria, macro-molecules, colloids, and micro-sediment. 

Enhances the fresh taste of water, providing a natural taste by removing dissolved gases and odors through a high quality granular activated bituminous filter. Also removes residual chlorine, pesticides, heavy metals, organic pollutants, and odors.

The process of removing fluoride also lightly alkalizes your water (a natural side effect of the fluoride removal process). Enjoy fluoride-free, alkaline water with the Optional Fluoride Filter!

Oh and guess what…as a thank you for being a Kickstarter backer, we’re including the Fluoride Filter (Compare at $60 with other filters) for FREE!

The Fluoride Filter is an upgrade of the Activated Carbon filter (replaces it) and removes everything the Carbon Filter filters just as well along with fluoride.

When we say these filters last, they REALLY Last. Aquatella was built to handle the nastiest tap water.

That’s 200x more than a single Brita filter! To put that in perspective, if you drank half a gallon of water a day - you wouldn’t need to replace your filter for almost 44 years!

We still recommend changing the filter every year to keep the flow rate high, but in a doomsday scenario, one Aquatella will provide you fresh water for a long time. The secret is in the quality of the filters and the out valve. By dumping the contaminants, the filter is able to stay cleaner longer and prevent clogging. 

Since you’ll be changing filters much less often, you’ll be significantly reducing waste from discarded filter cartridges!

 Aquatella is extremely easy to install when used as a counter-top filter. Attach it to almost any counter-top faucet without hassle!

Here is our installation video:

Separate faucet upgrade available! 

Want to keep your kitchen counter clear? Low on counter space? No problem! When the campaign ends, you will have the option to add a $19 under-the-counter system upgrade.

The under-counter system comes with a separate Filter Faucet, so you can enjoy fresh water AND a clear counter.  

Moms, runners, shake makers, athletes, environmentalists, crossfitters, gamers, do-gooders, hikers, bikers, entrepreneurs, adventurers - Aquatella is perfect for everyone.

We are on a mission to help you lead a healthier lifestyle starting from within. Water, coffee, tea and even that post-workout shake all have their own unique benefits for our bodies, but these benefits are often compromised by the water we use. This is why we are on a mission to bring you clean, pure water. Start clean and eliminate harmful pollutants at the source in your home or office tap with Aquatella.

We envision a beautiful world where no one lacks clean water. We believe everyone has the inalienable right to pure, safe drinking water.

We’re on a mission to bring clean water to the world. We believe clean, pure drinking water is an inalienable right to all people - and we will not stop until everyone has access to it. With our filter, we hope to make clean water accessible to all. Please join us. Together, we can make this world a beautiful, clean place - where fresh, clean water is available to all.

This is why we are on a mission to bring you clean, pure water. Start clean and eliminate harmful pollutants at the source in your home or office tap with Aquatella.

We envision a beautiful world where no one lacks clean water. We believe everyone has the inalienable right to pure, safe drinking water.








We’re on a mission to bring clean water to the world. We believe clean, pure drinking water is an inalienable right to all people - and we will not stop until everyone has access to it. With our filter, we hope to make clean water accessible to all. Please join us. Together, we can make this world a beautiful, clean place - where fresh, clean water is available to all.

story:
Story

 

Bath towels are one of the most essential yet underappreciated members of our home. They have three basic tasks to complete: dry our bodies, dry themselves  and look good while doing it.

 

 

Why Moso Towel?

 

So, given their simple purpose, why is it so hard to find one towel that combines softness and absorbency, hygiene and style?

We often think little of what towel to choose and why. Moso is a towel with presence. Designed to look, feel, perform and last better and longer

 

Features

 

  • 50% More absorbent than 100% cotton and at the same time ultralight and thick (because bamboo fiber is lighter and more absorbent than any other fiber).
  • Luscious softness and silky texture.
  • Highly breathable.
  • Dries faster - Anti odour.
  • Naturally antibacterial.
  • Naturally hypoallergenic and free of chemicals.
  • Thermoregulating.
  • Strong and durable.
  • Wrinkle resistant.
  • Colorfast.
  • Simple, elegant and minimalist design.
  • 600+ GSM (in comparison with cotton, a 600 GSM bamboo towel is equivalent to a 800 GSM cotton towel).
  • 30% larger than the standard bath sheet.
  • Certified by Oeko-Tex®.
  • 1 - Year warranty.
  • Fully biodegradable.

 

 

 

The Bamboo Factor

 

We use a towel multiple times a day. After a shower or a soak in the tub, after we wash our hands, at the beach or the pool.

However, when shopping for a good towel, the abundance and differences in quality and price can be confusing and overwhelming.

Budget towels get scratchy after a couple of washes, take forever to dry and are germ factories. You have to spend quite a lot to make sure that your towel really will be worth its price tag. But we don’t think it has to be so.

 

 

In our search for materials we came across the bamboo fiber and thought it was amazing how beneficial its properties were. Working with it was a revelation as we found all the qualities we were looking for. It’s naturally antibacterial, lightweight and fast drying, and is one of the most sustainable raw materials on earth.

 

 

In a recent test, a culture of bacteria was placed on bamboo yarn and cotton yarn. Within 24 hours, 99.8% of the bacteria in the bamboo yarn had died, while the bacteria number increased in the cotton yarn.

 

 

Towels That Will Last 

 

 

Comparative studies of properties of bamboo viscose versus cotton fiber in polyester blended knitted fabrics, demonstrate a higher tensile and bursting strength achieved by bamboo fibers. Because of these qualities, Moso Towel doesn't lose its shape and it doesn't shrink. 

 

 

 

 

Ultra Absorbent 

 

By weight, bamboo towels absorb 50% more water than cotton ones do in almost half the time.

 

 

Bamboo fiber has microscopic holes and gaps, making it more absorbent than any other fiber, which means our towel is highly breathable and also dries quickly. 600 GSM means a lot more absorption capacity in a bamboo towel. In comparison with cotton, a 600 GSM bamboo towel is equivalent to a 800 GSM cotton towel.

 

 

Less Dye & Vibrant Colors

 

Bamboo fabric takes organic and natural dyes more rapidly and thoroughly. It doesn’t need to be mercerized to improve luster. 

 

 

 

 

Design

 

Moso Towel has a modern minimalist design that blends easily with your bathroom decor. 

 

 

The Moso Towel is 100% bamboo yarn weaved through a 100% premium organic cotton sheet: 75% high quality bamboo double terry over 25% twisted yarn organic cotton sheet.

 

 

 

Color Chart

 

We chose a diverse color palette, including both bright and neutral shades.

 

 

 

Sizes Available

 

 

 

We Are Backed by Science

 

Here are links to websites with articles about recent research that support many of the qualities that we enjoy in bamboo fabrics: 

 

 

 

As customers, we can make a difference by trusting ecologically aware producers and manufacturers and choosing organic products.

 

 

Who’s Talking About This? 

 

 

 

Certifications

 

We are committed to only work following regulations under the OEKO-TEX 100 standard at every stage of the process. 

 

 

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

 

Our supply chain is ready to go and we've had production samples made. We will keep backers updated throughout the campaign so as to ensure that we stay as close as possible to the estimated delivery.

All that said, there are some chances of risks in production, but not out of our control. Members of our team will oversee all production, quality control and shipping steps.

story:
About

Did you know?

Americans spend 90% of their time indoors breathing stale air. We strive to make our homes energy efficient, but in doing so trap all of the toxins inside with no way for them to escape. Compounding this problem, studies have found that indoor pollutants can be more harmful to our bodies than outdoor pollutants, with some health effects not noticeable until years later.

That's where brēth comes in.

How does brēth help?

The technology is pretty straight forward. brēth actively feeds the plants all of the toxins and carbon dioxide in the air around it. The plants then use this as fertilizer to grow stronger. These health-giving plants only need light from the lamp above, and water to create filtered, fresh, and clean air.

  • Turbo-charges real plants for 100% natural purification (non-natural air purifiers and ionizers can actually be more harmful to your airflow )
  • Purifies the air in a 10×10 ft room more than 4x per day
  • Removes upwards of 70% of air toxins with a single pass through the unit
  • Is engineered with a perfect and sleek design - all your friends will wish they had one
  • Tells you via app when to water or not, never needs fertilizing - perfect for those who don't have a green thumb!
  • Grow light automatically turns on/off every 12 hours or with a custom timer
  • Water reservoir lasts for 10 days and the sensor tells you exactly when to add more water

Simply download the brēth app to monitor how much air is being purified at any given time. brēth measures the plant’s water level and alerts you when you need to add more. The unit's sensors make sure the water levels are always at an optimal level to keep you from over-watering or under-watering your plants. Zero plant care skills needed.

We’re especially excited about this product because it also gives parents the chance to provide clean air to their young children. Babies breathe about 40 times per minute, which is 2x as much as an adult, and brēth is helping us give these little ones the purest air for their healthy development.

What's the science behind brēth?

First, we developed the patented technology behind brēth in 2013 in the form of giant indoor green walls that force air toxins in a building through the plants to clean the air. In 2016, our green wall system successfully passed air purification tests run by Staffordshire University in England.

Then, in 2017, we had the idea to develop a table-top version of our green wall. The idea of the smaller unit is to bring the same air purification of a green wall to your personal space. Thus, brēth was born.

In August, we contracted a 3rd party research team, Ambient Group Inc., to run official air purification tests on the brēth prototype. After running the initial test, the research team insisted that the results must be wrong - but brēth produced the same amazing results again and again. Even we were astounded at the breakthrough!

Here's a chart of the test results from the official study that shows brēth removes upwards of 70% of air toxins with just 1 pass through the unit! You can view the full study release here.

This graph illustrates the culmination of testing experiments where formaldehyde was introduced directly into the air intake of the brēth™ Unit. The gas, at the dosing point, was allowed to reach a steady state concentration (blue). Note that the proportional concentrations of formaldehyde within chamber (green) and the outlet from the chamber (red) do not increase appreciably during the dosing experiment. This equates to an approximate seventy percent formaldehyde removal rate from the airstream.

With brēth’s technology, air is purified naturally using photosynthesis and bacteria cleaning processes in plants. The brēth unit uses a fan to capture indoor airflow and deliver it back to the plants, who convert toxins into organic compounds that they can use as food. The sugars plants produce in photosynthesis assist in this process by breaking down harmful bacteria into useful compounds. Using this active process versus the passive photosynthesis plants usually undergo, brēth has the bacteria-cleaning power of approximately 200 houseplants.

This is awesome! Now what?

Help brēth make a difference in air quality and plant care enjoyment by clicking the ‘Back This Project’ button at the top of the page, and by helping us spread the word by sharing our page.

We're also excited to announce that the Bonobo Conservation Initiative has partnered with brēth in a special campaign because we both love the rainforest and the bonobo! brēth is an all natural air purifier that is scientifically proven to clean the air in your home with the power of almost 200 plants (like a mini rainforest). 5% of proceeds go to support the BCI.

.

.

Stretch Goals Achieved & Surprises Unlocked!

We unlocked this stunning Rainforest Plant Combo once our campaign reached $75,000!

Now on to $100,000! Help us reach this new stretch goal of $100k so we can unlock the next brēth color option. Vote for your favorite color by commenting on this video here. Midnight is in the lead, so if your favorite is Rose Gold, Sunflower, Red or Sky Blue, get your friends involved to help promote your favorite color!!

We’re now over $100,000!!! Thanks to your help and votes, we’ve unlocked the brēth Midnight color option!

Newest Stretch Goal:

When our campaign hits $125,000 we’ll be unlocking 3 more $1 units!! (This very limited reward will be released within a 1 hour time frame after we hit $125k, so make sure to keep on the lookout because only 3 lucky backers will receive them!! Note: to show our appreciation to our loyal backers, we'll send out a specific update (visible to only current backers) letting them know the exact 10 minute window when these units will be released, so make sure to pledge before then to get notified!)

More stretch goals and features to unlock will be announced soon.

Stay tuned!

Our Story

Ray Greenstreet, co-founder of brēth, got started in the plant business in high school & worked as a wholesale grower. By 2000, he was able to buy his own nursery in Lothian, MD. Today, Greenstreet Gardens has 3 thriving locations where Ray continues to supply 100% organic plants (many of which are grown on his own farm) to the entire DC metropolitan area.

Mark Prescott, co-founder of brēth, is an inventor and has been in the green industry for over 35 years. He's developed a number of products in the industrial air cleaning arena using phytoremediation to improve the air quality in buildings.

In 2013, Mark Prescott joined forces with Ray Greenstreet, and together they developed the patented technology behind brēth - first in the form of giant indoor green walls that force air toxins in a building through the plants to clean the air.

In 2017, they engineered the first table-top version of this active and 100% natural air purifier, and brēth was born!

Behind the Scenes

This demo is meant to showcase how this product works, where we are in the process, and what you can expect from brēth in the future.

 

Risks and challenges

No one wants to see a good idea executed poorly, especially the inventors. We have worked extremely hard to ready this product for Kickstarter as well as for full-scale manufacturing and fulfillment. But here are what we see as the risks and challenges:

MANUFACTURING: The great news is that we’re already ahead of the game. The mold for brēth is created. We are now producing and testing brēth units to ensure that they are ready for our backers. However, unforeseen revisions to the mold can happen. We want to ensure that our supporters are receiving a product that will last and that they will love. To minimize the possibility of unforeseen revisions, we’ve already begun manufacturing testing before our kickstarter launch. This gives us additional time in case of unforeseen delays. We are also working with experienced and professional manufacturing partners who have a track record for efficiency and quality.

We are also in the process of finalizing the brēth app. After kickstarter, we’ll be making final touches on the app development as well as fine-tuning the app’s performance to ensure the best customer experience and the best accuracy of the sensor data. Then the app needs to be approved by Android and Apple, which can take time. In order to minimize any delays concerning the app, we have involved experienced app development partners that know this process forwards and backwards.

PRODUCT ADJUSTMENTS: As brēth gears up for production, there will likely be some minor adjustments to improve the final product. We have already made a pre-production prototype to test and refine brēth and allow us to incorporate our adjustments. This will always be beneficial for you, the consumer, and we will keep you up to speed if any changes are made and why.

FULFILLMENT: Even with greatest foresight and planning, unexpected circumstances can arise: a supplier misses a deadline, a machine breaks down, or a shipment gets lost. Those things could cause a delay. To minimize the possibility of manufacturing setbacks, we have already begun the process and partnered with a reliable and efficient manufacturer, and just in case, we will have at least one back-up supplier for each component pre-located. We also have product commercialization experts who will help ensure smooth sailing from our suppliers and factories.

Regarding plant shipping, especially international shipping, please take into consideration that there are shipping restrictions on soil and plants from the U.S. to certain countries. To handle this challenge effectively, we will be working with plant suppliers in those specific areas of the world that don’t allow U.S. plant and soil exports.

Also, based on country and availability, actual plant types may vary. We assure you that if plant substitutes are needed, we will personally reach out to each of our customers to notify them of the acceptable plant substitution(s). We will always choose the best plant substitutions that adhere to brēth’s air purification standards, so that you still have the best product we can provide.

CONCLUSION:
In the event that things don't go as planned, whether it's a delay in the manufacturing timeline, shipping date, or something else, we promise to communicate honestly with you and work around the clock until we correct the issue.

THANK YOU:
Any pledge amount brings us one step closer to our goal. Help brēth make a difference in air quality and plant care enjoyment by clicking the ‘Back This Project’ button at the top of the page, or by helping us spread the word by sharing our page.

We thank you for your support on our mission to help others grow simply, live healthy & breathe easy!

story:
About Us:

The alumni of Phi Sigma Kappa - Alpha Octaton at NJIT are asking for your help to fix our house!

Since the chapter founding a few years ago PSK has taken 1st place in our annual Greek Week competition, sponsored an underprivileged Ugandan Child, helped clean up the Hackensack River, started to hold a 5k annually to help support the Special Olympics, and participates in many other on campus philanthropies. The chapter works very hard to embody their fraternal values. We as alumni also strive to keep these values alive.

Through a journey to join NJIT’s Greek life this house was passed on to PSK and the current Alumni are working hard to see the necessary repairs to the house are made. In the past few years, money has been tight and the quality of living in the house has declined. Your donations will go toward imperative house renovations and much needed improvements. Since our chapter at NJIT is just over 3 years old, our most recent alumni simply don't have the financial means of fully repairing the structure. We as the current Alumni Corporation really want to give back and see that the undergrads have a great safe house to live in.

What We Need & What You Get

We desperately need money to repair our house. Our only bathroom with a shower is in a state of dismay, we have electrical issues, and frequent leaking around the house. Your funds will not only go to these necessary repairs but future ones as well. 

$20 - Bronze Donation - We'll send you a PSK magnet in the mail

$250 - Silver Donation - We'll put your name on a donation's plaque in the house under "Silver Donators" plus a PSK magnet

$1,000 - Gold Donation - We'll put your name on the donation's plaque under "Gold Donators" plus a PSK magnet

$2,500 - Platinum Donation - We'll put your picture on a composite of Platinum Donators plus a PSK magnet

$10,000 - TITANIUM DONATION - Your picture will be displayed on the same composite in the house under "TITANIUM DONATORS". You will have a room dedicated to YOU which you may also name. Further, we will throw a party in your honor as well as send you a commemorative thank-you plaque.

Your Impact

Your donations will fix extremely affordable housing for our undergraduate brothers. Some of which depend on our house to attend school. By donating to our cause you will not only be giving our brothers a place to live but a place to learn as well. All contributions made will be used to make necessary improvements to our house to increase the livability our humble abode.

Why we need you

The main reason we started this campaign is because we are getting fined for particular violations in our house which we cannot afford to fix alone, just by taking in rent as landlords of the property. If the goal is not met, we are most likely going to lose the house because we simply won't have the funds to pay bills.

story:
In the press:

THE FIRST SECURITY CAMERA WITH A REMOTE-CONTROL FUNCTION

Remocam does two things for your home or office:

1. Innovative security monitoring 
 2. Remote-control function for your electronic devices (cooler way to say it? "IoT") 


Remocam is the world’s first IoT security camera that you can place at home or in the office. This easy-to-setup, high quality IP camera delivers crystal clear surveillance straight to your smartphone so you can see what’s happening at your home or office anytime, anywhere.  Talk to your pets or check in on the babysitters who are taking care of your baby.  

Remocam is also the first security camera that has ever integrated IoT technology. While you are away from home, you can still feed your pet on time with a remote-controlled pet feeder. Just watched your baby fall asleep on your Remocam app? Turn on his favorite lullabies as your baby sleeps. 

We design, program, manufacture and assemble Remocam all in-house.


IoT TECHNOLOGY WITH PERSPECTIVE


WHAT IS IoT (Internet of Things)?

Well, you can look it up on Wikipedia, but it's too hard to understand. 
Here's our version of IoT:

Internet of Things (IoT) is a network environment, in which different
electronic devices can exchange data and interact with each other.

How does Remocam use this? With IoT technology, Remocam is able
to operate any electronic device that comes with a remote-control.

Now you can, not only monitor the house while you are away, but also 
control different electronic devices remotely.




How-to video 1:  RemoBulb


How-to video 2: RemoPet


How-to video 3: IoT Demo




INNOVATIVE SECURITY MONITORING

Live streaming? Yes. Night vision? Yes. Motion detection? Full HD resolution? 
Yes and Yes. Remocam's security monitoring is the best in class. 



BEST NANNY CAMERA FOR YOUR BABIES

You have five nights of babysitting this week? Whoa. No matter how much you trust the sitter, you just can't get rid of your worries over your babies; and we understand that. You don't need to explain again and again how to play your baby's favorite lullaby with the audio player, With Remocam's IoT remote control function, play the music by yourself.



PET LOVER'S MUST HAVE CAMERA!

Living in an apartment alone? You can't dare to have a dog or cat because you cannot feed them regularly with your schedule? Do not worry anymore!                 With Remocam, you can feed your dog anytime, anywhere using an automatic pet feeder, RemoPet and the free Remocam app on your phone. You can talk to your pet and turn the TV on for them as well!





WE HAVE SPECIAL FRIENDS

To achieve the true IoT home automation, we introduce the following IoT devices.

Meet Remocam Friends.



Feed your pet with the push of a button. Dine out. No need to rush home when you can feed your pet remotely with RemoPet.


RemoBulb is an IoT light bulb that can be controlled with a remote 
control, and of course with Remocam.  Turn lights on and off while you are on 
vacation to reduce the chance of break-ins.


With RemoHub, you can virtually control any electronic device at home. Coffee maker, slow cooker, charger, any kind of lights, and computer... you name it. 


Remocam Shop



OUR INDIEGOGO SPONSORS WILL GET...


Cool Parents Package: You will get a special baby bib made by the Etsy seller, The Cloudette. For more information on The Cloudette's product, click The Cloudette.




PRODUCT SPECS





TECHNICAL SPECS

Hardware

Full HD Resolustion (1080P)
Night Vision
Pan (335°) & Tilt (95°)
WiFi(802.11 b/g/n(2.4)
Built-in Mic & Speaker
H.264 Video Format
MicroSD Slot for Local Recording
2.1M CMOS Sensor
IR-Remote Control Learning
Power (DC 5V 2A)
SoftAP Installation

Remocam App

Motion Detection
Automatic Recording (Local & Cloud)
Push Notification
Emergency Call Setup
Remote-control Setup
Siren Alarm
Digital Zoom
Video 256-bit Encryption
2-Way Audio
Pan (335°) & Tilt (95°)
Android 4.0 or above
iOS (iPhone 4 & iOS 7.1 above)



 


FEATURES


Real-Time Monitoring

Live surveillance video via the Remocam app on your smartphone anytime and anywhere that has an internet connection.

Pan & Tilt

Remotely control the camera’s viewing angle. (Pan to 335˚/ Tilt at 95˚)

Motion Detection

When motion is detected, a push notification will be sent to your smartphone.

Full HD Resolution Video

Streams 1080P video in H.264 format via 2.1 megapixel CMOS sensor.

Remote-Control Capability

Turn on your remote-controllable electronic devices, like your TV, A/C or STB. Turn them on or off remotely using the Remocam app.

256-Bit Security Encryption

The Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) is used to protect the real time streaming video containing personal data.

Infrared Night Vision

8 IR LED sensors provide excellent night vision quality.

2-way Audio Communication

Built-in mic and speaker enables 2-way communication using the Remocam app on your smartphone.

Siren Alarm

Remotely turn on a siren to alarm those who are at home using the Remocam app.

Super Easy Setup

Soft AP technology makes it easy to install Remocam within 3 minutes.
(Port Forwarding is not required)

Real-Time Local Recording

Record your footage to a Micro SD card on your IP camera.
(SD card is not included)

Cloud Recording

Record your footage upon motion detection to the Cloud.







DESIGN STEP




PRODUCTION PLAN





ABOUT US


Find This Campaign On www.remocam.com

Meet The Team

"We all have things we like and things we care. Remocam is one of them"

SooWoo (Johaan) Lee
CEO / Co-Founder
Chanwoo (Peter) Lee
CTO
Paul Lee
Managing Director /
Co-Founder
Summer Kim
Marketing Team Lead
Yongheui (Jason) Kwak
Principal Hardware
Design Engineer
Jinho (Jacob) Lee
Principal Server Engineer
Kwanhyun (Brad) Cho
Principal Firmware Engineer
Sanggon (Brian) Lee
Principal Circuit
Design Engineer
Sukwoong (William) Yang
Senior Mobile App Engineer
JinChul (Sebastian) Park
Senior Production /
Web Engineer
Hyunkoo (Luke) Yeo
Production Manager
Hyehyun (Bertha) Shim
Accounting Manager



 

 

FAQ


Q. What is Remocam?

A. Remocam monitors your home or office so that you can observe your home while you have babysitting, your pets, or your office at night through your smartphone, tablet.


Q. How is it different from other cameras available on the market?

A. Remocam is the world's first security camera with IOT technology. It can
control your electronic devices remote-control (IR-controlled devices), such 
as TV, Amazon Fire TV, or a pet feeder.


Q. How do I set up a camera?

A. It is very simple. Just connect Remocam to your Wi-Fi router and start 
streaming via Android or iOS devices. It will take less than a minute.


Q. Can I use more than one camera?

A. Yes, the Remocam app supports up to 5 Remocams.


Q. Can I simultaneously live stream from more than one device?

A. Yes, you can simultaneously log in to Remocam from up to 5 mobile devices.


Q. How do I control my consumer electronic device, such as a TV? 

A. Remocam uses its IP Camera's IR to control any consumer devices that comes with a remote-control.


Q. What happens when there is a power outage?

A. The recorded videos are stored on either your SD card or Cloud space when the power goes off. When it comes back on, Remocam will automatically connect to your wireless network and come back to life.


Q. Is Remocam really secure to use? 

A. Remocam uses 256-bit encryption technology to protect your video streaming and cloud storage.


Q. Is cloud storage available?

A. Yes, the monthly charge is not set yet, but it will be provided at a lower price than the Dropcam's monthly cloud service price rate.
story_txt:
In the press:



THE FIRST SECURITY CAMERA WITH A REMOTE-CONTROL FUNCTION




Remocam does two things for your home or office:
1. Innovative security monitoring  2. Remote-control function for your electronic devices (cooler way to say it? "IoT") 





Remocam is the world’s first IoT security camera that you can place at home or in the office. This easy-to-setup, high quality IP camera delivers crystal clear surveillance straight to your smartphone so you can see what’s happening at your home or office anytime, anywhere.  Talk to your pets or check in on the babysitters who are taking care of your baby.  
Remocam is also the first security camera that has ever integrated IoT technology. While you are away from home, you can still feed your pet on time with a remote-controlled pet feeder. Just watched your baby fall asleep on your Remocam app? Turn on his favorite lullabies as your baby sleeps. 
We design, program, manufacture and assemble Remocam all in-house.






IoT TECHNOLOGY WITH PERSPECTIVE





WHAT IS IoT (Internet of Things)?



Well, you can look it up on Wikipedia, but it's too hard to understand. Here's our version of IoT:


Internet of Things (IoT) is a network environment, in which differentelectronic devices can exchange data and interact with each other.
How does Remocam use this? With IoT technology, Remocam is ableto operate any electronic device that comes with a remote-control.
Now you can, not only monitor the house while you are away, but also control different electronic devices remotely.







How-to video 1:  RemoBulb




How-to video 2: RemoPet




How-to video 3: IoT Demo










INNOVATIVE SECURITY MONITORING



Live streaming? Yes. Night vision? Yes. Motion detection? Full HD resolution? Yes and Yes. Remocam's security monitoring is the best in class. 


























BEST NANNY CAMERA FOR YOUR BABIES
You have five nights of babysitting this week? Whoa. No matter how much you trust the sitter, you just can't get rid of your worries over your babies; and we understand that. You don't need to explain again and again how to play your baby's favorite lullaby with the audio player, With Remocam's IoT remote control function, play the music by yourself.


























PET LOVER'S MUST HAVE CAMERA!


Living in an apartment alone? You can't dare to have a dog or cat because you cannot feed them regularly with your schedule? Do not worry anymore!                 With Remocam, you can feed your dog anytime, anywhere using an automatic pet feeder, RemoPet and the free Remocam app on your phone. You can talk to your pet and turn the TV on for them as well!


























WE HAVE SPECIAL FRIENDS

To achieve the true IoT home automation, we introduce the following IoT devices.
Meet Remocam Friends.




Feed your pet with the push of a button. Dine out. No need to rush home when you can feed your pet remotely with RemoPet.





RemoBulb is an IoT light bulb that can be controlled with a remote control, and of course with Remocam.  Turn lights on and off while you are on vacation to reduce the chance of break-ins.







With RemoHub, you can virtually control any electronic device at home. Coffee maker, slow cooker, charger, any kind of lights, and computer... you name it. 






Remocam Shop





OUR INDIEGOGO SPONSORS WILL GET...













Cool Parents Package: You will get a special baby bib made by the Etsy seller, The Cloudette. For more information on The Cloudette's product, click The Cloudette.





PRODUCT SPECS








TECHNICAL SPECS








Hardware

			Full HD Resolustion (1080P)
			Night Vision
			Pan (335°) & Tilt (95°)
			WiFi(802.11 b/g/n(2.4)
			Built-in Mic & Speaker
			H.264 Video Format
			MicroSD Slot for Local Recording
			2.1M CMOS Sensor
			IR-Remote Control Learning
			Power (DC 5V 2A)
			SoftAP Installation
		










Remocam App

			Motion Detection
			Automatic Recording (Local & Cloud)
			Push Notification
			Emergency Call Setup
			Remote-control Setup
			Siren Alarm
			Digital Zoom
			Video 256-bit Encryption 
			2-Way Audio
			Pan (335°) & Tilt (95°)
			Android 4.0 or above 
			iOS (iPhone 4 & iOS 7.1 above)
		









 



FEATURES












Real-Time Monitoring

			Live surveillance video via the Remocam app on your smartphone anytime and anywhere that has an internet connection.
		





Pan & Tilt

			Remotely control the camera’s viewing angle. (Pan to 335˚/ Tilt at 95˚)
		







Motion Detection

			When motion is detected, a push notification will be sent to your smartphone.
		





Full HD Resolution Video

			Streams 1080P video in H.264 format via 2.1 megapixel CMOS sensor.
		







Remote-Control Capability

			Turn on your remote-controllable electronic devices, like your TV, A/C or STB. Turn them on or off remotely using the Remocam app.
		





256-Bit Security Encryption

			The Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) is used to protect the real time streaming video containing personal data.
		







Infrared Night Vision

			8 IR LED sensors provide excellent night vision quality.
		





2-way Audio Communication

			Built-in mic and speaker enables 2-way communication using the Remocam app on your smartphone.
		







Siren Alarm

			Remotely turn on a siren to alarm those who are at home using the Remocam app.
		





Super Easy Setup

			Soft AP technology makes it easy to install Remocam within 3 minutes.
			(Port Forwarding is not required)
		







Real-Time Local Recording

			Record your footage to a Micro SD card on your IP camera.
			(SD card is not included)
		





Cloud Recording

			Record your footage upon motion detection to the Cloud.
		







DESIGN STEP











PRODUCTION PLAN











ABOUT US


Find This Campaign On www.remocam.com
Meet The Team
"We all have things we like and things we care. Remocam is one of them"









SooWoo (Johaan) Lee
CEO / Co-Founder





Chanwoo (Peter) Lee
CTO





Paul Lee
Managing Director / Co-Founder







Summer Kim
Marketing Team Lead





Yongheui (Jason) Kwak
Principal Hardware

Jinho (Jacob) Lee
Principal Server Engineer







Kwanhyun (Brad) Cho
Principal Firmware Engineer





Sanggon (Brian) Lee
Principal Circuit
			Design Engineer





Sukwoong (William) Yang
Senior Mobile App Engineer







JinChul (Sebastian) Park
Senior Production /
		Web Engineer





Hyunkoo (Luke) Yeo
Production Manager





Hyehyun (Bertha) Shim
Accounting Manager





 

 

FAQ




Q. What is Remocam?
A. Remocam monitors your home or office so that you can observe your home while you have babysitting, your pets, or your office at night through your smartphone, tablet.

Q. How is it different from other cameras available on the market?
A. Remocam is the world's first security camera with IOT technology. It cancontrol your electronic devices remote-control (IR-controlled devices), such as TV, Amazon Fire TV, or a pet feeder.

Q. How do I set up a camera?
A. It is very simple. Just connect Remocam to your Wi-Fi router and start streaming via Android or iOS devices. It will take less than a minute.

Q. Can I use more than one camera?
A. Yes, the Remocam app supports up to 5 Remocams.

Q. Can I simultaneously live stream from more than one device?
A. Yes, you can simultaneously log in to Remocam from up to 5 mobile devices.

Q. How do I control my consumer electronic device, such as a TV? 
A. Remocam uses its IP Camera's IR to control any consumer devices that comes with a remote-control.

Q. What happens when there is a power outage?
A. The recorded videos are stored on either your SD card or Cloud space when the power goes off. When it comes back on, Remocam will automatically connect to your wireless network and come back to life.

Q. Is Remocam really secure to use? 
A. Remocam uses 256-bit encryption technology to protect your video streaming and cloud storage.

Q. Is cloud storage available?
A. Yes, the monthly charge is not set yet, but it will be provided at a lower price than the Dropcam's monthly cloud service price rate.

story:
PLEASE HELP MAKE THIS DREAM A REALITY!!!
Crowd funding for Coding and programming

Scan any bottle of Spirits or cordials with your phone or tablet and get instant recipie's, quick mixers, party ideas, instant rebates and much more.
Drink recipes in the palm of your hand.

No more recipe books or web searching for drink recipes.

Spirits of Mixology is not just a recipe guide, but SO much more!

Going into a package store with all the different types of products and flavors available can be extremely overwhelming. There are literally thousands of options, and without some kind of help or reference, most people tend to "go with what we know" and get the same old things and make the same old drinks. Don't get me wrong, there's something to be said for the standards, but it's time to step out of your comfort zone and try something new.  Of course, it'll tell you how to make a Screwdriver, but the real benefit of this app is in learning and trying something new.

This app will give the consumers tons of information on any spirits bottle or cordials that they want to scan. The customer can pick up anything in the liquor store and scan it with their phone and a picture of the bottle will pop up. Tasting notes about the product will pop up, along with recipes and suggfor that product. The app will suggest popular drinks based on the customer's selections, while also introducing many options that the customer has probably never heard of. The user can also rate drinks and save their favorites. 

Manufacturers and suppliers are able to utilize this app by getting rebates to consumers and show new products coming soon, while also telling manufactures or suppliers how many times their products are scanned. This app is able to be shared on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter or by email so people can send their friends drinks to try or great party drink ideas. More great features and benefits will come from user feedback and suggestions through updates. Our goal is to have a completely functional, easy to use, and very user friendly tool.

We have been creating and documenting this concept for quite some time. The app has unique features not presently available in the marketplace. 

The only real challenges we currently face involve the programming and coding that's required to build such a complex database with so many unique features. Once that's successfully completed, the initial product launch will take place and consumer feedback will determine what added features will come via product updates.

Setbacks are virtually inevitable, and the only real way to handle them is to be immediately reactive and to make it a priority to make things roll as smoothly as possible. This is our primary starting venture of this kind, so it has our complete and individual attention.

FEATURES AND BENEFITS of App!

1). Try new recipes with old and new products

2). Get more familiar with many types of products

3). Save money at liquor stores from instant rebates on products

4). Never pay full retail for select products at liquor stores

5). Build a profile and share any party pics or events

6). Let suppliers send you cool merchandise for buying or scanning their products

7). Be able to scan and build drinks at resturaunts and bars 

8). More features and benefits to come on updates!

9). Get updates and early promotions on new products coming soon

Please look at the gallery of pics to see the App and some different brands and flavors that are out there.

story:
Re2O:

Who we are:

We are Beau Burns and Matt Bielski, two Californians with an idea on how to solve our water shortage needs.  Not just here in the western United States, but across the globe. 

What we’re doing:

We are using 100% solar energy to create clean water AND electricity.  We can create clean water from salt water, grey water, even waste water.  The solution goes from the reservoir into the pressure tank.  Here it is then heated to boiling using concentrated solar energy and pressurized.  The pressurized steam then turns a turbine which creates electricity.  The steam is then condensed into clean, fresh, pure drinkable water.

The only input our system needs is salty or dirty water and sunlight.

Why it’s better:

According to the U.N., by 2025 20% of the world will need to rely on desalinated water for their fresh water needs.  Current desalination methods require A LOT of energy.  Even in reverse osmosis systems, up to half of the cost of the water coming out is electricity costs.  That’s a lot coal and oil going to be needed to burn! 

The Re2O system uses ONLY solar power.  And it even creates clean electricity in the process!

Also, a lot of people don’t realize that the salt left over is actually up to a 22% brine solution.  Actual seawater is around 3% salt.  And it’s often just dumped back into the environment.  That’s not good for the plants and animals in the area of desal plants. 

The Re2O system can cook off ALL of the water in the pressure tank, leaving only salt, which can then be removed and used instead of poisoning the surrounding area.

So to sum up, our Re2O system creates drinkable water from nearly any source using only solar energy, clean renewable electricity, and salt that our friends in the northeast can use during the winter.

What we need:

We need $500,000 to finish research and development for our production model.  We have the proof of concept done, as you can see.  Now we need to hire a few engineers and maybe a physicist or two, rent some factory space, and buy a lot of different materials.  We have the plans and calculations for a few different, much bigger and efficient versions.  But we need money to get those designs off the page and into a working model.  So please, donate if you can, or just share this with as many people as possible.  California, the western United Sates, at least a fifth of the people on our planet need cheap, reliable, eco-friendly drinking water.

Thanks!!


Patents Pending

story:
What Our Campaign Is For

My whole life I've loved Star Wars. I think I had every Star Wars toy made as a kid. And sadly got rid of them a long time ago.  I was searching online for Star Wars figures one night and discovered a customized figure.  I looked at my fiancée and said “I could do that” she agreed so I decided to learn how to make my own figures and vehicles. As I began to customize, I started to need waterslide decals, but couldn't really find any online. Everyone said make your own, and I did. It was kind of a disaster! I wound up wasting so much money and so many materials trying to get it right, that I wished I could have just bought some.

So I decided to make a place to buy them. I bought a high quality photo printer, made up some designs, and perfected waterslide decal making. I started offering them on eBay and on Facebook and people went wild! That is also how we created Galactic Plastics.  We've been blessed to sell a lot of great looking decals, but I have a limitation. A question asked by many people is "Can you do white (or silver or gold)?" I have to answer "Sorry, not on clear paper."

The problem is that most consumer grade printers, even the highest quality ones, lack the option of white or metallic ink or toner. They print based on CMYK (cyan, magenta, yellow and black) color scale and use the media (background/paper) for white. So far, we have been able to make some really good decals using this method.  There are printers out there that can print with white on clear paper, but they are extremely expensive!  So that’s where you guys and gals come in.


What We Need & What You Get

I've found another option. A Japanese company called ALPS used to make a thermal ink printer that used white ink, but they discontinued it. The printers can be found in the secondary market and the toner is still readily available. They can be purchased for a far more reasonable price than a commercial printer. I am a certified printer repair technician, so I can maintain a used printer myself. And since it's a thermal ink style printer, I will be able to use the same decal paper I use now.

Our goal is to raise $2,000 for the ALPS printer and stock of ink cartridges.  Buying the ink cartridges for this printer will be about $400 cheaper than buying just one white toner cartridge for a comparable laser printer. This savings will be for each time the ink needs to be replaced. This will allow us to keep our prices at their current level with significant improvement to our product.  I think you can see the benefits!

Our perks range from our eternal gratitude all the way up to you receiving 5 awesome decal sheets (3 pre-designed and 2 customized just for you).

If we happen to not make it to our goal, you will still receive a decal sheet printed with our current technology (without white on a clear background or metallic colors) and still get a good deal on them! Anything extra will go toward growing our business and into our “printer fund”.  Did I mention that white on a clear background and metallic decals are in high demand?


The Impact

We will be able to fill a void in a market and help out many fellow action figure customizers find the decals they have searched high and low for to complete a restoration or custom project.  Also our customized decal sheets come with an almost endless possibility of designs.

Ladies it’s your turn now!  With the waterslide decals you can get customized you can add awesome designs to your home projects including but not limited to furniture, arts and crafts, and much more!  There is endless possibilities. Also you can get custom nail art designs.  My fiancée loves using them! 

Please feel free to check out our Facebook page  www.facebook.com/galacticplasticsdecals

And our website  www.galacticplastics.net


Risks & Challenges

Though there are risks involved with anything, the risks for this campaign are actually pretty low. If we don’t reach full funding we will still have decals to deliver. Our decals are already high quality and we have some pretty damn cool designs! We just won’t be able to deliver designs with white on a clear background or metallic colors.

As with any campaign, one of the biggest challenges is promotion. We need to get the word out! This is where you can help out, even if you can’t make a monetary contribution. Please spread the word about our campaign! Share it with your friends on social media. Tell your friends at work. Call your cousin across the country. Just help us get the word out! With your help, there isn't a challenge we can't overcome!


Other Ways You Can Help

  If you can’t donate we completely understand.  Everyone can’t contribute financially, but you can help by sharing, sharing and sharing!  Spread the word. Let’s make this happen!

We appreciate you taking the time to read this and we thank you for backing our campaign!

May the Force be with you!
