story:
Future BuyZ would like the present

  • Every second thousands of plastic water bottle are thrown away or just toss out.
  • That adds up to millions every day, and exactly 63 BILLION plastic water bottles are thrown away each year.
  • The fact that we do not see this makes it seem OK.
  • However, the cold truth is, this crisis is getting out of control.
  • Not only does it affect marine life and wildlife, it is also affecting our home planet, Earth.
  • This crisis has grown 10 folds or more over the last decade.
  • It is a real environmental problem, not only here in the US but worldwide.
  • Plastic bottles are super cheap to produce, we mean little to nothing!
  • Water is even cheaper! (Look at your electric bill VS. water bill, it is almost 10X cheaper!)
  • Big companies are making 10 to 100 times profit on water from us.

Sub Xero is the ultimate solution to this worldwide disaster

  • 5 GL bottles or even glass bottles (glass is much better) will save you so much more than plastic bottles.
  • It can fit 37 regular 16.9 oz bottles.
  • That can easily last a week for a family of 4.
  • It only cost $1.50 to $2 to refill a 5 GL at your nearest grocery store.
  • A case of 4pk water bottle is $5 to $8. (You can literally save over $500 a year, if that does not convince you then I don't know what does?)
  • Imagine if 10% of the people in the world stop drinking from plastic bottles (I myself do not), then we can reduce 630 million plastic bottles each year.
  • 10% can make a huge different especially if it is a world wide.
  • 5 GL bottles also produce no waste or plastic.
  • Plastic bottles can get warm within minutes and if left out in the sun for too long and can actually be carcinogenic. Yikes.
  • Sub Xero keeps your water cold all day, so there is no need to refill your cup with ice every time you get a drink.
  • Even if you do not the idea of Sub Xero, at least drink from a reusable water bottle.

Image all the benefits of an electric water cooler but on a whole new level

  Sub Xero VS. Electric Water Coolers

  • Cost 1/10 to 1/20 of the price.
  • 100% Waterproof and Washable.
  • Superb craftsmanship and quality.
  • Long lasting, 10 years +/- 5 years, reusable.
  • Portable, users can take it literally anywhere.
  • Aesthetically attractive no matter where you put it.
  • No wires, electric components, metal or plastic pieces.
  • Flexible, will not tear, break, nor rip no matter how hard you try.
  • Maintenance , costly fixes, troubleshooting problems does not exist.
  • Takes up virtually no space at all, it is just a thermal insulating cover.

The birth from passion to innovation

Every time you walk into a grocery franchise/store, whats the first thing you see (usually)? 5 GL water bottles and the water machine dispenser for it.

  • Millions of people refill 5 GL bottles on a daily/weekly basic. Yet, no one has even though of the idea of Sub Xero. We (Future BuyZ) know for a fact that at least 90% of water drinkers prefer cold water over warm water any day. Especially in the south where the weather is like the surface of out Sun. 
  • We have a small office and drink out of the 5 GL bottles all day. After years of drinking room temperature water (winter was the best season since the water was natural cold), we just got fed up with the taste. 
  • We are located in Florida and Florida wins the hottest state in the USA, beating out all other 49 contestants! Probably the worst award for 1st place and not an award to be happy about. So you get the picture, hot weather and warm water is a double negative, which does not make it a positive, it makes it a quadruple negative.
  • Millions of people have 5 GL bottles in there home. The ones that can afford an electric water cooler will get one. BUT for the rest of us, we just have to deal with room temperature water. BUT not anymore, Sub Xero is here and its ready to assist your hydration needs!

Sub Xero in its prime/prototype stage (July 2017)

  • Back in July, we made 2 colors, white and blue.
  • The blue was kind of ugly, but the white was attractive.
  • We changed the color from medium blue to neon and boy did that make  a huge difference.
  • We decided the logo should go on top next to the opening of the zipper and make it big enough so anyone can see it. Small logos are really meant for electronic devices.
  • We did not even think about the carrying strap. Thank goodness we made the carrying strap. Imagine how hard it would be carrying Sub Xero with a handle or strap.
  • This was the bare minimum we had thought of. No retail packaging or bar-codes. Our main focus was just to make a prototype and test it out to see if it even works. If it does not work, then there was no point in making Sub Xero.

Testing Sub Xero out (Still in prototype)

  • We tested Sub Xero in 3 different control variations.
  • It was done in the shade but control # 3 (No ice or Sub Xero cover) was left in the shade for 6 hours and then in the sun for 6 hours.
  • Miami, Florida was perfect for testing grounds since the run rises early and sets late.
  • The weather was even better because its so hot during the summer and still hot in the winter. (It's literally 85F outside in November as we are typing this!)
  • We use the 2 prototype of Sub Xero for testing. If this experiment/testing fail, then of course we would have never mass produced Sub Xero.
  • However, that was not the case. As you can Sub Xero did quite well and we were more than impress. It was then we started producing the logo, carrying straps and the final Sub Xero.

The Real Deal is Real

This is the final product of Sub Xero, 2 Colors for now.

In the future, we will improve on Sub Xero & fixing/adding to it as the consumer suggest.

 

  • INNOVATION: The very first and only insulating thermal cooler cover for 5 gallon glass or plastic bottle container.
  • Get ready for cold, refreshing, hydrating, and delicious H2O.
  • Warm, nasty, tasteless water is a thing of the past.
  • It is far superior to foam or plastic koozies/coolie.

   

  •  THE NEW COOLER: Step aside electric water coolers.
  • They're costly, take up valuable space, heavy, require yearly maintenance, breaks down easily, last a few years top, and aren't portable.
  • Sub Xero is the exact opposite.
  • It can keep the water 15F to 20F degrees lower than its surrounding temperature (or warmer).
  • It's a one-of-a-kind nonelectric water cooler.
  • The elastic material is top quality, and well-built. Craftsmanship at its finest. 
  • ALL IN ONE: Neoprene is almost as effective as any stainless steel insulator at 1/10 of the cost!
  • Neoprene is a synthetic rubber/fiber that maintains its insulation, the thicker the better.
  • It's extremely flexible, durable, but most importantly long lasting and does its job effectively.
  • Exact same fiber that deep sea scuba divers wear. Sub Xero is almost 1/4 inch thick.

(It's so portable, weightless, and compact. One can fit it virtually anywhere.)

 ULTRA PERFORMANCE: The unique zig-zag stitching on our neoprene insulating coolie gives it added durability. Thus, results in a tighter fit, keeps water cold(er) longer, and traps the cold particles from escaping. 

  • Want the best and long lasting coldness?
  • Fill the 5 gallon water bottle 80-90% to the top.
  • Leave it in the fridge overnight or in the freezer for 5-6 hours. 
  • Fill with 5-10 pounds of ice before or after you arrive at your destination. 
  • (Note: Having ice in the 5 gallon water bottle really does help maintain the coldness for a very long time. Neoprene fiber will trap cold air particles as oppose to regular room temperature water. More more ice the better, can last for days!)

                   (Great for watching games, tv, movies, playing video-games without pausing the moment)

Sub Xero Was Made For Everyone

  • Put any 5 gallon bottle on.
  • Zip it up.
  • Fill it with water and ice, and that's it!
  • You never have to take off Sub Xero.
  • Once you put it on, just leave it on your 5 gallon.
  • It is simple as that.
  • 100% Water proof, super durable, high quality neoprene fiber, and last up to 10+ years!

  • Sub Xero is perfect for many events.
  • After an intense workout, nothing taste better than cold water.
  • Having friends over drinking while Sub Xero keeps everyone cool and hydrated.
  • In your office, when you feel sluggish and tire, a glass of cold water will surely wake you up and keep you focus.
  • No more having to drink warm nasty water when cold, fresh, and hydrating water is right by your side.
  • And many more including camping, outdoor field practice, at the church, fundraisers, outdoor cooking, BBQs, meeting events, and whatever makes you happy. 

 

  • Heavy duty carrying strap included for free!
  • Easily fits and can support any 5 gallon plastic or glass water bottle. (Over 50 pounds)
  • You will really appreciate these straps because carrying a 45 pound bottle just for a few seconds can be draining and your back with hate you for it!
  • Carry the trap with one hand and with the other hand hold the neck of the water bottle.

 

 

 

  • Quick and easy to put on. We highly recommend you to put Sub Xero on an empty 5 gallon bottle before refilling it with water.
  • However, you can put on Sub Xero with a full bottle. Please be careful (Kids should not handle Sub Xero cover) as a 5 gallon bottle can be 45+ pounds.

 (Durable, it can even stand up on its own with no support. All materials are made with the highest standard quality!)

 

(Enjoy water, the way its meant to be. Cold and refreshing!)

 

 

 

 

From Pure Imagination to Creation

  1. June 2017 - The idea of Sub Xero was actually though of in April 2017 by Future BuyZ. It was not actually 100% thought out and confirm for production until June 2017.
  2. July 2017 - It took less than 1 week to make the prototype which included the zipper. That was all. The bare minimum to see how it looks and perform.
  3. Mid July 2017 - Intensive 3 day testing begins.
  4. August 2017 - The preparation and designing of the retail box, logo, branding, and packaging is all set.
  5. Mid August 2017 - The final product of Sub Xero is 100% complete and is ready for sale.
  6. September 2017 - Close friends and family members are given a free Sub Xero for testing.
  7. November 2017 - Indiegogo project is launched! (What happened in October?, We decided to take a 2-3 week break from all the hard work).

Why you should drink cold water?

Here is a small list of why cold water is beneficial and healthy to your diet and life.

  

Funding Sub Xero. $10K is the minimum we are asking. Your support is truly appreciated.

  • Like most or all projects, the minimum just covers for the cost of the product itself.
  • Sub Xero was made possible by a team, a company, not just one person.
  • The cost of production, assembly line, designing, video/photo editing, testing, packaging, shipping, and everything in order to make an idea come to life is very rewarding but at the same time truly difficult.
  • It takes a big risk to commit to your passion and make it a reality.
  • Creating something from nothing truly gives one the sense of accomplishment , wisdom, and knowledge.
  • We have learn so much through this journey about how to make an idea to a reality.
  • On the other hand. It would be  a great disappoint if our pledgers/backers were not impressed by our invention.
  • It truly pains us to know that after all the hours, sweat, blood, tears, and hard work we put into Sub Xero as a team, was all for nothing because the audience/consumers was not impress nor care about such product. 
  • If you can not pledge anything, that is fine, your support and sharing is all we need.
  • We just ask you, your family, friends, and coworkers to share and tell others about Sub Xero. That would be more than enough and invaluable to us.
  • Anything really helps. Thank you!

Claim your perks (Options)!

​Perk 0 

  • Anything is greatly appreciated, even $1. Your contribution to Sub Xero means more to us than you can imagine. It means you care and want our project to succeed. That alone is worth more than all the money in this world. Please let your family and friends know.

Perk 1 & 2 ( $20 / 50% OFF Retail Price $40 )

  • Option 1 - Bright White (Its super white, no heat or sun ray can penetrate it.)
  • Option 2 - Irresistible Neon Blue (Its neon and no one can take their eyes off it.)

Both colors comes with

  1. Black carrying strap
  2. A thank you card
  3. Plastic wrapper for the protection of Sub Xero
  4. The retail box itself.

Perk 3 ( $35 / 56% OFF Retail Price $80 )

Get both colors and everything included in perk 2.

Perk 4 & 5 ( $35 / 50% OFF Retail Price $70 )

  • Option 1 - Bright White Thermal Cover with Shiny Stainless Steel Rack and 55mm valve
  • Option 2 - Neon Blue Thermal Cover with Shiny Stainless Steel Rack and 55mm valve

Get the complete set for your water starter kit. Faz Flo 2.0 is also manufactured and sold by Future BuyZ. For more info please check our website at www.FutureBuyZ.com for more info.

  

 

(The complete set includes the rack, 55mm valve, and white or blue thermal cover)

Ready 2 Go, Are you?

Sub Xero is fully completed and stored in our warehouse and ready to ship! 

  • Stored in top facility warehouse (Clean and free of dirt, dust, and water).
  • In cartons and shrink wrap so nothing touches Sub Xero.
  • We have a warehouse in L.A. California that helps us with all the prepping and shipping.
  • Each Sub Xero with be shipped within 3-5 days to each backer in brand new condition.

             (An employee working on making Sub Xero back in the summer of 2017)

 

(One of the worker opening up the cartons for inspection and proof of shipments)

              

(Packed, stored, and ready to be ship to our backers)

For more info not on the F.A.Q, please 

email us and we will reply within the hour.

 

(Our team in Ningbo, China having dinner after a very long and busy week)

  • Tyler Cranston, the owner of Future BuyZ and the leader of this project. 
  • There were more people that contributed to the making of Sub Xero. (Mainly the designers, packaging people, and the shippers)
  • We did not include them for this project but their work was very valuable. 
  • It takes more than guts and passion to make an idea come to life.
  • To make and idea a reality, requires a team, talented minds, determination and dedication.

Risks/Obstacles/Hardships/Challenges

  • Without risk there is no reward. The same can be said vice versa.
  • The greater the risk, the greater the reward, and the greater the downfall.
  • Quality was our #1 priority. We wanted to create a genuine product that could compete with an electric water cooler for a fraction of the cost.
  • Restless nights, not going out or getting exercise really took a toll on our health. We wanted to complete Sub Xero in time for the Holidays.
  • We only had a couple people contribute to this project, a small team.
  • We spend quite a substantial amount of funding(of our own) to make Sub Xero. If we can't raise the funds then our future projects and this one will be in jeopardy. 
  • It takes many days or years to build something. It only takes a minute to bring it down.
  • This was our first project/invention. We had to learn how to prepare and market Sub Xero. Everything must be done at the right time, place, and moment in order for a project to succeed. 
  • Time. Patience is the key to success. If we mess up on one part, we had to fix redo it until it was perfect. It takes many trials and error to make something perfect, or almost perfect.

About us, Who we are.

Thank you for checking us out.

  • If you like what you have read and seen could you please let your family and friends know.
  • We have put 1000's of hours and restless nights to make Sub Xero a reality.
  • It is already here. We are waiting for eager pledgers and enthusiastic people to contribute to our project. Our success depends 100% solely on our backers and consumers.
  • If Sub Xero does not get the minimum funding, we will only ship out the those who have back us and will liquidate the excessive inventory and continue on with another project.
  • We are very confident and know Sub Xero will succeed.
  • That is why we have produce 4400 units. In the summer time, Sub Xero will be a huge hit and so convenient.
  • Get yours today because the next shipment is not due for another 2 to 3 months. Thank you again for your support and viewing us.

It is already here. We are waiting for eager pledgers and enthusiastic people to contribute to our project. Our success depends 100% solely on our backers and consumers.
If Sub Xero does not get the minimum funding, we will only ship out the those who have back us and will liquidate the excessive inventory and continue on with another project.
We are very confident and know Sub Xero will succeed.
That is why we have produce 4400 units. In the summer time, Sub Xero will be a huge hit and so convenient.
Get yours today because the next shipment is not due for another 2 to 3 months. Thank you again for your support and viewing us.

story:
Our handmade, eco-friendly and energy saving lamps create cosy and warm atmosphere in your home or office.  All of them have integrated led lighting, which is cost effective.  We may produce company logos or image by your choice.

I need to start with 10 000 USD  buy some equipment like router, grinding machine and professional circular saw.

For your support I will send you some perks with their unique design. 

If I don't reach my entire goal the funds will go for materials and for a router.

My project is valuable because I don't make copy/paste of other similar projects. All of the lamps have unique design.

Here are some pictures from process of production:

story:
Are you fed up with losing the angle grinder spanner you need to change the cutting/grinding disc on your grinder?

 Or worse still the disc is stuck on so tight that it takes two or more people and a hammer and chisel and a lot of wasted down time just to change the disc??

  • Well now with the WIL LOKTM QUICKBUTTONTM system , just press a button and the disc is instantly removed. 

 CHANGING THE DISC ON THE WIL LOKTM QUICKBUTTONTM   ANGLE GRINDER
 
Grinder prototype is used in video's for illustration purposes only
CHANGING A DISC THE OLD WAY

 

The WIL LOKTM QUICKBUTTONTM  angle grinder is not only a world first in power tools but also the only major advancement in angle grinder technology for 50+ years. 

The benefits of the WIL LOKTM QUICKBUTTONTM angle grinder are many.

For example there is no more losing the specially configured tool that is needed to change the grinding/cutting discs as often happens with existing Stone Age technology angle grinders. 

Also there are no more jammed on discs sometimes taking two or more people and a lot of wasted down time to remove the discs on existing cave man style technology angle grinders. 

Simply press a button and the grinding/cutting disc is instantly removed.NO MORE FRUSTRATION. NO MORE LOST DOWN TIME

 The WIL LOKTM QUICKBUTTONTM angle grinder is much safer than existing 1950's technology angle grinders. When the operator of the WIL LOKTM QUICKBUTTONTM   angle grinder presses the lock/release button to change the disc not only is the disc instantly removed from the grinder(without the disc being handled by the operator) but the grinder transmission is also locked solid at the same time, so even if the operator accidentally switches the grinder on while handling the replacement disc(as often happens resulting in very serious injuries) the grinder drive shaft is prevented from rotating because the transmission is locked solid. No more lost fingers.

ENVIRONMENTAL ADVANTAGE

The WIL LOKTM QUICKBUTTONTM angle grinder has an ENVIRONMENTAL ADVANTAGE over existing old technology angle grinders. 

The WIL LOKTM cutting/grinding discs are manufactured with a metal centre which means that when the cutting/grinding discs are worn down to an unusable size the metal centres can be RECYCLED.

However  when existing old technology discs are worn down to an unusable size the NON RECYCLABLE worn down centres often end up in land fill.

When you consider the millions of cutting/grinding discs that are used every day around the world this ENVIRONMENTAL DISASTER can now be avoided by simply using the WIL LOKTM metal centre cutting/grinding discs.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Q: DOES THE WIL LOKTM QUICKBUTTONTM ANGLE GRINDER USE EXISTING OLD TECHNOLOGY CUTTING/GRINDING DISCS.

A: NO the WIL LOKTM QUICKBUTTONTM   angle grinder uses an improved easier to use safer environmentally friendly cutting/grinding disc


Q: WHERE ARE THE DISCS MADE?

A: The discs are made in Australia to a very tough Australian standard by a very reputable company known as FLEXOVIT (Saint Gobain).


Q: IS THE WIL LOKTM QUICKBUTTONTM ANGLE GRINDER SAFER THAN EXISTING OLD TECHNOLOGY GRINDERS?

A: YES the WIL LOKTM QUICKBUTTONTM angle grinder is much safer than existing grinders because removing the discs is done by simply pressing a button NO HANDLING OF THE DISCS. However when reattaching a new disc the QUICKBUTTONTM  lock release button must be pressed which means that the grinder transmission is locked solid before the disc is attached. So even if the operator accidentally switches the grinder on while reattaching the disc (as often happens resulting in horrific injuries) the grinder shaft  and the disc are prevented from rotating. No more lost fingers.


Q: CAN THE QUICKBUTTONTM LOCK/RELEASE BUTTON BE PRESSED DURING OPERATION?

A: NO Because of the unique design of the WIL LOKTM QUICKBUTTONTM   system it is impossible to press the lock/release button during operation.


Q: WILL I HAVE ANY TROUBLE GETTING WIL LOKTM CUTTING/GRINDING DISCS?

A: NO Not at all. Because we are going to be an online company we will be able to deliver products straight to your door as well as eventually selling our products through many stores.


Q: CAN I GET ANY OTHER DISCS BESIDES METAL CUTTING/GRINDING DISCS?

A: YES eventually. At this stage of the process we are only in our infancy so we decided to sell the most popular discs which are of course metal cutting/grinding discs. However, with your help on our  Indiegogo campaign we will be able to expand into other types of metal discs as well as masonry,wood and eventually many other types of discs in the near future.


Q: IS THE  WIL LOKTM QUICKBUTTONTM ANGLE GRINDER ONLY AVAILABLE AS A 5 INCH (125 millimetre)? 

A: YES At this stage of the process the WIL LOKTM QUICKBUTTONTM angle grinder will only be released as a 5 inch grinder (125 millimetre). However with the help of Indiegogo and of course you good people we will be able to release it in different sizes in the near future.

story:
The Mack was created in the spirit of modern design. Due to its size and quality you can always have it at hand and you can enjoy the best possible sound while listening to your music tracks.

Just connect it and you can immediately enjoy the Mack experience.


Why is it good to have a Mack?

While making it easier and quicker to use your gadgets, it retains all the benefits of wired technologies. A Bluetooth device needs to be paired with all your tech equipment, it requires its own energy source, and thus its usage time is limited. The Mack can be connected to any 3.5 mm jack plug and you will not experience any quality degradation while using the best headphones or earphones. The Mack’s signal transmission is perfect. A similar-quality Bluetooth device, while having its evident drawbacks, costs several times more than our solution. 

In addition to conventional earphones, the Mack is also compatible with headsets, allowing you to talk on the phone or skype, or chat with your team while playing an online game. 

When you use the Mack, it makes the jack input of your equipment splash and dustproof.

As seen in

Colors

The Mack is available in 6 colors and bears an engraved logo. You will get a key holder in matching color.

Available colors:

  • Brushed Metal
  • Orange
  • Natural Green
  • Tomato Red
  • Cobalt Blue
  • Ebony Black

Available colors


Design

The Mack employs a uniform, clear and modern design. The elegant (brushed) aluminum surface with the engraved logo immediately captures everyone’s attention, without being ostentatious. The primary design goals are the most ergonomic style and the smallest possible size. Your Mack comes with an elegant, specially tailored aluminum case, matching the same color, which can be inserted in a key holder. A wide range of colors is available, so you can match your choice to the color of your favorite headphones or earphones.

Compatibility – More than five trillion compatible devices.


How does the Mack make your life easier?

Bringing it as your key holder, it can be with you everywhere, so you can connect, plug and play it with any device at your fingertips. If you have more than one Mack unit, you can equip all your everyday devices with one, so that you can connect your favorite head- or earphones to any of your devices with a flick.

Always have your Mack with you

Perfect sound transmission

The Mack is not only universal and compatible with every type of equipment; it also offers the highest quality sound transmission.


With the force of a magnet

In the Mack, the benefits of magnetic technology are combined with the advantageous characteristics of the conventional jack connection. Have you ever got entangled in the cable of your earpiece or have you yanked the connector from its socket when getting up from your desk abruptly? When using a conventional converter, it often results in damaging one or both devices, and the jack plug.

The magnetic technology eliminates this potential damage and it offers a smooth connection/disconnection. Take your Mack with you everywhere and use it hassle free with any device without worrying about accidents, damage and injuries.

Parameters

Weight: 21 g

Height: 16 mm 

Diameter: 6 mm

Material: Brushed aluminum

Protection: splash and dustproof

Warranty: lifetime

Colors:

  • Brushed Metal
  • Orange
  • Natural Green
  • Tomato Red
  • Cobalt Blue
  • Ebony Black

An enormous amount of work was invested to create the Mack, which at the same time, was produced from quality materials carefully selected during thoughtful design and production. We are certain that you will fall in love with the Mack forever, and it can be your lifetime partner in your daily life.

That is why we offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee and a life-time warranty.

Connecting your earphones to your equipment was never so simple and comfortable.

Goals

We believe that our project makes every prospective Mack owner’s life easier and it provides them with an everyday experience that may be subtle but add up to joyful moments in their lives.

Perfect gift

Packaeges

Mack Videos





Team


Thank you for listening to the presentation of the Mack. We hope you like the product and that we have earned your trust. 

FAQ

Do I need to charge the Mack? 

No, of course not. The Mack has no battery, so you can use it anytime, forever. 

Is it compatible with my equipment and headphones?

The Mack is compatible with every earphone with a 3.5 mm jack plug and with every electronic device equipped with a 3.5 mm jack socket, be it a headphone or a headset with microphone.

Does the project have any risk?

No, it does not. The product is completed, fully developed and we can start its economical production and delivery as soon as the first goal is reached.

No. The prototype of the product is completed. As soon as we reach the first goal, the economic manufacturing and shipping of your Mack is guaranteed.

If I order the Mack today, when will I have it?

We start shipping the complete orders in 2016 January.

How is the Mack delivered?

We send the ordered items as a postal package to the address provided by you.

International shipping fee is USD 4.

I provided a wrong address. How can I change it?

Contact us via our website, and we will help you change your shipping address.


Thank you again for reading through the presentation of the Mack!

If you know someone who would be interested in the product, please help our work with a share.

story:
What is this device?

PASSalert is a device designed to aid a person in putting a fire out using any traditional fire extinguisher. 

  • Device prompts users in an emergency
  • Push button activates verbal cues
  • Simply attaches to any pre-existing fire extinguisher unit

Why do you need this device?

According to the National Fire Protection Association, In 2015 3280 people died is U.S. fires, another 15700 were injured, and fires caused 14.3 Billion in damage.

PASSalert can really help save lives lost in a fire. This device can help users remember how to properly extinguish a fire during a hectic situation where your mind may be racing and steps are skipped or forgot.

Fire Chief Endorses PASSalert

 

Visit the website

  • This device has been tested and found to aid people to more quickly extinguish a fire
  • Firefighter designed, tested, and approved.
  • Together we can help create a safer place

A DEVICE FOR ALL AGES

 

The Impact

Your contribution will help create more fire awareness and prevention and help to create a great product that honestly should be standard on all fire extinguishers everywhere. 

  • PASSalert is a smart move for any home or business, you will help spread the safety concerns all over the world
  • We know that this device will make people more safe and save lives lost in a fire.
  • By the time you read this far on our campaign, a person has dies from an uncontrolled fire.

Risks & Challenges

 

With the PASSalert device, the greatest risk is not spreading it to enough people. We hope one day PASSalert can be installed on every single fire extinguisher in the world to help save more lives.

  • We hope to avoid this risk by completing our funding goal. If we can earn more than our goal calls for we would love to give back by creating more of a serious fire awareness for people all over the world. If we can raise the money we can look into the development of PASSalert devices in every language around the world!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • If you can not donate we understand! Please do your part and share our campaign with your friends or family, anyone you are worried about needs to know that they can be more protected in their home or office in case of a fire.
  • Protect your home from fire. Create a plan with the family members so that in case of a fire everyone has a plan and escape route. If you have not checked your smoke alarm please do that right now. Also get a fire extinguisher in your home.

We thank you for taking an interest in our campaign, PASSalert is something that needs to be available to anyone who wants to be proactive against a fire emergency. Thank you for stopping by, www.passalert.org.

 

WHERE IS THE MONEY USED?

 

 



FIRE CHIEF STEVEN MCCAIN TALKS PASSALERT

story:
The Ground Power Unit features a glowing band of light, that changes its color depending on the power output from green, over yellow to red.

Whether in the comfort of your house, in the car or on the go. The GPU comes with all the necessary accessories to  get a satisfying experience that fits you. It can be powered from the supplied 12V wall adapter as well as the 12V port on any car. You may also chose to power it from a lithium battery with anywhere from 1S to 3S being supported. Experience power like nothing before with the Ground Power Unit.

You have the choice of three types of wood to match your MFLB: Maple, Walnut and Ebony.

Each unit is handmade with love and comes with a lifelong limited warranty.

story:
We love our pets and they love us! They do cute things, like sleeping next to our head, snuggling during TV time and comforting us when we're down.   But they also do things that drive us CRAZY!  

Jumping up to surf the kitchen counter or the dining table is often the thing that tests the limit of our patience.  But the so-called cures or treatments often leave us as the bad guys.  We’ve tried everything imaginable, yelling, aluminum foil, tape, special sprayers and shock pads. None of these work well nor do they leave us with a usable counter or table.   Also, none of us enjoy yelling at our pet all the time, and we really don't like the thought of them being shocked.  If we can't find a reliable automated solution, then being consistent with training is not going to happen because we can’t be home or vigilant all the time. 

That’s why three geeky animal lovers are trying to stop being the bad guys and provide a REAL solution for our loved ones, and admittedly, ourselves.

Join us on the product development journey.

Our goal is to make sure that CatNani operates smoothly, reliably, and consistently.  As designers and developers, we know the more difficult issues will be in getting the logic perfect. 

We need to finalize our design so we can go to production and supply the world with this great product.  The funds raised will help us workout the few remaining technical hurdles, update the software, and get the design into a production ready configuration.

So, while this isn’t building a rocket, we could get it done if it was.  Ted has multiple technology and medical device patents and experience delivering wildly successful products to market. (have you heard of the Beerbelly?) Alex is a super genius, artificial intelligence software programmer. And Greg is a nuclear engineer with lots of hi-tech experience. 

As one of our supporters you will receive great perks, including our final product once we've reached production.

Basic Features

 

You can do more than just back us.....

We are thrilled if you decide to back us!  If you think this is a great product there's more you can do to help:

  • Share our story here on Indiegogo
  • Like us on Facebook and share our story on other networking sites.
  • Tell folks about us and what we're trying to do.
  • Warn your pet that you'll buy one as soon as it's available!

 

Package items

 

Here is the team

Greg & Bubby

 

I was an animal lover from a very early age and have lived with both cats and/or dogs most of his life.  I recently found nirvana with Bubby, a very large cat with species identity issues…he thinks he’s a dog…seriously. 

In my professional life I have over 20 yrs executive experience, leading small, medium and large technology organizations in startups to Fortune 500’s.  With a career spanning Technology and Energy sectors, founding BluLint and CatNani is especially exciting and allows me to serve my love of animals with technology that promotes healthy relationships with us humans.....'cause you know how we can be.

Ted & Butterscotch

Growing up with pets and having 2 now, they have always been a big part of my life.  I am so excited to be building my first pet invention!  Before founding BluLint, I was designing products for a variety of companies from prefabricated buildings to electronic devices and have over 12 patents to my name.

​I led and managed the design group that engineered, manufactured, and delivered the interior modular containment system for a Facebook datacenter. Previously, I designed RFID credit card readers frequently seen at fast food restaurants, movie theaters, and retail environments. I began my career designing and developed medical products including a visual inspection device, a novel contraceptive diaphragm, and a needle-less hypodermic jet injector.

On the lighter side, I was the president of Under Development, Inc, where I created the world-famous product The Beerbelly™ and Winerack™, featured on CNN, the TODAY show, Jay Leno and many mainstream magazines including Playboy, FHM and Maxim.

Alex & Francie

I am Research Scientist pushing the state of the art in home interior visualization.  My research combines computer graphics, computer vision, and computational imaging to create usable systems that allow people to better understand, edit, and visualize their data.  

​I also collaborate with the UW Graphics and Imaging Laboratory (GRAIL) and the Facial Expression Research Group (FERG) where we combine artistic insight and deep learning techniques to better understand facial expressions and create amazing tools for artists. 

​Previously I was a Research Scientist at Amazon.com, LLC. I worked on product imaging systems and augmented reality systems that enabled people to more effectively interact with and explore their environment using a combination of RGB-D sensors, projectors, and displays.  My Ph.D. work focused on interactive image-based modeling systems for architectural structures.  I spent 10 years at Microsoft Research working on a variety of projects ranging from creating a platform for building virtual worlds to implementing microphone arrays.
story_txt:
We love our pets and they love us! They do cute things, like sleeping next to our head, snuggling during TV time and comforting us when we're down.   But they also do things that drive us CRAZY!  
Jumping up to surf the kitchen counter or the dining table is often the thing that tests the limit of our patience.  But the so-called cures or treatments often leave us as the bad guys.  We’ve tried everything imaginable, yelling, aluminum foil, tape, special sprayers and shock pads. None of these work well nor do they leave us with a usable counter or table.   Also, none of us enjoy yelling at our pet all the time, and we really don't like the thought of them being shocked.  If we can't find a reliable automated solution, then being consistent with training is not going to happen because we can’t be home or vigilant all the time. 
That’s why three geeky animal lovers are trying to stop being the bad guys and provide a REAL solution for our loved ones, and admittedly, ourselves.


Join us on the product development journey.
Our goal is to make sure that CatNani operates smoothly, reliably, and consistently.  As designers and developers, we know the more difficult issues will be in getting the logic perfect. 
We need to finalize our design so we can go to production and supply the world with this great product.  The funds raised will help us workout the few remaining technical hurdles, update the software, and get the design into a production ready configuration.
So, while this isn’t building a rocket, we could get it done if it was.  Ted has multiple technology and medical device patents and experience delivering wildly successful products to market. (have you heard of the Beerbelly?) Alex is a super genius, artificial intelligence software programmer. And Greg is a nuclear engineer with lots of hi-tech experience. 
As one of our supporters you will receive great perks, including our final product once we've reached production.
Basic Features

 

You can do more than just back us.....
We are thrilled if you decide to back us!  If you think this is a great product there's more you can do to help:

Share our story here on Indiegogo
Like us on Facebook and share our story on other networking sites.
Tell folks about us and what we're trying to do.
Warn your pet that you'll buy one as soon as it's available!

 
Package items

Greg & Bubby

Previously, I designed RFID credit card readers frequently seen at fast food restaurants, movie theaters, and retail environments. I began my career designing and developed medical products including a visual inspection device, a novel contraceptive diaphragm, and a needle-less hypodermic jet injector.
On the lighter side, I was the president of Under Development, Inc, where I created the world-famous product The Beerbelly™ and Winerack™, featured on CNN, the TODAY show, Jay Leno and many mainstream magazines including Playboy, FHM and Maxim.

I am Research Scientist pushing the state of the art in home interior visualization.  My research combines computer graphics, computer vision, and computational imaging to create usable systems that allow people to better understand, edit, and visualize their data.  
​I also collaborate with the UW Graphics and Imaging Laboratory (GRAIL) and the Facial Expression Research Group (FERG) where we combine artistic insight and deep learning techniques to better understand facial expressions and create amazing tools for artists. 
​Previously I was a Research Scientist at Amazon.com, LLC. I worked on product imaging systems and augmented reality systems that enabled people to more effectively interact with and explore their environment using a combination of RGB-D sensors, projectors, and displays.  My Ph.D. work focused on interactive image-based modeling systems for architectural structures.  I spent 10 years at Microsoft Research working on a variety of projects ranging from creating a platform for building virtual worlds to implementing microphone arrays.

story:
UPDATE: In the future,

EpiShell will be called MedShell.  

 

After my son almost died from a severe allergic reaction, I became determined to keep epinephrine with my son wherever he goes. 


I just can't bear the thought of epinephrine not being there to save him when he has another allergic reaction.  The problem is that EpiPen Auto-Injectors need to be stored at about room temperature ("68° to 77° F" according to the manufacturer*). My son regularly goes outside (e.g., to the park, swimming, hiking, skiing). The outdoors are typically not room temperature. 

How could I follow the doctor's advice to make sure my son always has EpiPen Auto-Injectors and follow the manufacturer's advice to keep his EpiPen Auto-Injectors at about room temperature?

 

I recruited the technical help of my husband, who happens to be a Stanford-educated engineer who has invented other products you might have used before.  (Hint – You can buy some of his inventions in the Apple Store.)  

Together, we committed to create a product that would protect EpiPen Auto-Injectors from hot and cold temperatures. We are driven by the goal of saving lives by enabling people to take their EpiPen Auto-Injectors wherever they go, even if it’s hot or cold outside. 

After three years of work, we have patented the invention, successfully tested prototypes, and are on the brink of starting mass production.  We need your help to collect enough pre-orders to make mass production possible. 

Thanks in advance,

Sandy Wengreen, Inventor & Founder, EpiShell, Inc.

If you know someone with an EpiPen Auto-Injector, please use the Indiegogo share buttons (by the "back it" button above).  Thank you!

 

EpiShell is not just an insulated container. 


The heart of EpiShell is the patented EpiHeat System. This system releases heat when it’s cold outside and absorbs heat when it’s hot outside. It doesn’t use any batteries. Instead, it uses advanced EpiCells that “reset” to room temperature when indoors and then release or absorb heat as necessary when outdoors.  

 

Our patents explain the science behind EpiShell:

https://patents.google.com/patent/US9151531B2 

 

But, yes ... It includes a pretty amazing insulated container.

  • Deluxe Stainless Steel - Provides extreme durability ... Don't worry about accidental drops
     
  • Ultra-Vacuum Insulation - Blocks sweltering summer temperatures and chilly winter temperatures
     
  • Unique Lid - Thermally speaking, lids are typically the Achilles' heel of vacuum flasks, so we focused on making an exceptional lid to protect your EpiPen Auto-Injectors
 

Two versions

Regular EpiShell protects one EpiPen Auto-Injector (and also fits the carrier tube that comes with the EpiPen).  

Double EpiShell protects two EpiPen Auto-Injector​s (and carrier tubes).

 

Why we need your help

 
  • Custom manufacturing equipment is the last thing we need to start mass production.  We need to collect enough pre-orders to fund the purchase of this equipment.  
     
  • Many people do not know about EpiPen storage temperature requirements. Please help spread the word about the temperature requirements by using the Indiegogo share buttons (by the "back it" button above).

 

What you get

 

You'll get the satisfaction of knowing that children will be saved thanks to having their EpiPen Auto-Injectors with them outdoors, regardless of whether they are at the park, at the beach, camping, or otherwise enjoying the outdoors.

If you contribute enough (per the perks), we will happily send you an EpiShell so you can take your EpiPen Auto-Injector wherever you go, even if it's hot or cold outside. 

 

The impact

 

 

We sincerely believe that, every once in awhile, we all have an opportunity to make a positive impact. This opportunity to save lives by enabling people to have their EpiPen Auto-Injector with them outdoors when they have a severe allergic reaction is too important to let pass by. Over the last three years, we have made huge strides, but now, we need your help to run the last mile in this journey.

EpiPen Auto-Injectors are proven to be capable of saving the lives of people experiencing a severe allergic reaction. But, an EpiPen Auto-Injector left at home when a child suffers a severe allergic reaction cannot help.  EpiShell will allow children to always have an EpiPen Auto-Injector with them.

 

Risks & challenges

  • Custom manufacturing equipment - Developing the custom manufacturing equipment may take longer than anticipated. We will work to expedite this process. Luckily, we have many years of experience developing products, so we are well-suited to overcoming any potential challenges.
     
  • EpiCell technology - EpiCells are the heart of EpiShell.  Optimizing the EpiCells for mass production and cost reduction may take longer than anticipated.  We have already successfully tested EpiCell samples, so we are very confident in them, but there may be a few bumps in the road to mass production.
     
  • Future price - We have listed MSRPs, but the actual retail prices could be higher (if costs are higher than expected) or lower (if costs are lower than expected).  You can lock in your price by pre-ordering as an Indiegogo backer.    

 

Other ways you can help


We imagine our primary supporters will be people with a loved one who has an EpiPen Auto-Injector. Even if you don't know someone with an EpiPen Auto-Injector, please consider helping in other ways:

  • Please help spread the word regarding EpiShell's mission to enable people to take their EpiPen Auto-Injectors outdoors
     
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools

 

THANK YOU!!!

Please note that we are not affiliated with Mylan, the EpiPen manufacturer, in any way.

 

Frequently asked questions

 

Is the product called MedShell or EpiShell?

In response to feedback from several parties, we realized that our technology is applicable to many medicines, not just epinephrine.  To reflect this broader long-term vision, we are changing our name from EpiShell to MedShell.

Does EpiShell hold two EpiPen Auto-Injectors?

In response to feedback and insights from backers, we recently introduced Double EpiShell, which holds two EpiPen Auto-Injectors.  (The regular EpiShell holds one EpiPen Auto-Injector.)

Will EpiShell be available in multiple colors?

We hope so!  If we get enough backers, we will be able to make multiple colors.  Do you have any color preferences?

Why do people need an EpiPen Auto-Injector?

A life-threatening allergic reaction needs to be treated immediately.  These allergic reactions are often called anaphylaxis or anaphylatic shock.  If not treated right away by epinephrine and then in the emergency room, anaphylaxis can cause death.  EpiPen is an epinephrine "Auto-Injector" and is commonly prescribed as first aid for anaphylatic reactions. 

What causes anaphylaxis?

Common anaphylatic causes include food allergies (e.g., peanuts; tree nuts such as walnuts, hazelnuts, cashews, pistachios, macadamias, pine nuts, and almonds; fish; and shellfish), insect sting allergies (e.g., bees, wasps, yellow jackets, hornets, and other insects), medication allergies (e.g., penicillin, muscle relaxants, and NSAIDs such as aspirin and ibuprofen), and latex allergies.  Please see a doctor regarding your allergies.

 
 
This campaign is from MedShell Inc. (previously known as EpiShell Inc.)  EpiShell can help shield your EpiPen Auto-Injector from hot and cold outdoor temperatures, but the internal temperature of EpiShell may deviate from room temperature depending on the harshness of the outdoor temperature and the amount of time EpiShell is located in the harsh temperature.  
 
*EpiPen is a trademark of Mylan Inc.  MedShell Inc. is not affiliated with Mylan Inc.  According to the EpiPen packaging, EpiPen Auto-Injectors should be stored at 68° to 77° F; excursions permitted from 59° to 86° F.  EpiShell Inc. does not make any claims regarding the adequacy or sufficiency of the EpiPen storage and excursion temperatures.  One EpiPen Auto-Injector and the carrier tube (that comes with the EpiPen Auto-Injector) fit inside EpiShell.  For more information regarding EpiPen storage and excursion temperatures, please see the EpiPen packaging and https://www.epipen.com/en/hcp/about-epipen/safe...

story:
Why we did this 

Most of us live very stressful lives and often find our professional world interfering with our private life. Over the years I have taken steps to try to break the stress cycle; first it was putting together a standing desk to minimize the damage to my body from sitting most of the day, then it was putting time aside every day to prepare meals and be active. All of these changes have a common theme: I was making sure to take time for myself. This isn't always easy as Dave, Vince, Bob, and I often find ourselves working 80+ hour weeks on top of taking care of our families and loved ones. We hope the ZenScape can serve as a reminder to take some much needed time for yourself. 

Have you ever:
Forgotten to eat due to work?
Put off going to the gym because you were finishing a project?
Struggled with chronic colds that you just couldn't shake?
Neglected relationships?
Had trouble breaking through a problem or mental block?

The ZenScape can help break the cycle! 

It's a difficult pill to swallow but WE are often the major cause for these problems. We are all guilty of wasting valuable time surfing the internet, playing with our phones, or going in mental circles due to frustration. Taking a few moments to yourself helps you to refocus, take a look at a problem in a different way, or even just de-stress enough to handle difficult challenges. We hope to help everyone find a sense of calm and remind themselves that taking time for YOU is not only important, but can keep you on track to finish your challenges and free up time to spend doing the things you love. 

Working on artwork has always been a soothing creative outlet for all of us on the project, combining technical expertise with creative artistic methods helps us to take a few moments to ourselves and beautify our lives in the process. We hope that you will enjoy bringing our art and light into your everyday life so that we can all breathe a little more, stress a lot less, and work together towards a better future. 

What We Need

  • Referrals! Scroll down to the Referral section to find out more!
  • We need to purchase material for our first run of this product and to produce tooling / fixtures to machine and assemble the finished product. We already own or have direct access to the manufacturing equipment we need, now it's just a matter of materials.
  • Vendors - we are looking for anyone interested in selling this product at events or in a retail setting. Vendors will allow us to reach a wider audience and create a greater variety of artwork.
  • Artists - We will be holding quarterly competitions for new projection plates. Winning artists will be given a cash prize, royalty, and their designs will be available for sale.  

What You Get:

  • One ZenScape of your choice: Choose the color for your mirror, the engraved pattern (Including custom patterns), and your cord color. 
    • Bluetooth LE compatible - can connect up to 4 ZenScapes and 1 Smartphone
      • Update your ZenScape firmware through the mobile app, easily add modes and features as they become available, or change settings/Color Palettes to customize your ZenScape. Every ZenScape comes with free lifetime firmware updates so as we come up with new features you can update your ZenScape. 
    • Internal Lithium Battery - Charged via USB the battery will give you up to 8Hrs of continuous run-time on max settings and up to 7 days in eco mode. 
    • Multiple Power options - Plug the ZenScape into any USB port or the included wall adapter to charge the batteries. The ZenScape can run off of the wall-adapter indefinitely for a permanent installation. You can use your portal while it's charging. 
    • On-board Buttons- Change colors, brightness, and modes using the included buttons; Mobile app is not required for use. 

  • Mounting Hardware - We provide a way for you to wall mount your ZenScape. If you've ever hung a picture or clock on your wall you can handle this!
  • Wall Adapter - We will provide you with the appropriate wall adapter for your country of origin. Some orders will be shipped with a universal adapter if a wall adapter is not available for your specific country. 
  • USB Cord - A durable high quality 10' [3m] USB-Micro cable with high strength nylon braiding included. Available in 3 colors [Black, White, Gold] to match your environment. 

You can choose from 3 different ZenScape sizes [12 Inch, 18 Inch, 24Inch] Shown below:

Modes

Every ZenScape comes with free lifetime firmware updates meaning as we launch new features, add modes, and fix bugs you will always be up-to-date. Right now each ZenScape comes equipped out of the box with 12 modes including 4 different breathing exercises. Example modes can be found in the campaign Gallery!

Stretch Goals:

If we reach $25,000 in funding we will launch with the additional modes below 

Music Visualizer -Turn your ZenScape into a music equalizer and watch the LEDs come alive to your favorite beats. You have full control over the color and behavior of the EQ, or set it into a random color mode to watch it truly come alive. 

Lightning - Randomized streaks of light create a lightning like effect that transitions across the ZenScape. Combined with the sound sensor this mode is a great way to add ambiance to music or a thunderstorm. Select from multiple color palettes ranging from natural white, blue, or even rainbow lightning; use the mobile application to create your own custom color pallet. 

FireFlies - Watch as random pixels illuminate around the ZenScape to simulate fireflies. This mode is great to use as a night-light slowly lulling you to sleep with the soothing gentle glow of simulated fireflies. The real fireflies will thank you!

If we reach $45,000 in funding we will finish the mobile app to control your ZenScape:

Risks & Challenges

With deep roots in manufacturing and engineering we are ready to kick off production at the conclusion of the campaign. Having built multiple high-tech product lines in the past has equipped us with the skills, network, and tools to get this product built quickly while maintaining a high level of quality. 

  • In addition to working out of Tech Shop we already own a CNC router for manufacturing the wooden bodies of each ZenScape. With multiple machines at our disposal we will be able to produce product with minimal service interruptions. We have also received quotes from local woodworking supply shops for high quality sustainably sourced wood at the volume we need to support this campaign. 
  • We will be manufacturing the Acrylic top display plates using Universal Laser brand CNC machinery. These are high quality machines and their reliability means we will have minimal machine down-time. Universal Laser is also located 20 miles to our North meaning any replacement parts or support is a short drive away. 
  • All Components are sourced through a proven supply chain stemming over 10 years in development. PCB's are built and assembled in San Francisco, California or in Tempe, Arizona from proven and trusted suppliers. Plastic is sourced from Houston, Texas where it is manufactured. Machining and Laser cutting will be done in our home town of Chandler, Arizona. 
  • All final assembly and shipping logistics will be performed at EpiHab in Phoenix, Arizona, a non-profit group providing meaningful employment for individuals with Epilepsy or other challenges. We are committed to providing high quality US jobs and supporting individuals with specific challenges or life requirements. 

Other Ways You Can Help

1. Spread the word! Help us share this message on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, or any other social media you enjoy. If you know of a store or venue that would love our artwork feel free to refer us to them. 

2. Join our Artist network - We plan to hold Quarterly competitions for artists to design new projection plates or supporting artwork. The winning artists will receive a cash prize, royalties, and their designs will be available for sale. Send your contact information to Artists@mindfield.xyz to get added to the list for our first competition. 

3. Join our mailing list! Even if this product isn't your speed there are many more coming from MindField in 2017 in multiple product verticals and we appreciate your continued excitement. 

4. Take a deep breath, or at least a few minutes to yourself today!

Referral Program: (Get a FREE Zenscape!)

This program is available only to backers of this project. We will credit your account $10 for every referral that backs our project ($5, $10, $20 charity tiers not included). When their contributions equal the cost of the ZenScape you backed you will get your ZenScape for free! (Limit 1 free ZenScape per account) Here is how it works:

1. Makes sure you are LOGGED IN to your Indiegogo Account
2. Use the Indiegogo "Share" tools on our campaign to share a link on Social Media. 
3. At the end of the campaign we will tally up referrals and notify you!
4. You can keep track of your referral status through your Indiegogo profile during the campaign! (Referrals can take up to 24 hours to show in your dashboard) 

FAQ:

  • Will Software be Open or Closed Source? 
    • We plan to release the Source Code as Open-source to encourage integration of our product as a multi-media accessory for a wide array of applications. The code will be released on GitHub as soon as the product begins shipping. 
  • How do I choose the engraved pattern and color options?
    • ​A Survey will be sent to all backers at the completion of the Indiegogo for you to pick out your options. You will be able to pick your color of the mirror, the engraved pattern, and the color of the charging cable. Optional upgrades to the product will also be chosen through the Survey. 
  • How is the mirrored plate held on?
    • ​Since the top plate is held on with magnets you can swap it for another plate at any time. As we come out with new plate designs you can order them separately so your ZenScape can keep up with your style
  • I want a custom pattern engraved on my ZenScape, what are my options?
    • ​ At the conclusion of the campaign we will be sending out a survey with all of the available options. If you select the "Custom" option we will need you to send us a logo or image file for us to create the artwork from. 
  • What If I want more than 1 mirrored plate for my ZenScape?
    • When you receive the survey after completion of the campaign you will be able to select your primary mirror (included in the cost) and additional designs as you desire (There is an additional fee for extra mirrors). 
  • What if I want to become a retail partner?
    • ​Please reach out to us at: Contact@MindField.xyz 
  • I have more Questions!
    • Submit a comment or question to Contact@MindField.xyz and we will post the answers here!

Disclaimer: The ZenScape is currently in the prototyping phase. Many of the pictures used in this campaign are of the prototype or are renderings of the finished product. Variation in cosmetic finish of the final product are possible due to material availability and manufacturing limitations.
story_txt:
Why we did this 
Most of us live very stressful lives and often find our professional world interfering with our private life. Over the years I have taken steps to try to break the stress cycle; first it was putting together a standing desk to minimize the damage to my body from sitting most of the day, then it was putting time aside every day to prepare meals and be active. All of these changes have a common theme: I was making sure to take time for myself. This isn't always easy as Dave, Vince, Bob, and I often find ourselves working 80+ hour weeks on top of taking care of our families and loved ones. We hope the ZenScape can serve as a reminder to take some much needed time for yourself. 
Have you ever:Forgotten to eat due to work?Put off going to the gym because you were finishing a project?Struggled with chronic colds that you just couldn't shake?Neglected relationships?Had trouble breaking through a problem or mental block?
The ZenScape can help break the cycle! 
It's a difficult pill to swallow but WE are often the major cause for these problems. We are all guilty of wasting valuable time surfing the internet, playing with our phones, or going in mental circles due to frustration. Taking a few moments to yourself helps you to refocus, take a look at a problem in a different way, or even just de-stress enough to handle difficult challenges. We hope to help everyone find a sense of calm and remind themselves that taking time for YOU is not only important, but can keep you on track to finish your challenges and free up time to spend doing the things you love. 

Working on artwork has always been a soothing creative outlet for all of us on the project, combining technical expertise with creative artistic methods helps us to take a few moments to ourselves and beautify our lives in the process. We hope that you will enjoy bringing our art and light into your everyday life so that we can all breathe a little more, stress a lot less, and work together towards a better future. 

What We Need


Referrals! Scroll down to the Referral section to find out more!
We need to purchase material for our first run of this product and to produce tooling / fixtures to machine and assemble the finished product. We already own or have direct access to the manufacturing equipment we need, now it's just a matter of materials.

Vendors - we are looking for anyone interested in selling this product at events or in a retail setting. Vendors will allow us to reach a wider audience and create a greater variety of artwork.

Artists - We will be holding quarterly competitions for new projection plates. Winning artists will be given a cash prize, royalty, and their designs will be available for sale.  

What You Get:

One ZenScape of your choice: Choose the color for your mirror, the engraved pattern (Including custom patterns), and your cord color. 
Bluetooth LE compatible - can connect up to 4 ZenScapes and 1 SmartphoneUpdate your ZenScape firmware through the mobile app, easily add modes and features as they become available, or change settings/Color Palettes to customize your ZenScape. Every ZenScape comes with free lifetime firmware updates so as we come up with new features you can update your ZenScape. 

Internal Lithium Battery - Charged via USB the battery will give you up to 8Hrs of continuous run-time on max settings and up to 7 days in eco mode. 
Multiple Power options - Plug the ZenScape into any USB port or the included wall adapter to charge the batteries. The ZenScape can run off of the wall-adapter indefinitely for a permanent installation. You can use your portal while it's charging. 
On-board Buttons- Change colors, brightness, and modes using the included buttons; Mobile app is not required for use. 




Mounting Hardware - We provide a way for you to wall mount your ZenScape. If you've ever hung a picture or clock on your wall you can handle this!
Wall Adapter - We will provide you with the appropriate wall adapter for your country of origin. Some orders will be shipped with a universal adapter if a wall adapter is not available for your specific country. 
USB Cord - A durable high quality 10' [3m] USB-Micro cable with high strength nylon braiding included. Available in 3 colors [Black, White, Gold] to match your environment. 

You can choose from 3 different ZenScape sizes [12 Inch, 18 Inch, 24Inch] Shown below:



Modes
Every ZenScape comes with free lifetime firmware updates meaning as we launch new features, add modes, and fix bugs you will always be up-to-date. Right now each ZenScape comes equipped out of the box with 12 modes including 4 different breathing exercises. Example modes can be found in the campaign Gallery!
Stretch Goals:
If we reach $25,000 in funding we will launch with the additional modes below 
Music Visualizer -Turn your ZenScape into a music equalizer and watch the LEDs come alive to your favorite beats. You have full control over the color and behavior of the EQ, or set it into a random color mode to watch it truly come alive. 

Lightning - Randomized streaks of light create a lightning like effect that transitions across the ZenScape. Combined with the sound sensor this mode is a great way to add ambiance to music or a thunderstorm. Select from multiple color palettes ranging from natural white, blue, or even rainbow lightning; use the mobile application to create your own custom color pallet. 
FireFlies - Watch as random pixels illuminate around the ZenScape to simulate fireflies. This mode is great to use as a night-light slowly lulling you to sleep with the soothing gentle glow of simulated fireflies. The real fireflies will thank you!
If we reach $45,000 in funding we will finish the mobile app to control your ZenScape:


Risks & Challenges
With deep roots in manufacturing and engineering we are ready to kick off production at the conclusion of the campaign. Having built multiple high-tech product lines in the past has equipped us with the skills, network, and tools to get this product built quickly while maintaining a high level of quality. 

In addition to working out of Tech Shop we already own a CNC router for manufacturing the wooden bodies of each ZenScape. With multiple machines at our disposal we will be able to produce product with minimal service interruptions. We have also received quotes from local woodworking supply shops for high quality sustainably sourced wood at the volume we need to support this campaign. 
We will be manufacturing the Acrylic top display plates using Universal Laser brand CNC machinery. These are high quality machines and their reliability means we will have minimal machine down-time. Universal Laser is also located 20 miles to our North meaning any replacement parts or support is a short drive away. 
All Components are sourced through a proven supply chain stemming over 10 years in development. PCB's are built and assembled in San Francisco, California or in Tempe, Arizona from proven and trusted suppliers. Plastic is sourced from Houston, Texas where it is manufactured. Machining and Laser cutting will be done in our home town of Chandler, Arizona. 
All final assembly and shipping logistics will be performed at EpiHab in Phoenix, Arizona, a non-profit group providing meaningful employment for individuals with Epilepsy or other challenges. We are committed to providing high quality US jobs and supporting individuals with specific challenges or life requirements. 


Other Ways You Can Help
1. Spread the word! Help us share this message on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, or any other social media you enjoy. If you know of a store or venue that would love our artwork feel free to refer us to them. 
2. Join our Artist network - We plan to hold Quarterly competitions for artists to design new projection plates or supporting artwork. The winning artists will receive a cash prize, royalties, and their designs will be available for sale. Send your contact information to Artists@mindfield.xyz to get added to the list for our first competition. 
3. Join our mailing list! Even if this product isn't your speed there are many more coming from MindField in 2017 in multiple product verticals and we appreciate your continued excitement. 
4. Take a deep breath, or at least a few minutes to yourself today!
Referral Program: (Get a FREE Zenscape!)
This program is available only to backers of this project. We will credit your account $10 for every referral that backs our project ($5, $10, $20 charity tiers not included). When their contributions equal the cost of the ZenScape you backed you will get your ZenScape for free! (Limit 1 free ZenScape per account) Here is how it works:
1. Makes sure you are LOGGED IN to your Indiegogo Account2. Use the Indiegogo "Share" tools on our campaign to share a link on Social Media. 3. At the end of the campaign we will tally up referrals and notify you!4. You can keep track of your referral status through your Indiegogo profile during the campaign! (Referrals can take up to 24 hours to show in your dashboard) 
FAQ:


Will Software be Open or Closed Source? We plan to release the Source Code as Open-source to encourage integration of our product as a multi-media accessory for a wide array of applications. The code will be released on GitHub as soon as the product begins shipping. 


How do I choose the engraved pattern and color options?
​A Survey will be sent to all backers at the completion of the Indiegogo for you to pick out your options. You will be able to pick your color of the mirror, the engraved pattern, and the color of the charging cable. Optional upgrades to the product will also be chosen through the Survey. 


How is the mirrored plate held on?

​Since the top plate is held on with magnets you can swap it for another plate at any time. As we come out with new plate designs you can order them separately so your ZenScape can keep up with your style




I want a custom pattern engraved on my ZenScape, what are my options?
​ At the conclusion of the campaign we will be sending out a survey with all of the available options. If you select the "Custom" option we will need you to send us a logo or image file for us to create the artwork from. 


What If I want more than 1 mirrored plate for my ZenScape?When you receive the survey after completion of the campaign you will be able to select your primary mirror (included in the cost) and additional designs as you desire (There is an additional fee for extra mirrors). 


What if I want to become a retail partner?
​Please reach out to us at: Contact@MindField.xyz 


I have more Questions!Submit a comment or question to Contact@MindField.xyz and we will post the answers here!

story:
OUR CAMPAIGN HAS ENDED!

Thank you to everyone who contributed.  Together, we have raised ALMOST 100% of our goal (not all contributions are reflected in our Indiegogo total). Thank you for the outpouring of support and generosity.
If you would still like to contribute and help us EXCEED our total, please email: syriatoguelph@gmail.com
or visit us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/syriatoguelph/

----
"WHAT CAN I DO?"

Like many Canadians, we have been saddened, horrified, and frustrated by the stories and images emerging from Syria and Europe. 

Saddened because of the devastation to the lives of millions of men, women and children, horrified by the risks people must take to protect their families, and frustrated because our country is not doing enough. 

Many of us are asking, “What can I do?”

Our group of Guelph residents and families have come together because we want to help the refugee crisis in a tangible way.

Together we have the combined knowledge and commitment to sponsor a refugee family to live in Guelph. We are regular Canadians with regular jobs, and most of us are raising families.

We know that alone we can’t make much of a difference, but together, and with the help of our surrounding community, we can change some lives for the better. 


OUR GOAL

Our goal is to help a refugee family successfully resettle in Guelph, Ontario.

Our monetary goal is to raise $32,000. This will provide:

- Shelter: a warm place for this family to call home for a year

- Food: nourishment for this family

- Clothing: Canadian winters are frigid, summers are sweltering and appropriate clothing is crucial

In addition to providing financial assistance, as a group we are committed to responding to the family’s needs and providing assistance with activities such as meeting the family upon arrival, arranging housing for the family, arranging transportation to appointments and activities, providing orientation, providing assistance in finding employment.

We are committed to offering support to the family in a way that is directed by them and respects their autonomy.


HOW TO DONATE

There are two ways to donate:

1)   Click the “Contribute Now” button on your right to pay by Credit Card.

2)   Email SyriatoGuelph@gmail.com to set up an alternative (cash, cheque, Interac e-Transfer, etc.).  This method can circumvent  admin costs (~8%).


CONTRIBUTION GUIDE

The list below (and to your right) is strictly a guide for donations and the estimated associated costs of settling a refugee family. 
*These are not perks that you will receive.*

$5 - Thank you! We appreciate EVERY contribution towards this campaign.

$50 - Toasty toes. Winter boots for one person.

$100 - Full tummy. Feed a family of four for one week.

$200 - Book worm. School start-up costs for a child (pencils, backpack, lunchbox, new outfit, indoor shoes).

$500 - Dress to Impress. Provide clothing for one person for one year.

$1,000 - Home Sweet Home.  One month's rent.

$5,000 - Independence. Thank you: above and beyond generous.

*PLEASE NOTE – THIS CONTRIBUTION GUIDE IS FOR REFERENCE ONLY BASED ON THE SPONSORSHIP APPLICATION COST GUIDELINES PROVIDED BY CIC; AVAILABLE HERE*


CONTRIBUTIONS

Incoming refugee families often arrive with very little and yet have very practical requirements.  This campaign is focused on raising the required funds to provide a home and necessities to a refugee family for one year. 

We are asking you to give generously and provide not just financial support for the family who will call Guelph their home, but to join us and be part of a community that will embrace that family when they arrive.

We are relying on your good will and trust our group to administer these funds in good faith.

What happens with the raised funds?


The estimated total annual settlement cost for a family of four is $27,000 ($20,000 income support plus $7,000 start-up costs).


FAQs

Do you have the skill and expertise to resettle a refugee family?

We are lucky to have a wide range of skills in our group. We have two Social Workers, including one that specialized in supporting children that have experienced trauma. One of our members is a former Settlement Worker and Director of a local Settlement Agency and supported many refugee families in their transition to Canadian society. Another one of our group members is an informed refugee advocate and another is the Manager of our Local Immigration Partnership. Our whole group has become educated and informed about the realities of refugee resettlement and is committed to the journey that lies ahead. 

When will the refugee family arrive in Guelph?

We plan to submit our application to Citizenship and Immigration Canada in 2015. The exact length of time that it will take for the family to arrive in Guelph depends on things like how the Syrian refugee crisis unfolds, and how much of a priority the Canadian government puts on processing applications.

For a helpful resource, visit this Globe and Mail story.

If I contribute to this campaign, will I receive updates about the progress of the sponsored family once they arrive?  Will I see photos of them and know their names?

Once the family arrives in Guelph, we will ask them if they feel comfortable sharing their story, but will respect their privacy if they prefer not to share it. Some refugees feel uncertain, and even scared, of their new surroundings, and it can take time for them to trust their new community. However we will gladly keep any contributors updated of our application process until the refugee family arrives.

What sponsorship program are you going to use?

There are a number of ways that private sponsorships can occur. We are exploring a relationship with a local Sponsorship Agreement Holder (SAH) organization who may be able to help expedite the application process.  For a full guidance document on sponsorship, visit this CIC page.

What happens to the funds if the campaign does not reach its goal?

If our campaign does not reach our goal, we will plan to sponsor a fewer number of refugees (for example 2 instead of 4). If that is also not possible, we plan to donate any funds raised to a registered charity that is resettling refugees from Syria.

What happens if the“Syria to Guelph” campaign exceeds its goal?

Any and all funds collected through this campaign will be managed in good faith by the Syria to Guelph sponsorship group to support the application and settlement of a Syrian refugee family in the Guelph community. If we raise enough to sponsor additional refugees (such as a larger family or an additional family), we will do so.

I want to donate furniture/clothing/school supplies. How can I do this?

Thank you! This is incredibly helpful for the sponsorship application. Please send an email to SyriatoGuelph@gmail.com with the item(s) you would like to donate. These items will be added to the “in kind donation”total on our sponsorship application.  We will coordinate a pick-up/drop-off date and location once it is determined what types of donations are needed.

Is my contribution tax deductable?

No. The Syria to Guelph sponsorship group is not able to provide tax receipts for your contributions.

If you have any additional questions, please email: SyriatoGuelph@gmail.com.
