story:
We are an exclusively 100%  Eucalyptus TENCEL™  UK Bedding Company that seeks to change the way people sleep by making bedding for all seasons, that is, eco-friendly, skin-friendly, and extremely comfortable.

Our products are manufactured through a lyocell process. This clearly shows that our products are 100% eco-friendly. The fibers are certified as compostable and biodegradable, and thus can fully revert to nature.

At GreenSecrets, we are driven by a strong passion to inspire natural luxury and comfort in bedrooms with quality, eco-friendly, and creatively designed bedding.

Our Bedding is OEKO-TEX® 100 certified, evidence of its conformance to international safety standards, having been tested for harmful substances. Our partner in Portugal is reputable for sustainable practices and holds numerous certifications such as:

 

We hope to achieve one of the quickest shipments to backers after this campaign ends – we have gone through the developmental stage and with part payment made to our partner, the volume production has started.

Lawrence, one of our founders leveraged on his strong experience in supply chain to research, identify and select one of the most reputable bedding manufacturers in Northern Portugal.

And we have followed up with strong relationship management, bearing in mind how important it is to overcome the common challenges and complexities in any Supply Chain, especially at this time when COVID-19 is having an enormous impact on global supply chain performance. Thank goodness for the roll out of the vaccine and hopefully, things can start to take normal shape.

 Every stage of the project is tracked, and appropriate control and buffer built in to ensure we deliver our quality Tencel bedding at the quickest time possible. We can assure with great level of confidence that you wouldn't have to wait forever before getting your product, the one risk however is the limited number of quantities.

Michael compliments the team with his Project Management background, having successfully managed big projects in the past to the satisfaction of his customers. We are confident the project is well on track and if for any reason beyond our control we run into any delays, you can count on us to remain transparent during this process.

 

Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

The Impact
Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
Make it real for people and build trust.


Risks & Challenges
People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
Describe your plan for solving these challenges.


Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Introducing W’air: A powerful new tool to add to your personal clothing care routine.

W'air helps you refresh your lightly worn clothes and helps remove annoying spots so you can get on with your day.

It doesn’t take a genius to realise we use a lot of natural resources and time just to feel fresh and clean. 

So, why is it that with all the smart problem solvers in the world, no one’s improved the way we freshen our favourite clothes and remove annoying spots and stains?  Why have we been cleaning our clothes and fabrics the same way for so long? 

At W’air Sustainable Clothing Care we have developed an innovative new way to revive and refresh your clothes in a more environmentally friendly way.  Our revolutionary W'air device uses collision science to remove bacteria and odours from lightly warn clothes so you can re-wear them. 

W'airs technology gently cleans your delicate fabrics and other clothes you are told not to wash (like jeans and sneakers), or that you are told can only be treated (very chemically-intensively) at the dry cleaners.  Simply and efficiently, W'air helps you remove spots and stains from your clothes.  All while using only a tiny fraction of water, detergent, energy and time - resulting in your favourite clothes looking better and lasting longer. 

 

How does W'air work? 

W'air is a simple-to-use, cleaning device that uses our patented technology. W'air's technology combines a gentle burst of air with just a tiny bit of water and soap. The collision science behind this produces a very precise spray mixture that effectively pushes away dirt, grime and odour-causing bacteria. This is not an ordinary combination - W'air will quickly remove spots and stains and leave your clothes looking and feeling fresher.

All you have to do is turn your W'air device on, press the trigger and engage with your fabric.  W’air’s patented hydro-dynamic technology propels a very specific spray from its nozzle, gently removing spots, stains and smelly bacteria in a way that traditional cleaning technology does not.  Rather than rely on gallons or litres of water and large quantities of detergent, you can take care of your fabric cleaning needs now, helping you get on with your day.  Why wait for yet another load of laundry to get done? 

 

 

 

 

W’air removes spots, spills, smells and bacteria better and smarter than current products or hacks because of simple, common-sense science.

Spots and spills are forced out of clothes and other fabrics, quickly and easily.

 

Revive, Refresh, Re-w'air

There are two ways to use W'air. W'air allows you to effectively refresh and revive worn clothes, helping them to last longer. W'air also cleans spots and spills from clothes and other fabrics so there is less need to wash them.

 

 

W’air uses patented technology to gently refresh and revitalize lightly worn and delicate clothes.

 

W'air quickly removes spots and spills from trainers and other fabrics using just a small amount of water, detergent and air.

 

W'air, Better for Your Clothes, Better for the Environment

Not only is refreshing and cleaning your clothes with W'air better for your clothes, it is also better for the environment.

 

 

Product Timeline

 

 

W'air Specifications

 

 

Meet the Team

 

 

Here at W’air we have a highly skilled team working to bring W’air to the market.

Our technology has been developed by an R&D team, who have designed and built devices for many of the world’s leading brands working to bring W’air to the market.

We have the experience, relationships and resources to ensure the W’air device will be made by a reliable contract manufacturer. 

We are fully funded and plan to start shipping W’air devices in late Summer 2020.

See the W'air prototype in action on a variety of garments and stains

 

 

 

W'air is now in the manufacturing stage.

We are excited to share with you the images of the first w'air devices coming off the production line.

 

We would love to invite you join us on our exciting journey to reinvent clothing care.

Wouldn’t you like your favourite clothes, sneakers and fabrics to last longer and be less stressful on the environment? 

We welcome you to be first in the world to join our mission to Revive, Refresh and Re-W’air!

story:
Welcome to the new era of Home Office!

Benvenuti nella nuova epoca dell'Home Office!

 

This is REMOTE, the innovative solution to work in in a comfortable and cozy space in your home.

REMOTE is your office in a box, your new home workplace.

Vi presentiamo REMOTE, la soluzione innovativa per lavorare da casa in uno spazio comodo e raccolto.

REMOTE è l'ufficio in una scatola, il vostro nuovo posto di lavoro tra le mura domestiche.

REMOTE closed - REMOTE chiuso

 

REMOTE, is a beautiful design box with multiple finishes. It’s functional because it can contain your work tools without having them to be scattered all over your house. It’s simple because with a single gesture of your hand, REMOTE turns into a complete, ergonomic and flexible workstation. 

REMOTE è un contenitore di design con diverse finiture. E' funzionale perché contiene i vostri strumenti di lavoro senza che debbano essere sparsi per casa. E' semplice, perché con un solo gesto della mano si trasforma in una postazione di lavoro completa, ergonomica e flessibile.

REMOTE opened in the main setup - aperto nel setup principale

 

Once open it becomes a desk where you can comfortably work standing up or sitting down, without the footprint of wires, because they pass through it to connect into the integrated electrical outlets. 

Una volta aperto diventa una scrivania dove poter lavorare comodamente sia seduti che in piedi, senza l’ingombro dei cavi, che passano attraverso il piano per connettersi con le prese elettriche integrate.

REMOTE in the "standing work" setup - REMOTE configurato per il lavoro in piedi

 

The transition from the sitting down to the standing up position is quick and intuitive, allowing you to change your posture multiple times during the working days. 

Il passaggio dalla posizione seduta a quella in piedi è rapido e intuitivo, consentendovi di variare le posture nelle lunghe giornate di lavoro.

 

REMOTE can be realized in multiple finishes

The main frame can be realized with 3 types of wood

REMOTE ha tante finiture possibili tra cui scegliere

La scocca può essere fatta con 3 essenze:

Finishes of the frame - Finiture per la scocca di remote

 

The front door can have 3 finishes:

Lo sportello frontale può avere 3 diverse finiture:

Finishes of the REMOTE front door - Finiture per lo sportello di REMOTE

 

The interior, for a design choice, will always be in grey recycled felt. 

Mentre l'interno, per scelta di design sarà sempre in feltro grigio

Interior finish - Fodera interna

 

DIMENSIONS

REMOTE is so big

DIMENSIONI

REMOTE è grande così

Technical data and dimensions - Dati tecnici e dimensioni

 

INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN

The goal of this campaign is to arise the funds for the prototyping and pre-production of REMOTE.

Once financed the first phase we can start the production with the guarantee of a checked and verified design. We must smooth some corners and this will take sometime!

We count on this timeline for REMOTE:

October 2020 end Indiegogo campaign

End of November 2020 final prototype

End of January 2021 start of shipment

 

CAMPAGNA INDIEGOGO

Questa campagna di raccolta fondi ha l'obiettivo di raccogliere le risorse per la prototipazione e la pre-produzione di REMOTE.

Una volta finanziata la prima fase potremo produrre e spedire REMOTE con la certezza di un design collaudato e verificato. Dobbiamo limare qualche dettaglio e questo richiederà un pò di tempo!

Perciò contiamo su questa TIMELINE per il nostro progetto:

Ottobre 2020 termine campagna Indiegogo

Fine Novembre 2020 termine prototipazione finale

Fine Gennaio 2021 inizio spedizione

story:
We are excited to bring you the new V:Legs; stylish, modular legs that let you create your own DIY table or desk.

 

 

 

Why Now?

We have launched this Indiegogo campaign to help people adapt to working from home in style.

 

 

Get creative, our V:Legs look great on any table top!

 

 

......Even outdoors!

Our V:Legs are powder coated and can be used outside- so why not create your dream work from home space in your garden or a dining table ready for those Summer BBQ’s!

 

How it Works?

Our V Legs easily screw into any new or reclaimed flat wooden surface giving you the freedom to create your perfect desk or table for your home or office. 

 

 

Why Crowdfunding?

The manufacturing set up is expensive, and the new design needs several new moulds. We have negotiated with the factory to start the raw material purchasing. As soon as we hit our target the production will start, meaning unlike most crowdfunding campaigns, the product will be ready to ship directly to you just several weeks after the campaign finishes!

 

Up-cycle, Re-use and Reduce!

Sustainable living is becoming increasingly popular and the desire for affordable upcycled products is clear which is why we are proud that our V Legs are on average 70% cheaper than most others on the market.

Having a dedicated workspace where you feel comfortable helps increase productivity and keep you focused. This doesn’t have to be a closed off office or break the bank.

The design of our V Legs mean that people can create custom pieces that fit in with their needs and fit in to the space that they have all whilst adding their own personality.

 

The Finer Details.

 

How is it so affordable?

 

 

Product Development and test sales.

We have done a pilot run of our V Legs and have received brilliant customer reviews. We then re-worked the products taking onboard many comments to make out Legs even better!

 

 

Color options!

Many of our customers feedback was to introduce some cool colors- so here we go! Please see the perks for details.

 

The Perks!

 

 

The full V:Range.

As well our V:Legs, we have also produced stylish shelf brackets and coat hooks. These are all in line with our sustainability concept, to help you to create up-cycled and custom furniture!

See the Perks for details.

 

 

Development Time-Line.

 

 

The Team:

 

 

About OTO.

OTO are based in Hackney Wick London, a vibrant and creative area, with an eclectic mix of designers and makers on our doorstep. From our studio our team of designers believe product personality is key in everything we produce.​

OTO design was founded by professionals with vast experience in the design and manufacturing sector and a proven track record of creating new products and businesses. 

All OTO's products are produced to industrial standard.  With more than 20 years experience working in design and production we are familiar with working tirelessly with our global production partners to ensure OTO's products are to exacting quality standards.

 

Thanks, OTO x

story:
BrilliantPad can support your local  animal shelter, too.
Email shelter@brilliantpad.com for more information. 

HOW IT WORKS


 

Your hands stay clean when discarding the entire take-up assembly. Earth-friendly materials biodegrade in most landfills. Replacement rolls and subscriptions can be ordered online once we start shipping.

 

Systems made with factory produced parts have been in use since November 2016. Here is what some of our testers have to say:

"Yvette loves BrilliantPad! Now that she can relieve herself any time, walking now feels more like playtime and less of a chore."

"Rory used to wake me up in the middle of the night when she had to go outside. Now I can sleep longer, and Rory can go whenever she needs to!"

"When BrilliantPad is soiled, there is no odor – even before being advanced. Dramatic improvement from traditional pads!"

 

"After a month, I finally finished a roll... during that time, there was no smell!" - Animal Radio (Listen to the 7-minute broadcast here)

 

  • BrilliantPad System
  • BrilliantPad Roll
  • Training Guide
  • Transition Pads

Replacement Rolls Available Online

  • You can get replacement rolls on our website right after the Indiegogo campaign ends.
  • Replacement rolls start as low as $19.99 and free shipping with subscription.
  • With 27 pads per roll, that's just about 1 month per roll per dog!

 

BrilliantPad production sample in action:

BrilliantPad also works well with solids:

“BrilliantPad provides a healthy alternative when you can't walk your dog due to unforeseen circumstances such as extreme weather, heavy traffic or illness. BrilliantPad makes homes cleaner and more hygienic for both pet parents and their dogs.”  – Dr. Brett Shorenstein, VMD

“Most dogs can be trained to adopt new behaviors with sufficient time and patience, and the BrilliantPad Training Guide is consistent with the advice and protocols we use in our veterinary clinic.” – Dr. Carlo Siracusa, DVM, PhD, Dip. ACVB, Dip. ECAWBM, Veterinary Behaviorist

"I worked with the BrilliantPad team to develop the Training Guide, which is well thought out and provides tips to help anyone train their dog to use BrilliantPad."  – Dr. Margaret Gruen, Board-Certified Veterinary Behaviorist

 

80% thinner and use 33% less material without compromising absorption or durability. 

Disposable rods and end-caps are made with EcoPure® to breakdown 80% in less than 12 months* in most landfills.

* Lab testing in process to quantify rate and amount of degradation. Final amount and rate of decomposition TBD.

 

Many thanks extend to dozens of dogs, pet parents, animal behaviorists, veterinarians, and researchers. BrilliantPad could not have been created without you!

 

Don’t worry, we will help you train your dog to use BrilliantPad. Our Training Guide was developed by Animal Behaviorists from four university-based Veterinary clinics and includes easy-to-follow instructions. Training generally takes anywhere from a few days to several weeks.  

Additional resources include:

(1) Transition pads to help acclimate your dog.

(2) Online training center and help desk.

 

 

We invented the ScoopFree self-cleaning litter box and FroliCat family pet toys. We are experts at making pet waste easier to handle and dispose of, and our experienced team is passionate about developing innovative and useful products. We created BrilliantPad to allow pet parents to spend less time cleaning and more time loving

We are crowdfunding our latest product to build an engaged community of dog lovers. We want to hear your ideas and suggestions and with your help, we will continue to create innovative and useful pet products for everyone.

 

We are able to ship to the US and Canada only. Free shipping applies to the USA only. Canadian VAT and GST not included. Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you.

We plan to start shipping BrilliantPad orders in August 2017. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

By backing now you'll get access to exclusive Indiegogo pricing that will not be available again.

 

The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the more improvements we can make in the future! We can't do this without you.

 

What is making a “contribution"? By contributing to our campaign you are helping us bring this product to life. We've finished all of the steps to create and test BrilliantPad, and now we just need to know how many to order for next batch!
Who created it? The inventors of the ScoopFree automatic, self-cleaning litter box and FroliCat family of pet toys created BrilliantPad.
Why should we use it? BrilliantPad lets you spend less time cleaning and more time loving. It's easier, cleaner and more sanitary than traditional pads.
What are the main benefits? BrilliantPad provides freedom and flexibility, promotes health and hygiene, and is better for the environment than traditional pads.
Is BrilliantPad right for me and my dog? With your commitment and our guidance, you can enjoy the benefits of BrilliantPad. BrilliantPad works best if your dog is under 35 pounds, comfortable around noises made by household appliances, and generally accepting of new items in your home. By pre-ordering, you are letting us know that you're willing and able to invest some time and effort to train your dog to use BrilliantPad.
How much does it cost? BrilliantPad will retail at $199.99. Buy on IGG for up to 50% off. Replacement rolls (equal to 27 pads) work out to less than $1 per pad.
What do we get when we order? One (1) BrilliantPad at the lowest price it will ever be, one (1) replacement roll, and training materials to help teach your dog to use BrilliantPad.
When will I receive my order? The first 5,000 backers will receive their BrilliantPad systems in August.
Where can I buy replacement rolls? You can get replacement rolls on our website right after the Indiegogo campaign ends.
How much are replacement rolls? Replacement rolls start as low as $19.99 and includes free shipping with a subscription. With 27 pads per roll, that's just about a dollar per pad!
Where did the idea for BrilliantPad come from? One of our co-founders had two dogs and often came home to soiled, shredded pads. He figured there could be a better way.
How did the team come together? Brett went to Vet School at the University of Pennsylvania. Alan graduated from the M&T program. Brett found Alan through the alumni network.
How did you create the machine? After coming up with initial plans, we continued to iterate, test and refine our design to ensure it worked with most small dogs.
Does BrilliantPad really work? 20 dogs participated in the development of Brilliant Pad. Tester and animal behaviorists confirm it works reliably and promotes dog health.

 

How does BrilliantPad work? A super absorbant polymer soaks up urine and begins to dry out solids after a dog goes potty on the pad.
Then what happens? BrilliantPad's system automatically wraps and seals waste to eliminate odors, and replaces the soiled pad with a fresh one.
Where does the waste go? Soiled pads are wrapped and sealed at one end of the machine to lock away odor.
Umm, what about poop? All taken care of! Solid waste fits through an opening in the locked waste cover and is wrapped and sealed.
Hold on. Doesn't that smell? No! We know this is hard to believe, but testers report that odor is effectively sealed and the system does not smell. Phew!
Will it replace it as soon as they step off? The system has an adjustable timer. You can set the pad to advance automatically 1, 2 or 3 times a day or manually, at the touch of a button
How often do I have to empty the waste? Leave it alone for days or weeks at a time. Each roll is like 27 pads. When the supply roll is empty discard the entire take-up assembly.
What is disposal like? Fast, easy and clean. The plastic backing provides a clean grasp surface for your hands, and the end caps prevent leaks and odors.
What is the environmental impact? Our pads use one-third less material than traditional pads, and the disposable rods and caps biodegrade in most landfills.

 

What colors do you offer? The BrilliantPad system is slate grey. Pads are white with a blue/green backing.
What sizes do you offer? System comes in one size for dogs up to 35 pounds. 24" x 23" pad area is comparable to regular pads. System footprint is 34" x 24".
Will it fit in my home? BrilliantPad's compact, attractive design fits comfortably in most homes, even in small spaces.
How big are rolls? Each roll is equivalent to twenty-seven (27) large 24" x 23" pads. Pad roll is 22" wide and 3.5" diameter, about the same as a hockey puck!
How many rolls come with the pre-order? Each pre-order comes with 1 pad roll. After the campaign, you can purchase an auto-delivery subscription or buy rolls in 2, 4 and 9-packs.

 

How many layers are in each pad? Each pad has five layers that combine to provide durability, absorption, and cleanliness. The top layer is a non-woven fabric that provides superior scratch and tear resistance. The middle three layers quickly absorb liquids. The bottom layer is a barrier lining to prevent leaks and provide a clean grasp surface.
What is the absorbent technology? BrilliantPad pad rolls are 80% thinner and use 33% less material than traditional pads without compromising absorption or durability. A super-absorbent polymer soaks up liquids, begins to dry out solids and absorbs 50x its weight in liquid.
What is under each pad? A plastic lining is under the pad. It protects against leaks, seals in odor and provides a clean surface to touch during disposal.
What are the black marks for? Marks under the pad roll tell the machine how much paper to advance, when the system is out of paper, or if there is a tracking error.
Are the pads strong? Our pads are 80% thinner and use 33% less material than traditional pads without compromising absorption or durability.
How is BrilliantPad better for the environment? Our pads use one-third less material than traditional pads, and the disposable rods and caps biodegrade in most landfills.
When does the motor turn on? The system has an adjustable timer. You can set the pad to advance automatically 1, 2 or 3 times a day or anytime, at the touch of a button.
What if my dog is on the platform when the timer activates? BrilliantPad has an animal sensor, which prevents the motor from automatically turning on if a dog is on the machine.
Is the system safe? BrilliantPad is designed for safety starting with a safe, low-voltage UL-approved power supply. Sensors ensure the automatic timer will not start the motor when an animal is present. The waste roll and take-up assembly is covered, and a current limiter will turn off the motor if a paw or hand gets caught in the mechanism.
Are there any other sensors? A pad sensor reads marks on the rolls for 3 functions: advancing a full pad, detecting finished rolls, and monitoring pad tracking issues.
Does the system need an electrical outlet? Yes, BrilliantPad requires an electric outlet, and the safe, low-voltage power supply is UL-rated.
Will there be updates to it in the future? The system has a modular design. Users will be able to obtain new features by purchasing upgraded control modules in the future.
What are the dimensions? Machine footprint is 34" x 24" with pad area of 24" x 23". Step-up height for dogs is approximately 2".
How much does the machine weigh? BrilliantPad system weighs less than 10 pounds. Replacement rolls are approximately 2 pounds.
Where is it manufactured? BrilliantPad is designed in Chicago. Replacement pad rolls are made in the USA. The machine is made in China.
Is it patented? BrilliantPad has multiple patents pending. We vigorously enforce intellectual property rights.

 

Will my dog fit on the machine? Most dogs under 35 pounds should be able to use BrilliantPad successfully.
What dogs can use BrilliantPad? BrilliantPad works best with dogs who already use potty pads, or when training puppies less than 3 months old.
What if my dog does NOT already use pads? Most dogs can be trained to use BrilliantPad. Training requires a consistent investment of time, patience, lots of affection and treats! 
How do I transition my dog from using regular pads to BrilliantPad? A Training Kit with transition pads, easy-to-follow instructions, and online resources is included to help most dogs adapt to using BrilliantPad.
Can you help me with the training? You bet. Transition pads, easy-to-follow instructions, and online resources are included to help most dogs adapt to using BrilliantPad.
Can I use any pad with BrilliantPad? Place your current pad on top of BrilliantPad only to help your dog acclimate to the system. Then only use BrilliantPad replacement rolls.
What if my dog likes to scratch or dig after going potty? BrilliantPad rolls are very strong with a tear-resistant top sheet made with non-woven spun-bond fabric.  
How long will it take to train my dog to use BrilliantPad? Most dogs that already use pads can transition to using BrilliantPad within a few weeks. If your dog does not use pads it will take more time, but generally no longer than it would to train a dog to use traditional pads.
What if my dog is often afraid of new experiences and new objects?  If your dog is fearful of noises and new things, you will have to commit to following our training plan and invest extra time and effort to train your dog to use BrilliantPad.
What if I don’t have time to train my dog? If you don’t have the time or patience necessary to train your dog, then BrilliantPad may not be right for you. Every dog needs at least several days to several weeks of training to acclimate to BrilliantPad.   

 

How do I set it up? BrilliantPad is easy to setup. Attach covers, insert control module, add power and insert roll. Setup usually takes less than 10 minutes.
How do I manually advance the pad? Press and hold the "Pad Advance" button to advance the paper, or double-click the same button to advance a full sheet.
How do I automatically advance pad? Press "automatic timer" to replace pad automatically 1x, 2x or 3x per day -- that is once every 24, 12 or 8 hours, respectively.
How do I maintain the machine? The entire take-up assembly is disposable. Just lift and remove. Everything soiled or dirty is discarded.
What about more extensive cleaning? Little cleaning is required. Simply unlock and remove the control module. Then wash or hose away!
Can I put machine outside? Only clean BrilliantPad outside. BrilliantPad is designed for indoor use only.

 

When does production begin? Production tooling was completed in October 2106, which was reviewed and refined three times. Volume production begins in April 2017.
When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps? Order today to receive one of the first BrilliantPad systems in August 2017. Later backers may receive shipments at later dates.
Where does it ship? BrilliantPad only ships to customers in the USA and Canada. UK, Australia, and countries in Europe and Asia may be added later.
How much is shipping? Free shipping is included to the USA. International surcharges are added to Canadian shipments.
What if I am interested in a distribution partnership? If you are prepared to purchase $10,000 or more we would love to hear from you! Email your details to info@brilliantpad.com
Do I have to pay VAT / GST? Yes. Customer outside the USA have to pay VAT/GST.
What are the risks & challenges of getting the product as promised? Production tooling has been completed and the system is performing well during field-testing. New challenges may arise as we move into mass production. These could include a need to improve system parts or resolve issues related to fulfillment, such as transportation, international customs, etc. Based on the current pace, we expect to begin shipping Brilliant Pad this summer. With our team's experience fulfilling equally complex products, we are confident in the proposed timeline. We pledge to prioritize all crowdfunding pre-orders before shipping to national resellers. We also pledge to clearly and promptly communicate any issues that may arise.

 

Is there a warranty? Yes. The BrilliantPad machine has a 12-month warranty.
What is your refund policy? We are not able to refund orders or pledges once they have shipped.
How do I choose more than one reward? You must make a new contribution for each perk you wish to select.
How can I check the status of my pre-order? By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information.
If I have other questions, who should I contact? info@brilliantpad.com
support@brilliantpad.com
press@brilliantpad.com
story_txt:
BrilliantPad can support your local  animal shelter, too.Email shelter@brilliantpad.com for more information. 


HOW IT WORKS



 


Your hands stay clean when discarding the entire take-up assembly. Earth-friendly materials biodegrade in most landfills. Replacement rolls and subscriptions can be ordered online once we start shipping.
 


Systems made with factory produced parts have been in use since November 2016. Here is what some of our testers have to say:

"Yvette loves BrilliantPad! Now that she can relieve herself any time, walking now feels more like playtime and less of a chore."

"Rory used to wake me up in the middle of the night when she had to go outside. Now I can sleep longer, and Rory can go whenever she needs to!"

"When BrilliantPad is soiled, there is no odor – even before being advanced. Dramatic improvement from traditional pads!"
 

"After a month, I finally finished a roll... during that time, there was no smell!" - Animal Radio (Listen to the 7-minute broadcast here)
 




BrilliantPad System
BrilliantPad Roll
Training Guide
Transition Pads

Replacement Rolls Available Online

You can get replacement rolls on our website right after the Indiegogo campaign ends.
Replacement rolls start as low as $19.99 and free shipping with subscription.
With 27 pads per roll, that's just about 1 month per roll per dog!

 

BrilliantPad production sample in action:

BrilliantPad also works well with solids:


“BrilliantPad provides a healthy alternative when you can't walk your dog due to unforeseen circumstances such as extreme weather, heavy traffic or illness. BrilliantPad makes homes cleaner and more hygienic for both pet parents and their dogs.”  – Dr. Brett Shorenstein, VMD
“Most dogs can be trained to adopt new behaviors with sufficient time and patience, and the BrilliantPad Training Guide is consistent with the advice and protocols we use in our veterinary clinic.” – Dr. Carlo Siracusa, DVM, PhD, Dip. ACVB, Dip. ECAWBM, Veterinary Behaviorist
"I worked with the BrilliantPad team to develop the Training Guide, which is well thought out and provides tips to help anyone train their dog to use BrilliantPad."  – Dr. Margaret Gruen, Board-Certified Veterinary Behaviorist
 



80% thinner and use 33% less material without compromising absorption or durability. 


Disposable rods and end-caps are made with EcoPure® to breakdown 80% in less than 12 months* in most landfills.
* Lab testing in process to quantify rate and amount of degradation. Final amount and rate of decomposition TBD.
 

Many thanks extend to dozens of dogs, pet parents, animal behaviorists, veterinarians, and researchers. BrilliantPad could not have been created without you!

 

Don’t worry, we will help you train your dog to use BrilliantPad. Our Training Guide was developed by Animal Behaviorists from four university-based Veterinary clinics and includes easy-to-follow instructions. Training generally takes anywhere from a few days to several weeks.  
Additional resources include:
(1) Transition pads to help acclimate your dog.
(2) Online training center and help desk.
 


 

We invented the ScoopFree self-cleaning litter box and FroliCat family pet toys. We are experts at making pet waste easier to handle and dispose of, and our experienced team is passionate about developing innovative and useful products. We created BrilliantPad to allow pet parents to spend less time cleaning and more time loving
We are crowdfunding our latest product to build an engaged community of dog lovers. We want to hear your ideas and suggestions and with your help, we will continue to create innovative and useful pet products for everyone.

 




We are able to ship to the US and Canada only. Free shipping applies to the USA only. Canadian VAT and GST not included. Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you.

We plan to start shipping BrilliantPad orders in August 2017. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

By backing now you'll get access to exclusive Indiegogo pricing that will not be available again.

 

The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the more improvements we can make in the future! We can't do this without you.



 





What is making a “contribution"?
By contributing to our campaign you are helping us bring this product to life. We've finished all of the steps to create and test BrilliantPad, and now we just need to know how many to order for next batch!


Who created it?
The inventors of the ScoopFree automatic, self-cleaning litter box and FroliCat family of pet toys created BrilliantPad.


Why should we use it?
BrilliantPad lets you spend less time cleaning and more time loving. It's easier, cleaner and more sanitary than traditional pads.


What are the main benefits?
BrilliantPad provides freedom and flexibility, promotes health and hygiene, and is better for the environment than traditional pads.


Is BrilliantPad right for me and my dog?
With your commitment and our guidance, you can enjoy the benefits of BrilliantPad. BrilliantPad works best if your dog is under 35 pounds, comfortable around noises made by household appliances, and generally accepting of new items in your home. By pre-ordering, you are letting us know that you're willing and able to invest some time and effort to train your dog to use BrilliantPad.


How much does it cost? 
BrilliantPad will retail at $199.99. Buy on IGG for up to 50% off. Replacement rolls (equal to 27 pads) work out to less than $1 per pad.


What do we get when we order?
One (1) BrilliantPad at the lowest price it will ever be, one (1) replacement roll, and training materials to help teach your dog to use BrilliantPad.


When will I receive my order?
The first 5,000 backers will receive their BrilliantPad systems in August.


Where can I buy replacement rolls?
You can get replacement rolls on our website right after the Indiegogo campaign ends.


How much are replacement rolls?
Replacement rolls start as low as $19.99 and includes free shipping with a subscription. With 27 pads per roll, that's just about a dollar per pad!


Where did the idea for BrilliantPad come from?
One of our co-founders had two dogs and often came home to soiled, shredded pads. He figured there could be a better way.


How did the team come together?
Brett went to Vet School at the University of Pennsylvania. Alan graduated from the M&T program. Brett found Alan through the alumni network.


How did you create the machine?
After coming up with initial plans, we continued to iterate, test and refine our design to ensure it worked with most small dogs.


Does BrilliantPad really work?
20 dogs participated in the development of Brilliant Pad. Tester and animal behaviorists confirm it works reliably and promotes dog health.


 



How does BrilliantPad work?
A super absorbant polymer soaks up urine and begins to dry out solids after a dog goes potty on the pad.


Then what happens?
BrilliantPad's system automatically wraps and seals waste to eliminate odors, and replaces the soiled pad with a fresh one.


Where does the waste go?
Soiled pads are wrapped and sealed at one end of the machine to lock away odor.


Umm, what about poop?
All taken care of! Solid waste fits through an opening in the locked waste cover and is wrapped and sealed.


Hold on. Doesn't that smell?
No! We know this is hard to believe, but testers report that odor is effectively sealed and the system does not smell. Phew!


Will it replace it as soon as they step off?
The system has an adjustable timer. You can set the pad to advance automatically 1, 2 or 3 times a day or manually, at the touch of a button


How often do I have to empty the waste?
Leave it alone for days or weeks at a time. Each roll is like 27 pads. When the supply roll is empty discard the entire take-up assembly.


What is disposal like?
Fast, easy and clean. The plastic backing provides a clean grasp surface for your hands, and the end caps prevent leaks and odors.


What is the environmental impact?
Our pads use one-third less material than traditional pads, and the disposable rods and caps biodegrade in most landfills.


 



What colors do you offer?
The BrilliantPad system is slate grey. Pads are white with a blue/green backing.


What sizes do you offer?
System comes in one size for dogs up to 35 pounds. 24" x 23" pad area is comparable to regular pads. System footprint is 34" x 24".


Will it fit in my home?
BrilliantPad's compact, attractive design fits comfortably in most homes, even in small spaces.


How big are rolls?
Each roll is equivalent to twenty-seven (27) large 24" x 23" pads. Pad roll is 22" wide and 3.5" diameter, about the same as a hockey puck!


How many rolls come with the pre-order?
Each pre-order comes with 1 pad roll. After the campaign, you can purchase an auto-delivery subscription or buy rolls in 2, 4 and 9-packs.


 



How many layers are in each pad?
Each pad has five layers that combine to provide durability, absorption, and cleanliness. The top layer is a non-woven fabric that provides superior scratch and tear resistance. The middle three layers quickly absorb liquids. The bottom layer is a barrier lining to prevent leaks and provide a clean grasp surface.


What is the absorbent technology?
BrilliantPad pad rolls are 80% thinner and use 33% less material than traditional pads without compromising absorption or durability. A super-absorbent polymer soaks up liquids, begins to dry out solids and absorbs 50x its weight in liquid.


What is under each pad?
A plastic lining is under the pad. It protects against leaks, seals in odor and provides a clean surface to touch during disposal.


What are the black marks for?
Marks under the pad roll tell the machine how much paper to advance, when the system is out of paper, or if there is a tracking error.


Are the pads strong?
Our pads are 80% thinner and use 33% less material than traditional pads without compromising absorption or durability.


How is BrilliantPad better for the environment?
Our pads use one-third less material than traditional pads, and the disposable rods and caps biodegrade in most landfills.


When does the motor turn on?
The system has an adjustable timer. You can set the pad to advance automatically 1, 2 or 3 times a day or anytime, at the touch of a button.


What if my dog is on the platform when the timer activates?
BrilliantPad has an animal sensor, which prevents the motor from automatically turning on if a dog is on the machine.


Is the system safe?
BrilliantPad is designed for safety starting with a safe, low-voltage UL-approved power supply. Sensors ensure the automatic timer will not start the motor when an animal is present. The waste roll and take-up assembly is covered, and a current limiter will turn off the motor if a paw or hand gets caught in the mechanism.


Are there any other sensors?
A pad sensor reads marks on the rolls for 3 functions: advancing a full pad, detecting finished rolls, and monitoring pad tracking issues.


Does the system need an electrical outlet?
Yes, BrilliantPad requires an electric outlet, and the safe, low-voltage power supply is UL-rated.


Will there be updates to it in the future?
The system has a modular design. Users will be able to obtain new features by purchasing upgraded control modules in the future.


What are the dimensions?
Machine footprint is 34" x 24" with pad area of 24" x 23". Step-up height for dogs is approximately 2".


How much does the machine weigh?
BrilliantPad system weighs less than 10 pounds. Replacement rolls are approximately 2 pounds.


Where is it manufactured?
BrilliantPad is designed in Chicago. Replacement pad rolls are made in the USA. The machine is made in China.


Is it patented?
BrilliantPad has multiple patents pending. We vigorously enforce intellectual property rights.


 



Will my dog fit on the machine?
Most dogs under 35 pounds should be able to use BrilliantPad successfully.


What dogs can use BrilliantPad?
BrilliantPad works best with dogs who already use potty pads, or when training puppies less than 3 months old.


What if my dog does NOT already use pads?
Most dogs can be trained to use BrilliantPad. Training requires a consistent investment of time, patience, lots of affection and treats! 


How do I transition my dog from using regular pads to BrilliantPad?
A Training Kit with transition pads, easy-to-follow instructions, and online resources is included to help most dogs adapt to using BrilliantPad.


Can you help me with the training?
You bet. Transition pads, easy-to-follow instructions, and online resources are included to help most dogs adapt to using BrilliantPad.


Can I use any pad with BrilliantPad?
Place your current pad on top of BrilliantPad only to help your dog acclimate to the system. Then only use BrilliantPad replacement rolls.


What if my dog likes to scratch or dig after going potty?
BrilliantPad rolls are very strong with a tear-resistant top sheet made with non-woven spun-bond fabric.  


How long will it take to train my dog to use BrilliantPad?
Most dogs that already use pads can transition to using BrilliantPad within a few weeks. If your dog does not use pads it will take more time, but generally no longer than it would to train a dog to use traditional pads.


What if my dog is often afraid of new experiences and new objects? 
If your dog is fearful of noises and new things, you will have to commit to following our training plan and invest extra time and effort to train your dog to use BrilliantPad.


What if I don’t have time to train my dog?
If you don’t have the time or patience necessary to train your dog, then BrilliantPad may not be right for you. Every dog needs at least several days to several weeks of training to acclimate to BrilliantPad.   


 



How do I set it up?
BrilliantPad is easy to setup. Attach covers, insert control module, add power and insert roll. Setup usually takes less than 10 minutes.


How do I manually advance the pad?
Press and hold the "Pad Advance" button to advance the paper, or double-click the same button to advance a full sheet.


How do I automatically advance pad?
Press "automatic timer" to replace pad automatically 1x, 2x or 3x per day -- that is once every 24, 12 or 8 hours, respectively.


How do I maintain the machine?
The entire take-up assembly is disposable. Just lift and remove. Everything soiled or dirty is discarded.


What about more extensive cleaning?
Little cleaning is required. Simply unlock and remove the control module. Then wash or hose away!


Can I put machine outside?
Only clean BrilliantPad outside. BrilliantPad is designed for indoor use only.


 



When does production begin?
Production tooling was completed in October 2106, which was reviewed and refined three times. Volume production begins in April 2017.


When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps?
Order today to receive one of the first BrilliantPad systems in August 2017. Later backers may receive shipments at later dates.


Where does it ship?
BrilliantPad only ships to customers in the USA and Canada. UK, Australia, and countries in Europe and Asia may be added later.


How much is shipping?
Free shipping is included to the USA. International surcharges are added to Canadian shipments.


What if I am interested in a distribution partnership?
If you are prepared to purchase $10,000 or more we would love to hear from you! Email your details to info@brilliantpad.com


Do I have to pay VAT / GST?
Yes. Customer outside the USA have to pay VAT/GST.


What are the risks & challenges of getting the product as promised?
Production tooling has been completed and the system is performing well during field-testing. New challenges may arise as we move into mass production. These could include a need to improve system parts or resolve issues related to fulfillment, such as transportation, international customs, etc. Based on the current pace, we expect to begin shipping Brilliant Pad this summer. With our team's experience fulfilling equally complex products, we are confident in the proposed timeline. We pledge to prioritize all crowdfunding pre-orders before shipping to national resellers. We also pledge to clearly and promptly communicate any issues that may arise.


 



Is there a warranty?
Yes. The BrilliantPad machine has a 12-month warranty.


What is your refund policy?
We are not able to refund orders or pledges once they have shipped.


How do I choose more than one reward?
You must make a new contribution for each perk you wish to select.


How can I check the status of my pre-order?
By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information.


If I have other questions, who should I contact?
info@brilliantpad.comsupport@brilliantpad.compress@brilliantpad.com

story:
In stock, available for immediate domestic and international shipment. Received yours? Scan the QR code on the box or view the Setup Instructions on the web.
Have you ever...
  • driven off forgetting your garage open or were unsure about it?
  • left your garage door open overnight by mistake?
  • found yourself without any way to enter your house?
  • needed to let somebody into your house when you were not there or were unable to get the door at that moment?

By addressing these situations, Garadget offers peace of mind, convenience and security.

 

 

Why you’ll love Garadget

 

 

How it works

 

Please note that Garadget in the described here version is not equipped with an audible and visual warning system indicating a pending motion before the door starts moving as required for UL325 certification. Softcomplex is not assuming responsibility for your decision to use Garadget without this feature.

 

What's in the box

Everything needed to set up Garadget comes in a neat package. Just add your garage door, smartphone and WiFi network.

 

 

  • 1x Garadget controller
  • 1x USB power adapter
  • 1x micro-USB cable
  • 2x reflective tags
  • 2x adhesive pads
  • 2ft wire
  • 1x screw driver
  • QR code for iPhone and Android apps download
 

Setting up Garadget

Simple installation was one of the primary design goals for Garadget. Intricate sensor wiring and complex router setup is replaced with simply attaching the sticker to the door and answering a few questions in the mobile app.

 

 

How we got here

Hi, I'm Denis - creator of Garadget. I have a long history of developing software and hardware professionally and as a hobby.

The story of Garadget starts with me forgetting to close my garage door overnight and having to deal with the nasty mice situation the following days. After several more garage induced headaches and extensive market research, I traded most of my spare time and personal budget for the excitement of designing a new product.

 

Countless hours of electrical engineering, 3D design and coding were followed by field testing and a long trip to Asia to make manufacturing arrangements for Garadget.

Earlier this year the garage door "futurizer" enjoyed a successful crowdfunding campaign with over 200% of the funding goal raised. Today while still accepting pre-orders, we prepare manufacturing and work on improved versions of mobile apps, as well as items from our extended wish list.

 

 

 

What's next

Shipping Garadget to our customers is not the final goal, it's just a milestone. We are excited about all the things Garadget can do, systems it can work with and projects it can be used in. Among our ideas:

  • Software Integration with wearables (iWatch, Android wear, Pebble - implemented)
  • Integration with Vera (implemented) Control & Wink (awaiting open API)
  • SmrtThings Integration (implemented)
  • OpenHAB binding (implemented)
  • Home Assistant cover (implemented)
  • HomeSeer plugin (already implemented)
  • Amazon Echo Skill (implemented)
  • IFTTT service (implemented)
  • Windows phone app (cancelled due to no demand, web interface available)
  • Improved web based interface Email notifications (implemented)
  • Temporary and limited access accounts
  • Cloud-less option - LAN only mode via MQTT (implemented)
  • MFi, Apple HomeKit compatibility
  • Variety of environment sensors and other hardware extensions

Vote for the next Garadget feature

Any trademarks or trade names above mentioned are the property of their respective owners.

 

Technical specifications

Hardware:  

  • STM32F205 120Mhz ARM Cortex M3
  • 128KB RAM
  • 1MB flash + 1MB SPI Flash
  • Broadcom BCM43362 Wi-Fi chip
  • 802.11b/g/n Wi-Fi
  • 5mW 650nm laser
  • I2C bus or 2 x GPIO extensions connector
  • 5V, less than 100mA typical consumption
  • FCC, CE and IC certified

Software:

  • Real-time operating system (FreeRTOS)
  • Soft AP WiFi setup
  • Open Cloud API using REST protocol
  • iPhone app (iOS8+)
  • Android app (Android 4.x+)
  • Web interface

 

Developers Welcome

Although designed as an easy-to-use consumer product, Garadget is also a great tinkering platform for those of us who like to peek under the hood. Integrate it with your RaspberyPi or Arduino project, monitor objects with its laser, re-flash it to do something entirely different and share your project with the community.

 

 

 

 

In its core Garadget uses the Photon module from the great folks at Particle and benefits from all the development tools and support materials created for the module:

  • Well documented cloud API using REST protocol
  • iOS, Android and Node.js SDKs, CLI command line interface
  • Community supported clients for JavaScript, PHP, Ruby, Go, .NET
  • Over-the-air, USB and JTAG firmware upload
  • Web based Arduino-like development environment
  • Extension I2C bus or 2xGPIO powered connector

 

Follow Garadget

iPhone app (iOS8+)
Android app (Android 4.x+)
Web interface
 Developers WelcomeAlthough designed as an easy-to-use consumer product, Garadget is also a great tinkering platform for those of us who like to peek under the hood. Integrate it with your RaspberyPi or Arduino project, monitor objects with its laser, re-flash it to do something entirely different and share your project with the community.     In its core Garadget uses the Photon module from the great folks at Particle and benefits from all the development tools and support materials created for the module:
Well documented cloud API using REST protocol
iOS, Android and Node.js SDKs, CLI command line interface
Community supported clients for JavaScript, PHP, Ruby, Go, .NET
Over-the-air, USB and JTAG firmware upload
Web based Arduino-like development environment
Extension I2C bus or 2xGPIO powered connector
 Follow Garadget 
    Questions?Visit our community board.

story:
An exclusive offer to our backers on Indiegogo.

In the past few months, we have heard from many backers inquiring about using VentiFresh products to sanitize air at indoor personal spaces. VentiFresh Eco Plus UVC Odor Eliminator is our answer to the call. Combining the same NASA inspired odor eliminating technology with the power of UV-C rays, this is the ultimate portable air purifier.

 

Together we saw our respective life styles disrupted in the year 2020. While we’ve all worked diligently coping with the changes, some help from vibrant technologies may make things easier. Once again, the +UVC new model would not happen without your supports and encouragement. Thank you, all backers in this team VentiFresh!

 

 

How the technology works within the device. 

 

The VentiFresh ECO device purifies indoor air by oxidizing the VOCs (ie. ammonia, formaldehyde etc.) and airborne microbes (ie. mold and bacteria) as they pass through the internal UV-photocatalyst core. However, it is not a conventional air purifier that is designed to clean up the air in large spaces or entire rooms by filtering the air. Instead of specifying a suitable room size or spatial dimensions for this product (such as the CADR index, which is the cubic feet per minute (CFM) of air that has all the particles of a given size distribution removed), this device does NOT use any filter to capture dirty particles in the air. The technology used is a natural photocatalyst process that breaks down harmful organic compounds into CO2 and water, rather than a filter that traps particles. 

 

UVC lighting module joined force with the cleaning power of photocatalysis core, sanitizing strength tested and proven showing a 99.99% bactericidal activities, all packed into the compact unit that you can take anywhere by plugging into a USB power bank.  

**The UV-C power designed in the VentiFresh products has been tested with anti-bacterial efficacy such as e. Coli. As the COVID-19 pandemic is ongoing, testing protocols are under development and medical devices have priority in laboratories. At this time, we are waiting for our partner laboratories to develop tests to confirm commercial products’ effectiveness against the novel virus.

 

Upgraded germicidal efficiency with UV-C to the original UV-photocatalyst power. 

 

VentiFresh significantly reduces the amount of molds growing on a controlled dish.

 

We put VentiFresh to the time-lapse test - the rotting slows down!

 

VentiFresh effectively reduces the amount of Formaldehyde concentration.

 

VentiFresh (left) successfully suppresses the sweat stank building up in the backpack. 

 

 

VentiFresh ECO Plus UVC model comes in 2 control modes to accommodate your usage needs, whereas the Turbo Mode runs in 30% higher speed meant for a "quick fix", and the Quite Mode runs softly in the background for long-hour use.  Based on previous user feedback, we developed new electronic design and assembly techniques to reduce the audible wind noise.

 

 

Weighted only 2.5oz!

Design to be compact (2x2.4 in/51x63mm) and lightweight (2.5oz/70g), VentiFresh devices may be installed on any smooth and clean surfaces using the enclosed gel-pad or double-sided stickers. You may choose to pair the device with a USB battery bank to allow for portable use, or pair with a USB adopter to plug into wall sockets. There is no battery inside the VentiFresh device. Power plug or power bank is not included in this product package.  We recommend using a qualified USB power plug or power bank that specified minimum DC5V/1A output, same like when you charge a mobile phone.

 

Regardless of the room size, we recommend installing the device within 1-2 ft (30-50 cm) of the source of indoor pollution, such as a toilet, cat litter box, trash cans and more. All VentiFresh devices come with a motor fan that draws in the nearby air and releases the clean breeze processed by the UV-photocatalyst core. The product functions to clean up microbes/odors close to the source before they pervade the entire room.  
 
 
 

This +UVC model had been brought to production, and we are building stocks to fulfill orders as they come along. The first 50 backers will have their orders shipped within 2 weeks of placement, and newer orders will deliver in rolling shipments as we process orders and prepare for batch shipping monthly.

Please note that we are only able to fulfill orders to the U.S. domestic addresses at this time due to the on-going disruption in the supply chain and shipping services around the world.

 

 

Life isn't all roses, sometimes, it stinks! Whether it’s the cat litter box, shoe cabinets, gym bags, or the good ol’ trash can, organic odors intrude and permeate our homes.

VentiFresh ECO is a portable and eco-friendly air purifier that uses NASA inspired UV photocatalyst technology to help break down odor molecules instead of just masking it with harmful chemical fragrances. Let our innovative odor eliminator be your simple solution towards living your best life without unwanted odors. 

 


*VentiFresh test shows visible gas reduction 
 

 

 

 

 

VentiFresh ECO combines the semiconductor deodorizer technology and air ventilation techniques, in such a compact function that has never been seen before.

The applied semiconductors consists of photocatalyst and UV LED. A photocatalyst is a natural or synthetic substance that accelerates the rate of a molecular reaction using energy from light, without consuming itself. Chlorophyll of plants is a typical nature photocatalyst. We used a compound mainly consisted of titanium dioxide (TiO2).

 

Simply speaking, our technology reversed the process of how plants breathe, and was used  to deodorize stinky molecules in the air.

 

While chlorophyll captures sunlight to convert water and carbon dioxide into oxygen and glucose, our nano-grade substance at contact breaks down volatile organic compounds (VOCs), also known as odors in gas form, into carbon dioxide and water. Using a dust-resistant, low-noise motor fan, bad odor molecules in the air are pressured to flow inside an air compartment, get processed with a photocatalyst energized by UV light, then clean air flows out of VentiFresh ECO through air vents on the sides. Since the reaction is chemistry at the molecular level, odor compounds here are decomposed rather than captured by a filter, so there’s nothing to be replaced or refilled. VentiFresh ECO only needs energy from UV light to activate the cleaning process.

The use of effective ventilation with photocatalyst and UV lighting for indoor air treatment has been a well-established application used in many places such as factories, hospitals, labs and homes. Such systems usually cost thousands of dollars to start with, and often are installed inside the existing air ventilation by professional services.

 

**VentiFresh ECO is not an affiliate or associate with NASA. All trademarks, names and service marks mentioned herein belong to their respective owners.**

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

After the successful introduction of our 1st generation VentiFresh Odor Eliminator about 3
years ago, we’re beyond grateful for the support from our backers. Not only did we receive
the funding necessary to kick off our marketing, we have also received a lot of feedback and
suggestions. With the sales revenue generated by the original VentiFresh device, we
continued to invest in the material research of UV photocatalyst technology. By the end of
2018, we developed a new processing method for the photocatalyst materials that allowed
our product to respond faster, more efficiently and more powerfully to clean up bad odors in
the air.

The new UV photocatalyst core on VentiFresh ECO provides improved efficiency to process air faster as well as in larger volume. This new technology is 3 times more powerful than the previous version.

 

 

 

The major breakthrough with the photocatalyst core carrier of the new VentiFresh ECO has 3 times higher coating density which means 3 times more exposure to capture odor molecules. It also has improved nano-material compounds (photocatalyst we used is a nano substance), specialized custom-made fiber carrier to form stronger, durable bonds with the photocatalyst, which results in improved processing power and 50% more efficiency decomposing VOCs (Variable Organic Compounds, odors) and molds.

 

Mood lighting is incorporated to add a nice touch to your living space.
Quiet mode - minimum fan noise while in use.
Turbo mode - 30% more processing speed for faster results.
Standby mode - calming mood lighting at power plug-in, standing by for operation.

 

New silicone ring is added to protect the shiny and elegant housing.

 

 

 

 

FAQ
 

Q: Can I use any USB power bank with VentiFresh ECO?

Yes, VentiFresh ECO can pair with any DC5V power bank

Q: How long do I need to turn it on every day? 

Depending on where you use VentiFresh ECO, the time needed to deodorize the air varies and can be decided by yourself. Just plug in when you feel the need to freshen up the air. For more stinky places, you may keep it running for more than 10 hours a day.  

Q: Does the product need maintenance? How do I clean it? 

VentiFresh ECO is hassle free. There is nearly no maintenance required, there’s no replacing ﬁlter or reﬁll parts.  See the Product Specs above for care instructions.   

Q: Will it use much electricity? 

If you keep a VentiFresh ECO running for 24 hours, it would cost less than $0.40 (residential rate at 2.16KW running 24/7) per month in most American states. Power costs refer to the latest average price of electricity by the US Department of Energy.   https://www.eia.gov/electricity/monthly/epm_tab...

Q: Is the product safe to use?

The product has passed Photobiological Safety Testing (IEC62471), which tested UV lighting reaction with animal eyes. Our product is classiﬁed as no hazard “exempt class”. It is safe to you and your pets. 

There are speculations on various types of photocatalyst products producing harmful by-products (chemicals). It is not related to our product design and usage because the product runs on low power DC5V and it’s used in the residential environment, not in the industrial environments where toxic chemicals are already present, and by-products may be possibly generated from processing these chemicals. 

The UV photocatalyst process of VentiFresh ECO mainly converts odor compounds into water vapor and carbon dioxide, in very small, almost undetectable amounts. The capacity of VentiFresh ECO yields much less water and carbon dioxide comparing with a human for the same period of time. Animals also breathe in air (a mixture of compounds) and exhale mainly water vapor and carbon dioxide.  

Q. How much is shipping?

The shipping cost is different for every perk and shipping location. Please select the perk you want, enter your shipping location, and a shipping cost will be calculated.

Q. Will I have to pay customs and VAT?

Contributors are generally responsible for assuring the product can be lawfully imported to the destination country. The recipient is the importer of record and must comply with all laws and regulations of the destination country. Orders may be subject to import taxes, customs duties, and fees which are levied once a shipment reaches the recipient's country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient. We have no control over these charges.

Q. How long is the warranty?

VentiFresh ECO comes with 1-year limited warranty for Indiegogo backers. We also ensure that every unit is free from manufacturer defects and handled with the utmost care during shipment.
 
Q: Have any questions not listed here? 

Send us a message through the Ask a Question link above.

Q: Interested in writing about us? 

Our press kit is available for download here.

story:
Could you imagine that preparing a simple slice of bread can provide an exceptional experience?

We have turned imagination into reality.

R&D has delivered the solution:

The Spread-IT Heated Butter Knife!


Inspiration came one morning when the food prepared wasn’t really appetizing.

I felt I had to make a change, and shared my idea with my engineer friend. He designed the technical solution to transform my dream into practical reality. 

Finally, Spread-IT was born.

Technical description

The blade is equipped with a unique heater, capable of supplying the necessary heat evenly throughout the surface of the blade.

Constant temperature is guaranteed by the thermal sensor built into the blade, for maximum protection against overheating.

Added safety is provided by the touch sensor, making a switch unnecessary, as it is turned on by the human touch.


Specifications

  1. Stainless alloy blade with heated element
  2. Temperature indicator light
  3. Circuit board, with capacitive touch sensor
  4. 1020mah 3.7v lithium ion battery
  5. Brushed stainless steel casing
  6. Micro USB B connector, with charge indicator light

Charging is done through a micro-USB port with a waterproof plug – Spread-IT is fully waterproof and safe.


What's in the package?

  • Spread-IT - the heated butter knife
  • Instruction manual

  • 110-220V 0,8-1A Micro USB B charger

About our team

Three of us started this project, which allowed our product to be the result of solely in-house planning, development, and design work.

Following 20 months of research and development the technology has been perfected and by now the flawlessly functioning prototype is ready.

At last, we can present you this advanced, unique, and stylish kitchen utensil.

Thank you for helping us in our project! Share, and Spread the love.
