story:
Short summary


Sofia is a system of intelligent houses management built on modern technology. 

Its goal is to bring modern technology and comfort living among possibly the widest group of people. This idea comes from our practical experience, during which we met many people which just high initial costs have forced to give up the comfort that comes with these systems.
The second objective is the transition from PC to ARM architecture, so that we  reduce initial costs again.
Other, equally important goal, is to bring Sofia for the widest mass of people  in everybody's own language.
The last goal is the simplicity of installation and user control. That the installation of Sofia could be done by every -at least a little technically skilled- individual. User's settings should be handled by everyone who knows to check common web pages.

Wider information

Sofia is a new type of automated technology management in a house, which is nowadays often called an Intelligent System, or Smart House. It is a system which controls the heating, lighting, blinds, ventilation, air conditioning, and also works as an electronic security system and the electronic fire alarm system. Compared to the competing technologies it has the advantage of our simple setup and better availability for the general public due to lower price of creating costs.

Sofia has been designed so that it can be installed by every individual that has at least little technical skills. After installing there are coming up a user settings that can be done by everyone who can handle ordinary web browsing or email checking on a PC, mobile or tablet.

Schematic representation of involvement Sofia Modules - specifically control of heating, lighting and access control systems:


Sofia consists of two main parts - the hardware and the software. Hardware consist of the Sofia Server and the Modules. Software consists of the core of the system, who provides running of system and Web GUI (Graphical User Interface).

The substential part of the system is software running on Debian, so the extension of the system is the matter of additional programming of other software modules. Web GUI is built into the server. So on any client device is not necessary to install or set anything. You can do complete setting on each device with a modern web browser that supports HTML5. This graphic interface has two levels - service and users level. Service level is used to configure the foundations of the system so that factory default system gets into a fully functioning state. The User level is allowed to set the function settings, and programs such as temperature, color or intensity of light.

Home screen (only in Slovak language yet):

UPDATE:And now in english:

Screen from service level - hardware tree with hardware information and  "search button" (this button can find new hardware or hardware's changes):

UPDATE:And now in english:

Installation / circuit screen  - this is where "service man" can map sensors to right relay outputs and thus creating  the circuit:



UPDATE:And now in english:

Circuits assignments - contains settings which user can control which circuits:

UPDATE:And now in english:

Regulation - the users can set how those regulated areas should behave:

UPDATE:And now in english:


The Sofia interface can be accessed directly as to any other website. Within a home Local Area Network you enter corresponding IP address to browser, and you can set.
Of course thanks to OpenVPN technology and Internet you can access from anywhere in the world. Using this technology will establish a direct encryption tunnel leading from your device (PC, laptop, tablet, mobile phone ...) directly to your home  Sofia Server. This allows you to check from everywhere whether you remembered to turn off the lights or turn down heating when you're not there or raise the temperature when you're about to return home.

Sofia connection with the outside world:

Access through the Internet is possible directly and indirectly via encryption VPN tunnel.

  • Indirect tunnel is being redirected from your device through the VPN server to your Sofia Server. For such redirection you can use our VPN servers, as well as third-party (or your own) OpenVPN server. This method is independent of the type of Internet connection in your house. It is suitable for everyone, so it's recommended way of remote connection.
  • Direct tunnel is routed directly from your device to your Sofia Server. To establish a direct tunnel is necessary to have on your home Internet connection public IP address. Also you must be able to set up your home router to redirect one port directly to Sofia Server. If your public IP address is static, it is not necessary to do anything more. If your public IP address is dynamic (varies under some conditions) it is appropriate to use some of available free services  to pursue changes of your IP and update that address assigned with your domain. Such service offers for example noip.org.

Various options to access Sofia server via Internet:


The main hardware consists of the Server (PC x86-64bit architecture yet) and the Modules. Some of the modules are bridges from one type of buses to the other type. Some of them are  input (digital or analogue)/output devices. The last but not least members of these hardware family are Remote Sensors (temperature, humidity, movement, pressure, access) and outputs for relay or RGB light-controller.

Extension of the system in terms of hardware is in certain cases the development of additional hardware, such as a local switch or module RGB lighting.

The system components are connected by wire, so that Sofia is suitable for newly constructed houses or renovated houses. But even already completed houses do not lose the comfort which Sofia provides. The wiring of Sofia is really not complicated. For majority of applications, the existing unused structured wiring (originally designed for PC LAN) can be used. In some future version of Sofia, we would like to focus especially on communication of individual components in the LAN network, That allows utilization of cables of home LAN that are already in use.

Example of the hardware module - relay module (homemade prototype):


Nowadays the project has completed the prototype phase. At this stage, we tested the complete system, which controls directly the heaters in the family house, so we can say that currently Sofia supports the control and the regulation of heating.In the following months, we would like to develop additional modules of lighting and fire alarm system. And rework the web interface for multilingual version.

UPDATE:We made the first step towards the transition to multi-language Sofia. We inserted support of selection and displaying different language versions into the WEB GUI. And we also prepared first lingual version- English. With this first language we would like to - with your kind help - make translations into many other languages.

First homemade tested prototypes:

Real In-House prototype - This is our first testing house where Sofia is based on classic PC architecture, and controls only heating:



What We Need & What You Get

We need financial support mainly for the extension of Sofia's modules that were mentioned, system transformation to multilingual, subsequently the start of serial production.
Part of collected finance will be used to full-time employment of hardware and software technicians that will implement other hardware and software modules in Sofia – such as access control (security system), fire protection systems, lighting and air conditioning.
We have created the prototype in the mother language, but for the success of the project is very important that Sofia must be available to the general public not only because low prices, but also in proper language, so some of the money will be used for the translation of texts used in Web GUI, and for the adaptation of software to support language setup.


It is fact that the biggest is serial production the cheapest is one piece of the final product.
Therefore, we need huge amount of finances, so that we could begin bigger serial production.

With 100 pcs the price would be almost comparable to much larger series (1000pcs series) but also production of 25pcs cheapens the product enough that it is interesting for the beginning....
Other finance we need to buy additional development hardware resources such as multichannel digital oscilloscope with memory, PC pluggable and operating under Linux. And also hardware development kit for the ARM architecture, and a draft of hardware that is optimized for this architecture ....

If we won't get enough amounts of money, from what we gain, we will mainly finance the transition to a multi-language, change to arm, and the start of serial production ....

Perks :

We have two types of rewards:

  • Perks that are some modules from our production. With these perks you support serial production, what allows reduction of prices and fulfillment of the main aim - the affordability for everyone. 

  • Perks which are gifts that makes support to our project so we can achieve our aims. In these rewards the perk value is lower than the value of your gift (eg  15€ - LED USB flashlight, 50 € - frost effect mug with owlet - Sofia motive... etc...).  With this gifts you support further development of Sofia. Mainly the support for the multilinguality, movement to ARM and further creation of modules that expand the use of Sofia. 

The price of perks already includes shipping around the world. We will send packages by Slovak Postal Service, that can reach you almost anywhere.  In the specific case that you are on the place where it can't reach you, we'll contact you to decide further action.


Risks

The only problem in this stage of the project is the lack of funding. If we have enough of Finance to launch x piece series, it may happen that the cost per unit will be too large to start the project in large-scale. We could get into a vicious circle from which it is very difficult to escape: little capital => small series => relatively high price => few products sold (and failure of one of the main objectives - to get modern technology among ordinary people) => little capital for further development.


If you find our project interesting, but you do not have funds...

If you find our project interesting, but you do not have funds that you can help us, you can help us with translations. One of the aims is multilanguality, and any help with translation into different languages will be welcomed.
It is possible that if there was enough interest in helping us with the translation, we'd do some system designed to manage the translation of texts, or some forum where only the registered ones have access, and communicate there with each other and manage the goals.
story_txt:
Short
summarySofia is a system of intelligent houses
management built on modern technology. Its goal is to bring modern technology and comfort living
among possibly the widest  group of people. This idea comes from our
practical experience, during which we met many people which just high
initial costs have forced to give up the comfort that comes with
these systems.The second objective is the transition from PC to ARM architecture, so that we  reduce initial costs again. Other, equally important goal, is to bring Sofia for the widest mass of people  in everybody's own language. The last goal is the simplicity of installation and user control. That the installation of Sofia could be done by every -at least a little technically skilled- individual. User's settings should be handled by everyone who knows to check common web pages.Wider
informationSofia is a new type of automated technology
management in a house, which is nowadays often called an
Intelligent System, or Smart House. It is a system which controls the heating, lighting, blinds,
ventilation, air conditioning, and also works as an electronic security system and
the electronic fire alarm system. Compared to the competing technologies it has the
advantage of our simple setup and better availability for the general
public due to lower price of creating costs.Sofia has been designed so that it can be installed by every individual that has at least little technical skills. After installing there are coming up a user settings that can be done by everyone who can handle ordinary web browsing or email checking on a PC, mobile or tablet. Schematic representation of involvement Sofia Modules - specifically control of heating, lighting and access control systems:Sofia consists of two
main parts - the hardware and the software. Hardware consist of the Sofia Server and the Modules. Software consists of the core of the
system, who provides running of system and Web
GUI (Graphical User Interface).The substential part of the system
is software running on Debian, so the extension of the system is the
matter of  additional programming of other software modules. Web GUI
is built into the server. So on any client device is not
necessary to install or set anything. You can do complete setting on
each device with a modern web browser that supports HTML5. This
graphic interface has two levels - service and users level. Service
level is used to configure the foundations of the system so that
factory default system gets into a fully functioning state. The User
level is allowed to set the function settings, and programs such as
temperature, color or intensity of light.Home screen (only in Slovak language yet):UPDATE:And now in english:Screen from service level - hardware tree with hardware information and  "search button" (this button can find new hardware or hardware's changes): UPDATE:And now in english:Installation / circuit screen  - this is where "service man" can map sensors to right relay outputs and thus creating  the circuit:

UPDATE:And now in english:Circuits assignments - contains settings which user can control which circuits: UPDATE:And now in english:Regulation - the users can set how those regulated areas should behave:UPDATE:And now in english:The Sofia interface can be accessed directly as to any other website. Within a home Local Area Network you enter corresponding IP address to browser, and you can set. Of course thanks to OpenVPN technology and Internet you can access from anywhere in the world. Using this technology will establish a direct encryption tunnel leading from your device (PC, laptop, tablet, mobile phone ...) directly to your home  Sofia Server. This allows you to check from everywhere whether you remembered to turn off the lights or turn down heating when you're not there or raise the temperature when you're about to return home.Sofia connection with the outside world:Access through the Internet is possible directly and indirectly via encryption VPN tunnel.



Indirect tunnel is being redirected from your device through the VPN server to your Sofia Server. For such redirection you can use our VPN servers,
 as well as third-party (or your own) OpenVPN server. This method is independent of the type of Internet connection in your house. It is suitable for everyone, so it's recommended way of remote connection.


Direct tunnel is routed directly from your device to your Sofia Server. To establish a direct tunnel is necessary to have on your home Internet connection public IP address. Also you must be able to set up your home router to redirect one port directly to Sofia Server. If your public IP address is static, it is not necessary to do anything more. If
 your public IP address is dynamic (varies under some conditions) it is 
appropriate to use some of available free services  to pursue changes of your 
IP and update that address assigned with your domain. Such service offers for example noip.org.


Various options to access Sofia server via Internet:


The main hardware consists of the Server (PC x86-64bit architecture yet)
 and the Modules. Some of the modules are bridges from one type of buses
 to the other type. Some of them are  input (digital or analogue)/output
 devices. The last but not least members of these hardware family are Remote Sensors (temperature, humidity, movement, pressure, access) and outputs for relay or RGB light-controller.Extension of
the system in terms of hardware is in certain cases the development
of additional hardware, such as a local switch or module RGB
lighting.
The system components are connected by wire, so that Sofia is suitable for newly constructed houses or renovated houses. But even already completed houses do not lose the comfort which Sofia provides. The wiring of Sofia is really not complicated. For majority of applications, the existing unused structured wiring (originally designed for PC LAN) can be used. In some future version of Sofia, we would like to focus especially on communication of individual components in the LAN network, That allows utilization of cables of home LAN that are already in use.
Example of the hardware module - relay module (homemade prototype):



Nowadays the
project has completed the prototype phase. At this stage, we tested the
complete system, which controls directly the heaters in the family
house, so we can say that currently Sofia supports the control and
the regulation of heating.In the following months, we would like
to develop additional modules  of lighting and fire alarm system. And
rework the web interface for multilingual version.
UPDATE:We made the first step towards the transition to multi-language Sofia. We inserted support of selection and displaying different language versions into the WEB GUI. And we also prepared first lingual version- English. With this first language we would like to - with your kind help - make translations into many other languages.
First homemade tested prototypes:



Real In-House prototype - This is our first testing house where Sofia is based on classic PC architecture, and controls only heating:




What
We Need & What You Get

We need financial
support mainly for the extension of Sofia's modules that were
mentioned,  system transformation to multilingual, subsequently the
start of serial production.Part of collected finance will be used
to full-time employment of hardware and software technicians that will
implement other hardware and software modules in Sofia – such as
access control (security system), fire protection systems, lighting
and air conditioning.We have created the prototype in the mother
language, but for the success of the project is very important that
Sofia must be available to the general public not only because low

adaptation of software to support language setup.
It is fact
that the biggest is serial production the cheapest is one piece of the
final product.Therefore, we need huge amount of finances, so that
we could begin bigger serial production.



With 100 pcs the price would be almost comparable to much larger
series (1000pcs series) but also production of 25pcs cheapens the
product enough that it is interesting for the beginning....Other
finance we need to buy additional development
hardware resources such as multichannel digital oscilloscope
with memory, PC pluggable and operating under Linux. And also
hardware development kit for the ARM architecture, and a draft of
hardware that is optimized for this architecture ....
If we won't get enough amounts of money, from what we gain, we
will mainly finance the transition to a multi-language, change to arm,
and the start of serial production ....Perks  
:
We have two types of rewards:


Perks that are some modules from
our production. With these perks you support serial production, what allows reduction of prices and fulfillment of the main aim - the affordability for everyone. 

Perks which are gifts that makes support to
our project so we can achieve our aims. In these rewards the perk value is lower than the value of your gift (eg  15€ - LED USB flashlight,
50 € - frost effect mug with owlet - Sofia motive... etc...).  With this gifts you support further development of Sofia. Mainly the support for the multilinguality, movement to ARM and further creation of modules that expand the use of Sofia. 


The price of perks already includes shipping around the world. We will send packages by Slovak Postal Service, that can reach you almost anywhere.  In the specific case that you are on the place where it can't reach you, we'll contact you to decide further action.



Risks

The only problem in this stage of the
project is the lack of funding. If we have enough of Finance to
launch x piece series, it may happen that the cost per unit will be

capital => small series => relatively high price => few
products sold (and  failure of one of the main objectives - to get
modern technology among ordinary people) => little capital for
further development.


If you find our project interesting,
but you do not have funds...

but you do not have funds that you can help us, you can help us with
translations. One of the aims is multilanguality, and any help with
translation into different languages will be welcomed.It is
possible that  if there was enough interest in helping us with the

story:
PHO2WALL

As retired entrepreneur I gladly watch all fotos as memories of my trips around the world and meetings with businessfriends. Also images of my family and friends from years ago and to date. So many old fotos have been scanned and so many are available, but only if I find and open them. Now I will see them, on several fotoframes on my own digital PHO2WALL. 

  • I been in the graphicall industry for many years and still fascinated with technique and software.
  • This campaign should enable me to finish the further technical development and design.
  • Contributors will help to get so many digital memories out of the 'dust' and keep them alive.

What We Need & What You Get

  • For the last 2 months we been working to get the technical circuit
    At this moment the engineers finished and are testing a prototype with 2 displays .
  • Subscribers will have influence on the layout of the wall and software features.
    PHO2WALL will be supplied at cost-price (+ shipping) 
  • Funds will be used to pay off the engineers and to buy hardware for further testing and design.  Designers will layout walls for 2 to 10 fotodisplays with different themes.
  • Marketing will be cost some as well.

Risks & Challenges

  • Important now is it to find best quality digital foto frame displays. Will proceed research shortly.
  • Finding good industrial designers is a challenge we have as well.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Any help and promotion for this campaign is very much welcome.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
The Quest To Find An Affordable WIFI Monitor Camera Has Finally Come To An End! The LOOKcam Is HERE! The LOOKcam Does Everything The More Expensive Cameras Do at an Affordable Price With NO Storage Fees. The LOOKcam Will Upload Your Videos To Your Dropbox account and Record Them On a TF/Micro SD Card (not included) When A Memory Card Is Inserted. If No memory Card Is Inserted It Will Function As a WIFI Monitor Only.  You Can Receive Alerts When Motion Or Sound Is Detected.  You Can View Your LOOKcam Anywhere in the World With Our Free App iOS or Android And With The Snapshot Feature You Can Take A Picture With The LOOKcam Anytime.  The LOOKcam Has a Magnetic Base for Optimal 360 degree Placement.  The LOOKcam Is Also Equipped With A Two Way Talk Feature Allowing You to Talk Through The Camera With The Push Of A Button On The App.

 

Screenshot Of Our App


We Have Finished Product Testing And App Integration And Are Now Raising Funds To Complete The Packaging And Our Website.  We Expect To Have Units Ready To Deliver at The End Of November.
Thank You For Taking The Time To Check Us Out!

story:
Sotiris Sotiropoulos - Textile Engineer, Alexandra Sotiropoulos - Designer
http://ascentofgreece.wix.com/scent-of-greece

A few words about our campaign:

Respecting the history and the culture of our country, we decided to get involved with the greatest industry in our country......Tourism.

Unfortunately, the market is flooded with Chinese goods, imitating Greek Art. So, we developed a line of attractive and high quality bath and table linens, embroidered with unique designs with a "Scent of Greece"
By supporting this project you will be helping unemployed young people get a job. Starting with 6 people and increasing the number of employees in due time, as the business builds up.

"Marble" Set of 4 pure linen table napkins


"Olive" Pure linen and cotton hand towels

"Olive" Set of 4 Pure linen placemats and table napkins

"Amphora" Set of 4 Cocktail Napkins

"Sea Shells" Set of 3 pure linen guest towels

"Hydrangea" Cotton and Linen Hand and Face Towels

"Hydrangea" Pure Linen Table Linens

"Hydrangea" Set of 4 Placemats and 4 Table Napkins - Pure Linen.

After having produced our samples, we have visited a considerable number of potential customers, such as first class Hotels and Souvenir shops. We never expected that our idea would have such a welcome reaction.

We are convinced that this is an ideal market for our products.
http://ascentofgreece.wix.com/scent-of-greece

Budget:
12 head Embroidery Machine................................. $ 110,000
Raw Materials (Fabrics, Threads).......................... $  38,000
Sewing Machines, Cutting & Sewing..................... $  22,000
Working Space/Show Room,
Construction and Rental......................................... $  28,000
Working Capital........................................................ $  32,000

                                 TOTAL ....................................... $ 230,000

story:
What is GrindE?

 

It is the newest, easiest and most compact way of grinding herbs in the 21st century.

Twisting and turning a grinder can be tough. Anyone who uses current hand grinders or a Mortar & Pestle can tell you herb grinder technology is outdated and outmoded. With our Patent Pending design allows for ease of use and efficiency. GrindE is the replacement to the thousands year old Mortar and Pestle. 

Recognizing this, we have developed GrindE as a major leap forward for the field, pioneering automated, cutting-edge design concepts that will make it easier for you to grind your herbs and spices. 

Unlike traditional grinders, GrindE works automatically, its grind function turning on whenever you push the button at the top of the grinder. That means you will no longer need to throw your back and your shoulders into rotating the grinder blades, and running on a powerful battery, GrindE charges through a USB, just like all your favorite devices.

Main Cutting Chamber Open, Chassis and Body

Above: GrindE Unassembled (Chassis, Body, Screen, Lower Tray)

Easy to clean and easy to maintain as well, GrindE collects pollen instantly as well, storing it below the grinder for safekeeping.

This is the modern way to grind your herb, and we are ready to launch it worldwide!

 

The GrindE Timeline of Events

 

 

Funding

Right now, we are turning to you, Indiegogo, for help in creating awareness and  raising the funds that we need to manufacture, market, and distribute GrindE on a large scale. We are thrilled to bring our advanced herb grinder to market, and every contribution helps us get one step closer to doing so. At this point funding will be put towards production as Tooling has been paid for and are waiting on the completion of that phase of production.

If you really believe in GrindE's potential check out one of our Perks, which are pre-purchase offers!

Challenges of this Project

The desire to create this product comes from laziness and the current state of progressing technology. We live in an age of NOW. It hasn't been an easy road, lots of ups and downs. First prototype breaking within 5 minutes of getting it. Trying to do too much on the second prototype and over complicating things. Throughout I remained determined to come through because I believe in creating something and the people will come. Now it is time to see if the people will come out.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Get the word out about the Campaign and GrindE! Post it on your feed and let the social media world see it.


We appreciate all your support, and we thank you for your time.

story:
Imagine a Lifestyle With Smart Home Tech

 

Wiscloud's Smart Home System

When building our technology, we set out to simplify your lifestyle and add an extra layer of convenience to help you make the most of your time at home:

  • Set and easily activate your preferred ambiance for areas 
  • Keep your home & family safe
  • Monitor & control when you're away
  • Save money with no 3rd-party contracts & optimize use of resources

Our integrated technology and device-enabled controls can be used for Smart Homes, Smart Cities, Commercial, & Agriculture.

Featured in:

 

What Is Wiscloud?

Wiscloud is a high-tech research and development company that integrates Internet of Things products, hardware design, software design, and development, as well as cloud computing service platforms, data storage, and artificial intelligence services.

Wiscloud’s systems provide the world's leading IoT, and has a complete product line of software, hardware, and platform applications, used in a variety of fields. We’re totally open source, and welcome software and hardware developers to partner with us for any application.

To break it down, it is a cloud-based server that operates your home and its environment. Through our technology, you or A.I. can control, monitor the temperature and humidity in your home, your lights, your electronic devices, alarm systems, and any other fixtures within your home and business.

 

Wiscloud's Powerful Network & The Wisbox Mini

You may be familiar with other cloud-based products that connect to your phone, tablet, or even laptop computer. However, Wiscloud is unique in that it is self-operating with a proprietary network. The system uses what we call Nebula Mesh Network communication, which is safer and more reliable than Wifi or Bluetooth, far exceeding beyond Zigbee and Z-wave. It is a fully automatic mesh network that is able to transfer information using the shortest route with reliable efficiency.

When compared to the current other technologies, it does not require a controller – router set up like other networks where if the controller fails, the entire system fails. Each product containing the Nebula module is able to act both as a controller and router, making a far more reliable meshed network. You do not need internet service or a WiFi connection to operate Wiscloud, it is its own internet hub.

The Wisbox Mini, or the 'brain' of the system, can connect more than thousands of devices, reach up to 30 rooms and has a range of multiple floors! And it fits in the palm of your hand (now THAT's some powerful tech).

 

Wiscloud is the INTERNET of EVERYTHING in your space.

Smart lighting & the Wisbox Mini – Redefining how lights work

When Wisbox Mini is coupled deployed with Wiscloud smart switches, light controls can be paired up in any combination with no additional wiring. Pairing configuration includes: one switch linked to one light source, multiple switches linked to one light source or one switch to turn on multiple light sources. All light switches status can be monitored directly from your smart phone. Light switches can also be programmed to turn on or off based on event, time or user instruction.

Uniquely Smart Light Switches

Wiscloud's Smart Light Switches are hyper-customizable only limited by your imagination and the devices available in your home. You can program one or multiple functions to be controlled at the push of a button - the easiest way to set your room's desire ambiance in one action. Plus, the back-lit button is easy to see in the dark when you need it most. durable tempered glass for heat, water and strength resistance, very easy to clean.

Smart Switch Benefits:

  • Programmable settings by action
  • Can pair with different kinds and multiple devices
  • One-touch icons in Control Center to activate (Phone /tablet /computer)

 

Convenience, Security, Health

Wiscloud includes six smart air quality sensors (gadgets that receive information from the physical environment and uses their own built-in computed systems to interpret this data to provide functionality to the Wiscloud) to monitor and control many aspects of your home environment.

If the smart sensor detects an issue or a limit breach, it triggers a response, creating a safe and comfortable environment in your home, office, or commercial space.

The system goes above and beyond to ensure your safety - sounding an alarm, flashing lights, connecting to the network to send out alert messages to your connected devices and even goes the extra mile by activating Artificial Intelligence to take immediate action such as shutting off a stove.

The combination of the Smart Light Switch, Door/Window Sensors, and the Wisbox Mini will allow you to control your environment seamlessly while providing you the peace of mind that your wellbeing is the priority.

 

Smart Elderly Care

Coincidentally, the Smart Home System is also very practical for caring for the elderly. Smart Switches, Smart Outlets and other automation devices ease the burden of less physically able elders or disabled individuals.

The system allows close ones to remotely monitor, assist and respond to emergency situations to keep them safe. Caring for your loved ones when you can't be there: priceless.

 

 

Our Why & The Wiscloud Story

Wiscloud is the brainchild of a team of entrepreneurs who realized the potential of home automation. In 2007, Wiscloud was formed with one purpose: to connect the world to the Internet of Things.

The patented technologies the system runs on a closed-circuit, meaning only you can access and control your devices. 

Cloud Computing & The Internet Of Things

Why we started Wiscloud and developed Nebula protocol and 7 other technologies in the first place is because the current smart home products on the market have many issues that make it a negative experience and not the seamless automation we set out to create:

  • The different brand devices do not communicate and require different apps (too many apps are needed to control an entire home).
  • WiFi and Bluetooth networks are not reliable, have a short connecting distance and not secure enough against hacking. Zigbee and Z-Wave also have many cons.
  • Most systems still need users to give commands each time with a voice-enabled device or phone app, and that is not the fully automated/ A.I we envisioned.
  • Most home systems do not have the ability to handle smart business, the commercial industry or the potential of Smart Communities.

We think outside the box only to create a better solution for the average person to control their space conveniently and securely to maximize their technology's potential. 

____________________________________________________________________________

 

So we developed Wiscloud Smart system to be the most reliable, stable, secure Artificial Intelligence.

The system is compatible with many other brands' smart devices - letting you control them all in one place.

While our company is a decade in business, our staff and innovative technological experts encompass over two decades of technology and computing platform experience. Our CEO John Hu, alone comes from an extensive background as an IOT Master, bringing his experience and his innovation to Wiscloud to help connect the world and maximize the potential of our technology.

 

The Wiscloud Team

 

 

Our Progress and You

We are ready to produce this innovative technology for the masses, however, we need your help. Our product is tested and the markets have jumped to be first in line to buy and sell our product. However, we need to fund production. 

With your help, we can get this innovative technology out in the US markets and abroad.

Other Milestones:

  • If we reach $300k, we begin production of the Tablet Control Center
  • If we reach $500k, we can develop the Smart Community App

How You Can Help

We need funding to get these products to you faster - and this is where you can help us. If you can donate today, you will be among the first to receive one of our six innovative products at a reduced price by ordering the perks on the right.

You can also donate directly to our campaign:

We understand not everyone can assist financially. You can share our campaign with your network and that would help even more. The more people aware of our campaign, the closer we will get to our goal!

Thank you to all of our supporters.

_____________________________________________

 

Wiscloud Crowdfunding Frequently Asked Questions

 

  1. Do I need a Wi-Fi connection to set up the system?

    The Wiscloud Smart Home System can be used with or without WiFi connection. To maximize the benefits of the technology, use a wireless internet connection to enable its smart features, including the ability to get instant notifications to your devices and control straight from your smartphone.
     
  2. Does the system require direct power lines to function?

     The system operates wirelessly using its Nebula Protocol Network and Wifi. Some devices need plug into a power outlet and some use battery.
     
  3. Do I need to have existing smart home products for the Wisbox Mini to work?

    No. Your space may already have technology that is compatible with our Wiscloud System. Any additional Wiscloud products and other compatible products simply add more functionality to your Smart Home. Our control system compatible with many home appliances and security devices.(Signal include IR, RF315, RF433..)
     
  4. How long does it take to set-up?

    It depends on the number of devices and how tech-savvy you are but on average a few minutes per device pairing.
     
  5. Do I need to remove the product(s) to charge them?

    No.
     
  1. Are there any additional fees?

    No. We do not charge any 3rd party fees on a contract since you own your products and the network is all yours to use. All our technology operates without any monthly fees. We’re not out for your money, we just want to make your space a better place with Smart Home technology that is accessible to all. Even better - you will get grocery shopping and restaurants food discount and even cash back rebates when you use our Smart Community app.
     
  2. Where can I download the app?

    You can download the app for Android and iOS. Download links are included with the purchase of products or if included in perk. You can also use Web page end control it from your computer or phone. It is more compatibility and practicability,
  3. SHIPPING: When will I receive my products

    You will receive an email in February updating you on the status of your perk. We estimate the products will be shipping in March 2018.
     
  4.  SHIPPING: How will my product be shipped? Will there be tracking numbers?

    Yes, there will be tracking information shared with you. It will ship from a warehouse in California or an Amazon distribution center.
     
  5. Is there a Warranty and Technical Support?

    Yes, there is a 1-year Manufacturer's Warranty and we have a US-based Technical Support Team as well. For any inquiries, you can email Contact@iWiscloud.com .
story_txt:
Imagine a Lifestyle With Smart Home Tech

 

Wiscloud's Smart Home System
When building our technology, we set out to simplify your lifestyle and add an extra layer of convenience to help you make the most of your time at home:

Set and easily activate your preferred ambiance for areas 
Keep your home & family safe
Monitor & control when you're away
Save money with no 3rd-party contracts & optimize use of resources

Our integrated technology and device-enabled controls can be used for Smart Homes, Smart Cities, Commercial, & Agriculture.
Featured in:

 
What Is Wiscloud?
Wiscloud is a high-tech research and development company that integrates Internet of Things products, hardware design, software design, and development, as well as cloud computing service platforms, data storage, and artificial intelligence services.
Wiscloud’s systems provide the world's leading IoT, and has a complete product line of software, hardware, and platform applications, used in a variety of fields. We’re totally open source, and welcome software and hardware developers to partner with us for any application.

To break it down, it is a cloud-based server that operates your home and its environment. Through our technology, you or A.I. can control, monitor the temperature and humidity in your home, your lights, your electronic devices, alarm systems, and any other fixtures within your home and business.

 
Wiscloud's Powerful Network & The Wisbox Mini
You may be familiar with other cloud-based products that connect to your phone, tablet, or even laptop computer. However, Wiscloud is unique in that it is self-operating with a proprietary network. The system uses what we call Nebula Mesh Network communication, which is safer and more reliable than Wifi or Bluetooth, far exceeding beyond Zigbee and Z-wave. It is a fully automatic mesh network that is able to transfer information using the shortest route with reliable efficiency.
When compared to the current other technologies, it does not require a controller – router set up like other networks where if the controller fails, the entire system fails. Each product containing the Nebula module is able to act both as a controller and router, making a far more reliable meshed network. You do not need internet service or a WiFi connection to operate Wiscloud, it is its own internet hub.

The Wisbox Mini, or the 'brain' of the system, can connect more than thousands of devices, reach up to 30 rooms and has a range of multiple floors! And it fits in the palm of your hand (now THAT's some powerful tech).
 
Wiscloud is the INTERNET of EVERYTHING in your space.

Smart lighting & the Wisbox Mini – Redefining how lights work
When Wisbox Mini is coupled deployed with Wiscloud smart switches, light controls can be paired up in any combination with no additional wiring. Pairing configuration includes: one switch linked to one light source, multiple switches linked to one light source or one switch to turn on multiple light sources. All light switches status can be monitored directly from your smart phone. Light switches can also be programmed to turn on or off based on event, time or user instruction.

Uniquely Smart Light Switches

Wiscloud's Smart Light Switches are hyper-customizable only limited by your imagination and the devices available in your home. You can program one or multiple functions to be controlled at the push of a button - the easiest way to set your room's desire ambiance in one action. Plus, the back-lit button is easy to see in the dark when you need it most. durable tempered glass for heat, water and strength resistance, very easy to clean.

Smart Switch Benefits:

Programmable settings by action
Can pair with different kinds and multiple devices
One-touch icons in Control Center to activate (Phone /tablet /computer)

 
Convenience, Security, Health
Wiscloud includes six smart air quality sensors (gadgets that receive information from the physical environment and uses their own built-in computed systems to interpret this data to provide functionality to the Wiscloud) to monitor and control many aspects of your home environment.

If the smart sensor detects an issue or a limit breach, it triggers a response, creating a safe and comfortable environment in your home, office, or commercial space.
The system goes above and beyond to ensure your safety - sounding an alarm, flashing lights, connecting to the network to send out alert messages to your connected devices and even goes the extra mile by activating Artificial Intelligence to take immediate action such as shutting off a stove.

The combination of the Smart Light Switch, Door/Window Sensors, and the Wisbox Mini will allow you to control your environment seamlessly while providing you the peace of mind that your wellbeing is the priority.
 
Smart Elderly Care

Coincidentally, the Smart Home System is also very practical for caring for the elderly. Smart Switches, Smart Outlets and other automation devices ease the burden of less physically able elders or disabled individuals.
The system allows close ones to remotely monitor, assist and respond to emergency situations to keep them safe. Caring for your loved ones when you can't be there: priceless.
 

 

Our Why & The Wiscloud Story
Wiscloud is the brainchild of a team of entrepreneurs who realized the potential of home automation. In 2007, Wiscloud was formed with one purpose: to connect the world to the Internet of Things.
The patented technologies the system runs on a closed-circuit, meaning only you can access and control your devices. 
Cloud Computing & The Internet Of Things
Why we started Wiscloud and developed Nebula protocol and 7 other technologies in the first place is because the current smart home products on the market have many issues that make it a negative experience and not the seamless automation we set out to create:

The different brand devices do not communicate and require different apps (too many apps are needed to control an entire home).
WiFi and Bluetooth networks are not reliable, have a short connecting distance and not secure enough against hacking. Zigbee and Z-Wave also have many cons.
Most systems still need users to give commands each time with a voice-enabled device or phone app, and that is not the fully automated/ A.I we envisioned.
Most home systems do not have the ability to handle smart business, the commercial industry or the potential of Smart Communities.

We think outside the box only to create a better solution for the average person to control their space conveniently and securely to maximize their technology's potential. 
____________________________________________________________________________
 
So we developed Wiscloud Smart system to be the most reliable, stable, secure Artificial Intelligence.

The system is compatible with many other brands' smart devices - letting you control them all in one place.
While our company is a decade in business, our staff and innovative technological experts encompass over two decades of technology and computing platform experience. Our CEO John Hu, alone comes from an extensive background as an IOT Master, bringing his experience and his innovation to Wiscloud to help connect the world and maximize the potential of our technology.



 
The Wiscloud Team

We are ready to produce this innovative technology for the masses, however, we need your help. Our product is tested and the markets have jumped to be first in line to buy and sell our product. However, we need to fund production. 
With your help, we can get this innovative technology out in the US markets and abroad.

story:
Summary

A solution to this problem my family is using is our Ultimate Sock Organizer with a simple way of numbering socks of the same pair. By ironing a numbered Sticker to the bottom of a sock, each sock gets a number – the same number as it's pair. There is also a pocket reserved in the Sock Holder (a wardrobe organizer bag) for that pair of socks. Once you have washed and ironed a sock, put it in the Sock Holder's pocket marked with the matching number. Later in the day (or maybe another day!) you will have stumbled upon the other sock from that pair. After washing it, as you are putting it in its pocket in the Sock Holder, you'll notice that the other sock was there already! Now you can fold them both together in a little sock-ball and return them to their pocket.

When choosing the socks to wear for the day, choose from the pockets that have paired balls in them, and not the single ones. If you do not fold your socks into balls, let the single socks stick out of their pockets a little bit to set them apart from the paired ones.

My name is Stjepan Lucic. I have been working for a major international telecommunications vendor for over 20 years now. My experience there has thought me the importance of doing things in a time-efficient manner or money gets lost. But this is not about the time I could save for work, as much as it is about the precious free time I have available for spending with my family having fun. Which is why I am often finding myself pondering how to reduce the time we are wasting on reoccurring tasks nobody in our family likes to do?

The Ultimate Sock Organizer I am asking your support for is a helping tool we are finding so useful I have decided to try and turn into an actual product.

Our Ultimate Sock Organizer product will consist of a Sock Holder and an accompanying set of iron‑on transferrable Stickers with protection paper for ironing.

The Sock Holder will be a dual-sided, closet-hanging transparent storage with approx. 50 pockets, each pocket holding one pair of socks. The pockets will be optimized for size so that they fit a pair of folded socks just neatly to save space. Each pocket will be clearly numbered, starting from 1 up to the number of pockets.

The Sticker Set will contain as many pairs of Stickers as there are pockets in the Sock Holder. Each Sticker Pair will also be numbered, starting from 1 up to the number of pockets. Stickers in a pair will be labeled by the same number. The Sticker Set will be accompanied by a transparent protection paper that is to be used for ironing Stickers to socks.

What We Need & What You Get

We need the funds to kick-start the production of first 1.000 of our Ultimate Sock Organizers. And if within the first 1.000 of our $30 USD supporters, you'll get one to help you solve your own sock-pairing conundrums!

We also hope you will help us realize this innovative product promptly, as now that the idea has been put in the open, anyone can swoosh by and start the production before we do. If you cannot contribute, then spread the word out and make some noise about our campaign. Or simply use the Indiegogo share tools!

If you will support us, please also indicate your suggestion about where would you like the funds to go if the campaign does not reach the entire goal and if we do not succeed going into production.

The market price for two-sided general organizers containing over 40 pockets is about 20 USD. Our Sock Holders will have approx. 50 numbered pockets. The market price for general purpose iron‑on transfer sticker package with the required number of stickers is approx. 10 USD. We estimate the shipping costs to 10 USD (they are dependent on destination).

Although a household should have one Ultimate Sock Organizer for each family member, we aim at 1.000 of you to support us by choosing to pre-order a single Sock Organizer. So we have set the funding required to 1.000 x 30 USD = 30.000 USD.

With the funds raised we will start the production of our Ultimate Sock Organizer.

The Impact

Let’s make the world a more fun place: instead of losing time for pairing socks, we could gain hundreds of millions of months for fun!!!

And instead of being frustrated when half of pair is missing, you personally could frolic each time the other sock is already waiting in its pocket for the one you have just washed.

Thank you!

story:
Why Indiegogo

We currently have a provisional patent on the Rake Squared and we are seeking funding to get a working prototype and a full 20 year patent finalized.  We have already begun the process with GruntWorks Engineering but will need another couple of months to finalize the prototype, test in real-world situations and setup manufacturing.  If you want to see this revolutionary design come to life and in to your hand, then please contribute to this project.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are seeking $25,000 in funding to develop the working prototypes and setup manufacturing.
  • We have already spent quite a bit of our own money to get to this point and have already contracted GruntWorks Engineering to produce the working prototypes. This process began last week but we will need further funding to complete the process.
  • By backing this project you will be one of the first to receive your very own Rake Squared!

Purpose & Benefits of Rake Squared

Provides users with a modified yard rake capable of effectively completing yard work tasks by offering an extra handle for added ergonomic support, a storage compartment, and an adjustable rake head.

  • Includes a folding rake head capable of being adjusted for various applications such as raking leaves, branches, and more. 
  • Features a storage compartment for housing additional trash bags.
  • Utilizes an integrated Bluetooth speaker designed to play music when paired with a smartphone, tablet, or other mobile electronic device.
  • Offers a simple and convenient tool for raking yard debris.

Problems Solved

Yard work can be a time-consuming and exhausting process. Trash bags are typically required for storing leaves, branches, and other debris. Having to constantly go back and forth between the yard and a house/garage to obtain a new trash bag can be exceptionally frustrating. Yard work tasks are mundane and boring without music or other entertainment. Further, traditional yard rakes take up too much space in garages and other storage areas.

Detailed Description & Features

Rake Squared is a uniquely-designed yard rake with multiple convenient features. The device includes a folding head, a storage compartment for holding trash bags, a two-piece folding handle, and an integrated Bluetooth speaker. The device provides enhanced ergonomics, improved storage capabilities, and the ability to play music. 

An ergonomic grip offers ease of use while the storage compartment holds trash bags for improved productivity. The rake head can open and close in sections to adapt to different yard conditions. The handle can be compacted for easy storage. Further, the rake includes a Bluetooth speaker which, when paired with a smartphone or tablet, allows music to be played through the rake. Volume controls can be present on the handle in order to raise or lower volume as needed.

Rake Squared can be constructed using aluminum, plastic, memory foam, and other suitable materials. The rake may be available in a universal size capable of accommodating all user needs and preferences. Exact size, measurement, construction, and design specifications may vary upon manufacturing.

Risks & Challenges

Even though we have spent over a year designing and changing aspects of this rake to perfect the finished product, we won't know the true effectiveness or feasibility of the working prototype.  We will be making any necessary changes to the prototypes to create a truly functional, ergonomic and full-featured finished product.

  • Our engineers have not yet finalized he hinge design for the folding rake head and that could prove to be challenging.  They have several ideas however and will be testing them out in the working prototypes.  We want to make sure the solution is both convenient and durable.  We want your rake to last you a long time!
  • There are many materials that we could make the various components out of and we will be evaluating the various options and choose the ones that are perfect balance between durability and cost.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute financially, and that is ok, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please support us by sharing our campaign on all social media platforms.
  • If you know any landscapers or gardening experts please send our campaign to them!

story:
Welcome to the JemStoneNetwork funding page! We are working on a minecraft network were community and fun are the first priorites. We want the player experience to be more then just about making alot of money then not caring to keep up the server properly or large servers that are built without the players in mind. We want to bring to minecraft players a fun filled environment free from bullying and mistreatment of fellow players and focouses on the the server being fun and always adding something new for our players.


We are currently working on three different servers, Survival, towny and Creative. We want to make these work smoothly with as few bugs as possible to promote just having fun and hanging out with your friends. Soon we will begin work on a mini games server, capture the flag, SG and/or HG servers and somthing alittle more special called the *Glorgana Project* We'll tell you more about that as we begin getting our others servers up and running!


How you can help with the project:

By donating to JemStone fund you'll be helping us gain the resources nesscary to do make costom plugins and maps, gain professinal staff and devs and help us gain better equipment for the staff to run the server and youtube channel more effectivly for all of you

What we are working towards:

  • Pay for developers to make costom plugins
  • Pay for Professinal builders to make costom maps and spawns
  • Make the server website and facebook setup
  • Pay for multiple servers so every runs smoothly and lag free
  • Staff Tablets
  • Staff Laptops
  • Staff Professinal Microphones
  • Staff Professinal Headsets
  •  Purchase Professinal video recording and editing software
  • Purchase Professinal art creating and editing softare and/or apps
  • Any Other Equipment that may be need by members of the staff to help them better do their jobs for the server.

Please donate alittle bit whenever you can and when we have enough we will use the money to complete each goal. As well we will keep you all up to date on the latest work we're doing to make this server and network a reality! Thank you to everyone who donates and helps us spread the word and thank you to everyone in the Jemstone Network staff for making this a wonderful server!
story_txt:
Welcome to the JemStoneNetwork funding page! We are working on a minecraft network were community and fun are the first priorites. We want the player experience to be more then just about making alot of money then not caring to keep up the server properly or large servers that are built without the players in mind. We want to bring to minecraft players a fun filled environment free from bullying and mistreatment of fellow players and focouses on the the server being fun and always adding something new for our players.We are currently working on three different servers, Survival, towny and Creative. We want to make these work smoothly with as few bugs as possible to promote just having fun and hanging out with your friends. Soon we will begin work on a mini games server, capture the flag, SG and/or HG servers and somthing alittle more special called the *Glorgana Project* We'll tell you more about that as we begin getting our others servers up and running!How you can help with the project:By donating to JemStone fund you'll be helping us gain the resources nesscary to do make costom plugins and maps, gain professinal staff and devs and help us gain better equipment for the staff to run the server and youtube channel more effectivly for all of youWhat we are working towards:
Pay for developers to make costom plugins
Pay for Professinal builders to make costom maps and spawns
Make the server website and facebook setup
Pay for multiple servers so every runs smoothly and lag free
Staff Tablets
Staff Laptops
Staff Professinal Microphones
Staff Professinal Headsets
 Purchase Professinal video recording and editing software
Purchase Professinal art creating and editing softare and/or apps
Any Other Equipment that may be need by members of the staff to help them better do their jobs for the server.
Please donate alittle bit whenever you can and when we have enough we will use the money to complete each goal. As well we will keep you all up to date on the latest work we're doing to make this server and network a reality! Thank you to everyone who donates and helps us spread the word and thank you to everyone in the Jemstone Network staff for making this a wonderful server!

story:
1/29/15

Hi my name is Christopher Jones and I am looking for some help in funding my wedding. My Fiance doesn't know that I am asking for help. I wanted to surprise her. We decided on all of our options and chose what we could afford with what we had and still can't afford everything with School loans and Bills , Plus everything we started for our wedding. As of right now We put down payments for our venue, her wedding rings and her wedding dress with Credit Cards. We still don't have a DJ or a Photographer. We haven't even looked at a place to stay for our Honeymoon. Our Wedding day is Scheduled for August 9th 2015. We both don't have the richest families. I am asking for help because I love my fiance and I believe she deserves the best wedding. She is in huge debt and after the wedding I want to be able to help her get rid of it. Unfortunately It is hard for me to get a steady job or a career right now.We are basically living from pay check to paycheck.I was working 2 Jobs, now only one. My fiance is working 3 Jobs so we both can survive and Volunteers at church all the time. I know as a man I should be able to provide but I'm really just starting my life over again, and I would love to restart over with her the right way.

1/31/15 OK So for those that are a little confused, My initial idea was to raise funds for our  wedding to surprise her. But when creating my campaign I didn't realize that Social media would be the only way to promote it. So I didn't know that  when creating it. Once I went live I realized that my fiance would see it and then thought how cool it would be not just to help raise funds but to surprise her by showing the support that exist out there. Im so Grateful for any support through donations and sharing our Campaign.

story:
Off-the-shelf modular synthesisers can cost upwards of £2,000, an expensive investment for today’s musician or enthusiast. Soundtronics has partnered with MFOS (Music From Outer Space) to bring you an extensive range of affordable, customisable, and quality DIY synth modules, suitable for beginners and professionals alike. We’re sure you’ll love them as much as we do!

Soundtronics’ DIY Synth modules, Lo-Fi Noise Boxes, and Single Board Analogue Synths are available in varying levels of kit form. This allows enthusiasts like you, with a budget big or small, to collect units until you have the final setup you require. Plus there's the added satisfaction of knowing that they were hand built by yourself! If the idea of some soldering doesn't excite you too much, our team of technicians can expertly assemble the units and deliver them to your door in full working condition.

Soundtronics’ modules are designed to be combined in any desired panel setup and are currently compatible with 5U (MOTM format).


With your support, we will redesign these modules and make them available in formats such as Euro Rack, Moog, Dotcom, and Frackrack. For a more customised feel, the module front panels are also available in a number of colour combinations to suit the interior of any home office or recording studio!



Formed in late 2013, Soundtronics is a relatively new division of the Technobots Online Group, passionate about making quality analogue synths more widely available and affordable. Technobots Online is well established,  having supplied mechanical and electronic components to hobbyists, education, and trade since 2001. This means that ideal component suppliers, manufacturing equipment, and delivery services are already in place for the modular synths. 

Located in Warwickshire, the Technobots Online team consists of technology enthusiasts, each with their own particular passions. Soundtronics, and the DIY MFOS Synth module project, have the benefit of being personally (and enthusiastically) managed by our director Paul Cooper.

Music From Outer Space is run by another synthesiser enthusiast, Ray Wilson, in the USA. Back in 2003, Ray began publishing synth designs that have continued to evolve and gain credibility over the years. If you are not familiar with Ray’s superb designs, we cannot stress enough how essential it is that you visit his website musicfromouterspace.com, where you will find a complete library of information on each and every module we are offering here.

We will also mention that you can purchase PCBs direct from Ray, along with some front panels and other hard to find parts.

Important Update

Last November, just around the time we were going to launch this campaign, we learnt of the sad news that Ray had been diagnosed with cancer. In order for Ray and his family to fully concentrate on beating this, he stopped taking retail orders through the MFOS website. We are deeply appreciative of Ray finding the energy during these difficult times to keep us stocked with PCBs, so that we in turn keep them available online to MFOS builders around the world.

Since postponing this campaign, we have had the opportunity to discuss the essential role of MFOS in this Soundtronics' campaign, and Ray has encouraged us to move forward.  We shall therefore be working with Ray over the coming months to not only ensure the availability of the MFOS product range, but make it the most complete DIY synth range on the market.

Many of us have been directly or indirectly affected by cancer, so we would like to take this opportunity to ask that you consider visiting Ray's crowd funding site where you can directly contribute to Ray's medical expenses.

Without sounding cliché, Soundtronics is quickly becoming a one stop shop for all modular synth products. Our buying power enables us to source difficult to find components at good prices, passing the savings on to you and, of course, saving you all of the hassle of sourcing them yourself.

Our current range of in-house manufacturing equipment means we can produce our front panels and provide a full assembly service to those who do not wish to partake in the DIY element.

Again, it is worth mentioning that we fully support and appreciate all of Ray’s work, so we continue to pay the full retail value for all PCBs.


Over the last 18 months, we’ve supplied kits to enthusiasts across Europe and received excellent feedback. Our laser engraved laminate front panels look great, and generally last much longer than their screen printed counter parts. 


However, as with all new products, some customers have kindly suggested some improvements for us to make. Now, that’s where your support comes in.

Firstly, we’d love to continue receiving feedback, good or bad, as it really helps us to understand exactly what you want from our products. Therefore, at the end of this campaign we’ll be setting up a forum for you to chat to us, help each other out with projects, and benefit from our technical resources.

What are we funding?
The first improvement we will to put into action, is the introduction of a machined aluminium reinforcement layer, opposed to the current acrylic panel, behind the laser engraved laminate panel. This will allow us to reduce the depth of the modules, thus opening up a raft of opportunities for additional formats such as Euro Rack. Aluminium panels are are also the perfect solution for producing panels for the single boards synths, so the extra equipment and investment in design time will be well utilised.

We have already invested in a CNC router to produce the machined aluminium panels and a laser to engraver to cut out the front laminate panels. We will therefore use funds raised from this campaign to invest in PCB production for panel controls, and to design and produce front panels for new formats and single board synths.

Secondly, we want to produce a range of PCBs for panel controls, in order to reduce panel wiring and speed up assembly. Paul will be our lead R&D expert on this, and has already begun building prototypes.


Essentially, we’d like to invest in further research, design and development, manufacturing equipment, and up-front manufacturing runs.


Being optimistic, if funding surpasses our target, we’ll be looking into developing our own range of synth products to compliment the MFOS range. First up will be a MIDI to CV and CV to MIDI converters. As with all of Paul’s great ideas, he just couldn’t resist building a quick prototype to show you!

 



How can we help you?

As mentioned earlier, membership to the forum will give you access to all of our in-house synthesiser design files, including PCBs (not MFOS) and front panels. We also provide full support for customers just in case you get into difficulty with the build.

See below for our perks.


We’ve chosen to do our perks a little differently! As there is such an extensive range of permutations here, we’ve given you free range over your choices. Think of each perk as buying a pick ‘n’ mix voucher, to spend however you wish. Don't worry if the amount you want to spend finishes between Perk values, simply purchase the nearest value below your spend, and we will then request the difference at the end of the campaign through PayPal.

We have, of course, listed some Early Bird specials where you get that bit extra to spend on us!

Check out the info-graphics below for an overview of our perks and module options.

For more detailed information, please download the order form in Excel format or PDF.

Please note that all pricing is inclusive of VAT, delivery addresses outside of the EU will have the VAT element refunded prior to dispatch.






 
Kit Options
  • Main PCB - The official PCB manufactured by MFOS, no other components included. Ideal for the DIY builder who has access to their own components and wishes to create their own front panel.
  • Wiring PCB Set - Bare PCBs manufactured by Soundtronics to simplify construction. These PCBs are used to reduce the amount of panel wiring by soldering most, if not all, of the pots and connectors directly on the PCBs. These PCBs have various solderable options, i.e. creating common ground connections. Each PCB has a JST socket into which is plugged a cable, the other end of each cable is then soldered to the main PCB. Each Wiring PCB Set includes PCBs, JST connectors, cable assemblies  and pot brackets.
  • Components Kit - All electronic components required to complete the build of the corresponding main PCB.  Top quality components from metal film resistors upwards. Excludes panel mount potentiometers, sockets and switches.
  • Pots & Sockets - Includes all panel mount potentiometers, Switchcraft 1/4" sockets, switches and our Cliff KM20B knobs. These are most suitable for MOTM 5U size panels, but we will change the contents on request to suit Euro rack formats i.e. 3.5mm jack sockets.
  • Engraved Panel - Our own laser engraved laminate panels available as white on black, black on brushed aluminium plus other colours on request. These engraved panels really look the part and are hard wearing, no screen print rubbing off! The engraved panels are about 1.5mm thick but do require a rigid backing sheet to provide the necessary rigidity. To date, we have used an acrylic framework that also accommodates the PCB, however our new design uses an aluminium panel behind.
  • Aluminium Chassis Plate - A 6082 T6 aluminium panel 3mm thick (2mm for Euro rack) with all holes routed out to match the engraved front panel. Being aluminium, it also provides electrical screening. Also includes an acrylic panel and brackets to which the main PCB is mounted to.
  • Full Kit - Basically all of the above, everything the DIYer needs to build the module / noise box / sequencer / single board synth, even down to the wiring.
  • Fully Assembled - For those without the necessary tools / equipment / experience / time. We will build the kit and fully test it so it's ready to use.

As well as supporting through the purchase of Perks, there are other ways you can help us in achieving our aims.

Please let other similar minded builders and musicians know about this campaign through forums and social media.

Share your experience and expertise on our user group after the campaign ends.


What happens if you don't get all of the funding?

Our business model is such that even if we don't reach our goal, we will be able to honour all perks purchased thanks to our in-house capabilities. It will mean that we will not be able to bulk buy PCBs and it may constrain future development of our synth products.

What are the risks?
As with all projects, there will be challenges to overcome in fulfilling this campaign. Fortunately for us, we have a great support structure in place in the form of the Technobots infrastructure, and a team of experienced project managers and engineers.

We’re not too worried about any of these risks, but to give you a heads up:

Manufacturing: Being a small team, we’ve only invested in one each of larger manufacturing equipment such as the CNC cutter and laser engraver.

This does leave us vulnerable to machine failure, but we make sure we maintain our equipment regularly so as to reduce the probability of issues.

The Team: Of course, in a smaller team, there is little room for illness or loss of working hours. However, we operate the same strategy as we do with our machinery – don’t overwork them and keep them properly oiled (perhaps with a beer or two on a Friday afternoon!)

Supply chain: We depend on MFOS for the main PCBs and, without going into detail here, we have a number of contingency options available to ensure the continued supply. Unfortunately, this particular mitigation strategy has already been put to test. If you have not already, please read the section 'MFOS - Who are they?' above. All other components in the kits are available from multiple sources, so we are still able to use the original specified components. A small number of components are becoming obsolete, and are thus quite rare, however substitutes are possible.  We also share our stock holding with that of Technobots to ensure a ready supply.

Thank you for reading and we sincerely do hope you can support us in taking DIY synth building to this new level.
