story:
We are excited to introduce you to an innovative product that will lower your energy cost, reduce your carbon footprint, and enable you to leave a greener planet for the future. 

Meet the GECCO - Green Energy Efficient Cost Conservation Optimizer. 


Desert Camouflage

                     

                                   


Jungle Camouflage

                          

                              

Rainbow

                                                                    

Smart Device App Screen


                                                  


What is the GECCO?

The GECCO is a wireless tank water heater control unit. It attaches directly to your water heater and connects to your smart devices enabling you to automate your water heater so that it is only on when you need it.

Did you know that one storage tank water heater puts out as much as 1,000 lbs. of carbon into the air every single year? Now imagine tens of millions of water heaters doing the same every single day and night. It is estimated that in the US alone, nearly 170 million metric tons of carbon is emitted! No matter what your take is on environmental sustainability, this can’t be good.

On top of the carbon emissions, water heating constitutes 14% - 18% of your monthly energy bill. In order to keep your water hot all day, your water heater must keep reheating the water to the desired temperature, which is why it costs so much. While the water heater keeps the water hot, it also loses heat due to what is called stand-by heat loss – the heat seeps out through the walls of the tank. It is possible to wrap your water heater, but why even have it on at all when you’re not using it?

Why do water heaters emit so much carbon and cost so much? Well, the average family uses hot water only 2-3 hours a day, and for the most part, never adjusts the temperature gauge or turns it off. The water heater stays on 24 hours a day even when one leaves home for work, school, errands or even vacation. Leaving your water heater constantly running wastes the planet’s natural resources… and, of course, your money!

The GECCO addresses this problem by helping you use your water heater smartly without sacrificing your comfort. The GECCO allows you to preset the times that you know you will need hot water; and should you need hot water at an unscheduled time, our“On-Demand” system can activate your water heater by simply turning on your hot water anywhere in the house. Five minutes before you need it, it’s ready to go!


GECCO Mission Statement:

Our mission is to empower property owners with water heater control technology that helps users lower their energy costs, reduce their carbon emissions and enjoy piece of mind.


Why is Now the Right Time for the GECCO?

The world at large is learning more and more about how and why environmental sustainability matters. Engineering on cars and trucks now universally prioritizes fuel efficiency. SolarCity, the #1 leading provider of solar power panels for home and business, is proving that clean energy is increasingly more attractive. And if you have heard of the NEST Learning Thermostat, you know that this type of technology is really taking off. Why? Because the value is clear and people everywhere are joining in to help do their part to improve the environment.

The GECCO is one more step in that direction. If we currently emit 170 million metric tons of carbon into the atmosphere by leaving our water heaters on 24 ours a day, imagine the reduction in pollution by turning them off for 20 of those hours? We’re talking potentially 120 million tons of carbon taken out of the atmosphere! That feels good.


How Does the GECCO Work?

The GECCO comes equipped with the following capabilities:

·  Control your water heater using the GECCO from your computer, smart-device and control box (included with GECCO purchase).

·  Turn the water heater on when you need it and off when you don't.

·  Preset desired times that you will need hot water.

·  "On Demand” capability for unscheduled heating.

·  Measure water heater use with informative analytics.

· Configure the GECCO for battery or solar power. 

· Hot water re-circulation control ready. 

· GECCO automatically responds to outside air temperature fluctuation. 

·  No installation assistance needed! The GECCO is VERY simple to install and use. Older units may require tools that will come with the GECCO. 


What does this mean for you? Here is how you benefit:

·  Enjoy peace of mind knowing that you are making an effort to be more energy efficient.

·  Remotely control the water heater from anywhere.

·  Preserve natural resources.

·  Reduce the amount of carbon emitted into the atmosphere.

·  Save anywhere from an estimated $0.50 to $1.50 per day!

The GECCO comes in 3 great designs: Rainbow, Jungle Camouflage and Desert Camouflage. Since our company is  100% owned by veterans, of whom 80% are combat disabled, we felt that the camouflage units would be a nice touch.

Remember, because the GECCO saves you so much money off your heating bill, the GECCO pays itself off in less than a year!


How Do We Know That the GECCO Works?

With the current prototype, we ran a few tests to see just how valuable the GECCO could be. We ran tests on three houses, a restaurant and a shopping center with five stores in it.

Home 1: Two adults. Their water heater was automated to run one hour in the morning and one hour in the evening. The GECCO saved them about $1.00 a day.

Home 2: Two adults, two children. Their water heater was automated to run one hour in the morning and three in the evening. The GECCO saved them about $0.75 cents a day.

Home 3: This house had 1 adult and there was a re-circulation pump in use. Their circulation pump cools the water down more so the water heater runs more. Their water heater was automated to run one hour in the morning and one in the evening. The GECCO saved them about $1.30 a day.

The Restaurant: The restaurant was open from 6 am to 2 pm, 7 days a week. Their water heater was automated to run 8 hours on and 16 hours off. The GECCO saved the restaurant nearly $2 a day!

The shopping center: It had a re-circulation pump, but the stores were closed on the weekend so the water heater ran 40 hours a week instead of 168 hours a week. The GECCO saved the shopping center $2.50 a day.

To measure the gas usage, we used the Elster Gas Meter bk-g4. These savings are approximate and could vary depending on gas rates, location of water heaters indoors or out and weather conditions.

We calculated the gas usage for one month with the GECCO on and a month with it off.

These savings range from $200 - $900 per year!


The GECCO Works With…

The GECCO works with storage tank water heaters. Because water is held in the tank 24 hours a day, the standby heat loss and sheer non-stop energy usage makes the GECCO the smart option. To be fair, however, you could go with other options such as…

·  Instantaneous “Tankless”/ “On-Demand” Water Heater: $175 - $1200 for each water fixture

·  Wi-Fi Enabled Heat Pump Water Heater: $900 - $2500

·  Wi-Fi Enabled Conventional Storage Water Heater: $500 -$900

With the GECCO, you get the value of these three for only $75 during the campaign! 

Clearly, going these alternative routes will indeed achieve what the GECCO offers, but the cost is prohibitively expensive. These costs don’t include shipping, installation and taxes.

The three types of control valves that the GECCO fits look like this:


         

          

               



This Campaign is About More Than just Water Heaters

There is a deeper dimension to this campaign. While we are very excited about the benefits the GECCO has to offer society and the environment, we are also focused on sending love to our Veterans. We are giving back to our vets by donating 25% of ANNUAL profits to a very worthwhile program:

The Veteran’s Transition Center of Monterey County is a powerful organization located on the historic Fort Ord military base in Marina, California. Their mission is to help veterans and their families adjust to normal life after they leave military service. The VTC is responsible for providing housing assistance, life skills courses, legal assistance and special events for veterans all throughout Monterey County.




Eventually we want to give to many more veteran focused non-profits. And since our product will be built here in the USA, our plan is to employ as many veterans as possible in the manufacturing, marketing, management, sales and distribution of the GECCO.


How Did We Get Here?

"Over the past few years I became more and more aware of pollution and conservation of natural resources in our country. So in trying to do my share I would turn off my water heater when I was away from my house. It was a manual process, but worth doing. Several years ago, my wife and I went on a trip and, as always, turned off our water heater. The next morning, after returning back late, I heard some rough words coming from the bathroom where my wife was taking a shower!
I soon learned that I had forgot to turn the water heater back on the night before.  At that point I realized that I needed to develop a remote capability for my water heater. After some simple research I realized that we only needed hot water several hours a day. I did not leave my cars running all night  because we needed them the next day, why was my water heater keeping water hot 100% of the time when I only needed it 10% of the time. 
So over the last couple of years I have developed and built several prototypes and developed the one that finally meets all my needs. You can program it to go on and off when you need or do not need hot water. So no more cool showers for my wife! It has an on demand capability, so you can turn it on by just turning on the hot water anywhere in the house for a second. It runs on batteries, solar or household voltage. It can be controlled by any smart device and it can even detect a leak in your water heater. The latest prototype requires no tools and can be installed in less than a minute. I have named this unit the GECCO, Green, Energy, Efficient, Cost, Conservation, Optimizer."

Bo Hayner, Inventor of the GECCO     

Testimonials


                                                             

"This gadget looked interesting, and after studying it, I felt it was really cool and easy to understand. The GECCO concept - turn off your water heater when you don't need hot water makes a lot of sense! And it saves electricity, gas, (energy!) and MONEY!....It also reduces pollution. The GECCO is easy to use, and installs on your water heater in less than a minute! I recommend the GECCO to you and anyone who wants to save money, energy and help our Veterans."

Jerry Griffin, Retired Army Medical Corps Commander


                                                            

"I've been in the construction business here in Monterey County for over 30 years. I live alone and was amazed by the savings on my gas bill. For me, I really only need my water heater on one and a half hours a day. In the past I left the water heater on 24/7. After using the GECCO for a month, I saved about  $1.20-$1.30 a day. I'll be getting in touch with all of my past clients and get them on board."

Vince Frumkin, Contractor


Let’s Make it Happen!

The GECCO prototype is functional today as is. However, this crowdfunding campaign allows us to raise the money we need to send the current version of the GECCO in for final commercialization, which will turn out a sleeker and most effective final product. Once it is commercialized and ready for stores, we will send you your GECCO as ordered. 

By contributing to this campaign, you will save up to HALF off the future retail price of $149.99. As you will note in the perk descriptions, the savings from your utility bill on top of the price savings from the campaign mean that the GECCO will pay for itself multiple times a year! 

Reserve your GECCO today! 

Thank you! 


The GECCO is patent pending.

We are excited to introduce you to an innovative product that will lower your energy cost, reduce your carbon footprint, and enable you to leave a greener planet for the future. Meet the GECCO - Green Energy Efficient Cost Conservation Optimizer. Desert Camouflage                                                        Jungle Camouflage                                                        Rainbow                                                                    Smart Device App Screen                                                  
















What is the GECCO?
The GECCO is a wireless tank water heater control unit. It attaches directly to your
water heater and connects to your smart devices enabling you to automate your water heater
so that it is only on when you need it.
Did you know that one storage tank water heater puts out as
much as 1,000 lbs. of carbon into the air every single year? Now imagine tens of millions
of water heaters doing the same every single day and night. It is estimated
that in the US alone, nearly 170 million metric tons of carbon is emitted! No
matter what your take is on environmental sustainability, this can’t be good.


On top of the carbon emissions, water heating constitutes 14% - 18% of your monthly energy bill.
In order to keep your water hot all day, your
water heater must keep reheating the water to the desired temperature, which is why it costs so much. While the
water heater keeps the water hot, it also loses heat due to what is called stand-by heat loss – the
heat seeps out through the walls of the tank. It is possible to wrap your water heater, but why
even have it on at all when you’re not using it?
Why do water heaters emit so much carbon and cost so much? Well, the average
family uses hot water only 2-3 hours a day, and for the most part, never adjusts the temperature gauge or turns it off. The water heater stays on 24 hours a day even
when one leaves home for work, school, errands or even vacation. Leaving
your water heater constantly running wastes the planet’s natural resources… and, of course, your money!
The GECCO addresses this problem by
helping you use your water heater smartly without sacrificing your comfort.
The GECCO allows you to preset the times that you know you will need hot water; and should you need
hot water at an unscheduled time, our“On-Demand”
system can activate your water heater by simply turning on your hot water
anywhere in the house. Five minutes before you need it,
it’s ready to go!
GECCO Mission Statement:

Our mission is to
empower property owners with water heater control technology that helps users lower their energy costs, reduce their carbon emissions and enjoy piece of mind.
Why is Now the Right Time for the GECCO?
The world at large is learning more and more about how and why environmental sustainability matters.
Engineering on cars and trucks now universally prioritizes
fuel efficiency. SolarCity, the #1 leading provider of solar power panels for home and business, is
proving that clean energy is increasingly more attractive. And if you have heard of the NEST Learning Thermostat, you know that this type of
technology is really taking
off. Why? Because the value is
clear and people everywhere are
joining in to help do their part to improve the environment.
The GECCO is one more step in that direction. If we currently
emit 170 million metric tons of carbon into the atmosphere by leaving
our water heaters on 24 ours a day, imagine the reduction in pollution by
turning them off for 20 of those hours? We’re talking potentially 120 million tons of
carbon taken out of the atmosphere! That feels good.

peace of mind knowing that you are making an effort to be more energy efficient.

the atmosphere.

story:
THE URBAN MAP GARDEN:

A Map With Impact

We created the Urban Map Garden as an innovative way to show city pride and make a positive impact. For each purchase we donate $10 to an urban gardening initiative in the corresponding city -- keep reading to learn why Urban Gardens are important and how you can Map Your Impact.

Atlanta • Austin • Boston • Brooklyn • Chicago • Denver • Detroit • Minneapolis      Nashville • Portland • San Francisco • Seattle 

The Urban Map Garden functions as a wall hanging or free standing air plant garden. Air-plants filter more toxins from the air than almost any other other plant, and they are easy to care for.

We have designed the stylized engravings to feature prominent neighborhoods and highways. Many hand-painted accents are available.

Birch-Ply featuring Natural Engraving

Solid Walnut Featuring Natural Engraving

DIMENSIONS 

 

AN EXCELLENT HOLIDAY GIFT

Each map ships with a small easel, a Tillandsia air-plant, and a gift box. If you pledge to help us reach our initial goal, your map will ship in time for the holidays.

Please note: Maps purchased beyond our initial goal will begin shipping in January, 2018.

A MAP WITH IMPACT

We are so excited to offer this beautiful product that allows you to have an impact in the city you love. $10 from every map purchased is donated to an Urban Gardening initiative in the corresponding city. Many studies show that Urban Gardens are powerful catalysts for building strong communities. Even small gardens can yield an abundance of healthy food, while also providing valuable life skills and job training.

Below is a list of urban farms and community gardens that we have partnered with. Our partnership means that $10 from each map goes to support their excellent work.

  • Austin, TX Sustainable Food Center
  • Boston, MA Boston Food Forest 
  • Chicago, IL Growing Home 
  • Denver, CO The Grow Haus
  • Portland, OR Urban Farm Collective

We are currently seeking partnerships with non-profits in Atlanta, Brooklyn, Detroit, Minneapolis, Nashville, San Francisco, and Seattle. If you purchase a map in one of these cities, $10 will still be donated to a local garden that corresponds to the map and you can verify the donation after your purchase.

MAP YOUR IMPACT

Transparency is essential to our company, and when you purchase The Urban Map Garden you will know your impact first hand. There is a unique locator number on the backside of each map which you will be able to enter on our website to read about the garden you supported.

ABOUT OUR COMPANY

We run a handmade custom furniture studio in Seattle, WA called This Is Urban Made.  We create beautiful products for the home and office with a unique urban aesthetic. Our mission is to create furniture that is of exquisite quality, ultra-high efficiency, and to use natural materials in a responsible and ethical manner.

Please take a minute to look at our existing line of furniture and decor at ThisIsUrbanMade.com

PRODUCT TESTING & FUNDS DISTRIBUTION

Working out of our wood shop and a local production facility where we rent time on engraving equipment, we have completed several small production runs of The Urban Map Garden and have sold them at holiday fairs and retail shops in the Pacific Northwest. We are launching this campaign because we believe there is great potential for this product to appeal to a larger market and create massive positive impact.

We have strategically set our campaign goal at $12,500, which is approximately 225 Urban Map Gardens. At this scale, the cost of renting engraving equipment vs. purchasing is cost neutral. This will allow us to add engraving equipment into our existing wood shop without financing. The additional equipment will allow us to work more efficiently and profitably, growing our Urban Map product line and expanding our our team to create other jobs.

$12,500 / apx. 225 Urban Map Gardens

PROVEN PRODUCTION SUCCESS

Cutting Walnut Map Blanks

Engraving a short run of Seattle Birch Ply Maps

Hand-painting a stack of Walnut Maps

YOU CAN HELP!

Even if you can't support our campaign financially, you can still help us out! Use Indiegogo's Social buttons to share this campaign with friends, family, co-workers, and especially those who live in our featured cities. 

12 CITIES AND GROWING

The selected cities have been chosen after compiling multiple articles which rank the "greenest" cities and those most accommodating to urban farming and gardening. Don't see your city available? After successfully completing this campaign we will be expanding our list of available maps. Stay tuned!

story:
We are a small baby product company owned and operated out of North Shore, Hawaii:

  • We create Hawaii inspired muslin swaddle blankets 
  • Peri Co is teaming up with Operation Underground Railroad (O.U.R.) to contribute to child trafficking rescue missions. 

Your contribution helps save children from trafficking:

  • Peri Co is teaming up with Operation Underground Railroad to contribute to child trafficking rescue missions. 
  • Your support also goes towards start-up, production, delivery & marketing costs for Perennial Cottons, LLC

  • Co-owned and operated by sisters Cydne Gray & Victoria Waite 
  • As a mom & auntie, we are all about creating products that are functional and aesthetically beautiful 
  • The primary goals of Peri Co are to focus on meaning over making money & to help foster the love of nature in little ones 

  • Continue to educate yourself about the issues surrounding child trafficking & what O.U.R. is doing to help.
  • Share this campaign via the social media links at the top of the page!

story:
VisitAble Housing is simply three basic features in barrier-free design: one no-step entrance, wider doors and hallways, and a powder room or bathroom that can be accessed by an individual requiring the assistance of a mobility device.  The goal is to make the home welcoming to all, regardless of age or level of ability (no one is excluded from entering the home).

I live in Ottawa, Canada and have assisted individuals living with disabilities since 1994 (and continue this work on a part time basis).  I am also involved in the national VisitAbility Project by the Canadian Centre on Disability Studies as one of six coordinators nationwide (Please note that this campaign is not affiliated with the national project that I'm involved in, it's a separate project but if you wish to read further, please go to visitablehousingcanada.com),

My goal is to build a VisitAble home, with the assistance of my team members, in order to showcase this innovative approach to new housing that ensures that you can remain in your home for as many years as you wish, even if your needs change. No one is excluded from entering your home so it removes architectural barriers that most homes have because of outdated construction practices (that fail to respond to the aging population, young families, and have benefits for moving and delivery companies, as well as for paramedics responding to an emergency call).

Once this home is completed, there will be a marketing campaign to get media and the public interested in it, then it would be listed for sale.  50% of profit would be given to the top three charities that you vote on, and the remaining 50% would go toward the next VisitAble home.  The key here is that most of the housing industry isn't catching on to the market potential of VisitAbility (the ability to rent or sell your inventory to 100% of the population) so I'd like to educate them by creating this home for all to see.  It's already happening in parts of the US, and Canada has its first VisitAble neighbourhood in Winnipeg, Manitoba (Bridgwater in Waverley West) so this isn't a concept, it's already happening with the more innovative municipalities and developers/builders.

I have many research documents and statistics to back up my belief that VisitAbility must be the next trend in new housing.  I have also created a Facebook page "One Dollar for VisitAble Housing" to keep all of you posted on the progress of my campaign, and with your help, on the progress of the project.  Please join me on this journey.

story:
Superhero Polish

**DO NOT USE the polish on porous objects such as untreated marble, frosted chrome, unfinished wood etc..

Now that the warning is out of the way...

Superhero Polish is a nontoxic environmentally safe finish restore polish that will leave everything once dull, all shiny and smooth.

When mixed with either water or olive oil it removes tarnish with very little effort, can polish water stains off of finished wood and can be used to polish pretty much anything with a gloss.  You'll even see your reflection after you're done!

Using the dry powder removes sticky or gunky spots in the blink of an eye.

But I ALREADY Have A Polish!

I am sure you do. But most store brand polishes are stinky and/or toxic. Not a lot of fun to use. Think of almost any silver tarnish remover... BLECH. 

Superhero Polish has virtually no smell and is 100% toxin free. If you ate some the worst that would happen is you might get a bit healthier from the Magnesium Oxide ingredient. But it tastes like sand mixed with water, so eating it is not recommended.

It's made with very basic ingredients: Magnesium Oxide (as mentioned earlier) and very hard particles of Carbon, in nano and micron form, and very super fine diamond dust.

The teeny tiny particles are extremely dense because they are made through an explosive detonation synthesis process.  Super fine and super small and super hard means, well, Superhero Polish!

What's That Mean To Me? 

It means a little goes a long way.  Because the particles ARE super-dense they are hardy and last a long time. Once the polish has soaked into your designated polishing cloth you can use that cloth over and over  - only rarely adding more polish. So, when we send you your 25 grams of Superhero Polish, it could literally last you a lifetime. It really depends on how gungy your stuff is and how much stuff you've got. 

How Do I Use It?

The polish requires two dedicated cloths. One for polishing and one for burnishing. Even if you wash the cloths the polish will still be embedded in the material, so don't use any cloths that have personal meaning to you. Once you are done a polishing job, you can store your cloth for future use.

Dab the cloth in water or olive oil depending on what you are polishing.

Dab into the polish. Rub in small circles and coat the area.  The more you polish the smoother the result.

Take the burnishing cloth - the cloth with nothing on it - and burnish away the Superhero Polish.

Voila! It's as simple as that.

Wait a Minute, You Said This Polish Is Environmentally Friendly. How Can That Be If You Use EXPLOSIVES to Make it?

Because Superhero Polish is made with an environmentally safe explosive!  Inventor, Daren Swanson, patented a new explosive formula that produces LOADS of this polishing powder when it detonates. The ingredients are simply frozen Carbon Dioxide and Magnesium. What comes out of the detonation is Nanodiamond, and Nano-Magnesium Oxide as well as larger micron stuff. Pure, simple and safe elements, uniquely combined into an ultra-fine powder.

If you'd like to know more about the science you can visit this link on our website: http://envirodiamond.net/about-cdp-technology/

With this super safe version, everyone can benefit from Superhero Polish!

OK - You're Selling a Really Good Polish.  Any Other Benefits?

We're actually selling an AMAZING polish and there are, in fact, other amazing benefits...

We are currently renting a vessel from the Canadian Government to do small detonations and run tests, but it's not big enough to manufacture the polish. Our plan is to pre-sell enough Superhero Polish to build an extra-large vessel to contain our detonations and fulfill those orders. 

We also plan to extract our nitrogen-free nanodiamonds, which are biocompatible and can therefore be used in medical applications.  For example, nanodiamond can be used to save lives from cancer in a method called Targeted Chemotherapy Drug Delivery.

Fun Trivia Fact: Since our ingredients are affordable and very abundantly available, we plan to mass-produce nanodiamond because the demand currently far exceeds the existing supply and it can be used for so many things. One goal is to produce enough nanodiamond to put into every automobile's engine oil, which would cut global fuel consumption about 12%.

Fun Trivia Fact: We used Superhero Polish on an unplayable PS4 game.  Big scratch.  Unbelievably, we polished out the scratch and the game plays fine now.  Try it on old sketchy CD's and DVD's... you might be surprised!

Fun Trivia Fact: The waste from the nanodiamond purification step is Magnesium Chloride, which is an environmentally superior road de-icing agent that can be used to improve the safety of winter driving.

Items We've Tried Superhero Polish On... And Amazed By The Results

-End Tables

-Guitars

-Dressers

-Cutlery Boxes

-Silver Knives

-Chrome Bumpers

-Scratches in Car Paint

-Kitchen Sink

-Bathroom Sink

-Tile

-Tub

-Counter Stains

-Melamine Paint

-Glass (Windows)

story:
The beginning

All around us, things are evolving and what seemed impossible yesterday became possible today and tomorrow things are going to be even better.

 

This is the reason we have created a new piece of furniture, completely redesigned. There are no longer times when just simple pieces of wood are called furniture. We need something new, something to inspire us, to make our life easier, to improve our lives.

 

Meet The Bliss Table

 

 

So we've crafted our first prototype. A new kind of furniture, the smart furniture for you it can keep you powered up and interconnected.

 

Built-in refrigerator with freezer  

 

 

                          

Imagine the convenience of having a refrigerator within the reach without having to leave your comfortable couch during your favorite tv show. 

 

LED lights with remote      

 

 

              

Your Bliss Table will make a great ambiance and set the mood of your room or add more colors to it with the 12 colors LED lights via a remote control.

 

Sockets and Charging Docks     

 

 

You have 6 sockets, 3 on each side to charge your laptop or tablet and when you are done just simply close the drawer.

We didn't forget about the smartphones so we have included 4 charging docks, 2 on each side and (of course) your phone will stay vertically so you will see if you have any notifications.

 

Plenty of storage     

 

 

Also on the front are 4 storage drawers with push technology. You can choose to put inside: remotes, tablets, snacks, magazines or a new six pack of beer that waits its turn into the 40 l refrigerator. There is plenty of space to store things out of sight into the table's four drawers.

 

Everything is designed to improve your working, living and entertainment space.

 

Beautiful design    

Bliss Table was designed to complement your living room with its beautiful design enhanced with technology in order to improve your lifestyle.

 

Bliss Table key features

- doesn't require engineering skills and screws, it's just easy as plug into a wall socket

- easy to move around thanks to its 5 steel wheels underneath

- a 40 l capacity refrigerator with freezer

- 6 x sockets

- 4 x charging docks

- 12 color LED lights with remote control

- available in 4 different colors: brown/cream, wood, matte black and brown.

story:
Imagine the possibilities and everyday usage with Mstick?

Mstick is a LED light stick. Controlled from featured modular application, Mstick operates various functional lights. The user can choose categories from ready to use and settings and customize the light depending on their situation. 


Controlling Mstick is easy-to-use and its various functions are suitable for daily usage. Write down the text or emoji into the “After Effect” category and enjoy the festival in various ways. Riding a bicycle or running at night? Mstick can keep you safe and make your experience more enjoyable. Just click the “Sports Light” of the app. Choose animation and change colorsto fit your taste. Additionally, some of other major functions of Mstick are music visualiser, concept selfie, alarm, mood light, weather forecast. There are so many!

Whenever you are riding a bike or stopped to rest, Mstick notices your movements with G-sensor. Mstick automatically changes color and animation when it recognizes change in your movement. This allows for more safe riding as the light turns red when you are stopped and turns back to white when you begin riding. Please check the 'Prototype Review' video for more details.




Currently developed LED modes are ‘Power on/off’, ‘Color Changes’, ‘Control each LEDs’, ‘Sound Visualiser’, ‘Tilt by G-sensor’, ‘Sports Light’, ‘LED Animations’, ‘Power animation’, ‘Air Display by P.O.V’. Even after we launch Mstick, our efforts will be put to develop softwares and share the updates with the users through modular application.

Mstick modular application is easy to use in all situations.

Mstick application is modular to suit all functions. Controlling the Mstick is simple and user friendly.

Lighting control and changing color is easy with Mstick app. Also, you can use your smartwatch for simple taskssuch as on/off and modes change function. Mstick app supports iPhone 5 and above, Galaxy S4 and above, and Nexus 5 and above with Bluetooth 4.1.

We designed the Mstick to be simple, convenient and durable for heavy outdoor usage. 

1. Stick Body

1-1. Simple and beautiful stick shaped body is suitable for all types of environments. Gently press the button located at the top of body to turn on and off Mstick and change modes that are set in the app. So, you can simply turn on and off or change modes without touching your phone. You can also easily connect with your smart phone by pressing the Bluetooth Pairing button.

1-2. At the bottom of the Mstick body has a universal camera hole mount. It can be compatible with any types of camera accessories.

2. Leather Strap

Leather Strap: Mstick comes with Leather Strap which makes Mstick to hang or loop anywhere easily.

3. Link Part

Link Parts: Link Parts help you to fix the strap bolt stably when Stick Body is connected with Leather Strap.


4. Cable Holder

Recharge Mstick with Micro 5pin USB Port. Insert your USB cable to Cable Holder and stick to Cable Holder to Iron Plate. Magnetic Cable Holder makes your room mess free.

5. Iron Plate

Mstick comes with built-in magnet. Mstick can be easily attached to wherever it is magnetic. If Mstick should be attached on other than steel material, you can install the Iron Plate manually by tape or screw. 

Three Colors for Mstick

Mstick comes with following 3 colors.  Cream White, Turquoise and Midnight Blue.


Dimension 

  • Stick Body : 160(H) x 26(W) x 16(D) mm

Hardware Specification 

  • RGB LED x 16 ea : 120 Lumen
  • RGB LED brightness :Red(~420mcd), Green(~720mcd),Blue(~200mcd)
  • Bluetooth 4.1 2.4Ghz
  • G-Sensor (3 Axis Gyro+ 3 Axis Accelerometer )
  • Lithium Polymer Battery Time : Min 7 hours (Max brightness) Max 7 days (Low Brightness)
  • Micro 5pin USB Charging Port

Mstick comes in a handy and classy packaging, making it ideal gift for your loved ones. It also comes with a strap, so hanging or carrying is easy. 

Timeline

  • 2015 NOV 
    -Complete PCB Design 
    -Complete Hardware Design 
    -Start Firmware/ App Development
  • 2015 DEC
    -Complete App Design 
  • 2016 JAN
    -Develop M-Stick THETA Version
  • 2016 FEB
    -BETA Build and Test
  • 2016 MAR
    -ALPHA Build
    -Product Certification
  • 2016 APR
    -Pilot Build
    -Start Mass Production
    -Start Shipping to Backers!

We designed bike mount for the Sports Light function. We considered the environment when used for riding a bike came up with most functional design.  




We are already in the mass production stage. We would like to inform you that we applied heat sink featured Aluminium inner body for effective protecting from heating of Mstick. We always consider how the users can use our product longer and safer with best quality.

Risks and chanllenges

Technical Challenge:

MOLT Team faced numerous challenges due to technical difficulty to make all desired functions into reality. Technologies involved in each function are complex and difficult to realize. However, we are pursuing to utilize all functions for Mstick with smart phone and make life simpler for end users.

We spent more time than we initially expected during the R&D stage thus technical bugs are mostly eliminated and functions are ready for our backers.

MOLT Team is made up of specialists from different sectors with deep experience in developing and designing products. We love what we do and we are all very proud of our work.

Design: 
Mstick is created to keep the product user friendly. Therefore, Mstick fits in any interior settings and outdoor environment. The size of Mstick is optimal for all settings and usability and brightness of the LED light has been maximized.

Delivery: 
We expect to release the product by the end of April. The release date would be obeyed unless severe technical or logistical issue.

International Logistics: 
We are aware of issues of international delivery from other projects in Indiegogo. Our expert logistic staffs will proactively assist recipients to eliminate potential delays or missing products during transportation. Unfortunately, some countries impose duties, fees and taxes which will be recipients' responsibility.

story:
About

The history of wooden utensils is rooted in the distant past. Our ancestors carved many household items from wood - benches, tables, barrels, wooden spoons of different sizes and much more. At the beginning of the 20th century, the popularity of such dishes significantly decreased.But tired of everything artificial, the modern inhabitants of our planet crave environmentally friendly household goods, that is why we considering that projects can help people to choose more healthy and modern utensils at the same time. We all want to be healthy, to live in harmony with nature, so that household items will bring exclusively joy and health benefits, as well as will be environmentally friendly.

 The table served by wooden utensils looks cosy and warm, what makes any modern kitchen interior irresistible.

 

Introducing Avedo eco kitchen utensils

In addition to beauty and practicality, utensils have several advantages:

  • Environmental friendliness. People began to take care of their health more often and wooden kitchen appliances will help at that. You can be sure that in the composition of natural walnut wood, there are no harmful chemical compounds that destroy human body. The big benefit of wooden spoons is that even the smallest members of your family can use them, insofar as wood utensils are absolutely safe.
  • Healing properties. It is no secret that wood has healing properties. When heated, and even during normal use, wooden utensils release useful essential oils, that benefits our body.
  • Cooking food with wooden tools, help to save its natural flavour and food are enriched with useful enzymes by absorbing the woody aroma, it unleashes foods full flavour.
  • Strength. Wooden utensils are highly durable. If you drop a wooden tool on the floor, it will not crash or bend. Utensils are absolutely safe at high temperatures and in dishwashers.
  • Zero thermal conductivity. The wood does not conduct heat at all, which means that you can try your favourite dishes with such devices without bothering to get burned.
  • Safe to all dishes. The use of wooden tools completely eliminates damage to the non-stick coating in pans and pots. It is also very convenient to mix salads in glass bowls with wooden spoons with long handles. This method will not allow you to chop or scratch the walls of the salad bowl, and the dish looks very stylish in such a serving.
  • Good compatibility. Wood utensils go well with porcelain sets and glass dishes. The main thing here is to observe the unity of style.

 

Avedo eco design 

We have been investigated all types and styles of wooden utensils on the market, and it became clear why majority of people  prefer tools from artificial materials rather than natural. The main reason for this is small variety of wooden and natural tools, as well their similarity and nondescript old-fashioned look. Nobody wants to  ruin kitchen view and buy something what isn't harmonised to festive table.  

Thus, considering all mentioned factors, we decided to create something special, what will be absolutely natural, fashionable, durable and lovely.

First sketches of Avedo eco utensils were drawn by hand and pencil, we tried to display as much as we could, how should durable and stylish kitchen utensils look like and which we would like to use ourselves on a daily basis. 

Later on, considering all necessary preferences, utensils were redesigned in computer modulation. Avedo eco utensils turned out to be looking well. We believe that many housewives would like to have such an assistants along them at the kitchen everyday. 

To create absolutely comfortable utensils for kitchen use, were taken into account all essential kitchen, dishes and human parameters. Accordingly Avedo eco kitchen utensils are in the following shapes and sizes: 

We have already prototyped our Avedo eco utensils, but will continue our enhancement process over the next few weeks to get everything done right. That means there may be some slight changes on carving style or utensil sizes. But you don't have to worry about that, as soon as we will have any changes, we will keep you updated, so there are no surprises on a delivery day.

 

Features 

The set consists of the 6 most important appliances for preparing various daily dishes. Despite the use showed below, each device can be used at its discretion.

Mixing Spoon

This spoon is the smallest and most versatile, spoon is used in food preparation to measure, mix, stir and toss ingredients. Mixing spoon makes it easier to cook and prepare meals. Whether you need a tool to combine ingredients for cooking or baking, or need something to scrape the bottom of the sauce pan with after you prepare dinner, a mixing spoon is an essential tool at every kitchen.

 Serving Spoon

Serving spoon is used to serve or mix dishes. Generally it can be used together with Pasta/Salad fork.

Salad or Pasta Fork

Fork utensil used when preparing and serving various types of strand, ribbon or noodle pasta. The fork is spoon-shaped with upward pointing pieces, what makes easier to serve or mix salads, pasta, and many other dishes. 

Filter Spoon

Filter spoon perfectly scoops up foods and drains water or oil away. Can be used for vegetables, fruits,  pasta, salads, noodles and so on. 

Flat spatula

 A spatula is a hand-held tool that is used for lifting, flipping, or spreading. Spatulas have a handle that is long enough to keep the holder's hand away from what is being lifted or spread, as well as away from a hot surface. The blade of the spatula is wide and thin.

 Wok Turner

When it comes to cooking with a wok, you need the proper tools to ensure your stir-frying is cooking properly. These spatulas are perfect for working with a small and huge woks, as well as vegetables, and many other favourite dishes. 

 

The making of Avedo eco

Manufacturer

To support local UK manufacturing, reduce time and expenses on project implementation and to control Avedo eco utensils production process, we have chosen small local wood manufacturer, which is located here in Greater Manchester.

By hearsay present manufacturer is famous for good and experienced work. He is specialized in producing small furniture for home such as tables, chairs, shelves and etc, thus we consider this as a good idea to cooperate with local wood masters with a good reputation. 

Also one important aspect of choosing where Avedo eco utensils will be produced is production region. We would like to make it in Europe region, namely in England, what is enough valuable for customers worldwide. 

Cooperation system already was agreed with manufacturer, was discussed what kind of raw material will be used, quantity and processing method. Manufacturer will consider all our requirements of item parameters and its features. As well based on our preferences and sketches we have developed trial prototype of 6 piece set.

Material

We want to make Avedo eco items entirely from environmental friendly material, what will be durable during many years and what will be absolutely harmless, we decided to use sustainable nutwood namely walnut wood. Walnut wood is considered as valuable material among all wood. Walnut has many benefits such as density, resiliency, durability, which help tools remain in the same original condition for a long time. 

 

Funding and Fulfillment

 

Estimated target is 10.000£ due to the following costs for the project implementation:

We are raising the amount required for a minimum production of 300 units. This amount covers the cost of items manufacturing, material expenses, shipping costs and all required fees. 

Worldwide shipping costs are already included into a pledge price, thus there will not be any extra fees.

 

 

Timeline 

We have ensured both our material suppliers and manufacturers are ready to go.

Our Story 

Hey Indiegogo, I am Anastasia cooking enthusiast and nature lover. I always try to use non-toxic, non-artificial, eco-friendly, natural products, because they are not harmful for the health, good for the nature and environment. That's why I recommend to use eco-friendly and safe household products.

By developing eco-friendly wooden utensils for cooking, I tried to take into account all necessary factors for making it absolutely safe for human health and environment, as well as inalienable and beautiful part of kitchen interior. 

Just a few decades ago my family inherited the remaining wooden appliances from our grandparents. That was really old dishes and utensils painted by Russian folk drawings, but after awhile my family decided to get rid of that old fashioned appliances and to replace it with new and modern items. 

Due to its plain appearance, wooden dishes are considered as last century fashion, and because of it nobody wants to use it regardless of benefits and advantages comparing with new and modern inventions. Everybody wants to go with the times forgetting about own health and our planet, insofar as mostly behind new inventions stands chemicals, synthetics, non-recycling materials, what cause harm to our bodies and earth. Manufacturers have to reduce their costs, thus often produce low-quality, cheap, harmful products.

I would like to dispel myths, to combine advantages, safety and beauty at once, to give people opportunity enjoy old-fashioned items nowadays, by giving a chance and preferences to natural eco-friendly utensils.  Avedo eco items will decorate any modern kitchen interior, will benefit your health and environment, as well as it will create a cosy and warm atmosphere at any home.

After successful Indiegogo campaign I plan to bring Avedo eco products in UK market and later worldwide, as I am sure people will love them all around the world. 

 

Thank you Indiegogo

We appreciating your help and support, you help us to bring that wonderful project to life and we are excited to finish that project as soon as possible by making everyone's home and kitchen a little bit more eco-friendly and closer to nature.

 

Rewards

 

Risks and challenges

1.Delay in production due to excessive waste of raw materials and the purchase of additional material.
Since wood is not a homogeneous material, it is possible that many parts of the wood will not be suitable for the integrated production of identical items.
2. Delay in shipping the items due to manufacturing delay.

In order to reduce the likelihood of risks and challenges, were made special calculations of the material with extra stock, in case if there would be a lot of material waste and shortage for making at least 300 items, as well as were taken into account extra time for shipping all ordered items at stated time frames.

In any case, we will keep you updated and posted, if anything mentions above will happen our backers will be the first to know if anything comes along that may affect this timeline. We are fully prepared to make sure this project happens in the stated timeline.
